S06psp_1u:1_0_0: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūte parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ pañcamātrair
S06psp_1u:1_0_1: bhikṣusahasraiḥ sarvair arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair niḥkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ
S06psp_1u:1_0_2: kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair apahṛtabhārair anuprāptasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaiḥ sarvacetovaśiparamapāramitāprāptaiḥ
S06psp_1u:1_0_3: pañcamātrair bhikṣunīśatair upāsakair upāsikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ sarvair dṛṣṭadharmair aparimāṇaiś ca bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ
S06psp_1u:1_0_4: sārdhaṃ sarvair dhāraṇīpratilabdhaiḥ śūnyatāvihāribhir ānimittagocaraiḥ praṇidhānākalpitaiḥ kṣāntisamatāpratilabdhair asaṅgadhāraṇīpratilabdhair
S06psp_1u:1_0_5: acyutābhijñair ādeyavacanair akūhakair alapakair apagatajñātralābhacittair nirāmiṣadharmadeśakair gambhīradharmakṣāntipāraṅgatair
S06psp_1u:1_0_7: smitamukhaiḥ pūrvālāpibhir vigatabhṛkuṭīmukhair gāthābhir gītālapanakuśalair apagatalīnacittair anācchedyapratibhānair anantaparṣadabhibhavanavaiśāradyasamanvāgatair
S06psp_1u:1_1: tadyathā bhadrapālena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ratnākareṇa ca sārthavāhena ca naradattena ca varuṇadattena ca śubhaguptena ca [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:1_2_0: _2] indradattena ca uttaramatinā ca viśeṣamatinā ca vardhamānamatinā ca amoghadarśinā ca susaṃprasthitena ca suvikrāntavikrāmiṇā
S06psp_1u:1_2_1: ca nityodyuktena ca anikṣiptadhūreṇa ca sūryagarbheṇa ca anupamacintinā ca avalokiteśvareṇa ca mahāsthāmaprāptena ca mañjuśriyā
S06psp_1u:1_2_2: ca vajramatinā ca ratnamudrāhastena ca nityotkṣiptahastena ca maitreyeṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena,
S06psp_1u:2_0: atha khalu bhagavān svayam eva siṃhāsanaṃ prajñapya nyaṣīdat paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya abhimukhīṃ smṛtim upasthāpya samādhirājaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma,
S06psp_1u:3_0: atha khalu bhagavān smṛtimān saṃprajānaṃs tasmāt samādher vyutthāya divyena cakṣuṣā sarvalokadhātuṃ vyavalokya sarvakāyāt smitam akarot,
S06psp_1u:3_1: tasyādhastāt pādatalayoḥ sahasrābhyāṃ cakrābhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭīraśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ,
S06psp_1u:3_3: evaṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir gulphābhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir jaṅghābhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir jānumaṇḍalābhyām,
S06psp_1u:3_4: evaṃ dvābhyām ūrubhyāṃ kaṭinābhimaṇḍalābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ pārśvābhyāṃ hṛdayaśrīvatsān mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāt,
S06psp_1u:3_5: evaṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir daśabhyo hastāṅgulibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir dvābhyāṃ bāhubhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir dvābhyām aṃśābhyām,
S06psp_1u:3_6_0: evaṃ grīvāyāś catvāriṃśadbhyo dantebhyo dvābhyāṃ ghrāṇābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ śrotrābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ cakṣurbhyāṃ madhyād ūrṇāyā upariṣṭād
S06psp_1u:3_7: yai raśmibhir ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur avabhāsito 'bhūt parisphuṭaḥ,
S06psp_1u:3_8: pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena mahatā raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitāś cābhūvan,
S06psp_1u:3_9_0: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarasyām adhastād
S06psp_1u:3_9_1: upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena mahatā raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitāś cābhūvan,
S06psp_1u:3_10: ye ca sattvās tena mahatā raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitās te sarve niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_1u:4_1: atha khalu bhagavān punar eva sarvaromakūpebhyaḥ smitam akarot,
S06psp_1u:4_3: yair ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur avabhāsitaḥ sphuṭo 'bhūt,
S06psp_1u:4_4: taiś ca pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamāḥ sarvalokadhātavo 'vabhāsenāvabhāsitāḥ sphuṭāś cābhūvan,
S06psp_1u:4_5_0: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād
S06psp_1u:4_6: tena ca raśmyavabhāsenaye sattvāḥ spṛṣṭās te sarve niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_1u:5_0: atha khalu bhagavān punar eva yā sā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prakṛtiprabhā tayā prabhayā trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum avabhāsayāmāsa,
S06psp_1u:5_1: yāvat sarvāsu daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tayā prabhayā avabhāsitā abhūvan,
S06psp_1u:5_2: ye ca sattvās tayā prabhayā spṛṣṭās te sarve niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_1u:6_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ jihvendriyaṃ nirṇāmayāmāsa,
S06psp_1u:6_2: trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ jihvendriyeṇa sphuritvā tasmāj jihvendriyāt smitam akarot,
S06psp_1u:6_4: raśmimukhe caikaikasminn uttamamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāny utpannāny abhūvan,
S06psp_1u:6_5: teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇāḥ saṃsthitāś cābhūvan dharmaṃ deśayanto yad uta imām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām,
S06psp_1u:6_6: te pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamavyativṛttāsaṃkhyeṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti sma,
S06psp_1u:6_7: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād ūrdhvaṃ digvidikṣu,
S06psp_1u:6_8: ekaikasyāṃ ca diśi daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu aparimāṇeṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti sma,
S06psp_1u:6_9: yad uta imām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām,
S06psp_1u:6_10: ye ca sattvās tāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śmvanti te niyatā bhavanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_1u:7_1: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ siṃhavikrīḍitaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
S06psp_1u:7_2: tathārūpaṃ carddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskaroti sma yathārūpeṇarddhyabhisaṃskāreṇābhisaṃskṛtenāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāram akampata prākampata saṃprākampata,
S06psp_1u:7_3: acalat prācalat saṃprācalat, avedhat prāvedhat saṃprāvedhat,
S06psp_1u:7_4: araṇat prāraṇat saṃprāraṇat, akṣubhyat prākṣubhyat saṃprākṣubhyat,
S06psp_1u:8_0: atha khalu tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtena ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau nirayā vā tiryagyonayo vā yamalokā vā te sarve samucchinnāḥ śūnyā abhūvan,
S06psp_1u:8_2: ye ca sattvās tābhyo narakatiryagyoniyamalokagatibhyaś cyutās te sarve tenaiva prītiprāmodhyena manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapannāś cābhūvan,
S06psp_1u:8_3: evaṃ cāturmahārājikānāṃ devānāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapannāś cābhūvan.
S06psp_1u:9_0: atha khalu te manuṣyās te ca devā bhagavata evānubhāvena pūrvajanmāny anusmaranti sma,
S06psp_1u:9_1: anusmṛtya ca tenaiva prītiprāmodyena yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ,
S06psp_1u:9_2: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhir abhivandya bhagavantaṃ prāñjalayo bhūtvā namasyanti sma,
S06psp_1u:9_3_0: evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣūrdhvam adhaḥ samantād daśasu
S06psp_1u:9_3_1: dikṣv ekaikasmin digbhāge gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarve nirayāḥ sarvās tiryagyonayaḥ sarve yamalokāḥ samucchinnāḥ
S06psp_1u:9_5: ye ca sattvās tābhyo nirayatiryagyoniyamalokagatibhyaś cyutās te sarve devamanuṣyeṣūpapadyante sma,
S06psp_1u:9_6: te ca devamanuṣyeṣūpapannā bhagavata evānubhāvena pūrvanivāsam [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:9_7: _5] anusmaranti sma, anusmṛtya ca tenaiva prītiprāmodyena svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ye tatra buddhā bhagavanta utpannās teṣām antikān upasaṃkrāntāḥ,
S06psp_1u:9_8: upasaṃkramya teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pādavandanāṃ kṛtvā sarve prāñjalayo bhūtvā bhagavato namasyanti sma.
S06psp_1u:10_0: atha khalu ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau jātyandhāḥ sattvās te cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyanti sma,
S06psp_1u:10_1: vadhirāḥ sattvāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śṛṇvanti sma,
S06psp_1u:10_10: bhrātṛbhaginīsamacittā mitrāmātyajñātisālohitasamacittā daśakuśalakarmapathasevinaś ca bhavanti sma,
S06psp_1u:10_11_0: brahmacāriṇaḥ śucayo nirāmayagandhāḥ sarvasattvāś ca sarvasukhasamarpitā īdṛśaṃ sukhaṃ pratilabhante sma tadyathāpi nāma
S06psp_1u:10_11_1: tṛtīyadhyānasamāpannasya bhikṣoḥ tasminn eva ca samaye evaṃrūpayā prajñayā te samanvāgatā bhavanti sma,
S06psp_1u:10_12: yad anyabuddhakṣetrasthā buddhā bhagavanta evam udānayanti sma.
S06psp_1u:10_13: sādhu damaḥ asādhu śamaḥ sādhu saṃyamaḥ sādhu cīrṇo brahmacaryāvāsaḥ sādhu prāṇibhūteṣv avihiṃseti.
S06psp_1u:11_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ,
S06psp_1u:11_1: imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma,
S06psp_1u:11_3: pūrvasyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād ūrdhvaṃ digvidikṣu gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn abhibhūya tathāgatas tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma,
S06psp_1u:11_5: tadyathāpi nāma sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ sarvaparvatān abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma ābhayā varṇena śriyā tejasā ca,
S06psp_1u:11_6: evam eva bhagavān [PvsP1-1:_6] sarvalokadhātūn abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma,
S06psp_1u:12_0: atha khalu bhagavān punar eva yādṛk trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvānām ātmabhāvas tat samānam ātmabhāvaṃ prākṛtam upadarśayāmāsa.
S06psp_1u:13_0_0: atha khalu ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śuddhāvāsakāyikā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā ābhāsvarā brahmakāyikā devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaś
S06psp_1u:13_0_1: ca nirmāṇaratayaś ca tuṣitāś ca yāmāś ca trāyastriṃśāś ca cāturmahārājakāyikāś ca devās te taṃ tathāgatasyāsecanakam ātmabhāvaṃ
S06psp_1u:13_0_3: gṛhītvā divyāni ca keśaratamālapatrāṇi gṛhītvā yena tathāgatasyāsecanaka ātmabhāvas tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ,
S06psp_1u:13_1_0: ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau manuṣyās te 'pi taṃ tathāgatasyāsecanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthalajalajāni puṣpāṇi
S06psp_1u:14_0_0: atha khalu te devās te ca mānuṣās tābhir divyābhiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhis
S06psp_1u:14_0_1: taiś ca sthalajalajaiḥ puṣpais taṃ tathāgatakāyam avakiranti sma,
S06psp_1u:15_0_0: atha khalu yais taiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantīvarṣaiḥ sthalajalajaiś ca puṣpair
S06psp_1u:15_0_1: bhagavān avakīrṇas tāni ca sarvāṇi uparyantarīkṣe bhagavato 'dhiṣṭhānena trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātupramāṇam ekaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ
S06psp_1u:15_1: tataś ca kūṭāgārāt tāni divyāni puṣpapaṭṭadāmāni lambante pralambante sma,
S06psp_1u:15_2: taiś ca puṣpadāmabhiḥ paṭṭadāmabhiś cāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur atīvāśobhata,
S06psp_1u:15_3: tena ca suvarṇavarṇena bhagavataḥ prabhāvabhāsena daśasu dikṣu prasṛtena ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭāvabhāsitāś cābhūvan,
S06psp_1u:15_4: asmiṃś ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarveṣu cāturdvīpakeṣu lokadhātuṣu teṣāṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:15_5: _7] ca ekaikasyaitad abhūt, mama puratas tathāgato niṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ deśayatīti.
S06psp_1u:16_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ punar eva smitam akarot,
S06psp_1u:16_2: yāvad daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan,
S06psp_1u:16_3: ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti sma saśrāvakasaṃghān,
S06psp_1u:16_4: tasyāṃ ca pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvās te sarve imāṃ sahālokadhātuṃ paśyanti sma śākyamuniṃ ca tathāgataṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena.
S06psp_1u:16_5_0: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarasyām adha ūrdhvaṃ
S06psp_1u:16_5_1: digbhāge gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti sma saśrāvakasaṃghān,
S06psp_1u:16_6: teṣu ca gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvās te sarve imāṃ sahālokadhātuṃ paśyanti sma śākyamuniñ ca tathāgataṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena.
S06psp_1u:17_0_0: atha khalu pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātū ratnāvatī nāma tatra
S06psp_1u:17_0_1: ratnākaro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S06psp_1u:17_1: sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_1u:18_0_0: atha tatra lokadhātau samantaraśmir nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ
S06psp_1u:18_0_1: tañ ca bhagavato 'secanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān ratnākaras tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya
S06psp_1u:18_0_2: tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ ratnākaram etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:18_1: ko bhagavan hetuḥ? kaḥ pratyayo? 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāyāsya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya ca tathāgatasyāsecanakātmabhāvasya saṃdarśanāya.
S06psp_1u:19_0: evam ukte ratnākaras tathāgataḥ samantaraśmiṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:19_1: asti kulaputretaḥ paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:19_2: _8] atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S06psp_1u:19_3: sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati tasyāyam īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ.
S06psp_1u:20_0: atha khalu samantaraśmir bodhisattvo ratnākaraṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:20_1_0: gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān
S06psp_1u:20_1_1: mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān sarvasamādhivaśipāramitāṅ gatān.
S06psp_1u:21_0: sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.
S06psp_1u:22_0: atha khalu ratnākaras tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni samantaraśmaye bodhisattvāya prādāt,
S06psp_1u:22_1: etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ,
S06psp_1u:22_2: evañ ca vadeḥ ratnākaro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:22_3: imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti,
S06psp_1u:22_4: saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:22_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapannāḥ.
S06psp_1u:23_0_0: atha khalu samantaraśmir bodhisattvo ratnākarasya tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvamanirbhāsāni
S06psp_1u:23_0_1: sahasrapatrāṇi anekair bodhisattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ
S06psp_1u:23_0_2: puraskṛtaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi teṣu gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan mānayan pūjayan
S06psp_1u:23_3: ekānte sthitaś ca samantaraśmir bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamunim etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:23_4: ratnākaro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:23_5: imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa tathāgatena [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:23_6: _9] nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ.
S06psp_1u:24_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat,
S06psp_1u:24_1: taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan,
S06psp_1u:24_3: teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām,
S06psp_1u:24_4: yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_1u:25_0_0: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca dārikās tato ratnāvatyā lokadhātoḥ samantaraśminā
S06psp_1u:25_0_1: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjyaikānte
S06psp_1u:26_0_0: atha khalu dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātuḥ sarvaśokāpagato
S06psp_1u:26_0_1: nāma tatrāśokaśrīr nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S06psp_1u:26_1: sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_1u:27_0_0: atha tatra lokadhātau vigataśoko nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ
S06psp_1u:27_0_1: tañ ca bhagavato 'secanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān aśokaśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya
S06psp_1u:27_0_2: tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgatam aśokaśriyam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:27_1: ko bhagavan hetuḥ? kaḥ pratyayo? 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāyāsya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya ca tathāgatasyāsecanakātmabhāvasya saṃdarśanāya.
S06psp_1u:28_0: evam ukte aśokaśrīs tathāgato vigataśokaṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:28_1: asti kulaputreta uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S06psp_1u:28_2: sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati tasyāyam īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ.
S06psp_1u:29_1: atha khalu vigataśoko bodhisattvo 'śokaśriyaṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:29_2_0: gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān
S06psp_1u:29_2_1: mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān sarvasamādhivaśipāramitāṅ gatān.
S06psp_1u:30_0: sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.
S06psp_1u:31_0: atha khalu aśokaśrīs tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni vigataśokāya bodhisattvāya prādāt,
S06psp_1u:31_1: etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ,
S06psp_1u:31_2: evañ ca vadeḥ, aśokaśrīr bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:31_3: imāni ca tena bhagavatā aśokaśriyā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti,
S06psp_1u:31_4: saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:31_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapannāḥ.
S06psp_1u:32_0_0: atha khalu vigataśoko bodhisattvo 'śokaśriyaḥ tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanirbhāsāni
S06psp_1u:32_0_1: sahasrapatrāṇi anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ
S06psp_1u:32_0_2: puraskṛtaḥ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi teṣu gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan mānayan pūjayan
S06psp_1u:32_3: ekānte sthitaś ca vigataśoko bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamunim etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:32_4: aśokaśrīr bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:32_5: imāni ca tena bhagavatā aśokaśriyā tathāgatena nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ.
S06psp_1u:33_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:33_1: _11] yena te dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat,
S06psp_1u:33_2: taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan,
S06psp_1u:33_3: teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakās teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti sma,
S06psp_1u:33_5: yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_1u:34_0_0: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca dārikās tataḥ sarvaśokāpagatāyā lokadhātoḥ
S06psp_1u:34_0_1: vigataśokena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya
S06psp_1u:35_0_0: atha khalu paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātur upaśāntā nāma tatra
S06psp_1u:35_0_1: ratnārcir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S06psp_1u:35_1: sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_1u:36_0_0: atha tatra lokadhātau cāritramatir nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ
S06psp_1u:36_0_1: tañ ca bhagavato 'secanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān ratnārcis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya
S06psp_1u:36_0_2: tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ ratnārciṣam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:36_1: ko bhagavan hetuḥ? kaḥ pratyayo? 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāyāsya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya ca tathāgatasyāsecanakātmabhāvasya saṃdarśanāya.
S06psp_1u:37_0: evam ukte ratnārciḥ tathāgataḥ cāritramatiṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:37_1: asti kulaputretaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S06psp_1u:37_2: sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati tasyāyam īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ.
S06psp_1u:38_0: atha khalu cāritramatir bodhisattvo ratnārciṣaṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:38_1: gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:38_2_0: _12] śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān
S06psp_1u:39_0: sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.
S06psp_1u:40_0: atha khalu ratnārcis tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni cāritramataye bodhisattvāya prādāt,
S06psp_1u:40_1: etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ,
S06psp_1u:40_2: evañ ca vadeḥ, ratnārcir bhagavān bhagavantam alpabādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:40_3: imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnārciṣā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti,
S06psp_1u:40_4: saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:40_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapannāḥ.
S06psp_1u:41_0_0: atha khalu cāritramatir bodhisattvo ratnārciṣas tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanirbhāsāni
S06psp_1u:41_0_1: sahasrapatrāṇi anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ

S06psp_1u:41_3: ekānte sthitaś ca cāritramatir bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamunim etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:41_4: ratnārcir bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,

S06psp_1u:42_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:42_1: _13] yena te paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat,
S06psp_1u:42_2: taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan,
S06psp_1u:42_3: teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakās teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām,
S06psp_1u:42_4: yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sadharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_1u:43_0_0: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca dārikās tata upaśāntāyā lokadhātoś cāritramatiṇā
S06psp_1u:43_0_1: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjyaikānte
S06psp_1u:44_0_0: atha khalv uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātur jayā nāma tatra
S06psp_1u:44_0_1: jayendro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S06psp_1u:44_1: sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_1u:45_0_0: atha tatra lokadhātau jayadatto nāma bodhisattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavato
S06psp_1u:45_0_1: 'secanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavāñ jayendras tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya tasya
S06psp_1u:45_0_2: bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ jayendram etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:45_1: ko bhagavan hetuḥ? kaḥ pratyayo? 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāyāsya ca mahatāḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya ca tathāgatasyāsecanakātmabhāvasya saṃdarśanāya.

S06psp_1u:47_1_0: [PvsP1-1:_14] gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya

S06psp_1u:50_4: jayendro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:50_5: imāni ca tena bhagavatā jayendreṇa tathāgatena nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ.
S06psp_1u:51_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:51_1: _15] prākṣipat, taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan,
S06psp_1u:51_2: teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakās teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ,
S06psp_1u:51_3: yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_1u:52_0_0: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca dārikās tato jayāyā lokadhātoḥ jayadattena
S06psp_1u:52_0_1: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjyaikānte
S06psp_1u:53_0_0: atha khalv uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātuḥ samādhyalaṅkṛtā
S06psp_1u:53_0_1: nāma tatra samādhihastyuttaraśrīr nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S06psp_1u:53_1: sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_1u:54_0_0: atha tatra lokadhātau vijayavikrāmī nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ
S06psp_1u:54_0_1: tañ ca bhagavato 'secanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān samādhihastyuttaraśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad
S06psp_1u:54_0_2: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya bhagavantaṃ tathāgataṃ samādhihastyuttaraśriyam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:54_1: ko bhagavan hetuḥ? kaḥ pratyayo? 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya asya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya cāsecanakasya tathāgatātmabhāvasya saṃdarśanāya.
S06psp_1u:55_0: evam ukte bhagavān samādhihastyuttaraśrīs tathāgato vijayavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:55_1_0: asti kulaputreto dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma
S06psp_1u:56_0: atha khalu vijayavikrāmī bodhisattvaḥ samādhihastyuttaraśriyaṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:56_2_0: _16] tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān
S06psp_1u:57_0: sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.
S06psp_1u:58_0: atha khalu samādhihastyuttaraśrīs tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāṇi vijayavikrāmiṇe bodhisattvāya prādāt,
S06psp_1u:58_1: etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmaiḥ śākyamunin tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ,
S06psp_1u:58_2: evaṃ ca vadeḥ, samādhihastyuttaraśrīr bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānetāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:58_3: imāni ca tena bhagavatā samādhihastyuttaraśriyā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti,
S06psp_1u:58_4: saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:58_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapannāḥ.
S06psp_1u:59_0_0: atha vijayavikrāmī bodhisattvaḥ samādhihastyuttaraśriyas tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanibhāsāni
S06psp_1u:59_0_1: sahasrapatrāṇi anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ
S06psp_1u:59_0_2: puraskṛta uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan manayan pūjayan
S06psp_1u:59_1: yena ca śākyamunis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte 'tiṣṭhat,
S06psp_1u:59_2: ekānte sthitaś ca vijayavikrāmī bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamunim etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:59_3: samādhisastyuttaraśrīr bhagavan bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāñ ca paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:59_4: imāni ca tena bhagavatā samādhihastyuttaraśriyā tathāgatena nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ.
S06psp_1u:60_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tena [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:60_1: _17] prākṣipat, taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan.
S06psp_1u:60_2_0: teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakās teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ
S06psp_1u:60_2_1: dharmadeśanāṃ yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_1u:61_0_0: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca dārikās tataḥ samādhyalaṃkṛtāyā lokadhātor
S06psp_1u:61_0_1: vijayavikrāmiṇā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya
S06psp_1u:62_0_0: atha khalu pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātur bodhimaṇḍālaṃkārarucirā
S06psp_1u:62_0_1: nāma tatra padmottaraśrīr nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S06psp_1u:62_1: sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_1u:63_0_0: atha tatra lokadhātau padmahasto nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ
S06psp_1u:63_0_1: tañ ca bhagavato 'secanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān padmottaraśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad
S06psp_1u:63_0_2: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ padmottaraśriyam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:63_1: ko bhagavan hetuḥ? kaḥ pratyayo? 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāyāsya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya cāsyāsecanakasya tathāgatātmabhāvasya saṃdarśanāya.
S06psp_1u:64_0: evam ukte bhagavān padmottaraśrīs tathāgataḥ padmahastaṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:64_1_0: asti kulaputretaḥ paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma
S06psp_1u:64_2: sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati tasyāyam īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ.
S06psp_1u:65_0: atha khalu padmahasto bodhisattvaḥ padmottaraśriyaṃ tathāgatam [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:65_1_0: _18] etad avocat: gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahā nāma lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya
S06psp_1u:65_1_1: tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān sarvasamādhivaśipāramiṅ
S06psp_1u:66_0: sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.
S06psp_1u:67_0: atha khalu padmottaraśrī tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni padmahastāya bodhisattvāya prādāt,
S06psp_1u:67_1: etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ,
S06psp_1u:67_2: evañ ca vadeḥ, padmottaraśrī bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:67_3: imāni ca tena bhagavatā padmottaśriyā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti,
S06psp_1u:67_4: saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:67_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapannāḥ.
S06psp_1u:68_0: atha khalu padmahasto bodhisattvaḥ padmottaraśriyas tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi,
S06psp_1u:68_1_0: anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ
S06psp_1u:68_1_1: pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi teṣu gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan mānayan pūjayan puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir
S06psp_1u:68_2: yena ca śākyamunis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ,
S06psp_1u:68_4: ekāntasthitaś ca padmahasto bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamunim etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:68_5: padmottaraśrī bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:68_6: imāni ca tena bhagavatā padmottaraśriyā tathāgatena nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ.
S06psp_1u:69_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:69_1: _19] yena te pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat,
S06psp_1u:69_2: taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan,
S06psp_1u:69_3: teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakās teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ,
S06psp_1u:69_4: yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_1u:70_0_0: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca dārikās tato bodhimaṇḍālaṃkārasurucirāyā
S06psp_1u:70_0_1: lokadhātoḥ padmahastena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya
S06psp_1u:71_0_0: atha khalu dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātur vigatarajaḥsañcayā
S06psp_1u:71_0_1: nāma tatra sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśrīr nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S06psp_1u:71_1: sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_1u:72_0_0: atha tatra lokadhātau sūryaprabhāso nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ
S06psp_1u:72_0_1: tañ ca bhagavato 'secanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas
S06psp_1u:72_0_2: tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśriyam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:72_1: ko bhagavan hetuḥ? kaḥ pratyayo? 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāyāsya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya cāsecanakasya tathāgatātmabhāvasya saṃdarśanāya.
S06psp_1u:73_0: evam ukte bhagavān sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśrīs tathāgataḥ sūryaprabhāsaṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:73_1_0: asti kulaputreta uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma
S06psp_1u:73_2: sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati tasyāyam īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ.
S06psp_1u:74_1: atha khalu sūryaprabhāso bodhisattvaḥ sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśriyaṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:74_2_0: gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca sākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān
S06psp_1u:74_2_1: mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān sarvasamādhivaśipāramiṅ gatān.
S06psp_1u:75_0: sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.
S06psp_1u:76_0: atha khalu sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśrīs tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni sūryaprabhāsāya bodhisattvāya prādāt,
S06psp_1u:76_1: etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ,
S06psp_1u:76_2: evañ ca vadeḥ, sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśrī bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:76_3: imāni ca tena bhagavatā sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśriyā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti,
S06psp_1u:76_4: saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:76_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapannāḥ.
S06psp_1u:77_0_0: atha khalu sūryaprabhāso bodhisattvaḥ sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśriyaḥ tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā
S06psp_1u:77_0_1: suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikābhiś
S06psp_1u:77_0_2: ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi teṣu gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan
S06psp_1u:77_3: ekāntasthitaś ca sūryaprabhāso bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamunim etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:77_4: sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśrī bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,

S06psp_1u:78_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat,
S06psp_1u:78_1: taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan,
S06psp_1u:78_2: teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakās teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ,
S06psp_1u:78_3: yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_1u:79_0_0: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca dārikās tato vigatarajaḥsañcayāyā lokadhātoḥ
S06psp_1u:79_0_1: sūryaprabhāsena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya
S06psp_1u:80_0_0: atha khalu paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātur vaśībhūtā
S06psp_1u:80_0_1: nāma tatraikacchattro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S06psp_1u:80_1: sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_1u:81_0_0: atha tatra lokadhātau ratnottamo nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ
S06psp_1u:81_0_1: tañ ca bhagavato 'secanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān ekacchattras tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad
S06psp_1u:81_0_2: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgatam ekacchattram etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:81_1: ko bhagavan hetuḥ? kaḥ pratyayo? 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya,
S06psp_1u:81_2: asya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya cāsecanakasya tathāgatātmabhāvasya saṃdarśanāya.
S06psp_1u:82_0: evam ukte bhagavān ekacchattras tathāgato ratnottamaṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:82_1: asti kulaputra itaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:82_2: _22] nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbubddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S06psp_1u:82_3: sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati tasyāyam īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ.
S06psp_1u:83_0: atha khalu ratnottamo bodhisattva ekacchattraṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:83_1_0: gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān
S06psp_1u:83_1_1: mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān sarvasamādhivaśipāramitāṅ gatān.
S06psp_1u:84_0: sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.
S06psp_1u:85_0: atha khalu ekacchattras tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni ratnottamāya bodhisattvāya prādāt,
S06psp_1u:85_1: etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ,
S06psp_1u:85_2: evañ ca vadeḥ, ekacchattro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:85_3: imāni ca tena bhagavatā ekacchattreṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti,
S06psp_1u:85_4: saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:85_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapannāḥ.
S06psp_1u:86_0_0: atha khalu ratnottamo bodhisattva ekacchattrasya tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanirbhāsāni
S06psp_1u:86_0_1: sahasrapatrāṇi anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ
S06psp_1u:86_0_2: puraskṛtaḥ paścimottarasyāṃ diśi teṣu gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan mānayan pūjayan
S06psp_1u:86_1: yena ca śākyamunis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ,
S06psp_1u:86_5: ekacchattro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:86_6: imāni ca tena bhagavatā ekacchattreṇa tathāgatena nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni prahitāni bhagavataḥ.
S06psp_1u:87_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat,
S06psp_1u:87_1: taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan,
S06psp_1u:87_2: teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakāḥ teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām,
S06psp_1u:87_3: yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_1u:88_0_0: atha khalu te boadhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca dārikās tato vaśībhūtāyā lokadhāto ratnottameṇa
S06psp_1u:88_0_1: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjyaikānte
S06psp_1u:89_0_0: atha khalv adhastād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātuḥ padmā nāma tatra padmaśrīr
S06psp_1u:89_0_1: nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S06psp_1u:89_1: sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_1u:90_0_0: atha tatra lokadhātau padmottaro nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ
S06psp_1u:90_0_1: tañ ca bhagavato 'secanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān padmaśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya
S06psp_1u:90_0_2: tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ padmaśriyam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:90_1: ko bhagavan hetuḥ? kaḥ pratyayo? 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya,
S06psp_1u:90_2: [PvsP1-1:_24] asya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya cāsecanakasya tathāgatātmabhāvasya saṃdarśanāya.
S06psp_1u:91_0: evam ukte bhagavān padmaśrīs tathāgataḥ padmottaraṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:91_1: asti kulaputreta upariṣṭā diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S06psp_1u:91_2: sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati tasyāyam īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ.
S06psp_1u:92_0: atha khalu padmottaro bodhisattvaḥ padmaśriyaṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:92_1_0: gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān
S06psp_1u:92_1_1: mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān sarvasamādhivaśipāramiṅ gatān.
S06psp_1u:93_0: sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.
S06psp_1u:94_0: atha khalu padmaśrīs tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni padmottarāya bodhisattvāya prādāt,
S06psp_1u:94_1: etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ,
S06psp_1u:94_2: evañ ca vadeḥ, padmaśrīr bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:94_3: imāni ca tena bhagavatā padmaśriyā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti,
S06psp_1u:94_4: saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:94_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapannāḥ.
S06psp_1u:95_0_0: atha khalu padmottaro bodhisattvaḥ padmaśriyas tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanirbhāsāni
S06psp_1u:95_0_1: sahasrapatrāṇi anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ
S06psp_1u:95_0_2: puraskṛtaḥ adhastād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:95_1: _25] gurukurvan mānayan pūjayan puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir yenāyaṃ sahālokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ,
S06psp_1u:95_2: yena ca śākyamunis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ,
S06psp_1u:95_4: ekāntasthitaś ca padmottaro bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamunim etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:95_5: padmaśrīr bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:95_6: imāni ca tena bhagavatā padmaśriyā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ.
S06psp_1u:96_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te 'dhastād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat,
S06psp_1u:96_1: taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan,
S06psp_1u:96_3: teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām,
S06psp_1u:96_4: yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_1u:97_0_0: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca dārikās tataḥ padmāyā lokadhātor padmottareṇa
S06psp_1u:97_0_1: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjyaikānte
S06psp_1u:98_0_0: atha khalūpariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātur nandā nāma tatra nandaśrīr
S06psp_1u:98_0_1: nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S06psp_1u:98_1: sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_1u:99_0: atha khalu tatra lokadhātau nandadatto nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:99_1_0: _26] bhagavato 'secanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān nandaśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya
S06psp_1u:99_1_1: tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ nandaśriyam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:99_2: ko bhagavan hetuḥ? kaḥ pratyayo? 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya,
S06psp_1u:99_3: asya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya cāsecanakasya tathāgatātmabhāvasya saṃdarśanāya.
S06psp_1u:100_0: evam ukte bhagavān nandaśrīs tathāgato nandadattaṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:100_1: asti kulaputra ito 'dhastād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S06psp_1u:100_2: sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati tasyāyam īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ.
S06psp_1u:101_0: atha khalu nandadatto bodhisattvo nandaśriyaṃ tathāgatam etad avoacat:
S06psp_1u:101_1_0: gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān
S06psp_1u:101_1_1: mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān sarvasamādhivaśipāramiṅ gatān.
S06psp_1u:102_0: sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.
S06psp_1u:103_0: atha khalu nandaśrīs tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni nandadattāya bodhisattvāya prādāt,
S06psp_1u:103_1: etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ,
S06psp_1u:103_2: evañ ca vader, nandaśrīr bhagavān bhagavantam alpabādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:103_3: imāni ca tena bhagavatā nandaśriyā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti,
S06psp_1u:103_4: saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:103_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapannāḥ.
S06psp_1u:104_0_0: atha nandadatto bodhisattvo nandaśriyas tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi
S06psp_1u:104_0_1: anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛta
S06psp_1u:104_1_0: _27] gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan mānayan pūjayan puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir
S06psp_1u:104_2: yena ca śākyamunis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ,
S06psp_1u:104_4: ekānte sthitaś ca nandadatto bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:104_5: nandaśrīr bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:104_6: imāni ca tena bhagavatā nandaśriyā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ.
S06psp_1u:105_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena ta upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat,
S06psp_1u:105_1: taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan,
S06psp_1u:105_2: teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakās teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ,
S06psp_1u:105_3: yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_1u:106_0_0: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca dārikās tato nandāyā lokadhātor nandadattena
S06psp_1u:106_0_1: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjyaikānte
S06psp_1u:107_0: atha khalu tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtena ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ saptaratnamayaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt puṣpābhikīrṇaḥ,
S06psp_1u:107_1: avasaktapaṭṭadāmakalāpaḥ kalpavṛkṣair nānālaṅkāraphalāvanatāgraviṭapaiḥ puṣpavṛkṣaiḥ phalavṛkṣair gandhavṛkṣair mālyavṛkṣaiś copaśobhito 'bhūt,
S06psp_1u:107_2: tadyathāpi nāma padmāvatī lokadhātuḥ samantakusumasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetraṃ yatra mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ prativasati susthitamatiś ca bodhisattvaḥ,
S06psp_1u:107_4: [PvsP1-1:_28] bhagavāṃś cādrākṣīt, sadevalokaṃ saṃnipatitaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāṃ prajāṃ saṃnipatitāṃs tāṃś ca bodhisattvān kumārabhūtān.
S06psp_1u:109_0: tatra khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayāmāsa:
S06psp_1u:109_1: sarvākāraṃ śāriputra sarvadharmān abhisaṃboddhukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:111_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:111_1: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākāraṃ sarvadharmān abhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ?
S06psp_1u:112_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:112_1: iha śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvāsthānayogena,
S06psp_1u:114_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra daśasu dikṣu pratyekaṃ gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvās tān sarvān anupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau
S06psp_1u:115_1_0: evaṃ matsariṇaḥ sattvān dāne pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena duḥśīlān śīle vyāpādabahulān kṣāntau kuśīdān vīrye vikṣiptacittān dhyāne
S06psp_1u:115_1_1: duṣprajñān prajñāsaṃpadi pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:117_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra sarvākāraṃ sarvadharmān abhisaṃboddhukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:119_0: evam iha śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvāsthānayogena dānapāramitā paripūrayitavyā deyadāyakapratigrāhakānupalabdhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:119_1: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā paripūrayitavyā prajñādauṣprajñānupalabdhitām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:121_0: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śāriputra sthitvā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni paripūrayitavyāni,
S06psp_1u:121_1: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ paripūrayitavyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:121_5: evaṃ catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
S06psp_1u:121_6: aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ navāśubhāḥ saṃjñā bhāvayitavyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:121_7: katamā nava? yad uta ādhmātakasaṃjñā vidhūtakasaṃjñā vipūyakasaṃjñā vilohitakasaṃjñā vinīlakasaṃjñā vikhāditakasaṃjñā vikṣiptakasaṃjñā asthisaṃjñā vidagdhakasaṃjñā ca,
S06psp_1u:121_9_0: buddhānusmṛtir bhāvayitavyā, dharmānusmṛtir bhāvayitavyā, saṃghānusmṛtir bhāvayitavyā, śīlānusmṛtir bhāvayitavyā, tyāgānusmṛtir
S06psp_1u:121_10_0: udvegānusmṛtir bhāvayitavyā, maraṇānusmṛtir bhāvayitavyā, anityasaṃjñā bhāvayitavyā, duḥkhasaṃjñā bhāvayitavyā, anātmasaṃjñā
S06psp_1u:121_10_1: bhāvayitavyā, aśucisaṃjñā bhāvayitavyā, maraṇasaṃjñā bhāvayitavyā, sarvaloke 'nabhiratisaṃjñā bhāvayitavyā,
S06psp_1u:121_23: tisro vidyā bhāvayitavyāḥ. catasraḥ pratisaṃvido bhāvayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_1u:121_26: ṣaṭ pāramitā bhāvayitavyāḥ, sapta dhanāni bhāvayitavyāni,
S06psp_1u:123_0: sarvajñatāṃ jñānena darśanena cāvalokyātikramitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā,
S06psp_1u:123_1_0: mārgajñatāṃ paripūrayitukāmena sarvākārajñatām anuprāptukāmena sarvasattvacittacaritajñānākāratāṃ paripūrayitukāmena sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśānutpāṭayitukāmena
S06psp_1u:123_5: ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ prāptukāmena sarvasattvacittacaritavispanditāni vijñātukāmena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ jñānam abhibhavitukāmena dhāraṇīsamādhimukhaṃ pratilabdhukāmena.
S06psp_1u:125_0_0: matsariṇaḥ sattvān dāne pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhebhyo dānāni dīyamānāni ekenānumodanāsahagatena cittotpādenābhibhavitukāmena
S06psp_1u:127_1_0: duḥśīlān śīle pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ śīlam ekenānumodanāsahagatena cittotpādenābhibhavitukāmena
S06psp_1u:129_0_0: vyāpannacittān kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ kṣāntim ekenānumodanāsahagatena cittotpādenābhibhavitukāmena
S06psp_1u:131_0_0: kuśīdān vīrye pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ vīryam ekenānumodanāsahagatena cittotpādenābhibhavitukāmena
S06psp_1u:133_0_0: vikṣiptacittān dhyāne pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ dhyānam ekenānumodanāsahagatena cittotpādenābhibhavitukāmena
S06psp_1u:135_0_0: duṣprajñān sattvān prajñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñām ekenānumodanāsahagatena cittotpādenābhibhavitukāmena
S06psp_1u:137_0: ekam api kuśalacittotpādaṃ sarvākārajñatāyām upāyakauśalyena pariṇāmanayāprameyam asaṃkhyeyaṃ kartukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S06psp_1u:137_1: alpam api dānaṃ dadatā, alpamapi śīlaṃ rakṣatā, alpām api kṣāntiṃ bhāvayatā, alpam api vīryam ārabhamāṇena,
S06psp_1u:137_2: alpam api dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānenālpam api prajñāṃ bhāvayatā sarvasattvebhyaḥ sarvākārajñatāyām upāyakauśalyena pariṇāmanayāprameyam asaṃkhyeyaṃ kartukāmena bodhisattvena [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:138_0: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānapāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S06psp_1u:138_1_0: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāñ caratā kṣāntipāramitāyāñ caratā vīryapāramitāyāñ caratā dhyānapāramitāyāñ caratā prajñāpāramitāyāñ caratā
S06psp_1u:138_2: sarvasattvānām arthāya narakatiryagyoniyamalokaduḥkhāny utsoḍhukāmena kalpaśatasahasrasañcitam api śīlaṃ sattvopekṣayā tyaktukāmena buddhakule upapattukāmena,
S06psp_1u:138_3: aśītyanuvyañjanāni dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni ca niṣpādayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:140_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra buddhakāyaṃ niṣpādayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S06psp_1u:140_1: kumārabhūmim ākramitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S06psp_1u:140_2: buddhabodhisattvair avirahitena bhavitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:141_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ekena svareṇa pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn vijñāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:141_1: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣu adha ūrdhvam ekena svareṇa gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn vijñāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:142_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena triratnavaṃśasyānupacchedāya sthātukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:143_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yaiḥ yaiḥ kuśalamūlair ākaṅkṣati tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkartuṃ
S06psp_1u:143_0_1: gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tāni tāni me kuśalamūlāni samṛddhyantām iti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:145_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvānāṃ manorathān paripūrayitukāmena annapānavastragandhamālyapuṣpadhūpacūrṇavilepanaśayanāsanagṛhadhanadhānyālaṅkāraratnamaṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravāḍajātarūparajatodyānarājyādibhir
S06psp_1u:146_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dharmadhātuparame loke ākāśadhātuparyavasāne sarvasattvān dānapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:146_0_1: pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena
S06psp_1u:147_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ekam api kuśalacittotpādam akṣayaṃ kartukāmena yāvad bodhimaṇḍābhisaṃbodhir iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:148_0: punar aparam śāriputra ye daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavantas te me varṇaṃ bhāṣerann iti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:150_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:150_1_0: evaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāyām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ mahāśūnyatāyāṃ paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyām
S06psp_1u:150_1_1: asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyām atyantaśūnyatāyām anavarāgraśūnyatāyām anavakāraśūnyatāyāṃ prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyām
S06psp_1u:150_1_2: anupalambhaśūnyatāyām abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ bhāvaśūnyatāyām abhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ parabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣitukāmena
S06psp_1u:151_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmatathatām avaboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:151_1: evaṃ dharmadhātutathatām avaboddhukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S06psp_1u:151_2: sarvabhūtakoṭītathatām avaboddhukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:151_3: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:152_1: punar aparaṃ śāriputra trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau ye pṛthivyaptejovāyuparamāṇavas tāñ jñātukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam
S06psp_1u:153_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carañ jānāti evaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ mahāphalaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_1u:153_18: evaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratilambhāya saṃvartate,
S06psp_1u:154_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāñ caratā jñātavyam,
S06psp_1u:154_1: evam upāyakauśalena dānaṃ dattaṃ dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_1u:155_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:155_1_0: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānaṃ dadatā dānapāramitā paripūritā bhavati? kathaṃ dānaṃ dadatā śīlapāramitā
S06psp_1u:155_1_1: paripūritā bhavati? kathaṃ dānaṃ dadatā kṣāntipāramitā paripūritā bhavati? kathaṃ dānaṃ dadatā vīryapāramitā paripūritā bhavati?
S06psp_1u:155_1_2: kathaṃ dānaṃ dadatā dhyānapāramitā paripūritā bhavati? kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānaṃ dadatā prajñāpāramitā
S06psp_1u:156_0: bhagavān āha: anupalambhena deyasya dāyakasya grāhakasya ca dānapāramitā paripūritā bhavati,
S06psp_1u:156_6: evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānaṃ dadatā ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūritā bhavanti,
S06psp_1u:156_7: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūryante,
S06psp_1u:156_8: evaṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūryante,
S06psp_1u:156_9: evaṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūryante,
S06psp_1u:156_10: evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūryante,
S06psp_1u:156_11: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūryante.
S06psp_1u:158_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ekacittotpādena pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn samatikramitukāmena,
S06psp_1u:158_1: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣv adha ūrdhvaṃ digbhāge gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn samatikramitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:159_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra trisāhasramahāsāhasra lokadhātau yo mahāsamudreṣv [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:159_1_0: _36] apy apskandho mahānadīṣu kunadīṣūtsasarastaḍāgeṣu palvaleṣu taṃ sarvaṃ śatadhābhinnayā vālāgrakoṭyābhyutkṣeptukāmena
S06psp_1u:159_1_1: ca tanniśritān prāṇino 'viheṭhayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:160_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ kalpoddāhāgnipradīptam ekena mukhavātena
S06psp_1u:161_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yā vikṣobhaṇāvātamaṇḍalī vātasaṃvartanyāṃ vartamānāyāṃ yāvat sumerumahāsumerucakravāḍamahācakravāḍānupādāya
S06psp_1u:161_0_1: sarvaparvatān sarvamahāpṛthivīṃ vidhunoti vikirati nirmaṣīkaroti tāṃ vikṣobhaṇāvātamaṇḍalīm ekenāṅguliparvāgreṇācchādayitukāmena
S06psp_1u:162_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau yāvān ākāśadhātus taṃ sarvam ekena paryaṅkena sphāritukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:163_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau ye sumerumahāsumerucakravāḍamahācakravāḍādayaḥ
S06psp_1u:163_0_1: parvatās tān ekena vālena baddhā asaṃkhyeyān apramānān lokadhātūn samatikrāmayeyaṃ kṣipeyam iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam
S06psp_1u:164_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena daśasu dikṣu pratyekaṃ sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu buddhān bhagavato divyena cakṣuṣā
S06psp_1u:164_0_1: draṣṭukāmena teṣāñ ca dharmadeśanāṃ divyena śrotrena śrotukāmeṇa sarvasattvacittacaritāni ca jñātukāmena teṣāṃ pūrvanivāsam
S06psp_1u:164_0_2: anusmartukāmena āsravakṣayajñānābhijñām abhinirhartukāmena ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkartukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:166_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena daśasu dikṣu pratyekaṃ yāvanto gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:166_1: _37] bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakabodhisattvasaṃghās tān ekena piṇḍapātreṇa pratipādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:166_2_0: evaṃ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapaṭākāmeghais tāṃs tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkartukāmena
S06psp_1u:167_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvās tān śīlaskandhe
S06psp_1u:167_0_1: pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena samādhiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena vimuktiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena
S06psp_1u:167_4: pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena yāvad anupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:167_5_0: yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣv adha ūrdhvaṃ pratyekaṃ gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu
S06psp_1u:167_5_1: ye sattvās tān yāvad anupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:169_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhaguṇān anuprāptukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:170_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pāraṃ gantukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:171_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmāṇām atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānām avabodhukāmena dharmāṇām
S06psp_1u:173_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ pūrvaṅgamena bhavitukāmena prajnāpāramitāyāṃ [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:174_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena buddhānāṃ bhagavatām upasthāyakena bhavitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:175_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena buddhānāṃ bhagavatām abhyantaraparivāreṇa bhavitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:176_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāparivāreṇa bhavitukāmena bodhisattvaṃ parivāraṃ pratilabdhukāmena ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:177_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dakṣiṇāṃ pariśodhayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:178_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mātsaryacittaṃ nigrahītukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:179_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dauḥśīlyacittam anutpādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:180_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vyāpādacittam anutpādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:181_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kauśīdyacittam utsraṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:182_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vikṣiptacittaṃ riñcitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam
S06psp_1u:183_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dauṣprajñacittam aprapañcitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:184_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvān dānamayapuṇyakriyāvastuni pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena,
S06psp_1u:184_3: vaiyāvṛtyasahagate caupadhike puṇyakriyāvastuni pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:185_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañca cakṣūṃṣy uptpādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:185_2: _39] uta māṃsacakṣur divyacakṣuḥ prajñācakṣur dharmacakṣur buddhacakṣur utpādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:186_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvasyāṃ diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:187_0: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:188_0: paścimāyāṃ diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:189_0: uttarasyāṃ diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:190_0: uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:191_0: pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:192_0: dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:193_0: paścimottarasyāṃ diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:194_0: adhastād diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:195_0: upariṣṭād diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:196_0: yāṃś ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmān bhāṣante tān dharmān divyena śrotreṇa śrotukāmena,
S06psp_1u:196_1: teṣāñ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ cetasaiva cittaṃ yathābhūtaṃ parijñātukāmena,
S06psp_1u:196_2: teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūrvayogasahagatāṃ bodhisattvatām anusmartukāmena,
S06psp_1u:196_3: teṣāñ ca buddhānām ṛddhivikurvitaṃ draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:197_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yāṃs te buddhā bhagavantaḥ samantād daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu dharmān bhāṣante [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:197_1: _40] tāñ chrutvā anācchedyena smṛtibalādhānena sarvān saṃdhārayitukāmena yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddha iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:198_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena atītānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetrāṇi draṣṭukāmena,
S06psp_1u:198_1: anāgatānām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetrāṇi draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:198_2: ye caitarhi samantād daśa diśi loke buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetrāṇi draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:200_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yat kiñcid daśasu dikṣu buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca,
S06psp_1u:200_1: yad idaṃ sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ nidānam itivṛttakaṃ jātakaṃ vaipulyādbhutā dharmā avadānam upadeśāḥ,
S06psp_1u:200_2: yac ca śrāvakair na śrutaṃ tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena,
S06psp_1u:200_3: parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:201_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yat kiñcit pūrvasyāṃ diśi buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate
S06psp_1u:201_0_1: ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena
S06psp_1u:202_0_0: yat kiñcid dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena
S06psp_1u:202_0_1: vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:203_0: yat kiñcit paścimāyāṃ diśi buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:203_1: _41] bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:204_0_0: yat kiñcid uttarasyāṃ diśi buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena
S06psp_1u:204_0_1: vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:205_0_0: yat kiñcid uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena
S06psp_1u:205_0_1: vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:206_0_0: yat kiñcit pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena
S06psp_1u:206_0_1: vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:207_0_0: yat kiñcid dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena
S06psp_1u:207_0_1: vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:208_0_0: yat kiñcit paścimottarasyāṃ diśi buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena
S06psp_1u:208_0_1: vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:209_0: yat kiñcid adho diśi buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena vācayitukāmena [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:209_1: _42] tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:210_0_0: yat kiñcid ūrdhvaṃ diśi buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena
S06psp_1u:210_0_1: vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:212_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yāni pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv andhakāratamisrāṇi,
S06psp_1u:212_1: yatra sūryacandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti,
S06psp_1u:213_0: yāni dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv andhakāratamisrāṇi,
S06psp_1u:213_1: yatra sūryacandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti,
S06psp_1u:214_0: yāni paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv andhakāratamisrāṇi,
S06psp_1u:214_1: yatra sūryacandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti,
S06psp_1u:215_0: yāny uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv andhakāratamisrāṇi,
S06psp_1u:215_1: yatra sūryacandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti,
S06psp_1u:216_0: yāny uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv andhakāratamisrāṇi,
S06psp_1u:216_1: yatra sūryacandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti,
S06psp_1u:217_0: yāni pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv andhakāratamisrāṇi,
S06psp_1u:217_1: yatra sūryacandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti,
S06psp_1u:218_0: yāni dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv andhakāratamisrāṇi,
S06psp_1u:218_1: yatra sūryacandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti,
S06psp_1u:219_1: _43] andhakāratamisrāṇi, yatra sūryacandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti,
S06psp_1u:220_0: yāni adhastād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv andhakāratamisrāṇi,
S06psp_1u:220_1: yatra sūryacandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti,
S06psp_1u:221_0: yāny upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv andhakāratamisrāṇi,
S06psp_1u:221_1: yatra sūryacandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti,
S06psp_1u:221_2: tāni sarvāṇy avabhāsayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:222_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ye pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānā buddhakṣetreṣūpapannās
S06psp_1u:222_0_1: tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ saṃśrāvayitukāmena,
S06psp_1u:222_1: tāṃś ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:223_0: ye dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānā buddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ saṃśrāvayitukāmena,
S06psp_1u:223_1: tāṃś ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:224_0: ye paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānā buddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ saṃśrāvayitukāmena,
S06psp_1u:224_1: tāṃś ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:225_0: ye uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānā buddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ saṃśrāvayitukāmena,
S06psp_1u:225_1: tāṃś ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:226_0: ye uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānā buddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ saṃśrāvayitukāmena,
S06psp_1u:226_1: tāṃś ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:227_1: ye pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānā buddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ saṃśrāvayitukāmena,
S06psp_1u:227_2: tāṃś ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:228_0: ye dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānā buddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ saṃśrāvayitukāmena,
