S06psp_1u:230_1: tāṃś ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:231_0: ye upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānā buddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ saṃśrāvayitukāmena,
S06psp_1u:231_1: tāṃś ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:233_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu ye
S06psp_1u:233_0_1: sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyantīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:233_18: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:234_0: ye dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyantīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:234_16: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:235_0: ye paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyantīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:235_6: apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyanta iti,
S06psp_1u:235_15: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:236_0: ye uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyantīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:236_6: apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyanta iti,
S06psp_1u:236_15: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:237_0: ye uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyantīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:237_6: apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyanta iti,
S06psp_1u:237_15: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:238_0: ye pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyantīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:238_6: apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyanta iti,
S06psp_1u:238_15: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:239_0: ye dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyantīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:239_6: apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyanta iti,
S06psp_1u:239_15: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:240_0: ye paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:240_1: _48] sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyantīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:240_7: apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyanta iti,
S06psp_1u:240_16: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:241_0: ye 'dho diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyantīti,
S06psp_1u:241_7: apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyanta iti,
S06psp_1u:241_16: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S06psp_1u:242_0: ye ūrdhvaṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyantīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:242_6: _49] bhaviṣyantīti, apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyanta iti,
S06psp_1u:242_15: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:244_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tathāgateryāpathe śikṣitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:245_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyam,
S06psp_1u:245_2: kim ity ahaṃ pṛthīvīṃ caturaṅgulam aspṛśan padbhyāṃ gaccheyam iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:246_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:246_1_0: kim ity ahaṃ cāturmahārājakāyikais trayastriṃśair yāmais tuṣitair nirmāṇaratibhiḥ paranirmitavaśavartibhir brahmakāyikair
S06psp_1u:246_1_1: brahmapurohitair brahmapāriṣadyaiḥ parīttābhair apramāṇābhair ābhāsvaraiḥ parīttaśubhair apramāṇaśubhaiḥ śubhakṛtsnair anabhrakaiḥ
S06psp_1u:246_1_2: puṇyaprasavair bṛhatphalair asaṃjñisattvaiḥ śuddhāvāsair aspṛhair atapaiḥ sudṛśaiḥ sudarśanair akaniṣṭhaiś ca parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto
S06psp_1u:247_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:247_1_0: kim iti ye cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trayastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā
S06psp_1u:247_1_1: brahmapāriṣadyaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā
S06psp_1u:248_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:248_1: kim iti me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya gacchato vā tiṣṭhato vā niṣaṇṇasya vā śayānasya vā sa pṛthivīpradeśo vajramayaḥ saṃtiṣṭheteti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:249_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:249_1: kim ity ahaṃ yatraiva divase niṣkāmeyaṃ tatraiva divase 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyeyam iti,
S06psp_1u:249_3: dharmacakraṃ ca me pravartayamānasyāsaṃkhyeyānām aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ virajovigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur viśudhyed iti,
S06psp_1u:249_4: asaṃkhyeyānām aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānām anupādāyāsrvebhyaś cittāni vimucyeyur iti,
S06psp_1u:249_5: asaṃkhyeyā aprameyā sattvā avinivartanīyā bhaveyur anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhir iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:250_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:250_1: kim iti me 'prameyo 'saṃkhyeyaḥ śrāvakasaṃghaḥ syād iti,
S06psp_1u:250_2: aprameyāḥ asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā ekadharmadeśanāyā ekāsanikā bodhisattvā bhaveyur avinivartanīyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher iti,
S06psp_1u:250_3: asaṃkhyeyaś cāprameyaś ca bodhisattvasaṃgho bhaved iti,
S06psp_1u:250_5: aparimitā ca prabhāsaṃpad bhaved iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:251_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:251_1: kim iti me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tasmin buddhakṣetre rāgadveṣamohāyatanāni sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaveyur iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:252_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyam,
S06psp_1u:252_1: kim iti me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya evaṃrūpayā prajñayā sattvāḥ samanvāgatā [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:252_2: _51] bhaveyur, yad anyabuddhakṣetrasthā buddhā bhagavantaḥ evam udānam udānayeyuḥ.
S06psp_1u:252_3: sādhu śamaḥ sādhu damaḥ sādhu saṃyamaḥ sādhu cīrṇabrahmacaryavāsaḥ sādhv avihiṃsā sarvaprāṇibhūteṣv iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:253_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:253_1: kim iti me parinirvṛtasya saddharmāntardhānam api na syāt,
S06psp_1u:253_2: sahaśravaṇena ca me nāmadheyasya ye daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās te niyatā bhaveyur anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:254_0: yasmin samaye śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān guṇān utpādayati,
S06psp_1u:254_1: tadā ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahārājānas ta evaṃ cintayanti,
S06psp_1u:254_2: vayam asmai bodhisattvāya catvāri pātrāṇi dāsyāmaḥ,
S06psp_1u:254_3: yathā dattāni pūrvakair mahārājaiḥ pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāṃ trayastriṃśāś ca devā āttamanaskā bhavanti yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devā utsukā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_1u:254_4: vayam asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopasthānaparicaryāḥ kariṣyāma iti,
S06psp_1u:254_5: evam āsurāḥ kāyāḥ parihāsyante divyāḥ kāyāḥ abhivardhiṣyante.
S06psp_1u:255_0: āttamanaskāś ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau bhavanti brahmapāriṣadyā brahmapurohitā mahābrahmāṇaḥ,
S06psp_1u:255_1_0: āttamanaskā bhavanti parīttābhā apramāṇābhāś ca ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā
S06psp_1u:255_1_1: bṛhatphalā asaṃjñisattvāḥ śuddhābhāsā avṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāś ca devās teṣām evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_1u:255_3: yasmin samaye śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran vivardhate ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:255_4: tasmin samaya āttamanaskā bhavanti bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca vayam asya mātāpitarau bhaviṣyāmo bhāryāputrajñātisālohitā iti.
S06psp_1u:256_0_0: āttamanaskā bhavanti catvāro mahārājāno devās trayastriṃśā devā yāmā devās tuṣitā devā nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino
S06psp_1u:256_0_1: devā brahmapārṣadyā devā brahmapurohitā devā mahābrahmāṇo [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:256_1_0: _52] devāḥ parīttaśubhā devā apramāṇaśubhā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā anabhrakā devāḥ puṇyaprasavā devā bṛhatphalā
S06psp_1u:256_1_1: devā asaṃjñisattvā devāḥ śuddhāvāsā devā aspṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhāś ca devā bodhisattvasya
S06psp_1u:256_2: atha yaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo brahmacārī bhavati,
S06psp_1u:256_4: tasyaivaṃ bhavati abrahmacāriṇaḥ sa khalu punaḥ kāmān pratisevamāṇasya brahmalokopapatter apy antarāyo bhavati,
S06psp_1u:256_6: tasmāt tarhi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena brahmacāriṇaiva gṛhād abhiniṣkramyānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhavyā nābrahmacāriṇā.
S06psp_1u:257_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:257_1: kiṃ punar bhagavann avaśyaṃ bodhisattvasya mātāpitṛbhyāṃ bhavitavyaṃ bhāryāputrajñātisālohitair bhavitavyam?
S06psp_1u:258_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:258_1: keṣāṃcic chāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mātāpitarau bhavataḥ bhāryāputrajñātisālohitā vā,
S06psp_1u:258_2: keṣāñcid bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya brahmacaryasamādānan te kumārabhūtā eva bodhisattvacārikāṃ caranto 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante,
S06psp_1u:258_3: kecid bodhisattvā mahāsattvā upāyakauśalyena ca pañca kāmaguṇān paribhujyābhiniṣkramyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante,
S06psp_1u:258_4: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra dakṣo māyākāro vā māyākārāntevāsī vā suśikṣito bhaven māyāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:258_5: sa pañca kāmaguṇān abhinirmāya taiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇai ramet krīḍet paricaret,
S06psp_1u:258_6: tat kiṃ manyase? śāriputra api nu tena māyākāreṇa vā māyākārāntevāsinā vā pañca kāmaguṇā āsvāditāḥ paribhuktā bhaveyuḥ.
S06psp_1u:260_1: bhagavān āha: evam eva śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva upāyakauśalyena ca pañca kāmaguṇān paribhuṅkte sattvānāṃ paripākahetoḥ,
S06psp_1u:260_2: na punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kāmaguṇair lipyate,
S06psp_1u:260_3: anena paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kāmānām avarṇaṃ bhāṣate,
S06psp_1u:260_4: ādīptāḥ kāmā jugupsitāḥ kāmā badhakāḥ kāmāḥ pratyarthikāḥ kāmāḥ,
S06psp_1u:260_5: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvaparipākahetoḥ pañca kāmaguṇān upādadāti.
S06psp_1u:263_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:263_1: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam?
S06psp_1u:264_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:264_1: iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattva eva samāno bodhisattvaṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:264_5: rūpam api na samanupaśyati, evaṃ vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānam api na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:264_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvena śūnyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:264_8: tathā hi śūnyatayā na rūpaṃ śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:264_9: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ śūnyatayā śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:264_10: nānyatra rūpāc chūnyatā, nānyatra vedanāyāḥ śūnyatā, nānyatra saṃjñāyāḥ śūnyatā, nānyatra saṃskārebhyaḥ śūnyatā,
S06psp_1u:264_11: nānyatra vijñānāc chūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ? rūpam eva śūnyatā,
S06psp_1u:264_12_0: vedanaiva śūnyatā, saṃjñaiva śūnyatā, saṃskārā eva śūnyatā, vijñānam eva śūnyatā, śūnyataiva rūpaṃ, śūnyataiva vedanā, śūnyataiva
S06psp_1u:264_12_1: saṃjñā, śūnyataiva saṃskārāḥ, śūnyataiva vijñānam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi nāmamātram idaṃ yad idaṃ bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:264_14: nāmamātram idaṃ yad idaṃ rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:264_15: tathā hi māyopamaṃ rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:264_16: māyā ca nāmamātraṃ na deśasthā na pradeśasthā asadasaṃbhūtaṃ vitathadarśanasamaṃ,
S06psp_1u:264_18: _54] notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānam,
S06psp_1u:264_19: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattva utpādam api na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:264_23: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kṛtrimaṃ nāma pratidharmaṃ,
S06psp_1u:264_24: te ca kalpitāḥ, āgantukena nāmadheyena vyavahriyante,
S06psp_1u:264_25: tāni bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvanāmāni na samanupaśyati asamanupaśyan nābhiniviśate.
S06psp_1u:265_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran naivam upaparīkṣate nāmamātram idaṃ yad idaṃ bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:265_1: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta bodhir iti,
S06psp_1u:265_2: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta buddha iti,
S06psp_1u:265_4: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caryeti,
S06psp_1u:265_5: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta rūpam iti,
S06psp_1u:265_8: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta saṃskārā iti,
S06psp_1u:265_9: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta vijñānam iti,
S06psp_1u:265_11: na cātmā upalabhyate, na sattvo na jīvo na poṣo na puruṣo na pudgalo na manujo 'py upalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:265_12: anupalambhaśūnyatām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bodhisattvas tam api na samanupaśyati yenābhiniviśeta,
S06psp_1u:265_13: evaṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_1u:266_0: sa cec chāriputrāyañ jambudvīpaḥ paripūrṇo bhavec chāriputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:266_1_0: tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā tilavanaṃ vā teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:266_1_1: carato bodhisattvasya prajñāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:266_2: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy apamām apy upaniṣadam apy upaniśām api nopaiti,

S06psp_1u:266_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śāriputra yā bodhisattvasya prajñā sā sarvasattvānāṃ nirvāṇāya pratyupasthitā,
S06psp_1u:267_0: sa cec chāriputra trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ paripūrṇo bhavec chāriputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ,

S06psp_1u:278_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:278_1_0: yeyaṃ bhagavan srotaāpannasya prajñā sakṛdāgāmino 'nāgāmino 'rhataḥ pratyekabuddhasya prajñā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06psp_1u:278_1_1: prajñā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya prajñā sarvā etāḥ prajñā abhinnā viviktā anutpannā asvabhāvāḥ śūnyāḥ,
S06psp_1u:278_2: na ca bhagavann abhinnasya viviktasya anutpannasyāsvabhāvasya śūnyasya nānākaraṇam upalabhyate viśeṣo vā,
S06psp_1u:278_3: tat kathaṃ punar bhagavan yā bodhisattvasyaikadivasabhāvitā prajñā sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñām abhibhavati?
S06psp_1u:279_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:279_1_0: tat kiṃ manyase? śāriputra yena kāryeṇa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata ekadivasabhāvitā prajñā pratyupasthitā
S06psp_1u:279_1_1: sarvākāravaropetā sarvajñatāyāṃ carataḥ sarvasattvānām arthaṃ kurvataḥ sarvākāraṃ sarvadharmān buddhā sarvasattvāḥ parinirvāpayitavyā
S06psp_1u:279_2: api nu śāriputra tena kṛtyena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñā pratyupasthitā.
S06psp_1u:281_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? śāriputra api nu sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_1u:281_1: asmābhir anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvā nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayitavyā iti.
S06psp_1u:283_0: bhagavān āha: tad anenāpi te śāriputra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:283_1_0: yeyaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñā sā bodhisattvasya prajñā yā ekadivasabhāvitāyāḥ śatatamīm api kālaṃ nopaiti sahasratamīm
S06psp_1u:283_1_1: api śatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:283_3: tat kiṃ manyase? śāriputrāpi nu sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_1u:283_4_0: vayaṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā sattvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya daśatathāgatabalāni paripūrya catvāri vaiśāradyāni
S06psp_1u:283_4_1: catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūryānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān
S06psp_1u:285_0: bhagavān āha: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya punaḥ śāriputraivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_1u:285_1_0: ahaṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā sattvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya daśatathāgatabalāni paripūrya catvāri vaiśāradyāni
S06psp_1u:285_1_1: catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūryānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān
S06psp_1u:285_2: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra na bhavati khadyotakasya prāṇakajātasya mamābhayā jambudvīpo 'vabhāsyateti,
S06psp_1u:285_4: evam eva śāriputra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_1u:285_5_0: ekasyāpy ahaṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā sattvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya daśatathāgatabalāni paripūrya catvāri vaiśāradyāni
S06psp_1u:285_5_1: catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūrya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān
S06psp_1u:285_6: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra sūryamaṇḍalam udayan sarvaṃ jambudvīpam avabhāsena sphuṭīkaroti,
S06psp_1u:285_7_0: evam eva śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā sattvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya daśatathāgatabalāni
S06psp_1u:285_7_1: paripūrya catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūrya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya
S06psp_1u:286_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:286_1: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ cātikramya avinivartanīyabhūmim anuprāpnoti bodhimārgaṃ ca pariśodhayati.
S06psp_1u:287_1: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:287_2: iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu sarveṣu sthitvā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ cātikrāmati,
S06psp_1u:288_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:288_1: katamasyāṃ bhagavan bhūmau sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satatasamitaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ dakṣiṇīyo bhavati.
S06psp_1u:289_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:289_1: prathamacittotpādam upādāya śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran yāvadā bodhimaṇḍād atrāntare satatasamitaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ dakṣiṇīyo bhavati,
S06psp_1u:289_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śāriputra bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06psp_1u:289_3_0: yad uta daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ pañcānāṃ śikṣāpadānām aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatasya poṣadhasya caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām
S06psp_1u:289_3_1: apramāṇānāṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ pañcānām abhijñānāṃ caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ caturṇāṃ samyakprahāṇānāṃ
S06psp_1u:289_3_2: caturṇām ṛddhipādānāṃ pañcānām indriyāṇāṃ pañcānāṃ balānāṃ saptānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya loke prādurbhāvo
S06psp_1u:289_6: ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06psp_1u:289_7: eteṣāṃ ca kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvāt kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
S06psp_1u:289_12: yāmā devāḥ prajñāyante, tuṣitā devāḥ prajñāyante, nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06psp_1u:289_19: ābhāsvarā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06psp_1u:289_22: anabhrakā devāḥ prajñāyante, puṇyaprasavā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06psp_1u:289_26: aspṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, atapā devāḥ prajñāyante, sudṛśā devāḥ prajñāyante, sudarśanā devāḥ prajñāyante, akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante, ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06psp_1u:289_30: srotaāpannā loke utpadyante, sakṛdāgāmino loke utpadyante,
S06psp_1u:289_31: anāgāmino loke utpadyante, arhanto loke utpadyante, pratyekabuddhā loke utpadyante,
S06psp_1u:289_32: bodhisattvā loke utpadyante, tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke utpadyante.
S06psp_1u:290_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:290_1: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dakṣiṇāṃ śodhayati uta neti.
S06psp_1u:291_0: bhagavān āha: na hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dakṣiṇāṃ śodhayati,
S06psp_1u:291_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? ātyantaśuddhaiva dakṣiṇā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
S06psp_1u:291_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? dāyakaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ.
S06psp_1u:291_4_0: katameṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dāyakaḥ? yad uta daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ pañcānāṃ śikṣāpadāṇām aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatasya
S06psp_1u:291_4_1: poṣadhasya caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ catasmām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ pañcānām abhijñānāṃ caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ
S06psp_1u:291_4_2: caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ caturṇāṃ samyakprahāṇānāṃ caturṇām ṛddhipādānāṃ pañcānām indriyāṇāṃ pañcānāṃ balānāṃ saptānāṃ
S06psp_1u:291_4_3: bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānām
S06psp_1u:293_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:293_1: kathaṃ [PvsP1-1:_62] yujyamāno bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:294_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:294_1: iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:295_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś cakṣuḥśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:296_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:296_3: yāvat parabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:297_0: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann āsu sarvāsu śūnyatāsu yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:297_1: sa ābhiḥ śūnyatābhiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na tāvad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yukto yukta iti vaktavyo 'yukta iti.
S06psp_1u:297_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi na sa rūpaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati.
S06psp_1u:299_0: sa na rūpam utpādadharmi vā nirodhadharmi vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:299_1: na vedanām utpādadharmiṇīṃ vā nirodhadharmiṇīṃ vā samanupaśyati na saṃjñām utpādadharmiṇīṃ vā nirodhadharmiṇīṃ vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:299_2: na saṃskārān utpādadharmiṇo vā nirodhadharmiṇo vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:299_3: na vijñānām utpādadharmi vā nirodhadharmi vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:299_4: na rūpaṃ saṃkleśadharmi vā vyavadānadharmi vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:299_5: na vedanāṃ saṃkleśadharmiṇīṃ vā vyavadānadharmiṇīṃ vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:299_6: na saṃjñāṃ saṃkleśadharmiṇīṃ vā vyavadānadharmiṇīṃ vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:299_7: na saṃskārān saṃkleśadharmiṇo vā vyavadānadharmiṇo vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:299_8: na vijñānaṃ saṃkleśadharmi vā vyavadānadharmi vā samanupaśyati.
S06psp_1u:300_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpaṃ vedanāyāṃ samavasaratīti samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:300_5: na dharmaḥ kvacid dharme samavasaratīti samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:300_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi kaścid dharmaḥ kvacid dharme samavasarati prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:300_7: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śāriputra yā rūpasya śūnyatā na tad rūpam,
S06psp_1u:300_8: yā vedanāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā vedanā,
S06psp_1u:300_9: yā [PvsP1-1:_64] saṃjñāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā saṃjñā,
S06psp_1u:300_10: yā saṃskārāṇāṃ śūnyatā na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_1u:300_11: yā vijñānasya śūnyatā na tad vijñānam.
S06psp_1u:300_12: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yā rūpaśūnyatā na sā rūpayati,
S06psp_1u:300_17: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śāriputra nānyad rūpam anyā śūnyatā,
S06psp_1u:300_18: nānyā śūnyatā anyad rūpaṃ, rūpam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva rūpam,
S06psp_1u:300_19: nānyā vedanā anyā śūnyatā, nānyā śūnyatā anyā vedanā, vedanaiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva vedanā,
S06psp_1u:300_20: nānyā saṃjñā anyāśūnyatā, nānyā śūnyatā anyā saṃjñā, saṃjñaiva śūnyatā śūnyataivasaṃjñā,
S06psp_1u:300_21: nānye saṃskārā anyā śūnyatā, nānyā śūnyatā anye saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_1u:300_23: nānyad vijñānam anyā śūyatā, nānyā śūnyatā anyad vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:302_2: na hīyate na vardhate, nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā,
S06psp_1u:302_3_0: yā ca īdṛśī na tatra rūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ na pṛthivīdhātur nābdhātur na tejodhātur na vāyudhātur
S06psp_1u:302_3_1: nākāśadhātur na vijñānadhātur na cakṣurāyāyatanaṃ na rūpāyatanaṃ na śrotrāyatanaṃna śabdāyatanaṃ na ghrāṇāyatanaṃ na gandhāyatanaṃ
S06psp_1u:302_3_2: na jihvāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ na kāyāyatanaṃ spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ na manaāyatanaṃ dharmāyatanam,
S06psp_1u:302_4: na cakṣurdhātur na rūpadhātur na cakṣurvijñānadhātuḥ,
S06psp_1u:302_5: na śrotradhātur na śabdadhātur na śrotravijñānadhātuḥ,
S06psp_1u:302_6: na ghrāṇadhātur na gandhadhātur na ghrāṇavijñānadhātuḥ,
S06psp_1u:302_7: na jihvādhātur na rasadhātur na jihvāvijñānadhātuḥ,
S06psp_1u:302_8: na kāyadhātur na spraṣṭavyadhātur na kāyavijñānadhātuḥ na manodhātur na dharmadhātur na manovijñānadhātuḥ,
S06psp_1u:302_18_0: na bhavotpādo na [PvsP1-1:_65] bhavanirodhaḥ, na jātyutpādo na jātinirodhaḥ na jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsotpādo
S06psp_1u:302_19: na duḥkhaṃ na samudayo na nirodho na mārgo na prāptir nābhisamayo na srotaāpanno na srotaāpattiphalaṃ,
S06psp_1u:302_21: nānāgāmīnānāgāmiphalaṃ, nārhattvaṃ nārhattvaphalaṃ, na pratyekabuddho na pratyekabodhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:302_22: na buddho na bodhiḥ, evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:304_0: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dānapāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā ātmānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_1: na śīlapāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_2: na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_3: na vīryapāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_4: na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_5: na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_6: na rūpe yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_7: na vedanāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_8: na saṃjñāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_9: na saṃskāreṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_10: na vijñāne yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_11: na cakṣuṣi yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_12: na śrotre yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_13: na ghrāṇe yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_14: na jihvāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_15: na kāye yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_16: na manasi yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_17: na rūpe yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_18: na śabde yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_19: na gandhe yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_20: na rase yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_21: na spraṣṭavye yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_22: na dharme yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_24: _66] yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_25: na samyakprahāṇeṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_26: na ṛddhipādeṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_27: nendriyeṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_28: na baleṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_29: na bodhyaṅgeṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_30: na mārgeṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_31: na caturṣu satyeṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_32: na caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_33: na catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_34: nābhijñāsu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_35: na daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_36: nāṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_37: yāvan na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_38: na sarvajñajñāne yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:304_39: tad anenāpi te śāriputra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:305_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na śūnyatāyāṃ śūnyatayā yojayati,
S06psp_1u:305_1: na śūnyatāyogaḥ, nānimittam ānimittena yojayati nānimittayogaṃ,
S06psp_1u:305_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śūnyatā na yogo nāyogaḥ,
S06psp_1u:305_4: evam ānimittam apraṇihitaṃ na yogo nāyogaḥ.
S06psp_1u:305_5: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:306_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dharmāṇāṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām avatarati,
S06psp_1u:306_1: evam eva taran na rūpaṃ yojayati na viyojayati na vedanāṃ yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:306_5: na rūpaṃ pūrvāntena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:306_7: na rūpam aparāntena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:306_9: na rūpaṃ pratyutpannena yojayati na vāyojayati,
S06psp_1u:306_11: na vedanāṃ pūrvāntena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:306_13: na [PvsP1-1:_67] vedanām aparāntena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:306_15: na vedanāṃ pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:306_17: na saṃjñāṃ pūrvāntena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:306_19: na saṃjñām aparāntena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:306_21: na saṃjñāṃ pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:306_23: na saṃskārān pūrvāntena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:306_25: na saṃskārān aparāntena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:306_27: na saṃskārān pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:306_29: na vijñānaṃ pūrvāntena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:306_31: na vijñānam aparāntena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:306_33: na vijñānaṃ pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:307_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na pūrvāntam aparāntena yojayati nāparāntaṃ pūrvāntena yojayati,
S06psp_1u:307_1: na pratyutpannaṃ pūrvāntena vā aparāntena vā yojayati,
S06psp_1u:307_2: nāparāntaṃ pūrvāntena vā pratyutpannena vā yojayati,
S06psp_1u:307_3: na pūrvāntam aparāntena vā pratyutpannena vā yojayati,
S06psp_1u:307_4: adhvaśūnyatām upādāya. evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:308_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran evaṃ yujyate,
S06psp_1u:308_1: yathā yujyamāno na sarvākārajñatām atītena yojayati,
S06psp_1u:308_2: atītam eva na samanupaśyati, katham atītena sarvākārajñatāṃ yojayati.
S06psp_1u:308_9: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:310_1: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati rūpam eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:310_2: na vedanāṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati vedanām eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:310_3: na saṃjñāṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati saṃjñām eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:310_4: na saṃskārān sarvākārajñatayā yojayati saṃskārān eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:310_5: na vijñānaṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati vijñānam eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:310_6: na cakṣuḥ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati cakṣur eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:310_7: na śrotraṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati śrotram eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:310_8: na ghrāṇaṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati ghrāṇam eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:310_9: na jihvāṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati jihvām eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:310_10: na kāyañ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati kāyam eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:310_11: na manaḥ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati mana eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:310_12: na rūpaṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati rūpam eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:310_13: na śabdān sarvākārajñatayāyojayati śabdān eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:310_14: na gandhān sarvākārajñatayā yojayati gandhān eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:310_15: na rasān sarvākārajñatayā yojayati rasān eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:310_16: na spraṣṭavyaṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati spraṣṭavyaṃ eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:310_17: na dharmān sarvākārajñatayā yojayati dharmān eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:310_18: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:311_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dānapāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati dānapāramitām eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:311_1: na śīlapāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati śīlapāramitām eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:311_2: na kṣāntipāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati kṣāntipāramitām eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:311_3: na vīryapāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati vīryapāramitām eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:311_6: na prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati prajñāpāramitām eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:311_7: na smṛtyupasthānāni sarvākārajñatayā yojayati smṛtyupasthānāny eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:311_8: na samyakprahāṇāni [PvsP1-1:_69] sarvākārajñatayā yojayati samyakprahāṇāny eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:311_9: na ṛddhipādān sarvākārajñatayā yojayati ṛddhipādān eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:311_10: nendriyāṇi sarvākārajñatayā yojayati indriyāṇy eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:311_11: na balāni sarvākārajñatayā yojayati balāny eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:311_12: na bodhyaṅgāni sarvākārajñatayā yojayati bodhyaṅgāny eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:311_13: na mārgān sarvākārajñatayā yojayati mārgān eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:311_14: na pratisaṃvideiḥ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati pratisaṃvida eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:311_15: na vaiśāradyāni sarvākārajñatayā yojayati vaiśāradyāny eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:311_16: nābhijñāḥ sarvākārajñatayā yojayaty abhijñā eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:311_17: na daśatathāgatabalāni sarvākārajñatayā yojayati daśatathāgatabalāny eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:311_18: nāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān sarvākārajñatayā yojayaty aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:311_19: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahasattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:312_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na buddhaṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati buddham eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:312_1: na sarvākārajñatāṃ buddhena yojayati sarvākārajñatām eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:312_2: na bodhiṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati bodhim eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:312_3: na sarvākārajñatāṃ bodhyā yojayati sarvākārajñatām eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:312_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? buddha eva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva buddhaḥ,
S06psp_1u:312_6: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:314_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ bhavatīti yojayati na rūpaṃ vibhavatīti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:314_1: na vedanā bhavatīti yojayati na vedanā vibhavatīti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:314_2: na saṃjñā bhavatīti yojayati na saṃjñā vibhavatīti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:314_5: na vijñānaṃ bhavatīti yojayati na vijñānaṃ vibhavatīti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:314_6: na rūpaṃ nityam iti yojayati na rūpam anityam iti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:314_7: na rūpaṃ sukham iti yojayati na rūpaṃ duḥkham iti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:314_8: na rūpam ātmeti yojayati na rūpam anātmeti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:314_11: na vedanā nityeti yojayati na vedanā anityeti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:314_12: na vedanā sukheti yojayati na vedanā duḥkheti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:314_13: na vedanā ātmeti yojayati na vedanā anātmeti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:314_14: na vedanā śānteti yojayati na vedanā aśānteti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:314_15: na saṃjñā nityeti yojayati na saṃjñā anityeti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:314_16: na saṃjñā sukheti yojayati na saṃjñā duḥkheti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:314_17: na saṃjñā ātmeti yojayati na saṃjñā anātmeti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:314_18: na saṃjñā śānteti yojayati na saṃjñā aśānteti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:314_19: na saṃskārā nityā iti yojayati na saṃskārā anityā iti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:314_20: na saṃskārāḥ sukhā iti yojayati na saṃskārā duḥkhā iti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:314_21: na saṃskārā ātmāna iti yojayati na saṃskārā anātmāna iti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:314_22: na saṃskārāḥ śāntā iti yojayati na saṃskārā aśāntā iti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:314_23: na vijñānaṃ nityam iti yojayati na vijñānam anityam iti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:314_24: na vijñānaṃ sukham iti yojayati na vijñānaṃ duḥkham iti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:314_25: na vijñānam ātmeti yojayati na vijñānam anātmeti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:314_26: na vijñānaṃ śāntam iti yojayati na vijñānam aśāntam iti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:314_27: na rūpaṃ śūnyam iti yojayati na rūpam aśūnyam iti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:314_28: na rūpaṃ sanimittam iti vā carati na rupam animittam iti vā carati,
S06psp_1u:314_29: na rūpaṃ sapraṇihitam iti vā carati na rūpam apraṇihitam iti vā carati,
S06psp_1u:314_30: na vedanā śūnyā iti vā carati na vedanā aśūnyā iti vā carati,
S06psp_1u:314_31: na vedanā sanimittā iti vā carati na vedanā animittā iti vā carati,
S06psp_1u:314_32: na vedanā sapraṇihitā iti vā carati na vedanā apraṇihitā iti vā carati,
S06psp_1u:314_33: na saṃjñā śūnyā iti vā carati na saṃjñā aśūnyā iti vā carati,
S06psp_1u:314_34: na saṃjñā sanimittā iti vā carati na saṃjñā animittā iti vā carati,
S06psp_1u:314_35: na saṃjñā sapraṇihitā iti vā carati na saṃjñā apraṇihitā iti vā carati,
S06psp_1u:314_36: na saṃskārāḥ śūnyā iti vā carati na saṃskārā aśūnyā iti vā carati,
S06psp_1u:314_37: na saṃskārāḥ sanimittā iti vā carati na saṃskārā animittā iti [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:314_38: _71] vā carati, na saṃskārāḥ sapraṇihitā iti vā carati na saṃskārā apraṇihitā iti vā carati,
S06psp_1u:314_39: na vijñānaṃ śūnyam iti vā carati na vijñānam aśūnyam iti vā carati,
S06psp_1u:314_40: na vijñānaṃ sanimittam iti vā carati na vijñānam animittam iti vā carati,
S06psp_1u:314_41: na vijñānaṃ sapraṇihitam iti vā carati na vijñānam apraṇihitam iti vā carati,
S06psp_1u:314_42: ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti nopaiti na caratīti nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:314_43: carati ca na carati ceti nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:314_44: na caratīti nopaiti, evaṃ caran śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:315_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dānapāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_1u:315_9: na daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_1u:315_10: na caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_1u:315_11: na catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_1u:315_12: nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_1u:315_37: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kasyacid dharmasya saṃbhedaṃ samanupaśyati.
S06psp_1u:315_38: evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na divyasya cakṣuṣaḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_1u:315_39: na divyasya śrotrasya kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_1u:315_43: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitām eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:315_44: kuta eva bodhisattvaṃ kuta eva sarvākāraṃ sarvābhijñāḥ,
S06psp_1u:315_45: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:316_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_1u:316_1: ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti,
S06psp_1u:316_4: teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti.
S06psp_1u:317_0: evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_1u:317_1: ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti,
S06psp_1u:317_4: teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti.
S06psp_1u:318_0: evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_1u:318_1: ahaṃ [PvsP1-1:_73] divyena cakṣuṣā paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti,
S06psp_1u:318_4: teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti.
S06psp_1u:319_0: evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_1u:319_1: ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti,
S06psp_1u:319_4: teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti.
S06psp_1u:320_0: evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_1u:320_1: ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti,
S06psp_1u:320_4: teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti.
S06psp_1u:321_0: evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_1u:321_1: ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā pūrvadakṣinasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti,
S06psp_1u:321_4: teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti.
S06psp_1u:322_0: evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_1u:322_1: ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti,
S06psp_1u:322_4: teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti.
S06psp_1u:323_0: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_1u:323_1: ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti,
S06psp_1u:323_4: teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti.
S06psp_1u:324_0: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_1u:324_1: ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā adhastād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:324_5: teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti.
S06psp_1u:325_0: evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_1u:325_1: ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā ūrdhvaṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti,
S06psp_1u:325_4: teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti.
S06psp_1u:326_0: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān aparimāṇān sattvān parinirvāpayan yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:327_0: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato māraḥ pāpīyān avatāraṃ na labhate,
S06psp_1u:327_1: sarve cāsyānye 'pi laukikā ye kecit kleśās te sarve dalitā bhavanti.
S06psp_1u:328_0: ye 'pi te śāriputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavanto gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S06psp_1u:328_1_0: ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye ca cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trayastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino
S06psp_1u:328_1_1: brahmapārṣadyā brahmapurohitā mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ
S06psp_1u:328_1_2: puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā asaṃjñisattvāḥ śuddhāvāsā avṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi taṃ bodhisattvaṃ
S06psp_1u:328_2: mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kaścid antarāyaṅ kārṣīt,
S06psp_1u:328_3: ye 'py asya kecit kāyikā doṣās te 'py asya dṛṣṭadhārmikā bhavanti,
S06psp_1u:328_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa sarvasattvān maitryā spharati.
S06psp_1u:329_0: ye 'pi te śāriputra dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavanto gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
