S06psp_1u:330_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa sarvasattvān maitryā spharati.
S06psp_1u:331_0_0: ye 'pi te śāriputra uttarasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavanto gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ
S06psp_1u:331_0_1: ca deśayanti ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye ca cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trayastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ
S06psp_1u:331_0_2: paranirmitavaśavartino brahmapārṣadyā brahmapurohitā mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ
S06psp_1u:331_0_3: śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā asaṃjñisattvāḥ śuddhāvāsā avṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā devās te
S06psp_1u:331_2: mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kaścid antarāyaṅ kārṣīt,
S06psp_1u:331_3: ye 'py asya kecit kāyikā doṣās te 'py asya dṛṣṭadhārmikā bhavanti,
S06psp_1u:331_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa sarvasattvān maitryā spharati.
S06psp_1u:332_0: ye 'pi te śāriputra uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S06psp_1u:332_1: ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye ca cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāṃ kurvanti,
S06psp_1u:332_2: mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntarāyo 'bhūd iti.
S06psp_1u:333_0: ye 'pi te śāriputra pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S06psp_1u:333_1: ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye ca cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāṃ kurvanti,
S06psp_1u:333_2: mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntarāyo 'bhūd iti.
S06psp_1u:334_0: ye 'pi te śāriputra dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S06psp_1u:334_1: ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye ca cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniśṭhā devās te 'pi tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāṃ kurvanti,
S06psp_1u:334_2: mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntarāyo 'bhūd iti.
S06psp_1u:335_0: ye 'pi te śāriputra paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu
S06psp_1u:335_1: lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S06psp_1u:335_2: ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye ca cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniśṭhā devās te 'pi tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāṃ kurvanti,
S06psp_1u:335_3: mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntarāyo 'bhūd iti.
S06psp_1u:336_0: ye 'pi te śāriputra adhastād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:336_1: _77] deśayanti, ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye ca cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāṃ kurvanti,
S06psp_1u:336_2: mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntarāyo 'bhūd iti,
S06psp_1u:337_0: ye 'pi te śāriputra ūrdhvaṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S06psp_1u:338_0: ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye ca cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāṃ kurvanti,
S06psp_1u:338_1: mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntarāyo 'bhūd iti.
S06psp_1u:339_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ,
S06psp_1u:339_1_0: alpakṛcchreṇa dhāraṇīmukhāni samādhimukhāni cāmukhībhavanti sarvopapattyāyataneṣu ca tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān
S06psp_1u:339_1_1: ārāgayati nanu kadācid buddhair bhagavadbhir virahito bhavati,
S06psp_1u:339_3: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:340_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_1u:340_1: asti sa kaścid dharmo yo dharmaiḥ saha saṃyujyate vā visaṃyujyate vā.
S06psp_1u:341_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_1u:341_1: kañcid ahaṃ kṣiprataraṃ dharmadhātum abhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ vā na cābhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:341_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi dharmadhātur dharmadhātunābhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_1u:341_3: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:342_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kiñcid dharmadhātor vyatiriktaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:342_2: nāpy asyaivaṃ bhavati, ayaṃ dharmadhātur evaṃ pratividhyate na vā pratividhyata iti,
S06psp_1u:342_3: tathā hi na sa kañcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇa tāṃ dharmatāṃ pratividhyed iti,
S06psp_1u:342_4: tathā hi sa na dharmadhātuṃ śūnyam iti yojayati nāśūnyam iti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:342_5: evaṃ hi [PvsP1-1:_78] śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:343_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na cakṣurdhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ cakṣurdhātunā yojayanti,
S06psp_1u:343_1: na rūpadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ rūpadhātunā yojayati,
S06psp_1u:343_2: na cakṣurvijñānadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ cakṣurvijñānadhātunā yojayati.
S06psp_1u:344_0: na śrotradhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ śrotradhātunā yojayati,
S06psp_1u:344_1: na śabdadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ śabdadhātunā yojayanti,
S06psp_1u:344_2: na śrotravijñānadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ cakṣurdhātunā yojayati.
S06psp_1u:345_0: na ghrāṇadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ ghrāṇadhātunā yojayanti,
S06psp_1u:345_1: na gandhadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ gandhadhātunā yojayati,
S06psp_1u:345_2: na ghrāṇavijñānadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ ghrāṇavijñānadhātunā yojayati.
S06psp_1u:346_0: na jihvādhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ jihvādhātunā yojayanti,
S06psp_1u:346_1: na rasadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ rasadhātunā yojayati,
S06psp_1u:346_2: na jihvāvijñānadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ jihvāvijñānadhātunā yojayati.
S06psp_1u:347_0: na kāyadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ kāyadhātunā yojayati,
S06psp_1u:347_1: na spraṣṭavyadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ spraṣṭavyadhātunā yojayati,
S06psp_1u:347_2: na kāyavijñānadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ kāyavijñānadhātunā yojayati.
S06psp_1u:348_0: na manodhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ manodhātunā yojayanti,
S06psp_1u:348_1: na dharmadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ dharmadhātunā yojayati,
S06psp_1u:348_2: na manovijñānadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ manovijñānadhātunā yojayati.
S06psp_1u:348_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣa hi śāriputra paramo yogo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yad uta śūnyatāyogaḥ,
S06psp_1u:348_4_0: śūnyatāyāṃ śāriputra caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau patati buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati sattvān
S06psp_1u:349_0: ye kecic chāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yogās teṣāṃ prajñāpāramitāyogo [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:349_1: _79] 'gra ākhyāyate śreṣṭha ākhyāyate jyeṣṭha ākhyāyate varaḥ pravara uttamo 'nuttamo niruttamo 'samo 'samasamaḥ praṇīta ākhyāyate.
S06psp_1u:349_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? niruttamo hy eṣaḥ śāriputra yogo yad uta prajñāpāramitāyogaḥ śūnyatāyoga ānimittayogo 'praṇihitayogaḥ,
S06psp_1u:349_3: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākṛta iti dhārayitavyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:350_0: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānām arthaṃ kariṣyati,
S06psp_1u:350_1: na cāsyaivaṃ bhaviṣyati, māṃ buddhā bhagavanto vyākariṣyantīti,
S06psp_1u:350_5: aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyāmīti.
S06psp_1u:350_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa dharmadhātuṃ na viviktīkaroti,
S06psp_1u:350_8: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caret, yo vā buddhair bhagavadbhir vyākriyeta anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_1u:350_9: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na sattvasaṃjñotpadyate.
S06psp_1u:350_10: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atyantatayā sattvo notpadyate na nirūdhyate,
S06psp_1u:350_11: anutpādānirodhadharmatvāt, yasya ca notpādo na nirodhaḥ sa kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyati.
S06psp_1u:350_12: evaṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānutpādatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_1u:351_0: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ paramo yogo yad uta śūnyatāyogaḥ sarvān anyān yogān abhibhūyāvatiṣṭhate,
S06psp_1u:351_1: atra hi śāriputra yoge caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahākaruṇām abhinirharati,
S06psp_1u:351_2: mahāmaitrīm abhinirharati, na ca mātsaryacittam utpādayati,
S06psp_1u:351_4: na vyāpādacittam utpādayati, na kuśīdacittam utpādayati, na vikṣiptacittam utpādayati,
S06psp_1u:353_1: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:353_2: yo bhagavan bodhisattvo 'nena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharati sa kutaś cyuta ihopapadyate,
S06psp_1u:354_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:354_1: yaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharati sa itaś cyuta ihaiva buddhakṣetre upapadyate,
S06psp_1u:354_2: anyebhyo vā buddhakṣetrebhyaś cyutas tuṣitebhyo vā devebhyaś cyuta ihopapadyate.
S06psp_1u:356_0: tatra śāriputra yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo manuṣyebhya eva cyutvā manuṣyāṇām eva sabhāgatāyām upapadyate,
S06psp_1u:356_1: tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān sthāpayitvā dhanvānīndriyāṇi bhavanti,
S06psp_1u:356_3: na cāsya dhāraṇīmukham abhimukhībhavati na ca samādhimukham,
S06psp_1u:357_1: yo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaimaṃ prajñāpāramitāyogaṃ samāpadyate sa itaś cyutaḥ kutropapadyata iti,
S06psp_1u:357_2: yaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ prajñāpāramitāyogaṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_1u:357_3: sa ito buddhakṣetrāc cyutaḥ buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati,
S06psp_1u:359_0: yaḥ punaḥ śāriputrāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyaś cyuta ihopapadyate tasya tīkṣṇānīndriyāṇi bhavanti,
S06psp_1u:359_2: yad uta prajñāpāramitāyogam, tasya jātivyativṛttasyāpy amī gambhīragambhīrā dharmā abhimukhībhavanti,
S06psp_1u:359_4: yatra yatra buddhakṣetre upapadyate tatra tatra tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayiṣyati.
S06psp_1u:360_0: yaḥ punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tuṣitebhyo devebhyaś cyutvā ihopapanno bhavati tasyāpi paṭutarāṇīndriyāṇi bhavanti,
S06psp_1u:362_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto ghaṭamānā vyāyacchantaḥ sattvaparipākāyopāyakauśalyabalena srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkurvanti,
S06psp_1u:364_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anupāyakuśalā ye catvāri dhyānāni niṣpādayanti pāramitāsu ca caranti,
S06psp_1u:364_2: sacet tataś cyutvā manuṣyeṣu deveṣu copapadyante,
S06psp_1u:364_4: teṣām api dhanvānīndriyāṇi bhavanti na tīkṣṇāni.
S06psp_1u:365_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dhyānāni ca samāpadyante prajñāpāramitāyāṃ ca caranti,
S06psp_1u:365_1: te cānupāyakauśalyena dhyānāny utsṛjya kāmadhātāv upapadyante,
S06psp_1u:365_2: teṣām api śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dhanvānīndriyāṇi bhavanti na tīkṣṇāni.
S06psp_1u:367_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāś catvāri dhyānāny utpādya catvāry apramāṇāni samāpadyante,
S06psp_1u:367_3: na dhyānavaśena nāpramāṇavaśena nārūpyasamāpattivaśena tatra copapadyante yatra tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayiṣyanti,
S06psp_1u:367_4: te punaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇāvirahitā ihaiva bhadrakalpe anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante.
S06psp_1u:369_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ekajātipratibaddhā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upāyakauśalyena catvāri dhyānāni samāpadyante,
S06psp_1u:369_5: na ca teṣāṃ vaśena gacchanti saṃmukhībhūtāṃś [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:369_6: _82] ca buddhān bhagavata ārāgayitvā tatra brahmacaryaṃ caritvā punar eva tuṣitānāṃ sabhāgatāyai upapadyante,
S06psp_1u:369_8_0: te tatra yāvad āyuḥ sthitvā ahīnendriyāḥ smṛtimantaḥ saṃprajānānā anekair devakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtāḥ puraskṛtā
S06psp_1u:369_8_1: ihopapattiṃ darśayitvā nānābuddhakṣetreṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_1u:371_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhino ye na kāmadhātau na rūpadhātau nārūpyadhātāv upapadyante,
S06psp_1u:371_2: tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkurvanto gurukurvanto mānayantaḥ pūjayantaḥ.
S06psp_1u:372_0_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinas te tābhir abhijñābhir vikrīḍanto buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ
S06psp_1u:372_0_1: saṃkrāmanti yeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu na śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānasya prajñaptir apy asti.
S06psp_1u:373_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinas te tābhir abhijñābhir vikrīḍanto buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti yeṣu buddhakṣetreṣv amitam āyuḥ.
S06psp_1u:374_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinaḥ ye lokadhātor lokadhātuṃ saṃkrāmanti,
S06psp_1u:374_1: te tatropasaṃkramya yatra na buddhaśabdo na dharmaśabdo na saṃghaśabdas tatrāvasthitāḥ buddhaśabdaṃ ca dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ ca sattvānāṃ saṃśrāvayanti,
S06psp_1u:374_3: te tena buddhaśabdena dharmaśabdena saṃghaśabdena tataś cyutā yatra yatra buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti te tatra tatropapadyante.
S06psp_1u:376_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāś catvāri dhyānāny utpadya catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ,
S06psp_1u:376_1: te copāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ samādhisamāpattibhyo nivṛtya kāmadhātāv upapadyante,
S06psp_1u:378_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāś catvāri dhyānāni samāpadyante catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyante,
S06psp_1u:378_1: te 'py upāyakauśalyabalena dhyānasamādhisamāpattivaśena vā cāturmahārājakāyikānām api devānāṃ sabhāgatāyai upapadyante,
S06psp_1u:378_2: trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ sabhāgatāyai upapadyante,
S06psp_1u:379_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāś catvāri dhyānāni utpadya catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ,
S06psp_1u:379_1: te tataś cyutāḥ santa upāyakauśalyena brahmaloke yāvad akaniṣṭhe upapadyante,
S06psp_1u:379_2: te tatra bhavanti brahmāṇo mahābrahmāṇas teṣu brahmabhavaneṣu tiṣṭhanti,
S06psp_1u:379_3: te tatra sthitvā buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti,
S06psp_1u:379_4: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tāṃs tathāgatān dharmacakrapravartanāyādhyeṣayanti.
S06psp_1u:381_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ lābhino yāvad aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ lābhinas teṣāṃ cānubodhāya caranti,
S06psp_1u:381_1: caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ lābhino na ca tāni pratividhyanti,
S06psp_1u:381_2: te punar bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ekajātipratibaddhā veditavyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:383_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prathamacittotpādāya caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ lābhino bhavanti,
S06psp_1u:383_5: upāyakauśalyena brahmakāyikeṣu deveṣu yāvad akaniṣṭheṣu deveṣūpapadyante,
S06psp_1u:383_6: tatra cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām arthaṃ kurvanti.
S06psp_1u:385_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prathamacittotpādenaivānuttarāṃ [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:385_2: dharmacakraṃ pravartayanty aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ cārthaṃ kṛtvā nirūpadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvānti,
S06psp_1u:385_3: teṣāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā saddharmas tiṣṭhati.
S06psp_1u:387_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ṣaṭpāramitāsu caranto lokadhātor lokadhātuṃ saṃkrāmanti,
S06psp_1u:387_2: te nityam udyuktāḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo na kadācid anarthasaṃhitāṃ vācaṃ bhāṣante,
S06psp_1u:387_3: sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo nityam udyuktā buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti,
S06psp_1u:387_4: te 'pi bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo 'saṃkhyeyair aprameyaiḥ kalpair nānābuddhakṣetreṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_1u:389_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prathamacittotpādenaiva bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmanti,
S06psp_1u:390_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prathamacittotpādenaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyante,
S06psp_1u:390_1: te 'nekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ svabuddhakṣetrapariśodhanāya saṃkrāmanti,
S06psp_1u:392_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carantaś cakravartino bhūtvā dānapāramitāṃ puraskṛtya sarvasattvānāṃ sarvasukhopadhānāny upasaṃhariṣyanti,
S06psp_1u:392_3: yāvad daśakuśalakarmapatheṣu sattvān pratiṣṭhāpya brahmakāyikeṣu yāvad akaniṣṭheṣu deveṣūpapadyamānā nānābuddhakṣetreṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_1u:394_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye catvāri dhyānāni niṣpādya dhyānebhyaḥ parihīṇāḥ prathamaṃ dhyānam āsādya brahmakāyikeṣu deveṣūpapadyante,
S06psp_1u:394_1: te punar dhyānāni niṣpādyākaniṣṭheṣūpapadya nānābuddhakṣetreṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_1u:396_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye brahmalokāc cyutvā śuddhāvāseṣūpapadyante,
S06psp_1u:396_1: te śuddhāvāsānām ekaṃ vā dve vā sthāne vilaṅghyākaniṣṭheṣu deveṣūpapadya nānābuddhakṣetreṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_1u:398_0_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye tathāgatasadṛśam ātmabhāvam abhinirmāya tuṣitabhavanaṃ pariśodhya brahmakāyikeṣu
S06psp_1u:398_0_1: deveṣu yāvad akaniṣṭheṣu deveṣūpapadyopāyakauśalyena nairayikāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_1u:399_0_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sthitvā yādṛśas tathāgatakāyas tādṛśam ātmabhāvam abhinirmāya
S06psp_1u:399_0_1: gaṅgānadīvālukopamāni buddhakṣetrāṇy upasaṃkramya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_1u:399_1: tathāgatāṃś ca paryupāsate, buddhakṣetraṃ ca niṣpādayanti,
S06psp_1u:399_2_0: dharmaṃ ca śṛṇvanti, evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:399_2_1: paścimottarasyām ūrdhvam adhaḥ sarvāsu daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyāṃ adiśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ
S06psp_1u:399_4: buddhāṃś ca paryupāsate, dharmaṃ ca śṛṇvanti, te tebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyo nirmitāni nirmāya śreṣṭhāni viśiṣṭāny anuttarāṇi buddhakṣetrāṇi niṣpādayanti,
S06psp_1u:399_5: ekajātipratibaddhāś ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tatra tatra buddhakṣetreṣūpapadya nānābuddhakṣetreṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_1u:401_1: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye dhyānārūpyasamāpattīr āsādayanto brahmakāyikeṣu yāvac chubhakṛtsneṣu deveṣūpapadyante,
S06psp_1u:403_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye dhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ lābhinas ta ākāśānantyāyatane yāvad bhavāgre upapadyante,
S06psp_1u:405_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ṣaṭpāramitāsu caranto dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇālaṃkṛtamūrtayo niruttaraiḥ pariśuddhair indriyaiḥ samanvāgatā bhavanti,
S06psp_1u:405_1: te taiḥ pariśuddhair indriyaiḥ samanvāgatā bahujanasya priyāś ca bhavanti,
S06psp_1u:405_2: manaāpāś ca ye punaḥ sattvās tān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān paśyanti,
S06psp_1u:405_3: te tenaiva cittaprasādenānupūrveṇa tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvānti,
S06psp_1u:405_4: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kāyapariśuddhaye śikṣitavyaṃ vākpariśuddhaye śikṣitavyaṃ manaḥpariśuddhaye śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:406_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caranta uttaptānīndriyāṇi pratilabhante,
S06psp_1u:406_1: te tair uttaptair indriyair nātmānam utkarṣayanti na parān paṃsayanti.
S06psp_1u:407_0_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā naivaṃ kadācid
S06psp_1u:408_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prathamacittotpādam upādāya na jātu daśakuśalān karmapathān utsṛjanti,
S06psp_1u:409_0_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā rājānaś cakravartino bhūtvā dānaṃ sattvebhyo
S06psp_1u:410_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā anekāni cakravartirājyaśatāni parigṛhṇanti,
S06psp_1u:410_2: tatra sthitvā anekāni ca buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi ārāgayanti,
S06psp_1u:410_3: tāṃś ca buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti,
S06psp_1u:412_0_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaś caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ lābhinaś catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ
S06psp_1u:412_0_1: lābhinas te tābhir vikrīḍantaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyante,
S06psp_1u:413_0: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upāyakauśalyenāvaskandakena samādhiṃ samāpadya nānābuddhakṣetreṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_1u:415_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sthitvā sattvānāṃ buddhadharmāvabhāsaṃ kurvanti,
S06psp_1u:417_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'buddhakeṣu lokadhātuṣu apagataśrāvakeṣu pratyekāṃ bodhim abhisaṃbudhyante,
S06psp_1u:417_1: ta upāyakauśalyena [PvsP1-1:_88] bahūni prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi triṣu yāneṣu paripācyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_1u:419_0_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgāṇāṃ lābhino daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ
S06psp_1u:419_4: te prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upāyakauśalyena sarvasattvān mārge 'vatārya viśodhya srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāpayanti,
S06psp_1u:419_5: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāpayanti, anāgāmiphalaṃ prāpayanti, arhattvaṃ prāpayanti, pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ prāpayanti, svayam asākṣātkurvantaḥ parāṃs tatra pratiṣṭhāpayanti.
S06psp_1u:421_0: yac chāriputra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ jñānaṃ ca prahāṇaṃ ca sānutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilabdhasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ.
S06psp_1u:423_0: amī śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyā veditavyāḥ,
S06psp_1u:424_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sthitvā tuṣitabhavanaṃ viśodhayanti,
S06psp_1u:424_1: te khalu punar bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhadrakalpikā veditavyāḥ,
S06psp_1u:424_2_0: amī śāriputrāvaivartikā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yeṣām ayam udayo buddhadharmeṣu tasmāt tarhi śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
S06psp_1u:424_2_1: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā sāvadyasya kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇo 'vakāśo na dātavyaḥ kāyavāṅmanaskarmapariśuddhaye ca śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:427_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:427_1: katamad bhagavan sāvadyaṃ kāyakarma sāvadyaṃ vākkarma sāvadyaṃ manaskarma?
S06psp_1u:428_1: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:428_3: katamaḥ sa kāyaḥ, yena kāyena kāyakarma samārabheya,
S06psp_1u:428_4: katamā sā vāg, yayā vākkarma samārabheya, katamat tan manaḥ, yena manaskarma samārabheya? evam upaparīkṣamāṇaḥ kāyam upalabhate,
S06psp_1u:428_5: vācam upalabhate, mana upalabhate, ayaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kāyavāṅmanaskarmasamārambhaḥ sāvadyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:429_0: na khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kāyam upalabhate,
S06psp_1u:429_1: na vācam upalabhate, na mana upalabhate, yena kāyena vācā manasā mātsaryadauḥśīlyavyāpādakausīdyavikṣepadauṣprajñacittam utpādayet.
S06psp_1u:429_2: asthānam etac chāriputrānavakāśo yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kāyavāṅmanodauṣṭhulyam utpādayet,
S06psp_1u:429_3: naitat sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran kāyadauṣṭhulyaṃ śodhayati,
S06psp_1u:430_0: śāriputra āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kāyavāṅmanodauṣṭhulyaṃ śodhayati?
S06psp_1u:431_0: bhagavān āha: yataḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kāyam upalabhate,
S06psp_1u:432_0: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kāyavāṅmanodauṣṭhulyaṃ śodhayati,
S06psp_1u:432_1: sacet punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prathamacittotpādam upādāya daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā anuvartante,
S06psp_1u:432_3: satatasamitaṃ cāsya sarvasattveṣu mahākāruṇācittaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati.
S06psp_1u:432_4: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kāyavāṅmanodauṣṭhulyaṃ śuddham iti vadāmi.
S06psp_1u:433_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto bodhimārgaṃ pariśodhayanto dānapāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06psp_1u:434_0: śāriputra āha: katamo bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ [PvsP1-1:_90] bodhimārgaḥ?
S06psp_1u:435_0: bhagavān āha: yadā śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kāyam upalabhate,
S06psp_1u:435_1: na vācam upalabhate, na mana upalabhate, na dānapāramitām upalabhate, na śīlapāramitām upalabhate, na kṣāntipāramitām upalabhate,
S06psp_1u:435_5: na śrāvakam upalabhate, na pratyekabuddham upalabhate,
S06psp_1u:435_6_0: na bodhisattvam upalabhate, na buddham upalabhate. ayaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgo yad uta sarvadharmānupalambho
S06psp_1u:435_6_1: 'nena mārgeṇa gacchan bodhisattvo mahasattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran na śakyo 'vamarditum.
S06psp_1u:437_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran na rūpaṃ manyate,
S06psp_1u:437_1_0: na vedanāṃ manyate, na saṃjñāṃ manyate, na saṃskārān manyate, na vijñanaṃ manyate, na pṛthivīdhātuṃ manyate, nābdhātuṃ manyate,
S06psp_1u:437_1_1: na tejodhatuṃ manyate, na vāyudhātuṃ manyate, nākāśadhātuṃ manyate, na vijñānadhatuṃ manyate, na cakṣurdhātuṃ manyate, na
S06psp_1u:437_2: na śrotradhātuṃ manyate, na śabdadhātuṃ manyate, na śrotravijñānadhātuṃ manyate,
S06psp_1u:437_3: na ghrāṇadhātuṃ manyate, na gandhadhātuṃ manyate, na ghrāṇavijñānadhātuṃ manyate,
S06psp_1u:437_4: na jihvādhātuṃ manyate, na rasadhātuṃ manyate, na jihvāvijñānadhātuṃ manyate,
S06psp_1u:437_5: na kāyadhātuṃ manyate, na spraṣṭavyadhātuṃ manyate, na kāyavijñānadhātuṃ manyate,
S06psp_1u:437_6: na manodhātuṃ manyate, na dharmadhātuṃ manyate, na manovijñānadhātuṃ manyate,
S06psp_1u:437_7_0: na smṛtyupasthānāni manyate, na samyakprahāṇāni manyate, narddhipādān manyate, nendriyāṇi manyate, na balāni manyate, na
S06psp_1u:437_7_1: bodhyaṅgāni manyate, na mārgaṃ manyate, na dānapāramitāṃ manyate, na śīlapāramitāṃ manyate, na kṣāntipāramitāṃ manyate, na
S06psp_1u:437_7_2: vīryapāramitāṃ manyate, na dhyānapāramitāṃ manyate, na prajñāpāramitāṃ manyate, na vaiśāradyāni manyate, na pratisaṃvido
S06psp_1u:437_10: na sakṛdāgamiphalaṃ manyate, nānāgāmiphalaṃ manyate, nārhattvaṃ manyate, na pratyekabodhiṃ manyate, na [PvsP1-1:_91] bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ manyate,
S06psp_1u:437_12: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir vardhate,
S06psp_1u:438_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvajñajñānaṃ paripūrayanti,
S06psp_1u:438_1: yena jñānena samanvāgatānāṃ sarvāṇy apāyadvārāṇi pithitāni bhavanti,
S06psp_1u:440_0: śāriputra āha: katamad bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvajñajñānam?
S06psp_1u:441_0: bhagavān āha: yena jñānena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamāṃs tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān paśyati teṣāṃ ca dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇoti,
S06psp_1u:441_1: saṃghaṃ ca paryupāste, buddhakṣetraviśuddhiṃ ca paśyati,
S06psp_1u:441_2: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣv adha ūrdhvaṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamāṃs tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān paśyati,
S06psp_1u:441_4: saṃghaṃ ca paryupāste, buddhakṣetraviśuddhiṃ ca paśyati,
S06psp_1u:442_0: yena jñānena samanvāgatānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ na buddhasaṃjñā bhavati,
S06psp_1u:442_1: na bodhisaṃjñā bhavati, na śrāvakasaṃjñā bhavati, na pratyekabuddhasaṃjñā bhavati,
S06psp_1u:442_2: nātmasaṃjñā bhavati, na parasaṃjñā bhavati, na buddhakṣetrasaṃjñā bhavati,
S06psp_1u:442_3: yena jñānena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahasattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_1u:443_0: yena jñānena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayati,
S06psp_1u:443_8: yena jñānena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvabuddhadharmāṃś ca paripūrayati,
S06psp_1u:445_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye pañcacakṣūṃṣi pratilabhante pariśodhayanti,
S06psp_1u:445_1: katamāni pañca yad uta māṃsacakṣuḥ divyacakṣuḥ prajñācakṣuḥ dharmacakṣuḥ buddhacakṣuḥ.
S06psp_1u:446_0: śāriputra āha: katamad bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ māṃsacakṣuḥ?
S06psp_1u:447_0: bhagavān āha: asti śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māṃsacakṣuḥ,
S06psp_1u:447_1: yad yojanaśataṃ paśyati, asti śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māṃsacakṣur yad yojanaśatadvayaṃ paśyati,
S06psp_1u:447_2: asti śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māṃsacakṣur yaj jaṃbudvīpaṃ paśyati,
S06psp_1u:447_3: asti śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māṃsacakṣur yac cāturdvīpakaṃ lokadhātuṃ paśyati,
S06psp_1u:447_4: asti śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māṃsacakṣur yat sāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ paśyati,
S06psp_1u:447_5: asti śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māṃsacakṣur yad dvisāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ paśyati,
S06psp_1u:447_6: asti śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māṃsacakṣur yat trisāhasraṃ mahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ paśyati.
S06psp_1u:447_7: idaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ māṃsacakṣuḥ.
S06psp_1u:448_0: śāriputra āha: katamad bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ divyacakṣuḥ?
S06psp_1u:449_0: bhagavān āha: yac chāriputra cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte,
S06psp_1u:449_1: yat trayastriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte,
S06psp_1u:449_2: yad yāmānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte,
S06psp_1u:449_3: yat tuṣitānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte,
S06psp_1u:449_4: yan nirmāṇaratīnāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte,
S06psp_1u:449_5: yat paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte,
S06psp_1u:449_6: yad brahmapārṣadyānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte,
S06psp_1u:449_7: yad brahmapurohitānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte,
S06psp_1u:449_10: yat parīttābhānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte,
S06psp_1u:449_11: yad apramāṇābhānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte,
S06psp_1u:449_12: yad ābhāsvarāṇāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte,
S06psp_1u:449_13: yac chubhakṛtsnānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte,
S06psp_1u:449_14: yad anabrakānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte,
S06psp_1u:449_15: yat puṇyaprasavānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte,
S06psp_1u:449_16: yad bṛhatphalānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte,
S06psp_1u:449_17: yad asaṃjñisattvānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte,
S06psp_1u:449_18: yac chuddhābhāsānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte,
S06psp_1u:449_19: yad aspṛhāṇāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte,
S06psp_1u:449_20: yad atapānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte,
S06psp_1u:449_21: yat sudṛśānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte,
S06psp_1u:449_22: yat sudarśānānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte,
S06psp_1u:449_23: yad akaniṣṭhānāṃ devānāṃ divyaṃ cakṣus tadbodhisattvaḥ prajānīte.
S06psp_1u:450_0: yat punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya divyaṃ cakṣus tac cāturmahārājakāyikā devā na prajānanti,
S06psp_1u:450_2: na yāmā devāḥ prajānanti, na tuṣitā devāḥ prajānanti, na nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ prajānanti,
S06psp_1u:450_9: nābhāsvarā devāḥ prajānanti, na parīttaśubhā devāḥ prajānanti,
S06psp_1u:450_12: nānabhrakā devāḥ prajānanti, na puṇyaprasavā devāḥ prajānanti,
S06psp_1u:450_16: nāspṛhādevāḥ prajānanti, nātapā devāḥ prajānanti, na sudṛśā devāḥ prajānanti, na sudarśanā devāḥ prajānanti,
S06psp_1u:450_17: yad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya divyaṃ cakṣus tad akaniṣṭhā devā na prajānanti.
S06psp_1u:451_0: tenaiva pariśuddhena divyena cakṣuṣā pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:451_2: tenaiva pariśuddhena divyena cakṣuṣā dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:451_3: tenaiva pariśuddhena divyena cakṣuṣā paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:451_4: tenaiva pariśuddhena divyena cakṣuṣā uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:451_5: evam uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:451_6: pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:451_7: dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:451_8: paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:451_9: adho diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:451_10: ūrdhvaṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
S06psp_1u:451_11: idaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ divyaṃ cakṣuḥ.
S06psp_1u:452_0: śāriputra āha: katamad bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ prajñācakṣuḥ?
S06psp_1u:453_0: bhagavān āha: yena śāriputra prajñācakṣuṣā samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kañcid dharmaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:453_1: saṃskṛtaṃ vā asaṃskṛtaṃ vā kuśalaṃ vā akuśalaṃ vā sāvadyaṃ vā anavadyaṃ vā sāsravaṃ vā anāsravaṃ vā saṃkleśaṃ vā niṣkleśaṃ vā laukikaṃ vā lokottaraṃ vā saṃkliṣṭaṃ vā vyavadānaṃ vā,
S06psp_1u:453_2: yena prajñācakṣuṣā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kaścid dharmo na dṛṣṭo na śruto na mato na vijñātaḥ.
S06psp_1u:453_3: idaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ prajñācakṣuḥ,
S06psp_1u:454_0: śāriputra āha: katamad bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ dharmacakṣuḥ?
S06psp_1u:455_0: bhagavān āha: iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmacakṣuṣaivaṃ jānāti,
S06psp_1u:455_1: ayaṃ pudgalaḥ śraddhānusārī, ayaṃ pudgalo dharmānusārī, [PvsP1-1:_95] ayaṃ pudgalaḥ śūnyatāvihārī,
S06psp_1u:456_0: ayaṃ pudgalaḥ śūnyatāvihārī, asya pudgalasya śūnyatāvimokṣamukheṇa pañcendriyāṇy utpatsyante,
S06psp_1u:456_6: sa bhāvanāmārgaṃ pratilabhya kāmarāgavyāpādatanutvād ayam ucyate pudgalaḥ sakṛdāgāmī,
S06psp_1u:456_7: sa tenaiva bhāvanāmārgeṇādhimātrabhāvitena kāmarāgavyāpādaprahāṇād ayam ucyate pudgalo 'nāgāmī,
S06psp_1u:456_8: sa tenaiva bhāvanāmārgeṇādhimātrabhāvitena rūparāgam ārūpyarāgam avidyāṃ mānam auddhatyaṃ ca prahāyāyam ucyate pudgalo 'rhan.
S06psp_1u:457_0: ayaṃ pudgalo 'nimittavihārī, asya pudgalasyānimittavimokṣamukhena pañcendriyāṇy utpatsyante,
S06psp_1u:457_1: pañcabhir indriyair ānantaryasamādhiṃ prakṣyati ānantaryeṇa samādhinā vimuktijñānadarśanam utpādayiṣyati,
S06psp_1u:457_5: sa bhāvanāmārgaṃ pratilabhya kāmarāgavyāpādatanutvād ayam ucyate pudgalaḥ sakṛdāgāmī,
S06psp_1u:457_6: sa tenaiva bhāvanāmārgeṇādhimātrabhāvitena kāmarāgavyāpādaprahāṇād ayam ucyate pudgalo 'nāgāmī,
S06psp_1u:457_7: sa tenaiva bhāvanāmārgeṇādhimātrabhāvitena rūparāgam ārūpyarāgam avidyāṃ mānam auddhatyaṃ ca prahāyāyam ucyate pudgalo 'rhan.
S06psp_1u:458_7: sa bhāvanāmārgaṃ pratilabhya kāmarāgavyāpādatanutvādayam ucyate pudgalaḥ sakṛdāgāmī,
S06psp_1u:458_8: sa tenaiva bhāvanāmārgeṇādhimātrabhāvitena kāmarāgavyāpādaprahāṇād ayam ucyate pudgalo 'nāgāmī,
S06psp_1u:458_9: sa [PvsP1-1:_96] tenaiva bhāvanāmārgeṇādhimātrabhāvitena rūparāgam ārūpyarāgam avidyāṃ mānam auddhatyaṃ ca prahāyāyam ucyate pudgalo 'rhan.
S06psp_1u:458_10: idaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ dharmacakṣuḥ.
S06psp_1u:459_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ jānāti,
S06psp_1u:459_1: yat kiñcit samudayadharmī sarvaṃ tan nirodhadharmīti prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:459_3: idaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ dharmacakṣuḥ.
S06psp_1u:460_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ jānāti,
S06psp_1u:460_1: ayaṃ bodhisattvaḥ prathamacittotpādiko yo dānapāramitāyāṃ vā carati,
S06psp_1u:460_2: śīlapāramitāyāṃ vā carati, sa tataḥ śuddhendriyaṃ pratilabhate,
S06psp_1u:460_3: vīryendriyaṃ ca, sa upāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ saṃcintyātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_1u:460_20: na ca śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patiṣyati,
S06psp_1u:460_21: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na nivartate yāvan nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddha iti.
S06psp_1u:460_22: idaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ dharmacakṣuḥ.
S06psp_1u:461_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ jānāti,
S06psp_1u:461_1: amī bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_1u:461_2: amī bodhisattvā na vyākṛtā, amī bodhisattvā avinivartanīyāḥ,
S06psp_1u:461_6_0: ayaṃ bodhisattvo 'bhijñāparipūrṇaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi yāvad upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn gatvā tathāgatān arhataḥ
S06psp_1u:461_7: _97] pūjayati, ayaṃ bodhisattvo nābhijñāparipūrṇo yāvan na pūjayati,
S06psp_1u:461_10: asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_1u:461_14: asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya buddhā bhagavanto varṇaṃ bhāṣante,
S06psp_1u:461_16: amī bodhisattvā buddhānāṃ bhagavatām āsannasthāyino bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_1u:461_22: asya bodhisattvasyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya bodhisattvasaṃgho bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_1u:461_23: asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya na bodhisattvasaṃgho bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_1u:461_25: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na duṣkaracaryāṃ cariṣyati,
S06psp_1u:461_32: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ dharmacakṣuḥ.
S06psp_1u:462_0: śāriputra āha: katamad bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ buddhacakṣuḥ?
S06psp_1u:463_0: bhagavān āha: yac chāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhicittānantaraṃ vajropamaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadya ekacittakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti,
S06psp_1u:463_2: caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā ca samanvāgataḥ,
S06psp_1u:463_3: yena ca cakṣuṣā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāsti kiñcid adṛṣṭaṃ vāśrutaṃ [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:463_5: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ buddhacakṣuḥ.
S06psp_1u:464_0: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcacakṣūṃṣi śodhayitukāmena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:464_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śāriputra ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sarve kuśalā dharmā antargatāḥ sarvaśrāvakadharmāś ca sarvapratyekabuddhadharmāś ca bodhisattvadharmāś ca,
S06psp_1u:464_2: yat khalu śāriputra samyag vadanto vadeyuḥ sarvakuśaladharmasaṃgraha iti prajñāpāramitāṃ khalu samyag vadantovadeyuḥ.
S06psp_1u:464_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śāriputra prajñāpāramitā janayitrī sarvāsāṃ pāramitānām,
S06psp_1u:464_5: eṣu ca śāriputra pañcasu bodhisattvacakṣuḥṣu śikṣitvā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_1u:466_0: atra śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann abhijñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_1u:466_2: pṛthivīm api kampayati, eko 'pi bhūtvā bahudhā bhavati,
S06psp_1u:466_5: tiraḥkuḍyaṃ tiraḥprākāraṃ tiraḥparvatam apy asakto gacchati tadyathāpi nāmākāśe 'pi krāmati tadyathāpi nāma pakṣī śakuniḥ,
S06psp_1u:466_6: pṛthivyām apy unmajjanimajjaṃ karoti tadyathāpi nāmodake,
S06psp_1u:466_8: dhūmāyaty api prajjalaty api tadyathāpi nāma mahān agniskandhaḥ,
S06psp_1u:466_9: udakam api kāyāt pramuñcati tadyathāpi nāma mahāmeghaḥ,
S06psp_1u:466_10: imāv api sūryācandramasāv evaṃ maharddhikau mahānubhāvau pāṇinā parāmṛśati parimārṣṭi yāvad brahmalokād api kāyaṃ vaśena vartayati,
S06psp_1u:466_11: tayā ca ṛddhyā na manyate, tathā hi satām ṛddhiṃ nopalabhate yayā manyate tad api na manyate yenāpi manyate svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:466_13: sa na ṛddhicetanām apy utpādayati na ṛddhyabhinirhāracetanāṃ vā anyatra sarvajñatā manasikārāt.
S06psp_1u:466_14: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran ṛddhividhyabhijñāsākṣātkriyājñānam [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:467_0: sa divyena śrotradhātunā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa śabdān śṛṇoti divyān mānuṣyakāṃś ca,
S06psp_1u:467_1: na ca tena divyena śrotreṇa manyate,
S06psp_1u:467_2: ahaṃ śabdān śṛṇomi, tathā hi sa tarn api śabdaṃ nopalabhate svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya svabhāvaviviktatām upādāya svabhāvānupalabdhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:467_5: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran divyaśrotrābhijñāsākṣātkriyājñānam abhinirharati.
S06psp_1u:468_0: sa parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ cetasaiva yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:468_2: vigatarāgaṃ cittaṃ vigatarāgaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:468_3: sadoṣaṃ cittaṃ sadoṣaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:468_4: vītadoṣaṃ cittaṃ vītadoṣaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:468_5: samohaṃ cittaṃ samohaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:468_6: vītamohaṃ cittaṃ vītamohaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:468_7: satṛṣṇaṃ cittaṃ satṛṣṇaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:468_8: vīatatṛṣṇaṃ cittaṃ vītatṛṣṇaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:468_9: sopādānaṃ cittaṃ sopādānaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:468_10: nirūpādānaṃ cittaṃ nirūpādānaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:468_11: saṃkṣiptaṃ cittaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:468_12: vikṣiptaṃ cittaṃ vikṣiptaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:468_13: parīttaṃ cittaṃ parīttaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:468_14: vipulaṃ cittaṃ vipulaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:468_15: mahadgataṃ cittaṃ mahadgataṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:468_16: samāhitaṃ cittaṃ samāhitaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:468_17: asamāhitaṃ cittam asamāhitaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:468_18: viviktaṃ cittaṃ viviktaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:468_19: aviviktaṃ cittam aviviktaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:468_20: sāsravaṃ cittaṃ sāsravaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:468_21: anāsravaṃ cittam anāsravaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:468_22: sāṅgaṇaṃ cittaṃ sāṅgaṇaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:468_23: anaṅgaṇaṃ cittam anaṅgaṇaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:468_24: sottaraṃ [PvsP1-1:_100] cittaṃ sottaraṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:468_25: anuttaraṃ cittam anuttaraṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:468_26: tena ca na manyate, tathā hi tac cittam acittam acintyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:468_28: tad eva cittaṃ nopalabhate svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:468_32: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvasattvacittacaritābhijñāsākṣātkriyājñānam abhinirharati.
S06psp_1u:469_0: pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānena sa ekām api jātim anusmarati,
S06psp_1u:469_1: dve tisro yāvaj jātiśatasahasrāṇy apy anusmarati,
S06psp_1u:469_2: sa ekam api cittam anusmarati yāvac cittaśatam api,
S06psp_1u:469_7: anekāni api kalpaśatāny anekāny api kalpasahasrāṇy anekāny api kalpaśatasahasrāṇy anekāny api kalpakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi anusmarati yāvat pūrvāntakoṭīm apy anusmarati,
S06psp_1u:469_8: amutrāham āsam evaṃnāmā evaṃgotra evaṃjātir evamāhāra evaṃcirasthitikaḥ,
S06psp_1u:469_11: sa evaṃ sākāraṃ sādṛśaṃ sanirdeśam anekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsam anusmarati,
S06psp_1u:469_13: tathā hi tajjñānam ajñānam acintyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:469_15: sa tad eva jñānaṃ nopalabhate svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya svabhāvaviviktatām upādāya svabhāvānupalabdhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:469_18: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran pūrvanivāsānusmṛtisākṣātkriyājñānam abhinirharati.
S06psp_1u:470_0: sa divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa sattvān paśyati cyavamānān utpadyamānān suvarṇān durvarṇān hīnān praṇītān sugatau durgatau yathākarmopagān sattvān prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:470_2: _101] kāyasucaritena samanvāgatāḥ vāksucaritena samanvāgatāḥ manaḥsucaritena samanvāgatāḥ,
S06psp_1u:470_3: āryāṇām anapavādakāḥ samyagdṛṣṭayaḥ tena kāyavāṅmanaḥsucaritena hetunā sugatau svargaloka upapadyante.
S06psp_1u:471_0: ime punar bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatāḥ,
S06psp_1u:471_2: āryāṇām apavādakāḥ mithyādṛṣṭayas te mithyādṛṣṭikarmasamādānahetoḥ kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyante.
S06psp_1u:472_0_0: iti hi divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa daśadiśi loke sarvalokadhātuṣu dharmadhātuparame ākāśadhātuparyavasāne
S06psp_1u:473_0: tena ca na manyate tathā hi tac cakṣur acakṣur acintyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:473_2: tad eva cakṣur nopalabhate svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:474_0: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran divyacakṣurabhijñāsākṣātkriyājñānam abhinirharati,
S06psp_1u:474_2: na ca śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patati,
S06psp_1u:474_3: nāpy anyaṃ kañcid dharmam āśaṃsati anyatrānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyamīti,
S06psp_1u:474_4: sa tayā āsravakṣaya sākṣātkriyābhijñājñānābhinirhārakuśalatayā na manyate tathā hi taj jñānam ajñānam acintyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:474_6: tad eva ca jñānaṃ nopalabhate svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya svabhāvaviviktatām upādāya svabhāvānupalabdhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:474_7: na sa āsravakṣayacetanām apy utpādayati nāsravakṣayābhijñābhinirhāracetanāṃ vānyatra sarvākārajñatāmanasikārāt.
S06psp_1u:474_8: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann āsravakṣayābhijñāsākṣātkriyājñānam abhinirharati.
S06psp_1u:475_0: evaṃ punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ ṣaḍabhijñāḥ paripūryante pariśudhyante ca,
S06psp_1u:476_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānaṃ śodhayanti,
S06psp_1u:477_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānaṃ śodhayanti,
S06psp_1u:478_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānaṃ śodhayanti,
S06psp_1u:479_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānaṃ śodhayanti,
S06psp_1u:480_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānaṃ śodhayanti,
S06psp_1u:481_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānaṃ śodhayanti,
S06psp_1u:482_0: evaṃ khalu śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānaṃ śodhayanti,
S06psp_1u:482_1: atyantaśūnyatām upādāya, dānaṃ parigrahatām upādāya prajñapyate,
S06psp_1u:482_7: sa tīrṇa iti na manyate, na tīrṇa iti na manyate, dānaṃ parigraha iti na manyate,
S06psp_1u:482_13: ākruṣṭo 'ham iti na manyate, vandito 'ham iti na manyate, satkṛto 'ham iti na manyate, asatkṛto 'ham iti na manyate.
S06psp_1u:482_14: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi śāriputra anutpāda ākruṣṭo 'ham iti manyate,
S06psp_1u:482_16: satkṛto 'ham iti manyate, asatkṛto 'ham iti manyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitā sarvamananāḥ samucchinatti,
S06psp_1u:482_17: iha śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato ye guṇā bhavanti na te sarve śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ saṃvidyante,
S06psp_1u:482_18: sa imān guṇān paripūrayan sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati sarvākārajñatāṃ cānuprāpnoti.
S06psp_1u:483_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvasattvānām antike samacittatām utpādayati,
S06psp_1u:483_1: sarvasattvānām antike samacittatām utpādya sarvadharmasamatāṃ pratilabhate,
S06psp_1u:483_3: sa dṛṣṭa eva dharme buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ priyo bhavati manaāpaś ca,
S06psp_1u:483_4: sarvabodhisattvānāṃ ca sarvaśrāvakānāṃ ca pratyekabuddhānāṃ ca priyo bhavati manaāpaś ca,
S06psp_1u:483_5: sa yatra yatropapadyate tatra tatra na jātu cakṣuṣā amanaāpāni rūpāṇi paśyati,
S06psp_1u:484_0: asmin khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitānirdeśe nirdiśyamāne trīṇi bhikṣuṇīśatāni bhagavantaṃ yathāvṛtaiś cīvarair abhicchādayāmāsur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpādayāmāsuḥ.
S06psp_1u:484_1: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitam akarot.
S06psp_1u:485_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānandaḥ samutthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇañ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:485_1: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prādurbhāvāya,
S06psp_1u:485_2: nāhetukaṃ nāpratyayaṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti?
S06psp_1u:486_0: bhagavān āha: etāny ānanda trīṇi bhikṣuṇīśatāni ekaṣaṣṭitame kalpe mahāketunāmānas tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke utpatsyante,
S06psp_1u:486_1: tārakopame kalpe itaś cyutāni santi akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre upapatsyate,
S06psp_1u:486_3: _104] yāni yāny anayā dharmadeśanayā paripācitāni tāni tāni maitreyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike parinirvāsyanti.
S06psp_1u:487_0: atha khalu bhagavato 'nubhāvena tasyāṃ velāyāṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi buddhasahasraṃ paśyanti sma,
S06psp_1u:487_9: adha ūrdhvam ekaikasyāṃ diśi buddhasahasraṃ paśyanti,
S06psp_1u:487_11: na ceha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau tān buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān paśyanti yān daśasu dikṣu teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān paśyanti sma.
S06psp_1u:488_0: atha khalu bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ parṣanmaṇḍalād daśabhiḥ prāṇisahasraiḥ praṇidhānāni kṛtāni vayaṃ tāni puṇyāni kariṣyāmo yaiḥ puṇyair eteṣu buddhakṣetreṣūpapatsyāmaha iti.
S06psp_1u:489_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇām āśayaṃ viditvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitam akarot.
S06psp_1u:490_0: ānanda āha: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prādurbhāvāya?
S06psp_1u:491_0: bhagavān āha: paśyasi tvam ānandemāni daśaprāṇisahasrāṇi.
S06psp_1u:493_0: bhagavān āha: etāny ānanda daśaprāṇisahasrāṇi itaś cyutāni teṣu daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetrasahasreṣūpapatsyante,
S06psp_1u:493_2: tataḥ paścād vyūharājanāmānas tathāgatā loke utpatsyante.
S06psp_1u:494_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmāṃś ca mahāmaudgalyāyana āyuṣmāṃś ca subhūtir āyuṣmāṃś ca mahākāśyapaḥ,
S06psp_1u:494_1: ete cānye ca saṃbahulā abhijñātā abhijñātā bhikṣavo bodhisattvāś ca bhikṣubhikṣuṇy upāsakopāsikāś ca bhagavantam etad avocan:
S06psp_1u:494_2: mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_1u:494_3_0: agrapāramiteyaṃ [PvsP1-1:_105] viśiṣṭapāramiteyaṃ pravarapāramiteyam anuttarapāramiteyaṃ niruttarapāramiteyaṃ asamapāramiteyaṃ
S06psp_1u:494_4: anavamardanīyapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_1u:495_0: atra hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caradbhir bodhisattvair mahāsattvair asamasamaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ tair asamasamā dānapāramitā paripūritā,
S06psp_1u:495_2: te 'samasamasya dharmasya lābhino bhaviṣyanti yad utānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_1u:496_3: te 'samasamasya dharmasya lābhino bhaviṣyanti yad utānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_1u:497_3: te 'samasamasya dharmasya lābhino bhaviṣyanti yad utānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
S06psp_1u:498_3: te 'samasamasya dharmasya lābhino bhaviṣyanti yad utānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_1u:499_3: te 'samasamasya dharmasya lābhino bhaviṣyanti yad utānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
S06psp_1u:500_3: te 'samasamasya dharmasya lābhino bhaviṣyanti yad utānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_1u:501_0_0: atraiva ca tvaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann asamasamasya rūpasya lābhī jāto 'samasamāyā vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām
S06psp_1u:501_0_1: asamasamasya vijñānasya lābhī jāto 'samasamāṃ bodhim abhisaṃbuddho 'samasamaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartitam.
S06psp_1u:502_0: evam atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto 'traiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ samyaksaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbhotsyante ca abhisaṃbudhyante ca,
S06psp_1u:502_2: _106] pāraṃ gantukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:502_3: namaskaraṇīyās te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena.
S06psp_1u:503_0: evam ukte bhagavāṃs tān saṃbahulān śrāvakāṃs tāṃś ca bodhisattvān etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:503_2: namaskaraṇīyās te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena ye 'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti.
S06psp_1u:503_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? bodhisattvaṃ hi śāriputrāgamya lokasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06psp_1u:503_4_0: manuṣyalokasya devalokasya kṣatriyamahāśālakulānāṃ brāhmaṇamahāśālakulānāṃ gṛhapatimahāśālakulānāṃ rājñāṃ cakravartināṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ
S06psp_1u:503_4_1: devānāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ yāmānāṃ devānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ devānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ devānāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ
S06psp_1u:503_4_2: brahmapārṣadyānāṃ devānāṃ brahmapurohitānāṃ devānāṃ mahābrahmāṇāṃ devānāṃ parīttābhānāṃ devānām apramāṇābhānāṃ devānām ābhāsvarāṇāṃ
S06psp_1u:503_4_3: devānāṃ parīttaśubhānāṃ devānām apramāṇaśubhānāṃ devānāṃ śubhakṛtsnānāṃ devānām anabhrakānāṃ devānāṃ puṇyaprasavānāṃ devānāṃ
S06psp_1u:503_4_4: bṛhatphalānāṃ devānām asaṃjñisattvānāṃ devānāṃ śuddhābhāsānāṃ devānām aspṛhāṇāṃ devānām atapānāṃ devānāṃ sudṛśānāṃ devānāṃ
S06psp_1u:503_4_5: sudarśanānāṃ devānām akaniṣṭhānāṃ devānām ākāśānantyāyatanopagānāṃ devānāṃ vijñānānantyāyatanopagānāṃ devānām ākiñcānyāyatanopagānāṃ
S06psp_1u:503_4_6: devānāṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagānāṃ devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06psp_1u:503_5: srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06psp_1u:503_6: bodhisattvaṃ hi śāriputrāgamya trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06psp_1u:503_7: laukikānāṃ ca sarvajīvitopakaraṇānām annapānavastraśayyāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariskārāṇāṃ maṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṃkhaśilāpravālajātarūparajatānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06psp_1u:503_8: yāvac chāriputra sarvasukhopadhānāṃ divyānāṃ mānuṣyakāṇāṃ ca bhavasukhānāṃ ca nirvāṇasukhānāṃ ca [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:503_11: tat kasya hetoḥ? bodhisattvo hi śāriputra caryāñ caran ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sattvān niyojayati,
S06psp_1u:503_12: dānaṃ dāpayati śīlaṃ samādāpayati kṣāntyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati vīryaṃ niyojayati dhyāne pratiṣṭhāpayati prajñāyāṃ niyojayati,
S06psp_1u:503_13: sarve ca sattvā bodhisattvam āgamya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06psp_1u:503_14: tasmāc chāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo sarvasattvānāṃ hitasukhāya pratipanno bhavati.
S06psp_1u:504_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ jihvendriyaṃ nirnāmayitvā imaṃ trisāhasraṃ mahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ jihvendriyeṇācchādayāmāsa.
S06psp_1u:505_0: atha khalu tato jihvendriyād anekavarṇā nānāvarṇā arciṣo niśceruḥ,
S06psp_1u:505_1: niḥsṛtya pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn ābhayāvabhāsayāmāsuḥ.
S06psp_1u:505_2: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn ābhayāvabhāsayāmāsuḥ,
S06psp_1u:506_0_0: atha khalu pūrvasyāṃ yāvad ūrdhvaṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyo 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyā bodhisattvās tān prabhāvyūhān
S06psp_1u:506_0_1: dṛṣṭvā svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paripṛcchanti sma:
S06psp_1u:506_1: kasyāyaṃ bhagavann anubhāvo yenāyam eva prabhāvabhāsaḥ saṃdṛśyate?
S06psp_1u:507_0: te buddhā bhagavantas tān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān evam āhuḥ:
S06psp_1u:507_1: eṣa kulaputrāḥ paścime yāvad adho digbhāge sahāyāṃ lokadhātau śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddḥs tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S06psp_1u:507_2: tena jihvendriyaṃ nirṇamayya pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā iokadhātavo [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:507_4: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavo 'vabhāsena sphuṭīkṛtā yad uta bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ deśanāya saṃprakāśanāya.
S06psp_1u:508_0: te bodhisattvās tāṃs tathāgatān evam āhuḥ:
S06psp_1u:508_1: gamiṣyāmo vayaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahālokadhātuṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya,
S06psp_1u:508_2: tāṃś ca daśadiksaṃnipatitān bodhisattvān mahāsattvāṃs tāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāṃ śravaṇāya.
S06psp_1u:509_0: te buddhā bhagavanta āhuḥ: gacchata kulaputrā yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyadhvam.
S06psp_1u:510_0_0: atha khalu te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā daśabhyo digbhyaḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantīr
S06psp_1u:510_0_1: gṛhītvā nānāratnasuvarṇarūpyapuṣpapuṭāni ca gṛhītvā mahatyā tūryatāḍāvacarasaṃgītyā bhagavantaṃ śākyamunim upasaṃkrāntā abhūvan.
S06psp_1u:511_0_0: atha khalu cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trayastriṃśā devā yāmā devās tuṣitā devā nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino
S06psp_1u:511_0_1: devā brahmapurohitā devā mahābrahmāṇo devāḥ parīttābhā devā apramāṇābhā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ parīttaśubhā devā apramāṇaśubhā
S06psp_1u:511_0_2: devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā anabhrakā devāḥ puṇyaprasavā devā bṛhatphalā devā asaṃjñisattvā devāḥ śuddhābhāsā devā aspṛhā devā
S06psp_1u:511_0_3: atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhāś ca devā divyapuṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākā
S06psp_1u:512_0: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca devās taiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanais tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham avakiranti sma.
S06psp_1u:513_0_0: atha khalu tāni puṣpāṇi vaihāyasam abhyudgamyāsya trisāhasramahāsāhasrasya lokadhātor upariṣṭāt puṣpakūṭāgāraḥ saṃsthito
S06psp_1u:513_0_1: 'bhūt catusthūṇaś caturasro bhāgataḥ suvibhakto ramaṇīyo manoramaḥ.
S06psp_1u:514_0: atha khalu tataḥ parṣadaḥ prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasram utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:514_1: _109] pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:514_2: vayaṃ bhagavann anāgate 'dhvani evaṃrūpāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhino bhavema yathā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
S06psp_1u:514_3: evaṃ ca śrāvakagaṇaṃ parikarṣema evaṃ ca parṣadi dharmaṃ deśayema yac caitarhi tathāgato bhagavān dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_1u:515_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇām āsayaṃ viditvā sarvadharmāṇāṃ cānutpādāyānirodhāyānabhisaṃskārāyāprādurbhāvāya kṣāntiṃ viditvā smitam akarot.
S06psp_1u:515_1: atha tato 'nekavarṇā raśmayo bhagavato mukhadvārān niścaritās te sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punar evāgatā bhagavato mūrdhany antardhīyante sma.
S06psp_1u:516_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānanda utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ janumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:516_1: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya pradurbhāvāya?
S06psp_1u:517_0: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:517_1: etad ānanda prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasram aṣṭaṣaṣṭyā kalpakoṭībhir bodhyaṅgapuṣpanāmānas tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loka utpatsyante puṣpākare kalpe.
S06psp_1u:519_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyām āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayāmāsa:
S06psp_1u:519_1: pratibhātu te subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām ārabhya yathā bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ niryāyur iti.
S06psp_1u:520_0: atha khalu teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ teṣāṃ ca mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ teṣāṃ ca devaputrāṇām etad abhavat,
S06psp_1u:520_1: kiṃ nu khalv āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ svakena prajñāpratibhānabalādhānena bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyaty utāho buddhānubhāvena?
S06psp_1u:521_0_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir buddhānubhāvena teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ teṣāñ ca mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ teṣāñ ca devaputrāṇāṃ
S06psp_1u:521_0_1: cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:521_1: yat kiñcid [PvsP1-1:_110] āyuṣman śāriputra bhagavataḥ śrāvakā bhāṣante deśayanty upadiśanti sarvaḥ sa tathāgatasya puruṣakāro veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:521_2_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? yo hi tathāgatena dharmo deśitas tasyāṃ dharmadeśanāyāṃ śikṣamāṇās tāṃ dharmatāṃ sākṣātkurvanti tāṃ dharmatāṃ
S06psp_1u:521_2_1: sākṣātkṛtvā yad yad eva bhāṣante deśayanty upadiśanti sarvaṃ tad dharmatayā na virudhyate,
S06psp_1u:521_3: tathāgata evaiṣa śāriputra upāyayogena bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyati,
S06psp_1u:521_4: aviṣayo 'tra śāriputra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadeṣṭum.
S06psp_1u:523_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:523_2: katamasyaitad bhagavan dharmasyādhivacanaṃ yad uta bodhisattva iti? nāhaṃ bhagavan dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:523_3: so 'haṃ bhagavan bodhisattvam asamanupaśyan prajñāpāramitām apy anupalabhamānaḥ katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vadiṣyāmi?
S06psp_1u:524_0: bhagavān āha: nāmamātram idaṃ subhūte yad uta prajñāpāramitā iti bodhisattva iti ca,
S06psp_1u:524_1: tad api ca bodhisattvanāma nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:524_2: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sattvaḥ sattva iti cocyate,
S06psp_1u:524_3: na ca kācit sattvopalabdhiḥ, yac ca tannāma tat prajñaptimātraṃ prajñaptidharmaḥ prajñaptisat.
S06psp_1u:526_0: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate,
S06psp_1u:526_1: evam ātmasattvajīvapoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakāḥ sarva ete prajñaptidharmāḥ sarva ete anutpādā anirodhā yāvad eva nāmamātreṇa vyavahriyante.
S06psp_1u:527_0: evam eva subhūte yā ca prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_1u:527_2: yac ca bodhisattvanāma sarva ete prajñaptidharmāḥ,
S06psp_1u:527_3: sarva ete anutpādā anirodhā yāvad eva nāmamātreṇa vyavahriyate.
S06psp_1u:528_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte idam adhyātmikaṃ rūpam iti dharmaprajñaptimātraṃ [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:528_1: _111] tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate.
S06psp_1u:529_1: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate.
S06psp_1u:530_1: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate.
S06psp_1u:531_1: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate.
S06psp_1u:532_1: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate.
S06psp_1u:533_0_0: evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitā ca bodhisattvaś ca bodhisattvanāma ca sarva ete prajñaptidharmās teṣāñ ca prajñaptidharmāṇāṃ
S06psp_1u:534_1: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate yad uta cakṣur iti,
S06psp_1u:534_2: tac ca cakṣur nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:535_1: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate yad uta śrotram iti,
S06psp_1u:535_2: tac ca śrotraṃ nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:536_1: tasyās ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate yad uta ghrāṇam iti,
S06psp_1u:536_2: tac ca ghrāṇaṃ nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:537_1: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate yad uta jihveti,
S06psp_1u:537_2: sā ca jihvā nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:538_2: _112] notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate yad uta kāya iti,
S06psp_1u:538_3: sa ca kāyo nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:539_1: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptair notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate yad uta mana iti,
S06psp_1u:539_2: tac ca mano nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:540_1: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptair notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate rūpam iti.
S06psp_1u:541_1: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptair notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate śabda iti.
S06psp_1u:542_1: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptair notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate gandha iti.
S06psp_1u:543_1: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptair notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate rasa iti.
S06psp_1u:544_1: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptair notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate,
S06psp_1u:545_1: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptair notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate,
S06psp_1u:546_0: cakṣurdhātū rūpadhātuś cakṣurvijñānadhātur iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat,
S06psp_1u:546_1: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptair notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate,
S06psp_1u:546_2: te ca nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:547_0: śrotradhātuḥ śabdadhātuḥ śrotravijñānadhātur iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat,
S06psp_1u:547_3: te ca nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyante,
S06psp_1u:548_0: ghrāṇadhātur gandhadhātur ghrāṇavijñānadhātur iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat,
S06psp_1u:548_1: tasyās ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāma saṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate,
S06psp_1u:548_2: te ca nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:549_0: jihvādhātū rasadhātur jihvāvijñānadhātur iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat,
S06psp_1u:549_1: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāma saṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate,
S06psp_1u:549_2: te ca nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:550_0: kāyadhātuḥ spraṣṭavyadhātuḥ kāyavijñānadhātur iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat,
S06psp_1u:550_1: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāma saṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate,
S06psp_1u:550_2: te ca nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:551_0: manodhātur dharmadhātur manovijñānadhātur iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat,
S06psp_1u:551_1: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāma saṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate,
S06psp_1u:551_2: te ca nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:552_0: evam eva subhūte yad ucyate prajñāpāramiteti,
S06psp_1u:552_1: bodhisattva iti, bodhisattvanāmeti ca dharmaprajñaptimātram etat,
S06psp_1u:552_2: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate,
S06psp_1u:552_3: tac ca nāma nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:553_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yad etad ādhyātmikaṃ śarīraṃ śarīram iti vyavahriyate,
S06psp_1u:553_1: śiro grīvā udaram aṃsau skandhau bāhū pṛṣṭhaṃ pārśvakāḥ kaṭhyūrū jaṅghe pādāv asthīnīti vyavahriyante,
S06psp_1u:553_2: te ca prajñaptidharmās teṣāṃ notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyante,
S06psp_1u:553_3: tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:554_0: evam eva subhūte yad ucyate prajñāpāramiteti bodhisattva iti bodhisattvanāmeti ca sarva ete prajñaptidharmās teṣāṃ ca notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyante,
S06psp_1u:554_1: tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:555_1: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte bāhyaṃ tṛṇakāṣṭhaṃ śākhāparṇapalāśaṃ sarvaṃ taṃ nānānāmadheyair vyapadiśyate,
S06psp_1u:555_2: teṣāñ ca nāmnāṃ notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyante,
S06psp_1u:555_3: tāni ca nāmāni nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:556_0: evam eva subhūte yad ucyate prajñāpāramiteti bodhisattva iti bodhisattvanāmeti ca sarva ete prajñaptidharmās te ca nānānāmadheyair vyapadiśyante,
S06psp_1u:556_1: teṣāṃ ca nāmnāṃ notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyante,
S06psp_1u:556_2: tāni ca nāmāni nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:556_3: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:557_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte tadyathāpi nāma svapnapratiśrutkāmarīcipratibhāsamāyopamās tathāgatanirmitāḥ sarve te dharmaprajñaptimātrās
S06psp_1u:557_0_1: teṣāñ ca notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate,
S06psp_1u:557_1: tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:558_0_0: evam eva subhūte yad ucyate prajñāpāramiteti bodhisattva iti bodhisattvanāmeti ca sarvam etad dharmaprajñaptimātraṃ tasyāś
S06psp_1u:558_0_1: ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate,
S06psp_1u:558_1: tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:559_0: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā nāmasaṃketaprajñaptyām avavādaprajñaptyāṃ dharmaprajñaptyāṃ ca śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:561_0: evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpaṃ nityam iti samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:561_14: _115] samanupaśyati, na rūpaṃ saṃskṛtam iti samanupaśyati,

S06psp_1u:781_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitānāma taṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ tac ca bodhisattvanāma na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:781_1: saṃskṛte vā dhātāv asaṃskṛte vā dhātau tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran naitān sarvadharmān kalpayati na vikalpayati,
S06psp_1u:781_3: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na prajñāpāramitāṃ nāpi prajñāpāramitānāma samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:782_2: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na prajñāpāramitāṃ nāpi prajñāpāramitānāma,
S06psp_1u:784_0: tathā hi tena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dharmalakṣaṇaṃ pratividdhaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_1u:784_1: yac ca dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tan na saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate.
S06psp_1u:784_2: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā nāmasāṃketikī dharmaprajñaptir anuboddhavyā.
S06psp_1u:786_0: sa nāmasāṃketikyā dharmaprajñaptyā avabuddhayā na rūpam abhinivekṣyate,
S06psp_1u:787_0: na cakṣur abhinivekṣyate, na rūpam abhinivekṣyate, na cakṣurvijñānam abhinivekṣyate,
S06psp_1u:787_2: yad api cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayotpannaṃ vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā tad api nābhinivekṣyate.
S06psp_1u:788_0: na śrotram abhinivekṣyate na śabdaṃ na śrotravijñānaṃ na śrotrasaṃsparśaṃ,
S06psp_1u:788_1: yad api śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayotpannaṃ vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā tad api nābhinivekṣyate.
S06psp_1u:789_0: na ghrāṇam abhinivekṣyate na gandhaṃ na ghrāṇavijñānaṃ na ghrāṇasaṃsparśam,
S06psp_1u:789_1: yad api ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayotpannaṃ vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā tad api nābhinivekṣyate.
S06psp_1u:790_0: na jihvām abhinivekṣyate na rasaṃ na jihvāvijñānaṃ na jihvāsaṃsparśaṃ,
S06psp_1u:790_1: yad api jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayotpannaṃ vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā tad api nābhinivekṣyate.
S06psp_1u:791_0: na kāyam abhinivekṣyate na spraṣṭavyaṃ na kāyavijñānaṃ na kāyasaṃsparśaṃ,
S06psp_1u:791_2: _130] sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā tad api nābhinivekṣyate.
S06psp_1u:792_0: na mano 'bhinivekṣyate na dharmān na manovijñānaṃ na manaḥsaṃsparśaṃ,
S06psp_1u:792_1: yad api manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayotpannaṃ vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā tad api nābhinivekṣyate,
S06psp_1u:794_6: na nāmāpi na lakṣaṇam api tāsām abhinivekṣyate,
S06psp_1u:796_3_0: na śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ na mahāśūnyatāyāṃ na paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ na saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ nātyantaśūnyatāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:796_3_1: nānavarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ nānavakāraśūnyatāyāṃ na prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ na sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ nānupalambhaśūnyatāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:796_3_2: nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ na bhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ nābhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ na svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ na parabhāvaśūnyatāyām abhinivekṣyate.
S06psp_1u:797_0: na tathatāyāṃ na bhūtakoṭyāṃ na dharmadhātau na sattvaparipāke na buddhakṣetrapariśuddhau nopāyakauśalye 'bhinivekṣyate.
S06psp_1u:797_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te sarvadharmā na saṃvidyante yas cābhiniviśeta yena cābhiniviśeta yatra cābhiniviśeta.
S06psp_1u:799_0: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anabhiniviṣṭaḥ sarvadharmeṣu dānapāramitayā vivardhate,
S06psp_1u:799_1_0: śīlapāramitayā [PvsP1-1:_131] vivardhate, kṣāntipāramitayā vivardhate, vīryapāramitayā vivardhate, dhyānapāramitayā vivardhate,
S06psp_1u:801_0: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ carann avinivartanīyāṃ bhūmim avakrāmati.
S06psp_1u:803_0: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhijñāḥ paripūrayati,
S06psp_1u:803_2: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati, buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ satkaroti gurukaroti mānayati pūjayati tenaiva kuśalamūlena teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ cāntika upapadyate,
S06psp_1u:803_3: dharmaṃ ca śṛṇoti śrutāś cāsya dharmā na jātūcchetsyante yāvadā bodhimaṇḍād iti dhāraṇīmukhāni pratilapsyate samādhimukhāni pratilapsyate.
S06psp_1u:803_4: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā nāmasāṃketikī dharmaprajñaptir anuboddhavyā.
S06psp_1u:805_0: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yad ucyate bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity api tu rūpaṃ bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:806_0: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte 'nyatra rūpād bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:807_0: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte rūpe bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:808_0: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte boadhisattve rūpam iti,

S06psp_1u:909_1: saṃjñāsukhatāyā saṃjñāduḥkhatāyā saṃjñātmatāyā saṃjñānātmatāyā saṃjñāśāntatāyā saṃjñāśāntatāyā etad adhivacanaṃ bodhisattva iti?
S06psp_1u:910_0: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte saṃskāranityatāyā saṃskārānityatāyā etad adhivacanaṃ bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:910_1: saṃskārasukhatāyāḥ saṃskāraduḥkhatāyāḥ saṃskārātmatāyāḥ saṃskārānātmatāyāḥ saṃskāraśāntatāyāḥ saṃskārāśāntatāyā etad adhivacanaṃ bodhisattva iti?
S06psp_1u:911_0: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte vijñānanityatāyā vijñānānityatāyā etad adhivacanaṃ bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:911_1: vijñānasukhatāyā vijñānaduḥkhatāyā vijñānātmatāyā vijñānanātmatāyā vijñānaśāntatāyā vijñānāśāntatāyā etad adhivacanaṃ bodhisattva iti?
S06psp_1u:912_0_0: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte rūpaśūnyatāyā rūpāśūnyatāyā rūpanimittatāyā rūpānimittatāyā rūpapraṇihitatāyā rūpāpraṇihitatāyā etad
S06psp_1u:912_0_1: adhivacanaṃ bodhisattva iti? evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_1u:913_0: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte vijñānaśūnyatāyā vijñānāśūnyatāyā vijñānanimittatāyā [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:913_1: _142] vijñānānimittatāyā vijñānapraṇihitatāyā vijñānāpraṇihitatāyā etad adhivacanaṃ bodhisattva iti?
S06psp_1u:915_0: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punas tvaṃ subhūte 'rthavaśaṃ pratītya evaṃ vadasi:
S06psp_1u:915_1: na rūpasya nityatādhivacanaṃ nānityatādhivacanaṃ bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:915_2_0: evaṃ na sukhādhivacanaṃ na duḥkhādhivacanaṃ nātmādhivacanaṃ nānātmādhivacanaṃ na śāntādhivacanaṃ nāśāntādhivacanaṃ na śūnyatādhivacanaṃ
S06psp_1u:915_2_1: nāśūnyatādhivacanaṃ na nimittādhivacanaṃ nānimittādhivacanaṃ na rūpasya praṇihitādhivacanaṃ nāpraṇihitādhivacanaṃ bodhisattva
S06psp_1u:916_0: na vedanāyā nityatādhivacanaṃ nānityatādhivacanaṃ bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:916_1_0: evaṃ na sukhādhivacanaṃ na duḥkhādhivacanaṃ nātmādhivacanaṃ nānātmādhivacanaṃ na śāntādhivacanaṃ nāśāntādhivacanaṃ na śūnyatādhivacanaṃ
S06psp_1u:916_1_1: nāśūnyatādhivacanaṃ na nimittādhivacanaṃ nānimittādhivacanaṃ na vedanāyāḥ praṇihitādhivacanaṃ nāpraṇihitādhivacanaṃ bodhisattva
S06psp_1u:917_0: na saṃjñāyā nityatādhivacanam anityatādhivacanaṃ bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:917_1_0: evaṃ na sukhādhivacanaṃ na duḥkhādhivacanaṃ nātmādhivacanaṃ nānātmādhivacanaṃ na śāntādhivacanaṃ nāśāntādhivacanaṃ na śūnyatādhivacanaṃ
S06psp_1u:917_1_1: nāśūnyatādhivacanaṃ na nimittādhivacanaṃ nānimittādhivacanaṃ na saṃjñāyāḥ praṇihitādhivacanaṃ nāpraṇihitādhivacanaṃ bodhisattva
S06psp_1u:918_0: na saṃskārānāṃ nityatādhivacanam anityatādhivacanaṃ bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:918_1_0: evaṃ na sukhādhivacanaṃ na duḥkhādhivacanaṃ nātmādhivacanaṃ nānātmādhivacanaṃ na śāntādhivacanaṃ nāśāntādhivacanaṃ na śūnyatādhivacanaṃ
S06psp_1u:918_1_1: nāśūnyatādhivacanaṃ na nimittādhivacanaṃ nānimittādhivacanaṃ na saṃskārānāṃ praṇihitādhivacanaṃ nāpraṇihitādhivacanaṃ [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:919_0: na vijñānasya nityatādhivacanaṃ nānityatādhivacanaṃ bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:919_1_0: evaṃ na sukhādhivacanaṃ na duḥkhādhivacanaṃ nātmādhivacanaṃ nānātmādhivacanaṃ na śāntādhivacanaṃ nāśāntādhivacanaṃ na śūnyatādhivacanaṃ
S06psp_1u:919_1_1: nāśūnyatādhivacanaṃ na nimittādhivacanaṃ nānimittādhivacanaṃ na vijñānasya praṇihitādhivacanaṃ nāpraṇihitādhivacanaṃ bodhisattva
S06psp_1u:920_0: subhūtir āha: atyantatayā bhagavan rūpaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:921_0: atyantayā bhagavan vedanā na vidyate nopalabhyate, kuto vedanādhivacanaṃ bodhisattvo bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_1u:922_0: atyantatayā bhagavan saṃjñā na vidyate nopalabhyate, kutaḥ saṃjñādhivacanaṃ bodhisattvo bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_1u:923_0: atyantatayā bhagavan saṃskārā na vidyante nopalabhyante,
S06psp_1u:924_0: atyantatayā bhagavan vijñānaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:925_0: atyantatayā bhagavan nityaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:926_0: atyantatayā bhagavann anityaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:926_2_0: evaṃ na sukhādhivacanaṃ na duḥkhādhivacanaṃ nātmādhivacanaṃ nānātmādhivacanaṃ na śāntādhivacanaṃ nāśāntādhivacanaṃ na śūnyatādhivacanaṃ
S06psp_1u:926_2_1: nāśūnyatādhivacanaṃ na nimittādhivacanaṃ nānimittādhivacanaṃ na praṇihitādhivacanaṃ nāpraṇihitādhivacanaṃ bodhisattvo bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_1u:927_0: atyantatayā bhagavan nityaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:928_0: atyantatayā bhagavann anityaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:928_2: evaṃ na sukhādhivacanaṃ na duḥkhādhivacanaṃ nātmādhivacanaṃ nānātmādhivacanaṃ na śāntādhivacanaṃ [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:928_3: _144] nāśāntādhivacanaṃ na śūnyatādhivacanaṃ nāśūnyatādhivacanaṃ na nimittādhivacanaṃ nānimittādhivacanaṃ na praṇihitādhivacanaṃ nāpraṇihitādhivacanaṃ bodhisattvo bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_1u:929_0_0: bhagavān āha: sādhu sādhu subhūte, evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā rūpādhivacanam anupalabhamānena
S06psp_1u:929_0_1: vedanādhivacanam anupalabhamānena saṃjñādhivacanam anupalabhamānena saṃskārādhivacanam anupalabhamānena vijñānādhivacanam
S06psp_1u:930_0_0: rūpasya nityānityādhivacanam anupalabhamānena sukhaduḥkhādhivacanam anupalabhamānena ātmanānātmādhivacanam anupalabhamānena
S06psp_1u:930_0_1: śāntāśāntādhivacanam anupalabhamānena śūnyāśūnyādhivacanam anupalabhamānena nimittānimittādhivacanam anupalabhamānena praṇihitāpraṇihitādhivacanam
S06psp_1u:931_0_0: vedanāyā nityānityādhivacacanam anupalabhamānena sukhaduḥkhādhivacanam anupalabhamānena ātmānātmādhivacanam anupalabhamānena
S06psp_1u:931_0_1: śāntāśāntādhivacanam anupalabhamānena śūnyāśūnyādhivacanam anupalabhamānena nimittānimittādhivacanam anupalabhamānena praṇihitāpraṇihitādhivacanam
S06psp_1u:932_0_0: saṃjñāyā nityānityādhivacacanam anupalabhamānena sukhaduḥkhādhivacanam anupalabhamānena ātmanānātmādhivacanam anupalabhamānena
S06psp_1u:932_0_1: śāntāśāntādhivacanam anupalabhamānena śūnyāśūnyādhivacanam anupalabhamānena nimittānimittādhivacanam anupalabhamānena praṇihitāpraṇihitādhivacanam
S06psp_1u:933_0_0: saṃskārāṇāṃ nityānityādhivacacanam anupalabhamānena sukhaduḥkhādhivacanam anupalabhamānena ātmānātmādhivacanam anupalabhamānena
S06psp_1u:933_0_1: śāntāśāntādhivacanam anupalabhamānena śūnyāśūnyādhivacanam anupalabhamānena nimittānimittādhivacanam anupalabhamānena praṇihitāpraṇihitādhivacanam
S06psp_1u:934_0: vijñānasya nityānityādhivacacanam anupalabhamānena sukhaduḥkhādhivacanam anupalabhamānena ātmānātmādhivacanam anupalabhamānena [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:934_1_0: _145] śāntāśāntādhivacanam anupalabhamānena śūnyāśūnyādhivacanam anupalabhamānena nimittānimittādhivacanam anupalabhamānena
S06psp_1u:936_0: yad api subhūte evaṃ vadasi, nāhaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:936_1: na hi subhūte dharmo dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:938_0: na subhūte rūpadhātur dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati, nāpi dharmadhātū rūpadhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:939_0: na subhūte vedanādhātur dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati, nāpi dharmadhātur vedanādhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:940_0: na subhūte saṃjñādhātur dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati, nāpi dharmadhātur saṃjñādhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:942_0: na subhūte vijñānadhātur dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati, nāpi dharmadhātur vijñānadhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:943_0: na cakṣurdhātur dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati, nāpi dharmadhātuś cakṣurdhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:944_0: na śrotradhātur dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati, nāpi dharmadhātuḥ śrotradhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:945_0: na ghrāṇadhātur dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati, nāpi dharmadhātur ghrāṇadhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:946_0: na jihvādhātur dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati, nāpi dharmadhātur jihvādhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:947_0: na kāyadhātur dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati, nāpi dharmadhātur kāyadhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:953_0: na ca subhūte saṃskṛtavyatirekeṇāsaṃskṛtaṃ śakyaṃ prajñapayituṃ,
S06psp_1u:954_0: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kañcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:954_1: asamanupaśyan nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
S06psp_1u:954_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na samanupaśyati,
