S06psp_1u:956_0: rūpāṇi na samanupaśyati, śabdān na samanupaśyati, gandhān na samanupaśyati, rasān na samanupaśyati, spraṣṭavyān na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:957_0: pṛthivīdhātum abdhātuṃ tejodhātuṃ vāyudhātum ākāśadhātuṃ vijñānadhātuṃ na samanupaśyati.
S06psp_1u:959_0: rāgaṃ na samanupaśyati, dveṣaṃ na samanupaśyati, mohaṃ na samanupaśyati.
S06psp_1u:961_0: kāmadhātuṃ na samanupaśyati, rūpadhātuṃ na samanupaśyati, ārūpyadhātuṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:961_8: buddhaṃ na samanupaśyati, buddhadharmān na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:961_9: bodhiṃ na samanupaśyati, yāvat sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:961_10: sarvadharmān asamanupaśyan, nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate.
S06psp_1u:962_0: subhūtir āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate?
S06psp_1u:963_0: bhagavān āha: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś cittacaitasikān dharmān nopalabhate na samanupaśyati.
S06psp_1u:963_1: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate.
S06psp_1u:964_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nottrasyati mānasam?
S06psp_1u:965_0: bhagavān āha: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo manaś ca manodhātuṃ ca nopalabhate na samanupasyati,
S06psp_1u:965_1: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nottrasyati mānasam.
S06psp_1u:965_2: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmān upalabdhya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam.
S06psp_1u:966_0: sacet subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nopalabhate na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:966_1: tañ ca bodhisattvaṃ, tac ca bodhisattvanāma, tac ca bodhicittaṃ nopalabhate na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:966_2: eṣa eva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvavādaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām eṣaivānuśāsaṃ.
S06psp_1u:967_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:967_1: rūpaṃ parijñātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:967_2: vedanāṃ parijñātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S06psp_1u:967_3: saṃjñāṃ parijñātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajnāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S06psp_1u:967_4: saṃskārān parijñātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S06psp_1u:968_0: cakṣuḥ parijñātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:968_1: śrotraṃ parijñātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:968_2: ghrāṇaṃ parijñātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:968_3: jihvāṃ parijñātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:968_4: kāyaṃ parijñātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:968_5: manaḥ parijñātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:969_0: rūpaṃ parijñātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:969_1: śabdaṃ parijñātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:969_2: gandhaṃ parijñātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:969_3: rasaṃ parijñātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:969_4: sparśaṃ parijñātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:969_5: dharmaṃ parijñātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:970_0: cakṣurvijñānaṃ parijñātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:970_1: śrotravijñānaṃ parijñātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:970_2: ghrāṇavijñānaṃ parijñātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:970_3: jihvāvijñānaṃ parijñātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:970_4: kāyavijñānaṃ parijñātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:970_5: manovijñānaṃ parijñātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:971_0: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāṃ vedanāṃ parijñātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:971_5: manaḥsaṃsparśaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśajāṃ vedanāṃ parijñātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:972_0: rāgadveṣamohān prahātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāparamitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S06psp_1u:972_1_0: evaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataparāmarśaṃ vicikitsāṃ kāmarāgaṃ vyāpādaṃ rūparāgam ārūpyarāgaṃ saṃyojanānuśayaparyutthānāni prahātukāmena
S06psp_1u:973_0: punar aparaṃ caturo yogān oghān granthān upādānāni caturo viparyāsān prahātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāparamitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:974_1: daśakuśalān karmapathān parijñātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:975_0_0: catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catur ṛddhipādān
S06psp_1u:975_0_1: pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryaṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaś catvāri vaiśāradyāni ṣaḍ abhijñā daśa
S06psp_1u:975_0_2: tathāgatabalāni aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūrayitukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:976_0: bodhyaṅgaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabdhukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:977_0_0: siṃhavikrīḍitaṃ samādhiṃ, siṃhavijṛmbhitaṃ samādhiṃ, sarvadhāraṇīmukhaṃ samādhiṃ, śūraṅgamaṃ samādhiṃ, ratnamudraṃ samādhiṃ,
S06psp_1u:977_0_1: candraprabhaṃ samādhiṃ, candradhvajaketuṃ samādhiṃ, sarvadharmamudrāgataṃ samādhiṃ,
S06psp_1u:977_1: avalokitamudraṃ samādhiṃ, dharmadhātuniyataṃ samādhiṃ, niyatadhvajaketuṃ samādhiṃ, vajropamaṃ samādhiṃ, sarvadharmapraveśamukhaṃ samādhiṃ,
S06psp_1u:977_2: samādhirājaṃ samādhiṃ, gaganagañjamudraṃ samādhiṃ, balaviśuddhaṃ samādhiṃ, samudgataṃ samādhiṃ, sarvadharmaniruktiniyatapraveśaṃ samādhiṃ,
S06psp_1u:977_9: pātragataṃ samādhiṃ, dhvajāgrakeyūraṃ samādhiṃ, sarvakleśanirdahanaṃ samādhiṃ,
S06psp_1u:977_11: jñānolkāṃ samādhiṃ, daśabalodgataṃ samādhiṃ, ākāśāsaṃganiruktinirūpalepaṃ nāma samādhiṃ,
S06psp_1u:977_12: etāni cānyāni ca samādhimukhāni pratilabdhukāmea na bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:978_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvānām abhiprāyaṃ paripūrayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:979_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvakuśalamūlāni paripūrayitukāmena yaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ paripūrṇair nāpāyeṣūpapadyate,
S06psp_1u:979_1: na hīnakuleṣūpapadyate, na ca śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā na ca pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patati,
S06psp_1u:979_2: na ca bodhisattvamūrdhāmaṃ vā patati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:980_0: śāriputra āha: kathaṃ cāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mūrdhāmaṃ patati?
S06psp_1u:981_0_0: subhūtir āha: yad āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nupāyakuśalaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carann upāyakauśalam ajānan śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitān
S06psp_1u:981_0_1: samādhīn āgamya naiva śrāvakabhūmiṃ naiva pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patati naiva bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmati,
S06psp_1u:982_0: śāriputra āha: kena kāraṇena āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāyam āmaḥ?
S06psp_1u:983_0: subhūtir āha: āma ity āyuṣman śāriputra ucyate bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmatṛṣṇā.
S06psp_1u:986_0: śāriputra āha: katamā āyuṣman subhūte dharmatṛṣṇā?
S06psp_1u:987_0: subhūtir āha: ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpam anityam iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:987_1: _151] saṃjānīte, duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmakam iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte,
S06psp_1u:987_2: rūpaṃ śūnyam ity apraṇihitam iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte,
S06psp_1u:987_3: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān, vijñānam anityam iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte,
S06psp_1u:987_4: duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmakam iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte,
S06psp_1u:987_5: vijñānaṃ śūnyam ity apraṇihitam iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte.
S06psp_1u:987_6: iyam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ānulomikī dharmatṛṣṇā āmaḥ.
S06psp_1u:989_0: evaṃ rūpaṃ prahātavyam anena rūpaṃ prahātavyam iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte,
S06psp_1u:989_1: evaṃ vedanā prahātavyā anena vedanā prahātavyeti,
S06psp_1u:989_2: evaṃ saṃjñā prahātavyā anena saṃjñā prahātavyeti,
S06psp_1u:989_3: evaṃ saṃskārāḥ prahātavyā anena saṃskārāḥ prahātavyā iti,
S06psp_1u:989_4: evaṃ vijñānaṃ prahātavyam anena vijñānaṃ prahātavyam iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte,
S06psp_1u:989_5: evaṃ duḥkhaṃ parijñeyam anena duḥkhaṃ parijñeyam iti,
S06psp_1u:989_6: evaṃ samudayaḥ prahātavyo 'nena samudayaḥ prahātavya iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte.
S06psp_1u:991_0: evaṃ nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavyo 'nena nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavya iti,
S06psp_1u:991_1: evaṃ mārgo bhāvayitavyo 'nena mārgo bhāvayitavya iti,
S06psp_1u:991_3: ime dharmāḥ sevitavyā ime dharmā na sevitavyā iti,
S06psp_1u:991_19: idaṃ bodhisattvasyopāyakauśalam idam anupāyakauśalam iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte.
S06psp_1u:992_1: saced āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran imān dharmān evaṃ nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte 'yaṃ bodhisattvasyānulomikī dharmatṛṣṇā āmaḥ.
S06psp_1u:993_0: śāriputra āha: katamaḥ punar āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nyāmaḥ?
S06psp_1u:994_0: subhūtir āha: ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nādhyātmaśūnyatayā bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:995_0: ayaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvanyāmaḥ
S06psp_1u:997_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:997_1: yathā śikṣamāṇena rūpaṃ jñātavyaṃ na ca tena mantavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:997_2: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ jñātavyaṃ na ca tena mantavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:997_3: cakṣur jñātavyam evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo manojñātavyaṃ na ca tena mantavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:997_4: śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmā jñātavyā na ca tair mantavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:997_5: dānapāramitā jñātavyā śīlapāramitā jñātavyā kṣāntipāramitā jñātavyā vīryapāramitā jñātavyā dhyānapāramitā jñātavyā prajñāpāramitā jñātavyā na ca tābhir mantavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:997_6: evaṃ pañcābhijñāḥ pañca cakṣūṃṣi catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgā bhāvayitavyā na ca tair mantavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:997_7: catvāri vaiśāradyāni daśatathāgatabalāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā jñātavyā na ca tair mantavyam.
S06psp_1u:998_0: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhicittaṃ nāma jñātavyam asamacittaṃ nāmodāracittaṃ nāma jñātavyaṃ na ca tena mantavyam.
S06psp_1u:998_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā tac cittam acittaṃ prakṛtiś cittasya prabhāsvarā.
S06psp_1u:999_0: śāriputra āha: kā punar āyuṣman subhūte cittasya prabhāsvaratā?
S06psp_1u:1000_0: subhūtir āha: yad āyuṣman śāriputra cittaṃ na rāgeṇa saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1000_1: na dveṣeṇa mohena saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1001_0: śāriputra āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte asti tac cittaṃ yac cittam acittam?
S06psp_1u:1002_0: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman śāriputra yā acittatā tatrāstitā vā nāstitā vā vidyate vā upalabhyate vā?
S06psp_1u:1003_0: śāriputra āha: na khalv āyuṣman subhūte.
S06psp_1u:1004_0: subhūtir āha: saced āyuṣman śāriputra tatrācittatāyām astitā vā nāstitā vā na vidyate vā nopalabhyate vā,
S06psp_1u:1004_1: api nu te yukta eṣa paryanuyogaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1004_3: asti tac cittaṃ yac cittam acittam iti.
S06psp_1u:1005_0: śāriputra āha: kā punar eṣā āyuṣman subhūte acittatā?
S06psp_1u:1006_0: subhūtir āha: avikārā āyuṣman śāriputra avikalpā acittatā yā sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā,
S06psp_1u:1007_0: śāriputra āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte yathaiva tac cittam avikāram avikalpaṃ tathaiva rūpam apy avikāram avikalpaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1007_1: vedanāpy avikārā avikalpā saṃjñāpy avikārā avikalpā saṃskārā apy avikārā avikalpā vijñānam apy avikāram avikalpaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1007_2: evam eva cakṣurdhātū rūpadhātuś cakṣurvijñānadhātur avikāro 'vikalpaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1007_8_1: buddhadharmā yāvad anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir avikārā avikalpā.
S06psp_1u:1008_0: subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra yathaiva cittam avikāram [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:1008_1: _155] avikalpaṃ tathaiva skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādapāramitābhijñābodhipakṣyā dharmā daśatathāgatabalavaiśāradyāṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā yāvad anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:1009_0_0: śāriputra āha: sādhu sādhu āyuṣman subhūte tadyathāpi nāma bhagavataḥ putra auraso mukhato jāto dharmajo dharmanirmito dharmadāyādo
S06psp_1u:1009_0_1: nāmiṣadāyādaḥ pratyakṣacakṣudharmeṣu kāyasākṣī yathāpi nāmāgrāro 'raṇāvihāriṇāṃ bhagavatā agratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭasyāyam upadeśaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1010_0: evam āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1010_1: ataś ca bodhisattvo mahasattvo 'vinivartanīya upaparīkṣitavyo 'virahitaś ca prajñāpāramitayā veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1012_0_0: śrāvakabhūmāv api āyuṣman subhūte śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyam eva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā
S06psp_1u:1013_0_0: pratyekabuddhabhūmāv api āyuṣman subhūte śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyam eva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyodgrahītavyā
S06psp_1u:1013_0_1: dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca upaparīkṣitavyā.
S06psp_1u:1014_0_0: bodhisattvabhūmāv api āyuṣman subhūte śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyam eva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyodgrahītavyā
S06psp_1u:1014_0_1: dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca upaparīkṣitavyā.
S06psp_1u:1015_0_0: buddhabhūmāv api āyuṣman subhūte śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyam eva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā
S06psp_1u:1016_0_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiṣṭāni yatra bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ śrāvakabhūmau
S06psp_1u:1016_0_1: vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā bodhisattvabhūmau vā śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:1018_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1018_1: yo 'haṃ bhagavan na bodhisattvaṃ na prajñāpāramitāṃ vindāmi nopalabhe na [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:1018_2: _156] samanupaśyāmi. tat katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi? etad eva me bhagavan kaukṛtyaṃ syāt,
S06psp_1u:1018_3_0: yo 'haṃ vastu na vindāmi nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi so 'haṃ bhagavan vastv avindann anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamena
S06psp_1u:1018_3_1: dharmeṇa katamaṃ dharmam avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi? etad eva me bhagavan kaukṛtyaṃ syāt,
S06psp_1u:1018_4: yo 'haṃ sarvadhharmān avindann anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan nāmadheyamātreṇāyavyayaṃ kuryāṃ bodhisattva iti vā prajñāpāramiteti vā.
S06psp_1u:1019_0: api tu khalu punar bhagavaṃs tad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam.
S06psp_1u:1019_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? avidyamānatvena tasya nāmadheyasya evaṃ taṃ nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam,
S06psp_1u:1019_2: rūpasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:1019_3: vedanāyā ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:1019_4: saṃjñāyā ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:1019_5: saṃskārāṇām ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ canopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:1019_6: vijñānasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:1019_7: so 'haṃ bhagavan rūpādīnām āyañ ca vyayañ cānupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan kasya nāmadheyaṃ kariṣyāmi bodhisattva iti?
S06psp_1u:1020_0: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa tad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam.
S06psp_1u:1020_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? avidyamānatvāt tasya nāmadheyasya,
S06psp_1u:1020_2: evaṃ taṃ nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam.
S06psp_1u:1021_0: cakṣuṣo 'haṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:1021_1: śrotrasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:1021_2: ghrāṇasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:1021_3: jihvāyā ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:1021_4: kāyasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:1021_5: manaso 'haṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe.
S06psp_1u:1022_0: api tu khalu punar bhagavan yad api tad rūpaṃ nāma vedanā nāma saṃjñā nāma saṃskārā nāma vijñānaṃ nāma cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:1022_2: etāni nāmadheyāni na sthitāni nāsthitāni na viṣṭitāni nāviṣṭitāni.
S06psp_1u:1022_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? avidyamānatvena teṣāṃ nāmadheyānāṃ,
S06psp_1u:1022_4: evaṃ tāni nāmadheyāni na sthitāni nāsthitāni na viṣṭitāni nāviṣṭitāni,
S06psp_1u:1022_5: rūpasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe.
S06psp_1u:1022_6: evaṃ śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmāṇām āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:1022_7: so 'haṃ bhagavan rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmāṇām āyañ ca vyayañ cānupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan kasya nāmadheyaṃ kariṣyāmi bodhisattva iti.
S06psp_1u:1023_0: api tu khalu punar bhagavaṃs tad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam.
S06psp_1u:1023_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? avidyamānatvena tasya nāmadheyasya,
S06psp_1u:1023_2: evaṃ taṃ nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1023_3: cakṣurvijñānasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:1023_4: evaṃ śrotravijñānasya ghrāṇavijñānasya jihvāvijñānasya kāyavijñānasya manovijñānasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:1023_5_0: so 'haṃ bhagavaṃś cakṣurvijñānasya śrotravijñānasya ghrāṇavijñānasya jihvāvijñānasya kāyavijñānasya manovijñānasyāyañ ca
S06psp_1u:1023_5_1: vyayañ ca na samanupaśyann anupalambhamānaḥ kasya nāmadheyaṃ kariṣyāmi bodhisattva iti.
S06psp_1u:1024_0: api tu khalu punar bhagavaṃs tad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam.
S06psp_1u:1024_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? avidyamānatvena tasya nāmadheyasya,
S06psp_1u:1024_2: evaṃ taṃ nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1024_3: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasyāhaṃ bhagavan yāvac cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitasyāyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:1024_4: śrotrasaṃsparśasyāhaṃ bhagavan yāvac chrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitasyāyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:1024_5: ghrāṇasaṃsparśasyāhaṃ bhagavan yāvad ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitasyāyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:1024_6: jihvāsaṃsparśasyāhaṃ bhagavan yāvad jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitasyāyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:1024_7: kāyasaṃsparśasyāhaṃ bhagavan yāvat kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitasyāyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:1024_8: manaḥsaṃsparśasyāhaṃ bhagavan yāvan manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitasyāyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:1024_9: [PvsP1-1:_158] pṛthivīdhātor evam abdhātos tejodhātor vāyudhātor ākāśadhātor vijñānadhātor āyañ ca vyayañ ca na sanupaśyāmi nopalabhe.
S06psp_1u:1024_10: evam avidyā yāvaj jarāmaraṇasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:1024_11: evam avidyānirodhasya yāvaj jarāmaraṇanirodhasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:1024_12: skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādānām ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:1024_13: rāgadveṣamohānām ahaṃ bhagavan āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:1024_14: paryutthānāvaraṇānuśayasaṃyojanadṛṣṭikṛtānām ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe.
S06psp_1u:1025_0: dānapāramitāyā ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:1025_1: śīlapāramitāyā ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:1025_2: kṣāntipāramitāyā ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ cavyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:1025_3: vīryapāramitāyā ahaṃ bhagavannāyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:1025_4: dhyānapāramitāyā ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:1025_5: prajñāpāramitāyā ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi.
S06psp_1u:1026_0: ātmano 'haṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:1026_1: evaṃ sattvajīvapoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakānām ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi.
S06psp_1u:1027_0: smṛtyupashānām ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:1027_1: evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādenadriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:1027_2: śūnyatāyā ānimittasyāpraṇihitasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:1027_3: caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnām ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:1027_4: buddhānusmṛter dharmānusmṛteḥ saṃghānusmṛteḥ śīlānusmṛtes tyāgānusmṛter devatānusmṛter āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:1027_7: pañcānāṃ cakṣuṣām abhijñānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānām āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:1027_8: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām ahaṃ bhagavan buddhadharmāṇām āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:1027_9: so 'haṃ bhagavann aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇām āyañ ca vyayañ cānupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan kasya nāmadheyaṃ kariṣyāmi bodhisattva iti.
S06psp_1u:1028_0: api tu khalu punar bhagavaṃs tad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam.
S06psp_1u:1028_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? avidyamānatvena tasya nāmadheyasya,
S06psp_1u:1028_2: evaṃ taṃ nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam.
S06psp_1u:1029_0: svapnopamānām ahaṃ bhagavan pañcānām upādānaskandhānām āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:1029_1_0: evaṃ māyopamānāṃ pratiśrutkopamānāṃ pratibhāsopamānāṃ pratibimbopāmānāṃ marīcyupamānāṃ udakacandropamānāṃ nirmitakopamānām
S06psp_1u:1029_1_1: ahaṃ bhagavan pañcānām upādānaskandhānām āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi.
S06psp_1u:1029_2: evaṃ viviktasya śāntasyānutpādasyānirodhasyāsaṃkleśasyāvyavadānasya ahaṃ bhagavan āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi.
S06psp_1u:1029_3: evaṃ dharmadhātos tathatāyā bhūtakoṭer dharmasthititāyā dharmaniyāmatāyā ahaṃ bhagavan āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi.
S06psp_1u:1030_0_0: evaṃ kuśalānām akuśalānāṃ sāvadyānām anavadyānāṃ sāsravāṇām anāsravāṇāṃ saṃkleśānāṃ niḥkleśānāṃ laukikānāṃ lokottarāṇāṃ saṃskṛtānām
S06psp_1u:1030_0_1: asaṃskṛtānāṃ saṃkleśānāṃ vyavadānānāṃ saṃsārikāṇāṃ nairvāṇikānām ahaṃ bhagavan dharmāṇām āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi.
S06psp_1u:1031_0: atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ dharmāṇām āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:1031_1: bhagavato 'py ahaṃ bhagavan āyañ ca vyayañ canopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi.
S06psp_1u:1032_0: pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhanāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ sabodhisattvasaṃghānām [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:1032_1: _160] ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:1032_11: tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ sabodhisattvasaṃghānām ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:1032_12_0: so 'haṃ bhagavaṃs tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ sabodhisattvasaṃghānāmāyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalaṃbhamāno
S06psp_1u:1032_12_1: 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi.
S06psp_1u:1033_0: api tu khalu punar bhagavaṃs tad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam.
S06psp_1u:1033_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? avidyamānatvāt tasya nāmadheyasya,
S06psp_1u:1033_2: evaṃ taṃ nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1033_3: sarvadharmatathatāyā ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:1033_4: so 'haṃ bhagavan sarvadharmatathatāyām āyañ ca vyayañ cānupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi.
S06psp_1u:1034_0: api tu khalu punar bhagavaṃs tad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam.
S06psp_1u:1034_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? avidyamānatvāt tasya nāmadheyasya,
S06psp_1u:1034_2: evaṃ taṃ nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam.
S06psp_1u:1036_0: yāpīyaṃ bhagavan dharmasāṃketikī dharmaprajñaptir yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:1036_1: sā na kenacid vacanīyā skandhena vā dhātunā vā āyatanena vā yāvad āveṇikena vā buddhadharmeṇa,
S06psp_1u:1036_3: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan svapno na kenacid vacanīyaḥ pratiśrutko pratibhāsaḥ pratibimbaṃ nirmitakaṃ na kenacid vacanīyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1036_4: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan pṛthivyāptejovāyvākāśaṃ nāma na kenacid [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:1036_5: _161] vacanīyam, tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan śīlam iti samādhir iti prajñeti vimuktir iti vimuktijñā anadarśanam iti nāma na kenacid vacanīyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1036_6: srotaāpanna iti nāma na kenacid vacanīyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1036_7: sakṛdāgāmīti, anāgāmīti, arhann iti, pratyekabuddha iti, yāvad bodhisattvadharma iti tathāgata iti buddha iti tathateti buddhadharma iti nāma na kenacid vacanīyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1036_8_0: kuśalena vā akuśalena vā sāvadyena vā anavadyena vā sukhena vā duḥkhenavā ātmanā vā anātmanā vā śāntena vā aśāntena vā viviktena
S06psp_1u:1036_8_1: vā aviviktenavā nimittena vā animittena vā bhāvena vā abhāvena vā imam apy ahaṃ bhagavan arthavaśaṃ pratītya evaṃ vadāmi
S06psp_1u:1036_8_2: etad eva me bhagavan kaukṛtyaṃ syāt,
S06psp_1u:1036_9: yo 'haṃ sarvadharmāṇām āyañ ca vyayañ cānupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan nāmadheyamātreṇāyañ ca vyayañ ca kuryāṃ bodhisattva iti.
S06psp_1u:1037_0: api tu khalu punar bhagavaṃs tad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam,
S06psp_1u:1037_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? avidyamānatvāt tasya nāmadheyasya,
S06psp_1u:1037_2: evaṃ taṃ nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1037_3: saced bhagavann evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipratisārī bhavati,
S06psp_1u:1037_4: mānasaṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate niyataṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartaṇīyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito veditavyaḥ susthito 'sthānayogena.
S06psp_1u:1039_0_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na rūpe sthātavyaṃ na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na
S06psp_1u:1039_0_1: saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne sthātavyaṃ tena na cakṣuṣi sthātavyaṃ na śrotre na ghrāṇe na jihvāyāṃ na kāye na manasi sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1039_1: tena na rūpe sthātavyaṃ na śabde na gandhe na rase na spraṣṭavye na dharme sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1039_2: tena na cakṣurvijñāne sthātavyan na śrotravijñāne na ghrāṇavijñāne na jihvāvijñāne na kāyavijñāne na manovijñāne sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1039_3: tena na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe sthātavyan na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayite sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1039_9: na pṛthivīdhātau sthātavyaṃ nābdhātau na tejodhātau na vāyudhātau nākāśadhātau na vijñānadhātau sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1039_10_0: tena nāvidyāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ na saṃskāreṣuna vijñāne na nāmarūpe na ṣaḍāyatane na sparse na vedanāyāṃ na tṛṣṇāyāṃ nopādāne
S06psp_1u:1039_10_1: na bhave na jātau na jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaumanasyopayāseṣu sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1040_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan rūpaṃ rūpatvena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1040_1: vedanāvedanātvena śūnyā, saṃjñā saṃjñātvena śūnyā, saṃskārāḥ saṃskāratvena śūnyāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1040_3: yā ca bhagavan rūpasya śūnyatā na tad rūpaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1040_4: na cānyatra śūnyatāyā rūpaṃ, rūpam eva śūnyatāśūnyataiva rūpaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1040_5: yā ca bhagavan vedanāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā vedanā,
S06psp_1u:1040_8: yā ca bhagavan saṃjñāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā saṃjñā,
S06psp_1u:1040_11: yā ca bhagavan saṃskārāṇāṃ śūnyatā na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1040_14: yā ca bhagavan vijñānasya śūnyatā na tad vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1041_0: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na rūpe sthātavyaṃ na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1042_0: na pṛthivīdhātau sthātavyaṃ nābdhātau na tejodhātau na vāyudhātau nākāśadhātau na vijñānadhātau sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1042_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan pṛthivīdhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātutvena śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:1042_2: yā ca pṛthivīdhātuśūnyatā nāsau pṛthivīdhātur na cānyatra śūnyatāyāḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S06psp_1u:1042_3: pṛthivīdhātur eva śūnyatā, śūnyataiva pṛthivīdhātuḥ, evam abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātus tathā hi bhagavan vijñānadhātur vijñānadhātutvena śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:1042_4: yā ca vijñānadhātuśūnyatā nāsau vijñānadhātur na cānyatra śūnyatāyā vijñānadhātur vijñānadhātur eva śūnyatā,
S06psp_1u:1042_5_0: śūnyataiva [PvsP1-1:_163] vijñānadhātuḥ. anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na
S06psp_1u:1042_5_1: pṛthivīdhātau sthātavyaṃ nābdhātau na tejodhātau na vāyudhātau nākāśadhātau na vijñānadhātau sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1043_0: na rūpe sthātavyan na śabde na gandhena rase na spraṣṭavye na dharme sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1043_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan rūpaṃ rūpatvena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1043_2: yā ca rūpe śūnyatā na tad rūpaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1043_3: na cānyatra śūnyatāyā rūpaṃ, rūpam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva rūpaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1043_5: yā ca śabdaśūnyatā na sa śabdo,
S06psp_1u:1043_9: yā ca gandhaśūnyatā na sa gandho,
S06psp_1u:1043_13: yā ca rasaśūnyatā na sa raso,
S06psp_1u:1043_14: na cānyatra śūnyatāyā raso, rasa eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva rasaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1043_16: yā ca spraṣṭavyaśūnyatā na tat spraṣṭavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1043_19: tathā hi bhagavan dharmo dharmatvena śūnyo,
S06psp_1u:1043_20: yā ca dharmaśūnyatā na te dharmā,
S06psp_1u:1044_0: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na rūpe sthātavyaṃ na śabde na gandhe na rase na spraṣṭavye na dharme sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1044_1: na cakṣuṣi sthātavyaṃ na śrotre na ghrāṇe na jihvāyāṃ na kāye na manasi sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1045_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavaṃś cakṣuś cakṣutvena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1045_1: yā ca cakṣuḥśūnyatā na tac cakṣur,
S06psp_1u:1045_4: tathā hi śrotraṃ śrotratvena śūnyaṃ yā ca śrotraśūnyatā na tac chrotraṃ,
S06psp_1u:1045_8: yā ca ghrāṇaśūnyatā na tad ghrāṇaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1045_12: yā ca jihvāśūnyatā na sā jihvā,
S06psp_1u:1045_13: na cānyatra śūnyatāyā jihvā, jihvaiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva jihvā,
S06psp_1u:1045_15: yā ca kāyaśūnyatā na sa kāyo,
S06psp_1u:1045_17: kāya eva śūnyatā [PvsP1-1:_164] śūnyataiva kāyaḥ, tathā hi bhagavan mano manastvena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1045_18: yā ca manaḥśūnyatā na taṃ mano,
S06psp_1u:1045_19: na cānyatra śūnyatāyā mano, mana eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva manaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1046_0: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na cakṣuṣi sthātavyaṃ na śrotre na ghrāṇe na jihvāyāṃ na kāye na manasi sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1046_1: na cakṣurvijñāne sthātavyaṃ na śrotravijñānena ghrāṇavijñāne na jihvāvijñāne na kāyavijñāne na manovijñāne sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1047_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavaṃś cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānatvena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1047_1: yā ca cakṣurvijñānaśūnyatā na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1047_5: yā ca śrotravijñānaśūnyatā na tac chrotravijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1047_9: yā ca ghrāṇavijñānaśūnyatā na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1047_13: yā ca jihvāvijñānaśūnyatā na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1047_17: yā ca kāyavijñānaśūnyatā na tat kāyavijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1047_21: yā ca manovijñānaśūnyatā na tan manovijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1048_0_0: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na cakṣurvijñāne sthātavyan na śrotravijñāne
S06psp_1u:1048_0_1: na ghrāṇavijñāne na jihvāvijñāne na kāyavijñāne na manovijñāne sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1048_1: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe sthātavyaṃ na śrotrasaṃsparśe na ghrāṇasaṃsparśena jihvāsaṃsparśe na kāyasaṃsparśe na manaḥsaṃsparśe sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1049_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavaṃś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśatvena [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:1049_1: _165] śūnyaḥ, yā ca cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatā na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1049_5: tathā hi bhagavan manaḥsaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśatvena śūnyo,
S06psp_1u:1049_6: yā ca manaḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatā na sa manaḥsaṃsparśo,
S06psp_1u:1050_0_0: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe sthātavyaṃ na śrotrasaṃsparśe
S06psp_1u:1050_0_1: na ghrāṇasaṃsparśe na jihvāsaṃsparśe na kāyasaṃsparśe na manaḥsaṃsparśe sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1051_0: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayite sthātavyam evaṃ yāvan na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayite sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1051_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavaṃś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitatvena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1051_6: tathā hi bhagavan manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitatvena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1051_7: yā ca manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ śūnyatā na tan manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1052_0: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayotpanne vedayite sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1052_4: na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayotpanne vedayite na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayotpanne vedayite na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayotpanne vedayite sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1053_0: nāvidyāyāṃ sthātavyam evaṃ yāvan na jarāmaraṇe sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1053_1: tat [PvsP1-1:_166] kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavann avidyā avidyātvena śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:1053_5: evaṃ saṃskārāḥ saṃskāratvena śūnyāḥ vijñānaṃ vijñānatvena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1053_8: sparśaḥ sparśatvena śūnyaḥ, vedanā vedanātvena śūnyā, tṛṣṇā tṛṣṇātvena śūnyā, upādānam upādānatvena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1053_9: bhavo bhavatvena śūnyaḥ, jātir jātitvena śūnyā, tathā hi bhagavañ jarāmaraṇaṃ jarāmaraṇatvena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1053_10: yā ca jarā amaraṇaśūnyatā na taj jarāmaraṇaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1054_0_0: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā nāvidyāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne
S06psp_1u:1054_0_1: na nāmarūpe na ṣaḍāyatane na sparse na vedanāyāṃ na tṛṣṇāyāṃ nopādānena bhave na jātau na jarāmaraṇe sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1056_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā smṛtyupasthāneṣu na sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1056_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? smṛtyupasthānāni smṛtyupasthānatvena śūnyāni,
S06psp_1u:1056_2: yā ca bhagavan smṛtyupasthānānāṃ śūnyatā na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni na cānyatra śūnyatāyāḥ smṛtyupasthānāni smṛtyupasthānāny eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06psp_1u:1056_3: tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na smṛtyupasthāneṣu sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1056_5_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āveṇikabuddhadharmā āveṇikabuddhadharmatvena śūnyā yā ca bhagavann āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ śūnyatā
S06psp_1u:1056_5_1: na te āveṇikabuddhadharmā na cānyatra śūnyatāyā āveṇikā buddhadharmā āveṇikā buddhadharmā eva śūnyatā śūnyataivāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ.
S06psp_1u:1056_6_0: tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgapāramitābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu
S06psp_1u:1057_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na dānapāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1057_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi dānapāramitaiva śūnyā dānapāramitāsvabhāvena,
S06psp_1u:1057_2: yā ca bhagavan dānapāramitāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā dānapāramitā,
S06psp_1u:1057_5: na śīlapāramitāyāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na vīryapāramitāyāṃ na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1057_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitaiva śūnyā prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvena,
S06psp_1u:1057_7: yā ca bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_1u:1057_10: tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na dānapāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1057_11: na śīlapāramitāyāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na vīryapāramitāyāṃ na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1058_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā akṣareṣu na sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1058_2: ekodāhāre dvir udāhāre trir udāhāre na sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1058_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy akṣarāṇi śūnyāny akṣarasvabhāvena,
S06psp_1u:1058_4: yā ca bhagavann akṣaraśūnyatā na tāni akṣarāṇi,
S06psp_1u:1058_7: tad anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā nākṣareṣu sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1059_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā nābhijñāsu sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1059_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? abhijñā eva śūnyā abhijñāsvabhāvena,
S06psp_1u:1059_2: yā ca bhagavann abhijñā śūnyatā na tā abhijñā,
S06psp_1u:1059_5: tad anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā nābhijñāsu sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1060_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na rūpam anityam iti sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1060_1: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam anityam iti sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1060_4: yā ca bhagavan rūpānityatā śūnyatā na sā anityatā,
S06psp_1u:1060_7: tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā rūpam anityam iti na sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1061_0: na vedanānityeti sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vedanānityatānityatāsvabhāvena śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:1061_1: yā ca bhagavan vedanānityatāśūnyatā na sā anityatā,
S06psp_1u:1062_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi saṃjñānityatānityatāsvabhāvena śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:1062_2: yā ca bhagavan saṃjñā anityatā śūnyatā na sā anityatā,
S06psp_1u:1063_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi saṃskārānityatānityatāsvabhāvena śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:1063_2: yā ca bhagavan saṃskārā anityatā śūnyatā na sā anityatā,
S06psp_1u:1063_3: na cānyatra śūnyatāyā anityatā anityataiva śūnyatā śūnyataivānityatā,
S06psp_1u:1064_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vijñānānityatānityatāsvabhāvena śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:1064_2: yā ca bhagavan vijñānānityatā śūnyatā na sā anityatā,
S06psp_1u:1064_5: tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na vijñānam anityam iti sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1065_0: evaṃ na rūpaṃ duḥkham iti sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1065_1: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ duḥkham iti sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1065_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi rūpaduḥkhatā duḥkhatāsvabhāvena śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:1065_3: yā ca bhagavan rūpaduḥkhatā śūnyatā na sā duḥkhatā na cānyatra śūnyatāyā duḥkhatā duḥkhataiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva duḥkhatā,
S06psp_1u:1065_4: tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na rūpaṃ duḥkham iti sthātavyaṃ.
S06psp_1u:1065_5: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ duḥkham iti sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1065_6_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vijñānaduḥkhatā duḥkhatāsvabhāvena śūnyā yā ca bhagavan vijñānaduḥkhatā śūnyatā na sā duḥkhatā
S06psp_1u:1065_6_1: na cānyatra śūnyatāyā duḥkhatā duḥkhataiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva duḥkhatā,
S06psp_1u:1065_7: tad anenāpi [PvsP1-1:_169] bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na vijñānaṃ duḥkham iti sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1066_1: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam anātmeti sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1066_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi rūpānātmatā anātmatāsvabhāvena śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:1066_3: yā ca bhagavan rūpānātmatā śūnyatā na sānātmatā,
S06psp_1u:1066_6: tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na rūpam anātmeti sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1066_7: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam anātmeti sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1066_8: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vijñānānātmatā anātmatāsvabhāvena śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:1066_9: yā ca bhagavan vijñānānātmatā śūnyatā na sā anātmatā,
S06psp_1u:1066_12: tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na vijñānam anātmeti sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1067_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na rūpaṃ śāntam iti sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1067_1: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ śāntam iti sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1067_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi rūpaśāntatā śāntatāsvabhāvena śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:1067_3: yā ca bhagavan rūpaśāntatā śūnyatā na sā śāntatā,
S06psp_1u:1067_6: tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na rūpaṃ śāntam iti sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1067_7: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ śāntam iti sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1067_8: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vijñānaśāntatā śāntatāsvabhāvena śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:1067_9: yā ca bhagavan vijñānaśāntatā śūnyatā na sā śāntatā,
S06psp_1u:1067_12: tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na vijñānaṃ śāntam iti sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1069_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā tathatāyāṃ na sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1069_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tathatā tathatāsvabhāvena śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:1069_2: yā ca bhagavaṃs tathatāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā tathatā,
S06psp_1u:1069_5: tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:1070_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi dharmatā dharmatāsvabhāvena śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:1070_2: yā ca bhagavan dharmatāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā dharmatā,
S06psp_1u:1070_5: tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dharmatāyāṃ na sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1071_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi dharmadhātur dharmadhātusvabhāvena śūnyo,
S06psp_1u:1071_2: yā ca bhavagavan dharmadhātoḥ śūnyatā na sa dharmadhātur,
S06psp_1u:1071_5: tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dharmadhātau na sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1072_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi dharmaniyāmatā dharmaniyāmatāsvabhāvena śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:1072_2: yā ca bhagavan dharmaniyāmatā śūnyatā na sā dharmaniyamatā,
S06psp_1u:1072_5: tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dharmaniyāmatāyāṃ na sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1073_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhūtakoṭir bhūtakoṭisvabhāvena śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:1073_2: yā ca bhagavan bhūtakoṭeḥ śūnyatā na sā bhūtakoṭir,
S06psp_1u:1073_5: tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bhūtakoṭyāṃ na sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1074_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu na sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1074_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi dhāraṇīmukhāni dhāraṇīmukhaiḥ śūnyāni,
S06psp_1u:1074_2: yā ca bhagavan dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ śūnyatā na tāni dhāraṇīmukhāni,
S06psp_1u:1074_5: tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dhāraṇīmukheṣu na sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:1075_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anupāyakuśalo 'haṅkāramamakārapatitena mānasena saced rūpe [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:1075_1: _171] tisthati rūpābhisaṃskāre carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:1075_3: saced vijñāne tiṣṭhati vijñānābhisaṃskāre carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_1u:1075_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy abhisaṃskāre caran prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate na prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_1u:1076_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan rūpam aparigṛhītaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam aparigṛhītam.
S06psp_1u:1077_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? yaś ca rūpasyāparigraho na tad rūpaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1077_1: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, yaś ca vijñānasyāparigraho na tad vijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1078_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? yaś ca bhūtakoṭyā aparigraho na sā bhūtakoṭiḥ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1079_0: evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1079_1: tathā ca pratyavekṣitavyā yathā na kvacid dharme manaso vyupacāro bhavet.
S06psp_1u:1079_2: idaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvadharmāparigṛhītaṃ nāma samādhimaṇḍalaṃ vipulaṃ puraskṛtam apramāṇaṃ niyatam asaṃhāryaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ.
S06psp_1u:1080_2_0: mahāśūnyatām upādāya, śūnyatāśūnyatām upādāya, paramārthaśūnyatām upādāya, saṃskṛtaśūnyatām upādāya, asaṃskṛtaśūnyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1080_2_1: atyantaśūnyatām upādāya, anavarāgraśūnyatām upādāya, anavakāraśūnyatām upādāya, prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya, sarvadharmaśūnyatām
S06psp_1u:1080_2_2: upādāya, svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām upādāya, anupalambhaśūnyatām upādāya, abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1082_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi na bhagavan sarvākārajñatā nimittataḥ udgrahītavyā nimittaṃ hi kleśaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1083_0: katamat punar nimittam? rūpaṃ nimittaṃ vedanā nimittaṃ saṃjñā nimittaṃ saṃskārā nimittaṃ vijñānaṃ nimittaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1083_1: cakṣur nimittaṃ śrotraṃ nimittaṃ ghrāṇaṃ nimittaṃ jihvā nimittaṃ kāyo nimittaṃ mano nimittaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1083_2: rūpaṃ nimittaṃ śabdo nimittaṃ gandho nimittaṃ raso nimittaṃ sparśo nimittaṃ dharmo nimittaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1084_0: sacet punaḥ prajñāpāramitā nimittata udgrahītavyābhaviṣyan naiveha śreṇikaḥ parivrājakaḥ śāsane śraddhām alapsyata,
S06psp_1u:1084_1: atra sarvajñajñāne katamā ca śraddhā? yeyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyām abhiśraddadhānatā avakalpanatā adhimuktiś cintanā tulanā vyupaparīkṣaṇā tac cānimittayogena,
S06psp_1u:1085_0: atra punaḥ śreṇikaḥ parivrājakaḥ adhimucya śraddhānusārī prādeśikena jñānenāvatīrṇaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1085_1: so 'vatīrya na rūpaṃ parigṛhītavān na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ parīgṛhītavān.
S06psp_1u:1086_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa tena svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu na kaścid dharmaḥ parigṛhīto nimittāmanasikāratām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1087_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa nādhyātmaprāptyabhisamayatas taj jñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1088_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa taṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1089_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? nādhyātmarūpasya taj jñānaṃ samanupaśyati nādhyātmavedanāyās taj jñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1090_1: na bahirdhāvedanāyā na bahirdhāsaṃjñāyā na bahirdhāsaṃskārāṇāṃ na bahirdhāvijñānasya taj jñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1091_1: nādhyātmabahirdhāvedanāyā nādhyātmabahirdhāsaṃjñāyā nādhyātmabahirdhāsaṃskārāṇāṃ nādhyātmabahirdhāvijñānasya taj jñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1092_1: nāpy anyatravedanāyā, nāpy anyatrasaṃjñāyā, nāpy anyatrasaṃskārebhyo, nāpy anyatravijñānāt taj jñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1093_0: atra padaparyāye śreṇikaḥ parivrājako 'dhimuktaḥ so 'trādhimucya śraddhānusārī prādeśikena jñānenāvatīrṇaḥ sarvajñajñāne dharmatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya sarvadharmānupalabdhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1093_1: evam adhimuktas tena na kaścid dharmaḥ parīgṛhīto nimittāmanasikāratām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1093_2: nāpy anena kaścid dharma upalabdho yaṃ parigṛhīyād vā muñced vā sarvadharmānudgrahānutsargatām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1093_3: sa nirvāṇenāpi na manyate sarvadharmānudgrahānutsargatām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1094_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? yaḥ sarvadharmāṇām aparigraho 'nutsargaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_1u:1094_1: iyam api bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā apārapāragatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1094_2: yad rūpaṃ na parigṛhṇāti yad vedanāṃ na parigṛhṇāti yat saṃjñāṃ na parigṛhṇāti yat saṃskārān na parigṛhṇāti yad vijñānaṃ na parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_1u:1094_6: yāvat samadhiṃ na parigṛhṇāti sarvadharmāparigṛhītatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1094_8: yāvad daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ.
S06psp_1u:1095_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sarvadharmā adharmā,
S06psp_1u:1095_2: _174] buddhadharmā adharmā, nāpi te dharmā nādharmāḥ. iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmāparigṛhītatām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1097_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evaṃ vyupaparīkṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:1098_0: katamaiṣā prajñāpāramitā? kasya caiṣā prajñāpāramitā? kim eṣā prajñāpāramitā? kenaiṣā prajñāpāramitā?
S06psp_1u:1099_0: sacet punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evam upanidhyāyati,
S06psp_1u:1099_1: tat kiṃ yo dharmo na vidyate nopalabhyate sā prajñāpāramiteti na carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_1u:1100_0: atha khalu āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1100_1: katame te āyuṣman subhūte dharmā na vidyante nopalabhyante?
S06psp_1u:1101_0: subhūtir āha: prajñāpāramitā āyuṣman śāriputra na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1101_1: dhyānapāramitā āyuṣmān śāriputra na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1101_5: dānapāramitā āyuṣmān śāriputra na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1101_6: adhyātmaśūnyatām upādāya, bahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1101_7_0: śūnyatāśūnyatām upādāya, mahāśūnyatām upādāya, paramārthaśūnyatām upādāya, saṃskṛtaśūnyatām upādāya, asaṃskṛtaśūnyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1101_7_1: atyantaśūnyatām upādāya, anavarāgraśūnyatām upādāya, anavakāraśūnyatām upādāya, prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya, sarvadharmaśūnyatām
S06psp_1u:1101_7_2: upādāya, svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām upādāya, anupalambhaśūnyatām upādāya, abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1102_0: rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1102_4: vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1102_5: adhyātmaśūnyatā āyuṣman śāriputra na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1102_25: yāvat saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā na vidyante nopalabhyante,
S06psp_1u:1102_33: buddhāpy āyuṣman śāriputra na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1102_34: sarvākārajñatāpy āyuṣman śāriputra na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1103_0_0: sacet punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evam upaparīkṣate evam upanidhyāyati tasyaivam upaparīkṣamāṇasyaivam
S06psp_1u:1103_0_1: upanidhyāyataś cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
S06psp_1u:1105_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1105_1: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā avirahito veditavyaḥ?
S06psp_1u:1106_0: subhūtir āha: rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra virahitaṃ rūpasvabhāvena,
S06psp_1u:1106_1: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra virahitaṃ vijñānasvabhāvena.
S06psp_1u:1106_4: _176] dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāpy āyuṣman śāriputra virahitā prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvena.
S06psp_1u:1106_6: bhūtakoṭir apy āyuṣman śāriputra virahitā bhūtakoṭisvabhāvena.
S06psp_1u:1107_0_0: śāriputra āha: kathaṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte rūpasya svabhāvaḥ? kathaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ? kathaṃ vijñānasya
S06psp_1u:1107_0_1: svabhāvaḥ? kathaṃ vyastasamastānāṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ svabhāvaḥ? evaṃ vistareṇa yāvat kathaṃ bhūtakoṭyāḥ
S06psp_1u:1108_0: subhūtir āha: abhāva āyuṣman śāriputra rūpasya svabhāvaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1108_1: abhāvo vedanāyāḥ, abhāvaḥ saṃjñāyāḥ, abhāvaḥ saṃskārāṇām, abhāvo vijñānasya svabhāvaḥ, abhāvo vyastasamastānāṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādānāṃ svabhāvaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1109_0: evaṃ vistareṇa yāvad abhāvo bhūtakoṭyāḥ svabhāvaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1109_1: tad anena tvayāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam,
S06psp_1u:1111_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra rūpaṃ virahitaṃ rūpalakṣaṇena,
S06psp_1u:1112_1: śāriputra āha: ya āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'tra śikṣiṣyate sa niryāsyati sarvākārajñatāyām.
S06psp_1u:1113_0: subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra yo hy evam atra śikṣiṣyate sa niryāsyati sarvākārajñatāyām.
S06psp_1u:1115_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra ajātā aniryātāḥ sarvadharmāḥ.
S06psp_1u:1116_0: śāriputra āha: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte ajātā aniryātāḥ sarvadharmāḥ?
S06psp_1u:1117_0: subhūtir āha: rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra śūnyaṃ rūpasvabhāvena tasya nāpi jātir nāpi niryāṇam upalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1117_1: vedanā śāriputra śūnyā vedanāsvabhāvena tasyā nāpi jātir nāpi niryāṇam upalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1117_2: saṃjñā śāriputra śūnyā saṃjñāsvabhāvena tasyā nāpi jātir nāpi niryāṇam upalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1117_3: saṃskārāḥ śāriputra śūnyāḥ saṃskārasvabhāvena teṣāṃ nāpi jātir nāpi niryāṇam upalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1117_4: vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra śūnyaṃ vijñānasvabhāvena tasya nāpi jātir nāpi niryāṇam upalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:1117_6: yāvad bhūtakoṭiḥ śūnyā bhūtakoṭisvabhāvena tasyā nāpi jātir nāpi niryāṇam upalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:1118_0_0: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran sarvākārajñatāyā āsannībhavati yathā yathā ca sarvākārajñatāyā
S06psp_1u:1118_0_1: āsannībhavati tathā tathā kāyapariśuddhiñ ca cittapariśuddhiñ ca lakṣaṇapariśuddhiṃ cādhigacchati,
S06psp_1u:1118_1_0: yathā yathā ca kāyapariśuddhiṃ ca cittapariśuddhiṃ ca lakṣaṇapariśuddhiṃ cādhigacchati tathā tathā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06psp_1u:1118_1_1: rāgasahagataṃ cittaṃ notpadyate doṣasahagataṃ cittaṃ notpadyate mohasahagataṃ cittaṃ notpadyate mānasahagataṃ cittaṃ notpadyate
S06psp_1u:1118_1_2: lobhasahagataṃ cittaṃ notpadyate kudṛṣṭisahagataṃ cittaṃ notpadyate sa rāgacittānutpādād doṣacittānutpādān mohacittānutpādān
S06psp_1u:1118_1_3: mānacittānutpādāl lobhacittānutpādāt kudṛṣṭicittānutpādād na jātu mātuḥ kukṣāv upapadyate,
S06psp_1u:1118_7: na tair buddhair bhagavadbhir virahito bhavati,
S06psp_1u:1118_9: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva āsannībhavaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_1u:1120_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1120_1: saced bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nupāyakuśalaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpe carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:1120_2: saced vedanāyāṃ carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:1120_3: sacet saṃjñāyāṃ carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:1120_4: sacet saṃskāreṣu carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:1120_5: saced vijñāne carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_1u:1121_0: saced rūpaṃ nityam anityaṃ veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:1121_1: saced vedanā nityā anityā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:1121_2: saced saṃjñā nityā anityā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:1121_3: saced saṃskārā nityam anityaṃ veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:1121_4: saced vijñānaṃ nityam anityaṃ veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_1u:1122_0: saced rūpaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:1122_1: saced vedanā sukhā duḥkhā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:1122_2: saced saṃjñā sukhā duḥkhā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:1122_3: saced saṃskārāḥ sukhā duḥkhā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:1122_4: saced vijñānaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_1u:1123_0: saced rūpam ātmā anātmā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:1123_1: saced vedanā ātmā anātmā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:1123_2: saced saṃjñā ātmā anātmā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:1123_3: saced saṃskārā ātmāno 'nātmāno veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:1123_4: saced vijñānam ātmā anātmā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_1u:1124_1: saced rūpaṃ śāntam aśāntaṃ veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:1124_2: saced vedanā śāntā aśāntā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:1124_3: saced saṃjñā śāntā aśāntā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:1124_4: saced saṃskārāḥ śāntā aśāntā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:1124_5: saced vijñānaṃ śāntam aśāntaṃ veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_1u:1125_0: saced rūpaṃ viviktam aviviktaṃ veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:1125_1: saced vedanā viviktā aviviktā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:1125_2: saced saṃjñā viviktā aviviktā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:1125_3: saced saṃskārā viviktā aviviktā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:1125_4: saced vijñānaṃ viviktam aviviktaṃ veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_1u:1126_0: saced bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anupāyakuśalaḥ saptatriṃśatsu bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyām,
S06psp_1u:1126_1_0: evaṃ yāvad abhijñāsu pāramitāsv apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu pañcasu cakṣuḥṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu
S06psp_1u:1126_1_1: caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu yāvad aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_1u:1127_0: saced bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānupāyakauśalena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_1u:1128_1: ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_1u:1128_2: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāvayatīti nimitta eva sa carati,
S06psp_1u:1129_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1129_1: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte idaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānupāyakauśalaṃ veditavyam?
S06psp_1u:1130_0: subhūtir āha: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpam adhitiṣṭhati saṃjānīte 'dhimucyate,
S06psp_1u:1130_10: rūpasyābhisaṃskāre carati vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyābhisaṃskāre carati tat tasya jātijarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsakaram iti vadāmi.
S06psp_1u:1131_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra saced bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anupāyakuśalaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1131_2: śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvāṃ kāyañ mano 'dhitiṣṭhati saṃjānīte 'dhimucyate,
S06psp_1u:1131_4: śabdān gandhān rasān spraṣṭavyān dharmān adhitiṣṭhati saṃjānīte 'dhimucyate,
S06psp_1u:1131_5: cakṣurvijñānaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ manovijñānam adhitiṣṭhati saṃjānīte 'dhimucyate,
S06psp_1u:1131_8: sacec cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vādhitiṣṭhati saṃjānīte 'dhimucyate,
S06psp_1u:1131_9: sacec chrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vādhitiṣṭhati saṃjānīte 'dhimucyate.
S06psp_1u:1132_1_0: evaṃ pañca cakṣūṃṣi ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāś catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaś catvāry apramāṇāni catvāri dhyānāni
S06psp_1u:1132_1_1: catasra ārūpyasamāpattīr daśatathāgatabalāny aṣṭādaśaveṇikān buddhadharmān arhattvaṃ pratyekabuddhatvaṃ bodhisattvatvaṃ buddhadharmān
S06psp_1u:1132_5: jātyā jarayā maraṇena ca śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsair na parimucyate duḥkheneti vadāmi.
S06psp_1u:1133_0: sa khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhavyaḥ śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patituṃ kutaḥ so 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:1133_2: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anupāyakuśalo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1134_0: śāriputra āha: katham āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran upāyakuśalo veditavyaḥ?
S06psp_1u:1135_0: subhūtir āha: ya āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpam adhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte nādhimucyate,
S06psp_1u:1135_1: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārān vijñānaṃ nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte nādhimucyate,
S06psp_1u:1135_2: evaṃ yāvad buddhadharmān nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte nādhimucyate,
S06psp_1u:1135_3: sa na rūpe carati na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne carati,
S06psp_1u:1135_4: na rūpasya nimitte carati na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ na vijñanasya nimitte carati,
S06psp_1u:1135_5: na rūpaṃ nityam iti nānityam iti carati,
S06psp_1u:1135_6: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ nityam iti nānityam iti carati,
S06psp_1u:1135_7: na rūpaṃ sukham iti na duḥkham iti nātmeti nānātmeti na śāntam iti nāśāntam iti carati,
S06psp_1u:1135_8: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ sukham iti na duḥkham iti nātmeti nānātmeti,
S06psp_1u:1135_9: na śāntam iti nāśāntam iti carati,
S06psp_1u:1135_10: na rūpaṃ śūnyam iti nāśūnyam iti carati na nimittam iti nānimittam iti carati,
S06psp_1u:1135_11: na praṇihitam iti nāpraṇihitam iti carati na viviktam iti nāviviktam iti carati,
S06psp_1u:1135_12: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ na śūnyam iti nāśūnyam iti carati,
S06psp_1u:1135_13: na nimittam iti nānimittam iti carati na praṇihitam iti nāpraṇihitam iti carati,
S06psp_1u:1135_14: na viviktam iti nāviviktam iti carati.
S06psp_1u:1136_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi āyuṣman śāriputra yā rūpasya śūnyatā na tad rūpaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1136_2: nānyatra rūpāc chūnyatā, rūpam eva śūnyatā śūnyataivaṃ rūpam,
S06psp_1u:1137_0: yā vedanāyāḥ śūnyatā saṃjñāyāḥ śūnyatā saṃskārāṇāṃ śūnyatā,
S06psp_1u:1137_1: yā vijñānasya śūnyatā na tad vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1137_3: nānyatra vijñānāc chūnyatā, śūnyataiva vijñānaṃ vijñānam eva śūnyatā.
S06psp_1u:1138_0_0: evaṃ vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu pāramitāsv abhijñāsu apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu
S06psp_1u:1138_1: yāvad yā buddhadharmāṇāṃ śūnyatā na te buddhadharmā,
S06psp_1u:1139_0: evam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakuśalo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1140_0: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bhavyo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ,
S06psp_1u:1140_1: sa punaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sacet kaṃcid dharmam upaiti na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:1140_2: nopaiti na carati, upaiti nopaiti ca na carati, naivopaiti na nopaiti ca na carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_1u:1141_0: śāriputra āha: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte nopaiti bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran?
S06psp_1u:1142_0: subhūtir āha: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvo nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:1142_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy abhāvasvabhāvā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_1u:1142_2: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carāmīti nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:1142_3: na carāmīti nopaiti, carāmi ca na carāmi ceti nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:1142_4: naiva carāmi na na carāmīti nopaiti.
S06psp_1u:1142_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tena sarvadharmā abhāvasvabhāvā ity anugatā anupāttāḥ.
S06psp_1u:1142_6: saced evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate nottrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate veditavyam.
S06psp_1u:1143_0: āyuṣman śāriputrāsannībhavaty ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:1145_0: so 'pi khalv āyuṣman śāriputra sarvākārajñatāyā advayā advaidhīkārā sarvadharmābhāvasvabhāvatām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1145_1_0: ayaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvānutpattir nāma samādhir bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ vipulaḥ puraskṛto 'pramāṇo niyato 'saṃhāryaḥ
S06psp_1u:1145_1_1: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair anenāyuṣman śāriputra samādhinā viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_1u:1146_0: śāriputra āha: katamair āyuṣman subhūte samādhibhir viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
S06psp_1u:1147_0: subhūtir āha: asty āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:1147_1: _183] śūraṅgamo nāma samādhir yena samādhinā viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06psp_1u:1148_1: asti sucandro nāma samādhiḥ, asti candradhvajaketur nāma samādhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1148_21: astīndraketur nāma samādhiḥ, asti srotānugato nāma samādhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1148_26: asty animiṣo nāma samādhiḥ, asty aniketasthito nāma samādhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1148_27: asty aniścito nāma samādhiḥ, astivipulapratipanno nāma samādhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1148_34: asti ratikaro nāma samādhiḥ, asty ajayo nāma samādhiḥ, asti tejovatī nāma samādhiḥ, asti kṣayāpagato nāma samādhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1148_35: asty anirjito nāma samādhiḥ, asti vivṛto nāma samādhiḥ, asti sūryapradīpo nāma samādhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1148_39: asti kārākāro nāma samādhiḥ, asti jñānaketur nāma samādhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1148_45: _184] nāma samādhiḥ, asti sarvadharmasamatā nāma samādhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1148_46: asti ratijaho nāma samādhiḥ, asti dharmodgato nāma samādhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1148_47: asti vikiraṇo nāma samādhiḥ, asti sarvadharmapadaprabhedo nāma samādhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1148_51: asty anigaro nāma samādhiḥ, asti prabhākaro nāma samādhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1148_56: asty acalo nāma samādhiḥ, asti viṣamaśāntir nāma samādhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1148_58: asti niścito nāmasamādhiḥ, asti śubhapuṣpitaśuddho nāma samādhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1148_66: asty ekavyūho nāma samādhiḥ, asty ākārānabhiniveśanirhāro nāma samādhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1148_72: asti tejovatī nāma samādhiḥ, asti jvalanolkā nāma samādhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1148_82: asti śāravatī nāma samādhiḥ, asti paripūrṇavimalacandraprabho nāma samādhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1149_0: ime āyuṣman śāriputra samādhayo yaiḥ samādhibhir viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_1u:1149_1: anyāni cāsaṃkhyeyāprameyāṇi samādhimukhāni yeṣu śikṣyamāṇā bodhisattva mahāsattvāḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_1u:1149_2: tatra katamaḥ śūraṅgamo nāma samādhiḥ? yena samādhinā sarvasamādhīnāṃ gocaram anubhavaty ayam ucyate śūraṅgamo nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:1150_0: tatra katamo ratnamudro nāma samādhiḥ? yena samādhinā sarvasamādhayo mudritā bhavaty ayam ucyate ratnamudro nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:1151_0_0: evaṃ yāvat tatra katama ākāśasaṅgavimuktinirupalepo nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvadharmāṇām ākāśāsaṅgavimuktinirupalepatām
S06psp_1u:1151_0_1: anuprāpnoty ayam ucyate ākāśāsaṅgavimuktinirupalepo nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:1153_0: atha khalv āyuṣman subhūtir buddhānubhāvena āyuṣmantaṃ sariputram etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1153_1: vyakṛto 'yam ayuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1153_2: ye 'py etarhi daśadiśi loke tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06psp_1u:1153_3: te 'pi tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ vyākurvanti.
S06psp_1u:1153_4: ya etaiḥ samādhibhir viharati sa samādhim api na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1153_5: sa na ca tena samādhinā manyate,
S06psp_1u:1153_6: ahaṃ samāhita iti, ahaṃ samādhiṃ samāpatsye, ahaṃ samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ, ahaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadye, sarva ete vikalpā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na vidyante nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:1154_0: śāriputra āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte eṣu samādhiṣu sthito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākriyate tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ?
S06psp_1u:1155_0_0: subhūtir āha: no hīdam āyuṣman śāriputra. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra nānyā prajñāpāramitā anyaḥ samādhiḥ
S06psp_1u:1155_0_1: anyo bodhisattvo bodhisattva eva samādhiḥ samādhir eva bodhisattvaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1156_1: śāriputra āha: yady āyuṣman subhūte nānyaḥ samādhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1156_2: nānyo bodhisattvaḥ, samādhir eva bodhisattvo bodhisattva eva samādhiḥ sarvadharmasamatām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1156_3: tat kiṃ śakyaḥ sa samādhir darśayitum?
S06psp_1u:1157_0: subhūtir āha: na hy etad āyuṣman śāriputra.
S06psp_1u:1158_0: śāriputra āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte sa kulaputras taṃ samādhiṃ saṃjānīte?
S06psp_1u:1159_0: subhūtir āha: nāyuṣman śāriputra sa kulaputras taṃ samādhiṃ saṃjānīte.
S06psp_1u:1163_0: subhūtir āha: avidyamānatvena sarvadharmāṇām evaṃ taṃ samādhiṃ na vikalpayati,
S06psp_1u:1163_1: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃjānīte.
S06psp_1u:1165_0: subhūtir āha: avikalpatvena tasya samādher bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃjānīte.
S06psp_1u:1167_0: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāram adāt,
S06psp_1u:1167_1: sādhu sādhu subhūte yathāpi nāma te mayā araṇāvihāriṇām agratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭasya nirdeśaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1168_0: evaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śiksitavyam.
S06psp_1u:1168_1: evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramiatāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:1169_0: evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:1170_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1170_1: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate.
S06psp_1u:1171_0: bhagavān āha: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06psp_1u:1171_1: anupalambhayogena. evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:1173_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1173_1: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06psp_1u:1174_0: bhagavān āha: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06psp_1u:1175_0: śāriputra āha: kim iti bhagavan nopalabhate.
S06psp_1u:1176_2: atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, yāvad vyastasamastān skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādān nopalabhate,
S06psp_1u:1177_0: duḥkhaṃ nopalabhate, atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, samudayaṃ nopalabhate, atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, nirodhaṃ nopalabhate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1178_1: rūpadhātuṃ nopalabhate, atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, ārūpyadhātuṃ nopalabhate, atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr nopalabhate,
S06psp_1u:1179_1: atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, pāramitā nopalabhate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1180_0: srotaāpannaṃ nopalabhate, atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, sakṛdāgāminaṃ nopalabhate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1181_0: śāriputra āha: kā punar bhagavan viśuddhiḥ?
S06psp_1u:1182_0: bhagavān āha: anutpādaḥ śāriputra aprādurbhāvo 'nupalambho 'nabhisaṃskāro viśuddhir ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:1184_0: śāriputra āha: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ katameṣu dharmeṣu śikṣate?
S06psp_1u:1185_0: bhagavān āha: evaṃ śikṣāmāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasmiṃścid dharme śikṣate.
S06psp_1u:1185_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? naite śāriputra dharmās tathā saṃvidyante yathā bālapṛthagjanānām abhiniveśaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1186_0: śāriputra āha: kathaṃ bhagavann ete dharmāḥ saṃvidyante?
S06psp_1u:1187_0: bhagavān āha: yathā na saṃvidyante tathā saṃvidyante, evam asaṃvidyamānās tenocyante 'vidyeti.
S06psp_1u:1189_0: śāriputra āha: kena kāraṇenocyate asaṃvidyamānā avidyeti.
S06psp_1u:1190_0: bhagavān āha: rūpaṃ śāriputra na saṃvidyate,
S06psp_1u:1190_1: adhyātyaśūnyatām upādāya, bahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1190_3: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ śāriputra na saṃvidyate,
S06psp_1u:1190_4: adhyātmaśūnyatām upādāya, bahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1190_6: yāvat saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣā dharmā na saṃvidyante yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā na saṃvidyante,
S06psp_1u:1190_7: adhyātmaśūnyatām upādāya, bahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1192_1: tair avidyāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ ca kalpitāṃ kalpayitvā avidyātṛṣṇābhyām abhiniviśya ubhābhyām antābhyāṃ saktās te ubhāv antau na jānanti na paśyanti,
S06psp_1u:1192_2: yathā dharmā na saṃvidyante, te tān dharmān kalpayitvā nāmarūpe abhiniviṣṭāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1194_0: te dharmeṣv abhiniviṣṭā asaṃvidyamānāv ubhāv antau kalpayanti kalpayitvā na jānanti na paśyanti,
S06psp_1u:1195_0: rūpaṃ na jānanti na paśyanti, vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ na jānanti na paśyanti,
S06psp_1u:1195_1: yāvat skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādaṃ na jānanti na paśyanti,
S06psp_1u:1195_2: yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān na jānanti na paśyanti,
S06psp_1u:1195_3: tena te bālā iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti.
S06psp_1u:1197_0: te avidyātṛṣṇāpratyayaṃ na jānanti na paśyanti.
S06psp_1u:1197_1: kiṃ na jānanti na paśyanti? rūpaṃ saṃkliṣṭam iti na jānanti na paśyanti,
S06psp_1u:1197_2: evaṃ rūpaṃ vyavadānam iti na jānanti na paśyanti,
S06psp_1u:1197_3: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ saṃkliṣṭam iti na jānanti na paśyanti,
S06psp_1u:1197_4: evaṃ vijñānaṃ vyavadānam iti na jānanti na paśyanti,
S06psp_1u:1197_5: te na niryāsyanti. kuto na niryāsyanti? kāmadhātor na niryāsyanti,
S06psp_1u:1197_6: rūpadhātor na niryāsyanti, ārūpyadhātor na niryāsyanti, śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmebhyo na niryāsyanti.
S06psp_1u:1199_0: te na śraddadhati. kim iti na śraddadhati? rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyam iti na śraddadhati,
S06psp_1u:1199_1: yāvad bodhir bodhyātmanā śūnyeti na śraddadhati.
S06psp_1u:1200_0: te na pratiṣṭhante. kim iti na pratiṣṭhante? dānapāramitāyāṃ na pratiṣṭhante,
S06psp_1u:1201_0: te abhiniviṣṭāḥ. kim iti abhiniviṣṭāḥ? rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñāneṣv abhiniviṣṭāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1201_1: cakṣuṣi śrotre ghrāṇe jihvāyāṃ kāye manasy abhiniviṣṭāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1202_0: śāriputra āha: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati.
S06psp_1u:1203_0: bhagavān āha: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:1204_0: śāriputra āha: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na śikṣate na niryāsyati sarvākārajñatāyām?
S06psp_1u:1205_0: bhagavān āha: iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitām anupāyakuśalaḥ kalpayaty abhiniviśate,
S06psp_1u:1206_4: anena śāriputra paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ na niryāsyati.
S06psp_1u:1207_0: śāriputra āha: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ na niryāsyati.
S06psp_1u:1208_0: bhagavān āha: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na śikṣate na niryāsyati sarvākārajñatāyām.
S06psp_1u:1210_0: śāriputra āha: kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate yathā śikṣamāṇaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati?
S06psp_1u:1211_0: bhagavān āha: yadā śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ nopalabhate na samanupaśyati.
S06psp_1u:1212_0: evaṃ khalu śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyaty anupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1212_1: evaṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ dānapāramitāṃ nopalabhate na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1212_2: yāvad bodhiṃ sarvākārajñatāṃ nopalabhate na samanupaśyati.
S06psp_1u:1213_0: evaṃ khalu śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyaty anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:1216_0: bhagavān āha: ātmānaṃ śāriputra nopalabhate na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1216_1: atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, evaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ nopalabhate na samanupaśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1221_0: so 'nupāyakuśalo rūpaṃ kalpayaty abhiniviśate, yāvad vijñānaṃ kalpayaty abhiniviśate.
S06psp_1u:1223_0: cakṣuḥ kalpayaty abhiniviśate, evaṃ yāvan manaḥ, rūpaṃ kalpayaty abhiniviśate, evaṃ yāvad dharmān.
S06psp_1u:1225_0: cakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānadhātūn kalpayaty abhiniviśate, evaṃ yāvan manodharmamanovijñānadhātūn.
S06psp_1u:1227_0: avidyāṃ kalpayaty abhiniviśate, evaṃ yāvaj jarāmaraṇam.
S06psp_1u:1229_0: so 'dhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ kalpayaty abhiniviśate.
S06psp_1u:1237_0: sa daśatathāgatabalāni yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ kalpayaty [PvsP1-1:_192] abhiniviśate.
S06psp_1u:1240_1: evaṃ sattvaṃ jīvaṃ poṣaṃ puruṣaṃ pudgalaṃ manujaṃ mānavaṃ kārakaṃ vedakaṃ jānakaṃ paśyakaṃ nopalabhate.
S06psp_1u:1240_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? atyantatayā hy ātmā na vidyate nopalabhate.
S06psp_1u:1242_0: rūpaṃ śāriputra nopalabhate, yāvad vijñānaṃ nopalabhate.
S06psp_1u:1244_0: cakṣuḥ śāriputra nopalabhate, evaṃ yāvan manaḥ, rūpaṃ nopalabhate, evaṃ yāvad buddhadharmān nopalabhate.
S06psp_1u:1246_0: cakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānāni śāriputra nopalabhate, yāvan manodharmamanovijñānāni nopalabhate.
S06psp_1u:1248_0: pratītyasamutpādaṃ śāriputra nopalabhate, yāvad ārūpyadhātuṃ nopalabhate.
S06psp_1u:1250_0: prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ nopalabhate, yāvad ārūpyasamāpattīr nopalabhate.
S06psp_1u:1259_1: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1259_2: yo bhagavan pṛcchet kim ayaṃ māyāpuruṣaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyan niryāsyatīti,
S06psp_1u:1259_4: evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyatīti,
S06psp_1u:1259_6: yāvat saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati,
S06psp_1u:1259_7: sarvākārajñatāṃ prāpsyatīti, tasyaivaṃ pṛcchataḥ kathaṃ nirdeṣṭavyaṃ syāt?
S06psp_1u:1260_0: bhagavān āha: tena hi subhūte tvām evātra pratiprakṣyāmi,
S06psp_1u:1260_2: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, anyad rūpam anyā māyā, anyā vedanā anyā saṃjñā anye saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1263_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, anyā māyā anyac cakṣuḥ, anyā māyā anyac chrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1263_1: anyā māyā anyan manaḥ, anyā māyā anyad rūpaṃ, anyā māyā anyaḥ śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1264_0: subhūtir āha: no bhagavan. iti tatraiva dvitīya āyatanaprajñaptivikalpaḥ
S06psp_1u:1265_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, anyā māyā anyac cakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1265_2: jihvārasajihvāvijñānaṃ, kāyaspraṣṭavyakāyavijñānaṃ, anyā māyā anyan manodharmamanovijñānam,
S06psp_1u:1267_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, anyā māyā anyac cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayād utpadyate vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā?
S06psp_1u:1269_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, anyā māyā anyac chrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṃsparśapratyayād utpadyate vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā? subhūtir āha:
S06psp_1u:1270_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, anyā māyā anyaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S06psp_1u:1270_1: anyā māyā anyo 'bdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātuḥ,
S06psp_1u:1271_0: subhūtir āha: na bhagavann anyaḥ pṛthivīdhātur anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:1271_4: na bhagavann anyas tejodhātur anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:1271_6: na bhagavann anyo vāyudhātur anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:1271_8: na bhagavann anya ākāśadhātur anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:1271_10: na bhagavann anyo vijñānadhātur anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:1273_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, anyā māyā anyaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ?
S06psp_1u:1274_0: subhūtir āha: na bhagavann anyā avidyā anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:1274_1: avidyaiva māyā māyaivāvidyā, na bhagavann anye saṃskārā anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:1274_3: na bhagavann anyad vijñānam anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:1274_5: na bhagavann anyaṃ nāmarūpam anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:1274_7: na bhagavann anyat ṣaḍāyatanam anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:1274_11: na bhagavann anyā vedanā anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:1274_13: na bhagavann anyā tṛṣṇā anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:1274_14: tṛṣṇaiva māyā māyaiva tṛṣṇā, na bhagavann anyad upādānam anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:1274_18: na bhagavann anyā jātir anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:1274_20: na bhagavann anyaj jarāmaraṇam anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:1276_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, anyā māyā anye saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣā dharmāḥ?
S06psp_1u:1279_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, anyā māyā anyā śūnyatā anyā māyā anyad ānimittam anyā māyā anyad apraṇihitam.
S06psp_1u:1281_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, anyā māyā anyā dhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ?
S06psp_1u:1284_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, anyā māyā anyāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ?
S06psp_1u:1287_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, anyā māyā anyāni daśabalāni, anyā māyā anye 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ?
S06psp_1u:1289_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, anyā māyā anyā bodhiḥ?
S06psp_1u:1290_0: subhūtir āha: na bhagavann anyā māyā anyad rūpaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1290_1: rūpam eva bhagavan māyā māyaiva bhagavan rūpaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1290_2: na bhagavann anyā māyā anyā vedanā,
S06psp_1u:1290_3: vedanaiva bhagavan māyā māyaiva bhagavan vedanā,
S06psp_1u:1290_4: na bhagavann [PvsP1-2:_4] anyā māyā anyā saṃjñā, saṃjñaiva bhagavan māyā māyaiva bhagavan saṃjñā,
S06psp_1u:1290_5: na bhagavann anyā māyā anye saṃskāraḥ,
S06psp_1u:1290_6: saṃskārā eva bhagavan māyā māyaiva bhagavan saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1290_7: na bhagavann anyā māyā anyad vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1290_8: vijñānam eva bhagavan māyā māyaiva bhagavan vijñānam.
S06psp_1u:1291_0: na bhagavann anyac cakṣur anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:1291_1: na bhagavann anyad rūpam anyā māyā,
