S06psp_1u:1291_2: na bhagavann anyac cakṣurvijñānam anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:1291_4: na bhagavann anyac cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayād utpadyate vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā anyā māyā.
S06psp_1u:1292_0: na bhagavann anyac chrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo 'nyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:1292_2: na bhagavann anye dharmā anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:1292_3: na bhagavann anyan manovijñānam anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:1292_5: na bhagavann anyan manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayād utpadyate vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā anyā māyā.
S06psp_1u:1293_0: na bhagavann anyā māyā anye bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1293_1: bodhipakṣyā dharmā eva bhagavan māyā māyaiva bhagavan bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1294_0: na bhagavann anyā māyā anye 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1294_1: aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā eva bhagavan māyā māyaiva bhagavann aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1294_2: na bhagavann anyā māyā anyā bodhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1294_3: bodhir eva bhagavan māyā māyaiva bhagavan bodhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:1295_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, api nu māyāyā utpādo vā nirodho vā?
S06psp_1u:1297_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, māyāyāḥ saṃkleśo vā vyavadānaṃ vā?
S06psp_1u:1299_0_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, yasya notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate? dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:1299_0_1: vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣate? apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu śikṣate? saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣeṣu
S06psp_1u:1301_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, atraiṣā saṃjñā samajñā prajñaptir vyavahāro bodhisattva iti.
S06psp_1u:1303_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, saṃjñā samajñā prajñaptir vyavahāramātreṇa pañcānām upādānaskandhānām utpādo vā nirodho vā saṃkleśo vā vyavadānaṃ vā upalabhyate?
S06psp_1u:1305_0_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, yasya na saṃjñā na samajñā na prajñaptir na vyavahāro na nāma na nāmaprajñaptir na
S06psp_1u:1305_0_1: kāyo na kāyakarma na vāk na vākkarma na mano na manaskarma notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānam api nu sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:1307_0: bhagavān āha: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati,
S06psp_1u:1308_0: subhūtir āha: evaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena māyāpuruṣeṇaiva śikṣitavyaṃ bhagavaty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_1u:1308_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan sa eva māyāpuruṣo veditavyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1309_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, api tv amī pañcopādānaskandhāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyanti?
S06psp_1u:1310_0: subhūtir āha: no bhagavaṃs, tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvāḥ pañcopādānaskandhāḥ.
S06psp_1u:1311_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte pratiśrutkopamāḥ pañcaskandhāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1311_1: pratibhāsopamāḥ nirmitakopamāḥ pratibimbopamāḥ pañcaskandhāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyanti?
S06psp_1u:1312_1: subhūtir āha: no bhagavaṃs, tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvāpratiśrutkā,
S06psp_1u:1312_2: evaṃ pratibhāso nirmitakaṃ pratibimbaṃ tathaiva pañcaskandhā abhāvasvabhāvatayā nopalabhyante,
S06psp_1u:1312_3: tathā hi bhagavan māyopamaṃ rūpaṃ māyopamā vedanā māyopamā saṃjñā māyopamāḥ saṃskārā māyopamaṃ vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1312_4: yac ca vijñānaṃ tat ṣaḍindriyaṃ te pañcaskandhās te cādhyātmaśūnyatayā nopalabhyante,
S06psp_1u:1312_8: saced evaṃ bhagavan bhāṣyamāṇo yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipratisārī bhavati notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
S06psp_1u:1312_9: veditavyam ayaṃ bhagavan niryāsyati sarvajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati mārgajñatāyāṃ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati.
S06psp_1u:1315_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1315_1: mā khalu bhagavan navayānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā avalīyeta saṃlīyeta vipratisārī bhavet,
S06psp_1u:1316_0_0: bhagavān āha: sacet subhūte navayānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anupāyakuśalo bhaven na
S06psp_1u:1316_0_1: ca kalyāṇamitrahastagato bhaved uttrasyet saṃtrasyet saṃtrāsam āpadyeta.
S06psp_1u:1317_0_0: subhūtir āha: katamad bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata upāyakauśalyaṃ yatra caran bodhisattvo
S06psp_1u:1317_0_1: mahāsattvo nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate?
S06psp_1u:1318_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena rūpam anityam iti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate,
S06psp_1u:1318_1: vedanā sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittenānityeti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate,
S06psp_1u:1318_3: saṃskārāḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittenānityā iti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate,
S06psp_1u:1318_6: idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata upāyakauśalyaṃ veditavyam.
S06psp_1u:1319_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena rūpaṃ duḥkham iti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate,
S06psp_1u:1319_1: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ, sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena vijñānaṃ duḥkham iti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate.
S06psp_1u:1320_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena rūpaṃ śūnyam iti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate,
S06psp_1u:1320_1: rūpam anātmeti rūpaṃ śāntam iti rūpaṃ viviktam iti rūpaṃ śūnyam iti rūpam ānimittam iti rūpam apraṇihitam iti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate,
S06psp_1u:1320_3: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena vijñānaṃ śūnyam iti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate,
S06psp_1u:1320_4: vijñānam anātmeti vijñānaṃ śāntam iti vijñānaṃ viviktam iti vijñānaṃ śūnyam iti vijñānam ānimittam iti vijñānam apraṇihitam iti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate,
S06psp_1u:1320_6: idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata upāyakauśalyaṃ veditavyam.
S06psp_1u:1321_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair yān dharmadeśanāṅ
S06psp_1u:1321_0_1: karoty anupalambhayogena iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā,
S06psp_1u:1321_1: yā teṣām eva sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktānāṃ manasikārāṇām aparāmarṣaṇatā iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitā,
S06psp_1u:1321_2: yā teṣām eva sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktānāṃ manasikārāṇāṃ kṣamaṇārocanapratyavekṣaṇatā,
S06psp_1u:1321_4: yā teṣām eva sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktānāṃ manasikārāṇāṃ anutsṛṣṭir,
S06psp_1u:1321_6: yā ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktānāṃ manasikārāṇām anavakāśadānatā anyeṣām api vā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitā,
S06psp_1u:1321_7: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate.
S06psp_1u:1322_1: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ pratyavekṣate na rūpaśūnyatayā rūpaṃ śūnyaṃ rūpam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva rūpam,
S06psp_1u:1322_2: na vedanāśūnyatayā vedanā śūnyā vedanaiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva vedanā,
S06psp_1u:1322_3: na saṃjñāśūnyatayā saṃjñā śūnyā saṃjñaiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva saṃjñā,
S06psp_1u:1322_4: na saṃskāraśūnyatayā saṃskārāḥ śūnyāḥ saṃskārā eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1322_5: na vijñānaśūnyatayā vijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ vijñānam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva vijñānam.
S06psp_1u:1323_0: evaṃ na cakṣuḥśūnyatayā cakṣuḥ śūnyaṃ cakṣur eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva cakṣuḥ,
S06psp_1u:1323_1: na śrotraśūnyatayā śrotraṃ śūnyaṃ śrotram eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva śrotraṃ,
S06psp_1u:1323_2: na ghrāṇaśūnyatayā ghrāṇaṃ śūnyaṃ ghrāṇam eva śūnyatāśūnyataiva ghrāṇaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1323_3: na jihvāśūnyatayā jihvā śūnyā jihvaiva śūnyatāśūnyataiva jihvā,
S06psp_1u:1323_4: na kāyaśūnyatayā kāyaḥ śūnyaḥ kāya eva śūnyatāśūnyataiva kāyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1323_5: na manaḥśūnyatayā manaḥ śūnyaṃ mana eva śūnyatāśūnyataiva manaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1324_0: evaṃ na rūpaśūnyatayā rūpaṃ śūnyaṃ rūpam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva rūpaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1324_1: na śabdaśūnyatayā śabdaḥ śūnyaḥ śabda eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva śabdaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1324_2: na gandhaśūnyatayā gandhaḥ śūnyaḥ gandha eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva gandhaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1324_3: na rasaśūnyatayā rasaḥ śūnyaḥ rasa eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva rasaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1324_4: na spraṣṭavyaśūnyatayā spraṣṭavyaṃ śūnyaṃ spraṣṭavyam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva spraṣṭavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1324_5: na dharmaśūnyatayā dharmāḥ śūnyāḥdharmā eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva dharmāḥ.
S06psp_1u:1325_0: evaṃ na cakṣurvijñānaśūnyatayā cakṣurvijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ cakṣurvijñānam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1325_1: na śrotravijñānaśūnyatayā śrotravijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ śrotravijñānam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva śrotravijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1325_2: na ghrāṇavijñānaśūnyatayā ghrāṇavijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ ghrāṇavijñānam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1325_3: na jihvāvijñānaśūnyatayā jihvāvijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ jihvāvijñānam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva jihvāvijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1325_4: na kāyavijñānaśūnyatayā kāyavijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ kāyavijñānam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva kāyavijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1325_5: na manovijñānaśūnyatayā manovijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ manovijñānam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva manovijñānam.
S06psp_1u:1326_0: evaṃ na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatayā śūnyaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1327_0: evaṃ na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1327_2: na ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaśūnyatayāśūnyaṃ ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1327_3: na jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam eva śūnyatā,
S06psp_1u:1327_5: na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1327_6: na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam.
S06psp_1u:1328_0: na smṛtyupasthānaśūnyatayā smṛtyupasthānāni śūnyāni smṛtyupasthānāny eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06psp_1u:1328_2: na mārgaśūnyatayā mārgaḥ śūnyo mārga eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva mārgaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1328_3: na balavaiśāradyāveṇikabuddhadharmaśūnyatayā buddhadharmāḥ śūnyā buddhadharmā eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva buddhadharmāḥ.
S06psp_1u:1328_5: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajnāpāramitāyāṃ caran nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate.
S06psp_1u:1330_0: subhūtir āha: katamāni bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi yaiḥ parigṛhīta imaṃ prajnāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate?
S06psp_1u:1331_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāni yāny asya rūpam anityam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1331_1: [PvsP1-2:_10] tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:1331_2: anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānam anityam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1331_3: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:1331_4: anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ, amūni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi.
S06psp_1u:1332_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi yāny asya rūpaṃ duḥkham iti dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_1u:1332_1: rūpam anātmeti śāntam iti viviktam iti śūnyam iti ānimittam iti apraṇihitam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1332_2: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:1332_3_0: anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ, vedanā saṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ, yāny asya vijñānaṃ duḥkham iti dharmaṃ deśayanti vijñānam anātmeti śāntam
S06psp_1u:1332_3_1: iti viviktam iti śūnyam iti ānimittam iti apraṇihitam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1332_4: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:1332_5: anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ, amūni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi.
S06psp_1u:1333_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi yāny asya cakṣur anityam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti duḥkham iti
S06psp_1u:1333_0_1: anātmeti śāntam iti viviktam iti śūnyam iti ānimittam iti apraṇihitam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1333_1: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:1333_2_0: anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ, evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano 'nityam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti duḥkham iti anātmeti śāntam
S06psp_1u:1333_2_1: iti viviktam iti śūnyam iti ānimittam iti apraṇihitam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1333_3: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:1333_4: anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ, amūni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi.
S06psp_1u:1334_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kalyāṇamitrāṇi yāny asya rūpam anityam iti dharmaṃ
S06psp_1u:1334_0_1: deśayanti duḥkham iti anātmeti śāntam iti viviktam iti śūnyam iti ānimittam iti apraṇihitam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1334_1: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:1334_3: evaṃ śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyaṃ dharmā anityā iti dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_1u:1334_4: duḥkhā iti anātmāna iti śāntā iti viviktā iti śūnyā iti ānimittā iti apraṇihitā iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1334_5: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:1334_6: anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ. amūni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi.
S06psp_1u:1335_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi yāny asya cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam anityam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_1u:1335_1: duḥkham iti anātmeti śāntam iti viviktam iti śūnyam iti ānimittam iti apraṇihitam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1335_2: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:1336_4: manovijñānaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam anityam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_1u:1336_5: duḥkham iti anātmeti śāntam iti viviktam iti śūnyam iti ānimittam iti apraṇihitam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1336_6: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:1336_7: anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ. imāni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kalyāṇamitrāṇi.
S06psp_1u:1337_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kalyāṇamitrāṇi yāny asya smṛtyupasthānāny anityānīti dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_1u:1337_1: duḥkhānīti anātmānīti śāntānīti viviktānīti śūnyānīti ānimittānīti apraṇihitānīti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1337_2: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:1338_0: evaṃ samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādā indriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgamārgo 'nitya iti dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_1u:1338_1: duḥkha iti anātmeti śānta iti vivikta iti śūnya iti ānimitta iti apraṇihita iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:1338_2: _12] cānupalambhayogena, tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:1339_0: evam apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo 'bhijñā anityā iti duḥkhā iti anātmāna iti śāntā iti viviktā iti śūnyā iti ānimittā iti apraṇihitā iti dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_1u:1339_1: tac cānupalambhayogena tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:1340_0: evaṃ vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido daśatathāgatabalāni aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā apy anityā iti dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_1u:1340_1: duḥkhā iti anātmāna iti śāntā iti viviktā iti śūnyā iti ānimittā iti apraṇihitā iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1340_2: tāni ca kuśalamūlani na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:1340_3: anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ. imāni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi,
S06psp_1u:1340_4: yaiḥ parigṛhīta imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate.
S06psp_1u:1341_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām anupāyakuśalo bhaviṣyati pāpamitrahastagataś ca bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_1u:1341_1: ya imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā uttrasiṣyati saṃtrasiṣyati saṃtrāsam āpatsyate?
S06psp_1u:1342_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'pagatasarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati upalabhate,
S06psp_1u:1343_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:1343_1: _13] carann apagatasarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārai rūpam adhyātmaśūnyam iti manasikaroti,
S06psp_1u:1343_5: evam apagatasarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam adhyātmaśūnyam iti manasikaroti,
S06psp_1u:1343_9_0: apagatasarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tāṃ cādhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām
S06psp_1u:1343_9_1: upalabhate tābhiś ca śūnyatābhir manyate upalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:1344_4: tāś ca śūnyatā upalabhate tayā ca manyate upalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1344_5: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano 'dhyātmaśūnyam iti manasikaroti,
S06psp_1u:1344_9: tāś ca śūnyatā upalabhate tayā ca manyate upalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:1344_17: tāś ca śūnyatā upalabhate tayā ca manyate upalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:1345_0: evam avidyā yāvaj jarāmaraṇam adhyātmaśūnyam iti manasikaroti,
S06psp_1u:1345_4: tāś ca śūanyatā upalabhate, tebhir manyate upalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:1346_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:1346_1: _14] carann apagatasarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayati tāni ca smṛtyupasthānāni upalabhate taiś ca manyate upalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1346_2: evaṃ samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādānīndriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāni mārgān apramāṇāni dhyānāni ārūpyasamāpattīḥ,
S06psp_1u:1346_3: abhijñāḥ pratisaṃvido daśatathāgatabalāni vaiśāradyāni aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān bhāvayati tāṃś ca buddhadharmān upalabhate taiś ca manyate upalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:1346_4: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anupāyakuśala imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā uttrasyati saṃtrasyati saṃtrāsam āpadyate.
S06psp_1u:1347_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pāpamitraparigṛhīto bhavati,
S06psp_1u:1347_1: yena pāpamitraparigraheṇemaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā uttrasyati saṃtrasyati saṃtrāsam āpadyate?
S06psp_1u:1348_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā vivecayati,
S06psp_1u:1348_1: dhyānapāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāḥ śīlapāramitāyā dānapāramitāyā vivecayati,
S06psp_1u:1348_2_0: nātra śikṣitavyam iti naitat tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitam iti kavikṛtāny etāni kāvyāni naitāni śrotavyāni
S06psp_1u:1348_2_1: nodgrahītavyāni na paryavāptavyāni na dhārayitavyāni na vācayitavyāni na manasikartavyāni nāpi parebhyo deśayitavyāni,
S06psp_1u:1348_3: idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitraṃ veditavyam.
S06psp_1u:1349_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitraṃ yo 'sya na mārakarmāṇy upadiśati,
S06psp_1u:1349_1: na māradoṣān ācaṣṭe, iti hi māraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇa vivecayati bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam upasaṃkramyaivaṃ bravīti:
S06psp_1u:1349_2_0: kiṃ te kulaputra prajñāpāramitayā bhāvitayā? kiṃ te dhyānapāramitayā bhāvitayā? kiṃ te vīryapāramitayā bhāvitayā? kiṃ te
S06psp_1u:1349_2_1: kṣāntipāramitayā bhāvitayā? kiṃ te śīlapāramitayā bhāvitayā? kiṃ te dānapāramitayā bhāvitayā? idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya
S06psp_1u:1350_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇa śrāvakabhūmipratisaṃyuktāni sūtrāṇi geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthodānaṃ nidānam itivṛttakaṃ
S06psp_1u:1350_0_1: jātakāni vaipulyam adbhutadharmāvadānopadeśam upadekṣyati prakāśayiṣyati vibhajiṣyati uttānīkariṣyati saṃprakāśayiṣyati,
S06psp_1u:1350_2: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitraṃ veditavyam.
S06psp_1u:1351_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati;
S06psp_1u:1351_1: na te kulaputra kiṃcid bodhicittaṃ nāpi tvam avinivartanīyo nāpi tvaṃ śakṣyasy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ,
S06psp_1u:1351_2: ya imāny evaṃrūpāṇi mārakarmāṇy ākhyātāni nāvabodhayati,
S06psp_1u:1351_3: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitraṃ veditavyam.
S06psp_1u:1352_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati;
S06psp_1u:1352_1: cakṣuḥ kulaputra śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca,
S06psp_1u:1352_2: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo manaḥ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca,
S06psp_1u:1352_4: evaṃ śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyāni dharmāḥ śūnyā ātmanā cātmīyena ca,
S06psp_1u:1352_6: evaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ manovijñānaṃ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca,
S06psp_1u:1352_8: evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ śūnya ātmanā cātmīyena ca,
S06psp_1u:1352_12: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā śūnyā ātmanā cātmīyena ca,
S06psp_1u:1352_14: evaṃ samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādā indriyāni balāni bodhyaṅgāni mārgā yāvad āveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ śūnyā ātmanā cātmīyenaca,
S06psp_1u:1352_15: kiṃ kariṣyasy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya ya imāny evaṃrūpāṇi mārakarmāṇi nācaṣṭe nopadiśati,
S06psp_1u:1352_16: idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitraṃ veditavyam.
S06psp_1u:1353_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ pratyekabuddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati;
S06psp_1u:1353_1: śūnyā kulaputra pūrvā dig buddhair bhagavadbhir bodhisattvaiḥ śrāvakaiś ca nātra buddho na bodhir na bodhisattvo na śrāvakaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1353_3: _16] buddhair bhagavadbhir bodhisattvaiḥ śrāvakaiś ca nātra buddho na bodhir na bodhisattvo na śrāvakaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1353_5: imāni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitrāṇi veditavyāni.
S06psp_1u:1354_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān śramaṇaveṣeṇopasaṃkramya bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktebhyo manasikārebhyo
S06psp_1u:1354_2: idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitraṃ veditavyam.
S06psp_1u:1355_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān upādhyāyācāryaveṣeṇopasaṃkramya bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāyā vivecayiṣyati
S06psp_1u:1355_1: smṛtyupasthāneṣu niyojayiṣyati samyakprahāṇeṣu ṛddhipādeṣu indriyeṣu baleṣu bodhyaṅgeṣu mārge niyojayiṣyati śūnyatāyām ānimitte 'praṇihite niyojayiṣyati,
S06psp_1u:1355_2: imāny evaṃrūpān dharmān sākṣātkṛtvā śrāvakabhūmiṃ sākṣātkuruṣva,
S06psp_1u:1355_3: kiṃ te kariṣyaty anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ ya imāny evaṃrūpāṇi mārakarmāṇi nācaṣṭe nopadiśati,
S06psp_1u:1355_4: idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitraṃ veditavyam.
S06psp_1u:1356_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān mātāpitṛveṣeṇopasaṃkramya bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam evaṃ vakṣyati;
S06psp_1u:1356_1_0: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra srotaāpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai yogam āpadyasva sakṛdāgāmiphalasākṣātkriyāyai anāgāmiphalasākṣātkriyāyai
S06psp_1u:1356_1_1: arhattvaphalasākṣātkriyāyai yogam āpadyasva kiṃ te 'nuttarayā samyaksaṃbodhyā abhisaṃbuddhayā yasyāḥ kṛtaśo 'saṃkhyeyān aprameyān
S06psp_1u:1356_1_2: kalpān saṃsāre saṃsaratā hastacchedāḥ pādacchedāś cānubhavitavyāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1356_2: ya imāny evaṃrūpāṇi mārakarmāṇi nopadekṣyati nākhyāsyati,
S06psp_1u:1356_3: idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitraṃ veditavyam.
S06psp_1u:1357_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣuveṣeṇopasaṃkramya rūpam anityam iti deśayiṣyaty upalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1357_1: rūpaṃ duḥkham anātmakaṃ śāntaṃ viviktaṃ śūnyam ānimittam apraṇihitam iti deśayiṣyaty upalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1357_4: vijnānaṃ duḥkham anātmakaṃ śāntaṃ viviktaṃ śūnyam ānimittam apraṇihitam iti deśayiṣyaty upalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1357_5: cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano 'nityaṃ duḥkham anātmakaṃ śāntaṃ viviktaṃ śūnyam ānimittam apraṇihitam iti deśayiṣyaty upalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1357_6: evaṃ yāvat smṛtyupasthānāny anityāni duḥkhāny anātmakāni śāntāni viviktāni śūnyāni ānimittāni apraṇihitānīti deśayiṣyaty upalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1357_7: evaṃ samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādā indriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāni mārgo 'nityo duḥkho 'nātmakaḥ śānto viviktaḥ śūnya ānimitto 'praṇihita iti deśayiṣyaty upalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1357_8: yāvad buddhadharmā api anityā duḥkhā anātmakāḥ śāntā viviktāḥ śūnyā ānimittā apraṇihitā iti deśayiṣyaty upalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1357_9: ya imāny evaṃrūpāṇi mārakarmāṇi nopadekṣyati nākhyāsyati,
S06psp_1u:1357_10: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitraṃ veditavyaṃ viditvā ca parivarjayitavyam.
S06psp_1u:1360_0: subhūtir āha: bodhisattvo bodhisattva iti bhagavann ucyate, bodhisattva iti bhagavan kaḥ padārthaḥ?
S06psp_1u:1361_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi subhūte bodher utpādo 'stitā vā nāstitā vā vidyate vopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1363_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśe śakuneḥ padaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1363_1: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1364_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte svapnasya padaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1364_1: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1365_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte māyāyāḥ padaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1365_1: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1366_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte marīcyāḥ padaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1366_1: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1366_2: evaṃ pratiśrutkāyāḥ pratibhāsasya pratibiṃbasya gandharvanagarasya nirmitasyapadaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1366_3: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:1369_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte bhūtakoṭyāḥ padaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1369_1: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1370_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathatāyāḥ padaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1370_1: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1370_2: evam avitathatāyā ananyatathatāyā dharmatāyā dharmadhātor dharmasthititāyā dharmaniyāmatāyāḥ satyatāyāḥ padaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1370_3: evam eva bodhisattvasya padārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate.

S06psp_1u:1373_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte māyāpuruṣasya vijñānasya padaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1373_1: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1374_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte māyāpuruṣasya cakṣuṣaḥ padārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate,

S06psp_1u:1375_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte māyāpuruṣasya manasaḥ padārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate,

S06psp_1u:1395_2: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1396_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte avyavadānapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1396_1: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:1397_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? rūpasya subhūte utpādapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1397_1: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāṇāṃ, vijñānasya subhūte utpādapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:1398_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? rūpasya subhūte nirodhābhisaṃskāraprādurbhāvopalambhasaṃkleśapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1398_1: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya subhūte nirodhābhisaṃskāraprādurbhāvopalambhasaṃkleśapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:1399_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? rūpasya subhūte vyavadānapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1399_1: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya subhūte vyavadānapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1399_2: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:1400_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte vyastasamastānāṃ skandhānāṃ dhātūnām āyatanānāṃ pratyītyasamutpādasya utpādapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1400_1: yāvat skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu vyavadānapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1400_2: evaṃ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyadharmā pramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattyabhijñāpratisaṃviddaśabalavaiśāradyāveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām utpādapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1400_3: evaṃ yāvad vyavadānapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1400_4: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1401_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ yāvat saṃkleśavyavadānapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1401_1: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1402_1: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rūpasyātyantaviviktatvān nimittapadaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1402_2: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1403_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte vijñānasyātyantaviviktatvān nimittapadaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1403_1: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1404_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣv atyantaviviktatvān nimittapadaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1404_1: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1405_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte smṛtyupasthānām atyantaviśuddhatvānnimittapadaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1405_1: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1405_3: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1406_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ātmasattvajīvapoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakānāṃ viśuddhau padaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1406_2: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:1408_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ādityasyodāgacchataḥ prabhāyāḥ padaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1408_1: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:1409_1: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kalpoddāhe vartamāne sarvasaṃskāre [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:1409_3: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:1411_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śīle dauḥśīlyapadaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1411_1: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:1412_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya samādhau vikṣepapadaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1412_3: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:1413_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyavimuktijñānadarśane vimuktijñānadarśanapadaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1413_1: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:1415_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sūryacandramasoḥ prabhāyāḥ padaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1415_1: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:1417_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte śrāvakapratyekabuddhagrahanakṣatramaṇiratnajyotiṣāṃ prabhāyāḥ padaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1417_1: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:1419_0_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ yāmānāṃ devānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ devānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ
S06psp_1u:1419_0_1: devānāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ brahmapārṣadyānāṃ devānāṃ brahmapurohitānāṃ devānāṃ mahābrahmaṇāṃ [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:1419_1: _24] devānāṃ yāvad akaniṣṭhānāṃ devānāṃ prabhāyāḥ padaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1419_2: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:1421_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya prabhāyāḥ padaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1421_1: evam eva subhūate bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:1421_2_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte yayā bodhyā bodhisattvapadārthaḥ yaś ca bodhisattvapadārthaḥ sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā
S06psp_1u:1421_2_1: na visaṃyuktā arūpino 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yadutālakṣaṇāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1421_3: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena asaktatāyām asadbhūtatāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1424_0_0: subhūtir āha: katame bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ? kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmāṇām asadbhūtatāyāṃ śikṣitavyam?
S06psp_1u:1424_0_1: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmā avaboddhavyāḥ?
S06psp_1u:1425_0: bhagavān āha: sarvadharmā ucyante kuśalāś cākuśalāś ca vyākṛtāś cāvyākṛtāś ca laukikāś ca lokottarāś ca sāsravāś cānāsravāś ca saṃskṛtāś cāsaṃskṛtāś ca sādhāraṇāś cāsādhāraṇāś ca,
S06psp_1u:1425_1: imam ucyante subhūte sarvadharmā yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāsadbhūtatāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1425_2: ime subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmā avaboddhavyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:1427_0: subhūtir āha: katame bhagavan kuśalā laukikā dharmāḥ.
S06psp_1u:1428_0: bhagavān āha: kuśalā laukikā dharmā ucyante,
S06psp_1u:1428_1: mātreyatā pitreyatā śrāmaṇyatā brāhmaṇyatā kule jyeṣṭhāpacāyitā,
S06psp_1u:1428_2: dānam ayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śīlam ayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu,
S06psp_1u:1428_5: daśakuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ, laukikyo navasaṃjñā, ādhmātakasaṃjñā vipaḍumakasaṃjñā vipūyakasaṃjñā vilohitakasaṃjñā vinīlakasaṃjñā vikhāditakasaṃjñā vikṣiptakasaṃjñā [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:1428_7: laukikāni catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1428_8_0: laukikyaḥ pañcābhijñāḥ, laukikyo daśānusmṛtayaḥ, yad uta buddhānusmṛtir dharmānusmṛtiḥ saṃghānusmṛtiḥ śīlānusmṛtiḥ tyāgānusmṛtir
S06psp_1u:1429_0: subhūtir āha: katame bhagavan laukikā akuśalā dharmāḥ?
S06psp_1u:1430_0: bhagavān āha: prāṇātipāto 'dattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāro mṛṣāvādaḥ paiśunyaṃ pāruṣyaṃ saṃbhinnapralāpo 'bhidhyā vyāpādo mithyādarśanaṃ daśākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1430_1: krodhopanāhau mrakṣaḥ pradāśo vihiṃsā īrṣyā mātsaryaṃ māno mithyāmānaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1431_0: subhūtir āha: katame bhagavann avyākṛtā dharmāḥ?
S06psp_1u:1432_0: bhagavān āha: avyākṛtaṃ kāyakarma, avyākṛtaṃ vākkarma, avyākṛtaṃ manaḥkarma, avyākṛtāni catvāri mahābhūtāni,
S06psp_1u:1432_1: avyākṛtāni pañcendriyāṇi, avyākṛtāni ṣaḍ āyatanāni, avyākṛtāni arūpyāṇi skandhadhātvāyatanāni,
S06psp_1u:1432_2: avyākṛtā vipākāḥ, sarva ima ucyante avyākṛtādharmāḥ
S06psp_1u:1433_0: subhūtir āha: katame bhagavan laukikāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ?
S06psp_1u:1434_0_0: bhagavān āha: pañca skandhā dvādaśāyatanāny aṣṭādaśa dhātavo daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāś catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni
S06psp_1u:1434_0_1: catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ pañcābhijñāḥ ye cānye laukikā dharmāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1435_0: subhūtir āha: katame bhagavan lokottarāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ?
S06psp_1u:1436_0: bhagavān āha: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1436_5: avitarko 'vicāraḥ samādhiḥ, vidyāvimuktiḥ smṛtiḥ saṃprajanyaṃ yoniśomanaskāraḥ,
S06psp_1u:1436_6: aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ katame aṣṭau? rūpī rūpāṇi paśyati,
S06psp_1u:1436_7: [PvsP1-2:_26] ayaṃ prathamo vimokṣaḥ, adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati,
S06psp_1u:1436_8: ayaṃ dvitīyo vimokṣaḥ, śubhatāyām adhimukto bhavati,
S06psp_1u:1436_9: ayaṃ tṛtīyo vimokṣaḥ, sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt,
S06psp_1u:1436_11: nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_1u:1436_12: ayaṃ caturtho vimokṣaḥ, sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanasamatikramād anantaṃ vijñānam iti vijñānānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_1u:1436_14: nāsti kiñcid ity ākiñcanyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_1u:1436_17: ayaṃ saptamo vimokṣaḥ, sarvaśo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamatikramāt saṃjñāvedayitanirodham upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_1u:1437_1: catvāri dhyānāni, viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_1u:1437_2: vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamād adhyātmaṃ saṃprasādāc cetasa ekotībhāvād avitarkam avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_1u:1437_3_0: prīter virāgād upekṣakaś ca viharati smṛtimān saṃprajānan sukhañ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayate yat tadāryā ācakṣate upekṣakaḥ
S06psp_1u:1437_3_1: smṛtimāṃś casukhavihārīti tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_1u:1437_4: sukhasya ca prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṅgamād aduḥkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_1u:1437_5: sa sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānām astaṅgamān nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśamiti ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_1u:1437_6: sa sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanasamatikramād anantaṃ vijñānam iti vijñānānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_1u:1437_7: sa sarvaśo vijñānānantyāyatanasamatikramān nāsti kiñcid ity ākiñcanyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_1u:1437_8: sa sarvaśa ākiñcanyāyatanasamatikramān naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_1u:1437_9: sa sarvaśo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamatikramāt saṃjñāvedayitanirodham upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_1u:1438_2: daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1439_0: subhūtir āha: katame bhagavan sāsravā dharmāḥ?
S06psp_1u:1440_0: bhagavān āha: pañca skandhā dvādaśāyatanāny aṣṭādaśa dhātavaś catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1441_0: subhūtir āha: katame bhagavan anāsravā dharmāḥ?
S06psp_1u:1442_0_0: bhagavān āha: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāny
S06psp_1u:1442_0_1: āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1443_0: subhūtir āha: katame bhagavan saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ?
S06psp_1u:1444_0: bhagavān āha: kāmadhātū rūpadhātur ārūpyadhātur ye 'py anye kecit traidhātukaparyāpannā dharmāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1445_0: subhūtir āha: katame bhagavann asaṃskṛtā dharmāḥ?
S06psp_1u:1446_0: bhagavān āha: yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ notpādo na nirodho nānyathātvaṃ prajñāyate rāgakṣayo doṣakṣayo mohakṣayaś ca,
S06psp_1u:1446_1: tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1447_0: subhūtir āha: katame bhagavan sādhāraṇā dharmāḥ?
S06psp_1u:1448_0: bhagavān āha: catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ pañcābhijñāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1449_0: subhūtir āha: katame bhagavann asādhāraṇā dharmāḥ?
S06psp_1u:1450_0: bhagavān āha: saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣadharmā daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1451_0: tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu na saktiḥ kāryā,
S06psp_1u:1453_0: subhūtir āha: yad ucyate bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti,
S06psp_1u:1453_1: kena kāraṇena bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate? bhagavān āha:
S06psp_1u:1453_2: iha subhūte mahataḥ sattvarāśer mahataḥ sattvanikāyasyāgratāṃ kārayiṣyati,
S06psp_1u:1453_3: tena kāraṇena subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:1454_0: subhūtir āha: katame bhagavan mahāsattvarāśir mahāsattvanikāyaḥ yasya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'gratāṃ kārayiṣyati?
S06psp_1u:1455_0_0: bhagavān āha: mahāsattvarāśir mahāsattvanikāya iti subhūte ucyate yad uta gotrabhūmir aṣṭamakabhūmiḥ srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmī
S06psp_1u:1455_0_1: anāgāmī arhan pratyekabuddhaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad avinivartanīya iti,
S06psp_1u:1455_3: tatra subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vajropamaṃ cittam utpādya mahataḥ sattvarāśer mahataḥ sattvanikāyasyāgratāḥ kārayitavyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:1456_0: subhūtir āha: katamo bhagavan vajropamaś cittotpādaḥ?
S06psp_1u:1457_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ cittam utpādayati,
S06psp_1u:1457_1: aparimite mayā saṃsāre sannāhaṃ sannahya sarvasvaparityāginā bhavitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1457_4: sarvasattvān api mayā parinirvāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ parinirvāpito bhavati.
S06psp_1u:1457_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? anutpādo mayā sarvadharmāṇām avaboddhavyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1457_6: avyavakīrṇena mayā sarvākārajñatācittena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1457_13: ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vajropamaś cittotpādo yatra pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahataḥ sattvarāśer mahataḥ sattvanikāyasyāgratāṃ [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:1458_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ cittam utpādayati,
S06psp_1u:1458_1: yāvantaḥ sattvā nairayikā vā tairyagyonikā vā yamalaukikā vā duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti,
S06psp_1u:1458_2: teṣām aham arthāya tāṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayeyaṃ tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyam,
S06psp_1u:1458_3: ekaikasyāpy ahaṃ sattvasyārthāya kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi nairayikaṃ vā tairyagyonikaṃ vā yamalaukikaṃ vā duḥkham anubhaveyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1458_4: yāvan na te sattvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtā bhaveyur iti,
S06psp_1u:1458_5: etenopāyena sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśas tan nairayikādikaṃ duḥkham anubhaveyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1458_6: yāvan na te sattvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtā bhaveyur iti,
S06psp_1u:1458_7: paścād aham ātmanaḥ kṛtakuśalam avaropya kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyeyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1458_8: ayaṃ subūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vajropamaś cittotpādo yena mahataḥ sattvarāśer mahataḥ sattvanikāyasyāgratāṃ kārayiṣyati.
S06psp_1u:1459_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena udāracittena bhavitavyaṃ yena cittena sarvasattvānām agratā kārayitavyā,
S06psp_1u:1459_1: tatreyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyodāracittatā yat prathamacittotpādam upādāya na rāgacittam utpādayati,
S06psp_1u:1459_2: na doṣacittam utpādayati, na mohacittam utpādayati, na vihiṃsācittam utpādayati, na śrāvakacittam utpādayati, na pratyekabuddhacittam utpādayati,
S06psp_1u:1459_3: iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyodāracittatā yayā sarvasattvānām agratāṃ kārayiṣyati,
S06psp_1u:1460_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena akampyacittena bhavitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1460_1: tatreyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyākampyacittatā yat sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktam api manasikāran na manyate,
S06psp_1u:1461_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvānām antike hitasukhacittena bhavitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1461_1: tatreyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya hitasukhacittatā yā sarvasattvānāṃ paritrāṇatā yaḥ sarvasattvānām aparityāgaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1461_2: tena ca na manyate, iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya hitasukhacittatā.
S06psp_1u:1461_3: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahasattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvasattvānām agratāṃ kārayiṣyati.
S06psp_1u:1462_1: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dharmārāgeṇa bhavitavyaṃ dharmaratena dharmārāmatāyogam anuyuktena bhavitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1462_2: tatra katamo dharmo? yad uta sarvadharmāṇām asaṃbhedaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1462_3: ayam ucyate dharmaḥ, tatra katamā dharmaratir? yā dharme 'bhiratir iyam ucyate dharmaratiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1462_4: tatra katamā dharmārāmatā? yā tasya dharmasya bhāvanā bahulīkaraṇatā,
S06psp_1u:1462_5: iyam ucyate dharmārāmatā. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā mahataḥ sattvarāśer mahataḥ sattvanikāyasyāgratā kārayitavyā anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:1463_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā
S06psp_1u:1463_0_1: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā mahataḥ sattvarāśer mahataḥ sattvanikāyasyāgratā
S06psp_1u:1464_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu sthitvā baleṣu
S06psp_1u:1464_0_1: vaiśāradyeṣu pratisamvitsv aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu sthitvā mahataḥ sattvarāśer mahataḥ sattvanikāyasyāgratā kārayitavyā
S06psp_1u:1465_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā vajropamasamādhau sthitvā yāvad ākāśāsaṅgavimuktinirupalepasamādhau
S06psp_1u:1465_0_1: sthitvā mahataḥ sattvarāśer mahataḥ sattvanikāyasyāgratā kārayitavyā anupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1465_1: eteṣu subhūte dharmeṣu sthitvā bodhisattena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā mahataḥ sattvarāśer mahataḥ sattvanikāyasyāgratā kārayitavyā,
S06psp_1u:1467_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1467_1: mamāpi bhagavan pratibhāti yenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:1468_0: bhagavān āha: pratibhātu te śāriputra yenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:1469_0: śāriputra āha: ātmadṛṣṭer bhagavan sattvadṛṣṭer jīvadṛṣṭer jantudṛṣṭer poṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakadṛṣṭer [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:1469_1_0: _31] cchedadṛṣṭeḥ śāśvatadṛṣṭer astidṛṣṭer nāstidṛṣṭeḥ skandhadṛṣṭer dhātudṛṣṭer āyatanadṛṣṭeḥ pratītyasamutpādadṛṣṭer bodhipakṣadharmadṛṣṭer
S06psp_1u:1469_1_1: balavaiśāradyadṛṣṭer āveṇikabuddhadharmadṛṣṭeḥ sattvaparipācanadṛṣṭer buddhakṣetrapariśodhanadṛṣṭer bodhisattvadṛṣṭer buddhadṛṣṭer
S06psp_1u:1469_2: āsāṃ sarvāsāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ prahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1470_0: subhūtir āha: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rūpadṛṣṭir bhavati,
S06psp_1u:1471_0: śāriputra āha: ihāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anupāyakuśalo bhavati,
S06psp_1u:1471_1: sa rūpam upalabhya dṛṣṭim utpādayaty upalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1471_2: evaṃ vistareṇa vyastasamastaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādaṃ yāvaj jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsān upalabhya dṛṣṭim utpādayaty upalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1471_4: evaṃ daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān upalabhya dṛṣṭim utpādayaty upalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:1473_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1473_1: mamāpi bhagavan pratibhāti yenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:1475_0: subhūtir āha: yad api bhagavan bodhicittam asamasamacittam asādhāraṇacittaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ tatrāpi citte 'saktaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1475_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tat sarvajñatācittam anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ traidhātuke tatrāpi citte 'saktas tena bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.
S06psp_1u:1476_0: śāriputra āha: katamad āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asamasamacittam asādhāraṇacittaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ?
S06psp_1u:1477_1: subhūtir āha: ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya na kasyacid dharmasya utpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1477_2: na hāniṃ na vṛddhiṃ nāgatiṃ na gatiṃ na saṃkleśaṃ na vyavadānaṃ yatra cāyuṣman śāriputra na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ na gatir nāgatir na hānir na vṛddhir notpādo na nirodhaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1477_3: tac ca na śrāvakacittaṃ na pratyekabuddhacittam,
S06psp_1u:1477_4: idaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asamasamacittam asādhāraṇacittaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ.
S06psp_1u:1478_0: śāriputra āha: yad āyuṣmān subhūtir evam āha,
S06psp_1u:1478_2: nanv āyuṣman subhūte rūpam apy asaktaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1478_3: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam apy asaktam.
S06psp_1u:1479_0: subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra rūpam apy asaktaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam apy asaktaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1479_1: yāvad vyastasamastāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādā yāvaj jarāmaraṇam apy asaktaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1479_3: yāvat saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣā dharmā balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā apy asaktāḥ.
S06psp_1u:1480_0: śāriputra āha: yad apy āyuṣmān subhūtir idam āha,
S06psp_1u:1480_1: yad api tat sarvajñatācittam anāsravam aparyāpannam iti,
S06psp_1u:1480_2: nanv āyuṣman subhūte bālapṛthagjanānām api cittam anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1480_3: nanu sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhasamyaksaṃbuddhānām api cittam anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1481_0: subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra.
S06psp_1u:1482_0: śāriputra āha: rūpam api subhūte anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1482_1: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam apy āyuṣman subhūte anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1482_2_0: nanv āyuṣman subhūte saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣā dharmā daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā
S06psp_1u:1483_0: subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra yathā vadasi bālapṛthagjanānām api cittam anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:1483_1: _33] upādāya, yāvat sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhasamyaksaṃbuddhānām api cittam anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1483_2: yāvat saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣā dharmā daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā anāsravā aparyāpannāḥ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1484_0: śāriputra āha: yad api tad āyuṣmān subhūtir evam āha,
S06psp_1u:1484_2: nanv āyuṣman subhūte 'rūpe 'pi rūpam asaktam avedanāyām api vedanā asaktāsaṃjñāyām api saṃjñā asaktāsaṃskāreṣv api saṃskārā asaktāvijñāne 'pi vijñānam asaktam.
S06psp_1u:1485_0: subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra.
S06psp_1u:1486_0: śāriputra āha: nanv āyuṣman subhūte 'smṛtyupasthāneṣv api smṛtyupasthānāny asaktāni,
S06psp_1u:1486_1: evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgapāramitāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattyabhijñābalavaiśāradyāni yāvad āveṇikabuddhadharmeṣv api āveṇikabuddhadharmā asaktāḥ.
S06psp_1u:1487_0: subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra yathā vadasi,
S06psp_1u:1487_1: rūpe 'py āyuṣman śāriputra rūpam asaktaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñāne 'pi vijñānam asaktam,
S06psp_1u:1487_2: evaṃ vyastasamastā api skandhadhātava āyatanāni satyāni pratītyasamutpādo 'pramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1487_3: pāramitā abhijñā bodhipakṣā dharmā balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvidaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1487_5_0: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tenāpi bodhicittena asamasamacittena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair
S06psp_1u:1490_0: pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra āha: mamāpi bhagavan pratibhāti yenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:1492_0: pūrṇa āha: mahāsannāhasannaddhaḥ sa bhagavan sattvo mahāyānasaṃprasthitaḥ sa sattvo mahāyānasamārūḍhaḥ sa sattvas tena bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:1493_1: śāriputra āha: kiyatā ayuṣman pūrṇa bodhisattvo mahasattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate?
S06psp_1u:1494_0: pūrṇa āha: ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na prādeśikānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtena bodhāya caran dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_1u:1494_1: api tu sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtena dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_1u:1494_2: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na prādeśikānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtena bodhāya caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_1u:1494_3: api tu sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_1u:1494_4: na sattvaparicchedena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhaṃ saṃnahyate,
S06psp_1u:1494_9: api tu khalu punaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtena sannāhaṃ saṃnahyate,
S06psp_1u:1494_10: evaṃ cāsya bhavati, ātmanā ca dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmi sarvasattvāṃś ca dānapāramitāyāṃ niyojayiṣyāmīti,
S06psp_1u:1494_15: ātmanā ca bhāvayiṣyāmi sarvasattvāṃś ca tāsu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,
S06psp_1u:1494_16: yāvat saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu daśabalavaiśāradyāṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣv ātmanā ca sthāsyāmi sarvasattvāṃś ca teṣu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,
S06psp_1u:1494_17: iyatāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:1496_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānaṃ dadataḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair
S06psp_1u:1496_0_1: manasikārair yāvad dānasya sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye niryātanā,
S06psp_1u:1496_1: ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānaṃ dadato dānapāramitāsannāhaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1497_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānaṃ dadataḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair
S06psp_1u:1497_1: ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānaṃ [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:1498_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānaṃ dadataḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair yā teṣāṃ kṣamaṇā rocanā vyupaparīkṣaṇā,
S06psp_1u:1498_1: ayam ucyate bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato kṣāntipāramitāsannāhaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1499_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāñ carato dānaṃ dadataḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair
S06psp_1u:1499_0_1: manasikārair yā vīryāsraṃsanatā tat kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_1u:1499_1: ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānaṃ dadato vīryapāramitāsannāhaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1500_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānaṃ dadato yā cittasyaikāgratā sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair
S06psp_1u:1500_0_1: manasikāraiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhacittasyānavakāśaṃ dānatā tat kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
S06psp_1u:1500_1: ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānaṃ dadato dhyānapāramitāsannāhaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1501_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānaṃ dadataḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair
S06psp_1u:1501_0_1: manasikārair yā māyākṛtasaṃjñopasthitā naiva dāyakam upalabhate na pratigrāhakaṃ na deyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1501_1: ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānaṃ dadataḥ prajñāpāramitāsannāhaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1501_2: yad āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena tāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā na nimittīkaroti nopalabhate.
S06psp_1u:1502_0: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran mahāsannāhasannaddho bhavati.
S06psp_1u:1504_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair dānaṃ dadāti
S06psp_1u:1504_0_1: sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttrāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1504_1: iyaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ carato dānapāramitā.
S06psp_1u:1505_1_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ carato yā
S06psp_1u:1505_2: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śīlapāramitā.
S06psp_1u:1506_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair yā dharmāṇāṃ kṣamaṇā rocanā vyupaparīkṣaṇā,
S06psp_1u:1506_1: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kṣāntipāramitā.
S06psp_1u:1507_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair yā vīryāsraṃsanatā anavalīnatā,
S06psp_1u:1507_1: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ carato vīryapāramitā.
S06psp_1u:1508_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair viharato
S06psp_1u:1508_0_1: yac chrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktānāṃ cittotpādānām anavakāśadānaṃ tasya kṛtaśaḥ kuśalamūlasya sarvasattvasādhāraṇī
S06psp_1u:1508_1: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ carato dhyānapāramitā.
S06psp_1u:1509_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ sarvadharmeṣu māyākṛtasaṃjñāpratyupasthitā bhavati,
S06psp_1u:1509_1: tac ca śīlaṃ na manyate nopalabhate,
S06psp_1u:1509_2: iyam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitayāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_1u:1510_0: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_1u:1512_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair
S06psp_1u:1512_0_1: na śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
S06psp_1u:1512_1: [PvsP1-2:_37] iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carato dānapāramitā,
S06psp_1u:1512_2: evaṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā.
S06psp_1u:1513_0_0: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran sarvabuddhadharmasamudānayanatāyai sarvasattvaparipākāya
S06psp_1u:1513_0_1: ca prayujyate prajñayā sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac
S06psp_1u:1513_0_2: cakuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_1u:1513_1: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_1u:1514_0: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_1u:1516_0_0: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair
S06psp_1u:1516_0_1: na śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
S06psp_1u:1516_1: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitāyāṃ carato dānapāramitā,
S06psp_1u:1516_2: evaṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā.
S06psp_1u:1517_0: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan sarvadharmeṣu māyākṛtasaṃjñām upasthāpayati,
S06psp_1u:1517_1_0: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac ca kusalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ
S06psp_1u:1517_2: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_1u:1518_0: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_1u:1520_0: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:1520_1_0: _38] caran dānaṃ dadāti sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac
S06psp_1u:1520_1_1: ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_1u:1520_2: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carato dānapāramitā,
S06psp_1u:1520_3: evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā.
S06psp_1u:1521_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan sarvadharmeṣu māyākṛtasaṃjñām upasthāpayati,
S06psp_1u:1521_1_0: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ
S06psp_1u:1521_2: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_1u:1522_0: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_1u:1524_0_0: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs trimaṇḍalapariśuddhaṃ dānaṃ dadāti sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair
S06psp_1u:1524_0_1: manasikārair na śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai
S06psp_1u:1524_1: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānapāramitā,
S06psp_1u:1524_2: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā.
S06psp_1u:1525_0: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_1u:1525_1_0: tasya sarvapāramitāsu sarvadharmeṣu ca māyāsvapnapratibhāsapratiśrutkāpratibimbanirmāṇasaṃjñā pratyupasthitā bhavati sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair
S06psp_1u:1525_1_1: manasikārair na śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai
S06psp_1u:1525_2: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_1u:1525_3: yad āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittenaitāḥ ṣaṭ [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:1526_0: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran mahāsannāhasannaddho bhavati,
S06psp_1u:1526_1: evaṃ ca punar āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva ekaikasyāṃ pāramitāyāṃ sthitvā ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati.
S06psp_1u:1528_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānāni ca samāpadyate na ca dhyānāny āsvādayati na ca taiḥ saṃhriyate na ca teṣāṃ vaśenopapadyate,
S06psp_1u:1528_1: evam apramāṇāni cārūpyasamāpattīś ca samāpadyate na ca tā āsvādayati na ca tābhiḥ saṃhriyate na ca tāsāṃ vaśenopapadyate,
S06psp_1u:1529_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu vivekadarśanena ca viharati śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitadarśanena ca viharati na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti,
S06psp_1u:1529_1: ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata upāyakauśalasannāhaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1530_0: evam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddhas tenocyate bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti,
S06psp_1u:1530_1_0: evaṃ mahāsannāhasannaddhasyāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavanta udānam udānayanti
S06psp_1u:1530_1_1: varṇam udīrayanti nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānās tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śabdam anuśrāvayanti ghoṣam udīrayanti,
S06psp_1u:1530_2: amuṣmin lokadhātuprasare bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha iti sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati.
S06psp_1u:1533_0: śāriputra āha: kiyat āyuṣman pūrṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasaṃprasthito mahāyānasamārūḍho bhavati?
S06psp_1u:1534_0_0: pūrṇa āha: ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ
S06psp_1u:1534_1: _40] upasaṃpadya viharati, evaṃ dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1534_2: evam ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanam ākiñcanyāyatanaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_1u:1534_3_0: imāni bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānārūpyāṇi yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva etaiś ca dhyānair etaiś cārūpyair dānapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:1534_3_1: carann ākāśākāraliṅganimittaiḥ samāpadyamāno vyuttiṣṭhamānaś ca tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvā anuttarāyai
S06psp_1u:1534_5: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vācyam.
S06psp_1u:1535_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃś catvāri dhyānāni samāpadyate catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyate,
S06psp_1u:1535_1: yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva etaiś ca dhyānair etābhiś cārūpyasamāpattibhir viharati,
S06psp_1u:1535_2: sa etā dhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyamāno vyuttiṣṭhamānaś cākāśākāraliṅganimittāni manasikaroti,
S06psp_1u:1535_3: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tāni ca kuśalamūlāny anyāni ca sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_1u:1536_0: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāsu caran mahāsannāhasannaddhaḥ sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati.
S06psp_1u:1538_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yat sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaṃ manasikāram utpādya kleśānāṃ dhvaṃsanāya sarvasattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti cittam utpādayati,
S06psp_1u:1539_0: yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tair eva sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ prathamaṃ dhyānam ākrāmati deśayati,
S06psp_1u:1539_1: tatra ca prathame dhyāne pratiṣṭhate na cānyeṣāṃ cittotpādānām avakāśaṃ dadāti śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktānām iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya aparāmṛṣṭā śīlapāramitā,
S06psp_1u:1540_3: yāvat teṣāṃ manasikārāṇāṃ kṣamaṇā rocanā vyupaparīkṣaṇā avabodha upanidhyāpanam,
S06psp_1u:1541_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ sarvakuśalamūlāni sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni
S06psp_1u:1541_0_1: kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati vīryaṃ ca na sraṃsayati,
S06psp_1u:1542_0: yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair dhyānārūpyasamāpattīś ca samāpadyate na copalabhate,
S06psp_1u:1543_0_0: yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ prathamadhyānāṅgāni dvitīyāni tṛtīyāni caturthāni
S06psp_1u:1543_0_1: dhyānāṅgāni anityākāreṇa duḥkhākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa śāntākāreṇa śūnyākāreṇa ānimittākāreṇa apraṇihitākāreṇa pratyavekṣate
S06psp_1u:1544_0: idam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
S06psp_1u:1546_0: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1546_1: yat sarvākāraṃ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣān dharmān bhāvayati,
S06psp_1u:1546_3: sarvākāraṃ balāni vaiśāradyāni aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān bhāvayati.
S06psp_1u:1547_0: idam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
S06psp_1u:1549_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo maitrīsahagatena cittena vipulena mahadgatenādvayenāpramāṇenāvaireṇāsapatnenānāvaraṇenāvyāvadhena
S06psp_1u:1549_0_1: sarvatrānugatena subhāṣitena dharmadhātuparame loke ākāśadhātuparyavasāne sarvāvantaṃ lokam ekāṃ diśaṃ sphuritvopasaṃpadya
S06psp_1u:1549_2_1: sarvatrānugatena subhāṣitena dharmadhātuparame loke ākāśadhātuparyavasāne sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1549_4: _42] viharati, yāvad daśa diśaḥ sphāritvopasaṃpadya viharati.
S06psp_1u:1550_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahasattvo maitrīsamādhiṃ samāpadyate mayā sarvasattvās trātavyā iti nirṇāmayati,
S06psp_1u:1550_1: karuṇāṃ ca samādhiṃ samāpadyate klībakāruṇyatāṃ ca sattveṣu nirṇāmayati,
S06psp_1u:1550_2: muditāṃ ca samādhiṃ samāpadyate aham eva modayiṣyāmīti sattveṣu nirṇāmayati,
S06psp_1u:1550_3: upekṣāṃ ca samādhiṃ samāpadyate āsravakṣayaṃ ca sattveṣu nirṇāmayati,
S06psp_1u:1551_0: yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānāpramāṇākāraliṅganimittāni samāpadyate vyuttiṣṭhate ca na ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayaty anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1552_0: yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tābhir dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattibhir avyavakīrṇo viharati,
S06psp_1u:1552_1: ābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ śrāvakabhūmaye vā pratyekabuddhabhūmaye vā na spṛhayate sarvākārajñataivāsya kṣamate rocate ceyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāpramāṇeṣu carataḥ kṣāntipāramitā,
S06psp_1u:1553_0: yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādair anikṣiptadhuro viharati akuśaladharmaprahāṇāya kuśaladharmopasaṃpade,
S06psp_1u:1554_0: yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva etāni ca dhyānāny etāś cāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattīś ca samāpadyate,
S06psp_1u:1554_2: na ca tā āsvādayati na ca tābhiḥ saṃhriyate,
S06psp_1u:1555_0_0: yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tā dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate
S06psp_1u:1555_0_1: ca tāś cānityākāreṇa duḥkhākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa śāntākāreṇa śūnyākāreṇa animittākāreṇa apraṇihitākāreṇa pratyavekṣate,
S06psp_1u:1555_1: na ca śrāvakanyāmaṃ vā pratyekabuddhanyāmaṃ vābhikrāmati,
S06psp_1u:1555_3: idam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvsya māhāyānam.
S06psp_1u:1557_0: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam,
S06psp_1u:1558_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1558_1: yat sarvadharmeṣu na śikṣiṣyate cittaṃ samāhitaṃ taj jñānam.
S06psp_1u:1559_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1559_1: yad asya na nityam iti jñānaṃ pravartate nānityam iti,
S06psp_1u:1559_3: na sukham iti nāsukham iti, nātmeti nānātmeti, na śāntam iti nāśāntam iti, na śūnyam iti nāśūnyam iti, na nimittam iti nānimittam iti,
S06psp_1u:1559_4: na praṇihitam iti nāpraṇihitam iti jñānaṃ pravartate.
S06psp_1u:1559_5: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyanam.
S06psp_1u:1560_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1560_4: na cāsya triṣv adhvasv ajñānaṃ pravartate,
S06psp_1u:1560_5: tac cānupalambhayogena. idam api śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
S06psp_1u:1561_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1561_1: yan na kāmadhātau jñānaṃ pravartate na rūpadhātau jñānaṃ pravartatenārūpyadhātau jñānaṃ pravartate,
S06psp_1u:1561_3: tac cānupalambhayogena. idam api śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
S06psp_1u:1562_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1562_1: yan na laukikeṣu lokottareṣu dharmeṣu jñānaṃ pravartate,
S06psp_1u:1562_2: na sāsraveṣu dharmeṣu nānāsraveṣu dharmeṣu na saṃskṛteṣu nāsaṃskṛteṣu na cāsyalaukikalokottarasāsravānāsravasaṃskṛtāsaṃskṛteṣu dharmeṣv ajñānaṃ pravartate,
S06psp_1u:1562_3: tac cānupalambhayogena. idam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:1564_0: śāriputra āha: kiyatāyuṣman pūrṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamārūḍha ity ucyate?
S06psp_1u:1565_0: pūrṇa āha: ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānapāramitām ārohati,
S06psp_1u:1565_1: sa naiva dānapāramitām upalabhate na dāyakaṃ na pratigrāhakaṃ na dānam upalabhate anupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:1565_2: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvodānapāramitāsamārūḍha ity ucyate,
S06psp_1u:1565_3: evaṃ śīlapāramitāsamārūḍhaḥ kṣāntipāramitāsamārūḍho vīryapāramitāsamārūḍho dhyānapāramitāsamārūḍhaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitām ārohati,
S06psp_1u:1565_4: sa naivaprajñāpāramitām upalabhate na bodhisattvaṃ na manasikāram upalabhate anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:1565_5: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahasattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāsamārūḍha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:1567_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vyavakīrṇena sarvākārajñatācittotpādena saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣān dharmān bhāvayati bhāvanāvibhāvanārthena tac cānupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:1567_1: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamārūḍha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:1568_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vyavakīrṇena sarvākārajñatācittotpādena śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhīn bhāvayati bhāvanāvibhāvanārthena tac cānupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:1568_1: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamārūḍha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:1569_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vyavakīrṇena sarvākārajñatācittotpādena daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni
S06psp_1u:1569_0_1: catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān bhāvayati bhāvanāvibhāvanārthena tac cānupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:1569_1: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamārūḍha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:1570_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ saṃjānāti,
S06psp_1u:1570_1: vyavahāramātram idaṃ yad uta bodhisattva iti sattvānupalabdhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1570_2: idam api nāmamātraṃ yad uta rūpaṃ rūpānupalabdhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1570_3: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ, nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta vijñānaṃ vijñānānupalabdhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1570_4: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta cakṣuś cakṣuṣo [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:1570_5: _45] 'nupalabdhitām upādāya, evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta mano manaso 'nupalabdhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1570_6: evaṃ vyastasamastāḥ skandhā dhātava āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaḥ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1570_7: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatānupalabdhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1570_8: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta buddhadharmābuddhadharmānupalabdhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1570_9: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta tathatā dharmadhātuś ca dharmaniyāmatā ca bhūtakoṭiś ca bhūtakoṭyanupalabdhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1570_10: nāmamātraṃ yad uta bodhir buddhaś ca buddhānupalabdhitām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1570_11: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamārūḍha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:1572_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhir atrāntare bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06psp_1u:1572_0_1: 'bhijñāparipūrṇatvāt sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetreṇa ca buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati,
S06psp_1u:1572_1: buddhakṣetre buddhakṣetre ca buddhān bhagavataḥ satkaroti gurukaroti mānayati pūjayati,
S06psp_1u:1572_2: yo yasya buddhasya aupayikapūjāsatkāravidhis tebhyaś ca buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyo dharmaṃ śṛṇoti,
S06psp_1u:1572_3: yad uta idam eva mahāyānam, sa tatra bodhisattvayāne abhiruhya buddhakṣetreṇa ca buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati,
S06psp_1u:1572_4: buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
S06psp_1u:1572_5: na cāsya buddhakṣetrasaṃjñā pravartate na sattvasaṃjñā pravartate,
S06psp_1u:1572_6: so 'dvayabhūmau sthitvā yādṛśenātmabhāvena sattvānāṃ śaknoty arthakaraṇāya tādṛśam ātmabhāvaṃ saṃcintya parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_1u:1572_7: sa na jātu tena mahāyānena virahito bhavati,
S06psp_1u:1574_3: pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto varṇaṃ bhāṣante ghoṣam udīrayanti [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:1574_4_0: _46] yaśaḥ prakāśayanti, eṣā amuṣmin lokadhātuprasare 'mukena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāyānam abhiruhya sarvākārajñatānuprāptā
S06psp_1u:1574_5_0: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarasyām adha ūrdhvadiśi
S06psp_1u:1574_5_1: gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto varṇaṃ bhāṣante ghoṣam udīrayanti yaśaḥ prakāśayanti,
S06psp_1u:1574_6: eṣāmuṣmin lokadhātuprasare 'mukena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatānuprāptā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartitam.
S06psp_1u:1574_7: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamārūḍha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:1577_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1577_1: mahāsannāhasannaddho mahāsannāhasannaddha iti bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate,
S06psp_1u:1577_2: kiyatā bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate?
S06psp_1u:1578_0_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānaṃ sannahya yad uta dānapāramitāsannāhaṃ śīlapāramitāsannāhaṃ kṣāntipāramitāsannāhaṃ
S06psp_1u:1578_14_0: ṣaḍ vikāraṃ kampayati ca sarvasmin nairayikabhavane ca tam agniskandhaṃ nirvāpya nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhāni praśāmya
S06psp_1u:1578_14_1: tān sarvān nirvāṇābhimukhān vijñāya bodhisattvo mahāsattva [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:1578_15: _47] evaṃ śabdam udīrayati ghoṣam anuśrāvayati namas tathāgatāyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāyeti,
S06psp_1u:1578_16: tatas te nairayikāḥ sattvās taṃ buddhaghoṣaṃ śrutvā sukhaṃ pratilabhante,
S06psp_1u:1578_17: te tenaiva sukhasaumanasyena tebhyo nirayebhyo vyutthāya tatra lokadhātāv upapadyante yatra buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanty ārāgayanti devamanuṣyopapattiñ ca parigṛhṇanti,
S06psp_1u:1578_18: evaṃ tiryagyonito yamalokato vyutthāya tatra lokadhātāv upapadyante yatra buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanty ārāgayanti ca devamanuṣyopapattiṃ ca parigṛhṇanti,
S06psp_1u:1578_19_0: evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarasyām
S06psp_1u:1578_19_1: adha ūrdhvadiśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn avabhāsena spharati ca ṣaḍ vikāraṃ kampayati ca sarveṣu nairayika bhavaneṣu
S06psp_1u:1578_19_2: ca tam agniskandhaṃ nirvāpya nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhāni praśāmya tān sarvān nirvāṇābhimukhān vijñāya bodhisattvo mahāsattva
S06psp_1u:1578_19_3: evaṃ śabdam udīrayati ghoṣam anuśrāvayati namas tathāgatāyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāyeti,
S06psp_1u:1578_20: tatas te nairayikāḥ sattvās taṃ buddhaghoṣaṃ śrutvā sukhaṃ pratilabhante,
S06psp_1u:1578_21: te tenaiva sukhasaumanasyena tebhyo nirayabhyo vyutthāya tatra tatra lokadhātāv upapadyante yatra yatra budhhān bhagavataḥ paśyanty ārāgayanti devamanuṣyopapattiṃ ca parigṛhṇanti,
S06psp_1u:1578_22: evaṃ tiryagyonibhyo yamalokebhyo vyutthāya tatra tatra lokadhātāv upapadyante yatra yatra buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanty ārāgayanti devamanuṣyopapattiṃ ca parigṛhṇanti.
S06psp_1u:1578_23: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:1579_0_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahato janakāyasya purato nirayāṃs tiryagyoniyamalokaṃ
S06psp_1u:1579_0_1: ca nirmimīte nirmāya teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdam anuśrāvayati,
S06psp_1u:1579_1: tatas tena buddhaśabdena dharmaśabdena saṃghaśabdena tebhyo nirayatiryagyoniyamalokebhyo vyutthāya devamanuṣyeṣūpapadyeran,
S06psp_1u:1579_2: api tu subhūte tena māyākāreṇa māyākārāntevāsinā vā kaścit sattvo nirayatiryagyoniyamalokagatibhyo vyutthāpitaḥ?
S06psp_1u:1581_0: bhagavān āha: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣv apramāṇeṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāṃs tribhyo 'pāyebhyaḥ parimocya na kaścit sattvaḥ parimocito bhavati.
S06psp_1u:1581_1: tat kasya [PvsP1-2:_48] hetoḥ? dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1582_0: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamārūḍho mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:1584_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā mahāsannāhasannaddhas trisāhasraṃ mahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ
S06psp_1u:1584_0_1: vaiḍūryam ayaṃ nirmimīte vaiḍūryam ayaṃ nirmāya cakravartivyūhaṃ nirmimīte cakravartivyūhaṃ nirmāya annārthikebhyo 'nnaṃ
S06psp_1u:1584_2: so 'nnam annārthikebhyo datvā yāvad anyatarānyataraṃ pariṣkāraṃ datvā teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_1u:1584_4: te khalu punaḥ sattvās tāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā na jātu tābhiḥ pāramitābhir virahitā bhavanti yavād anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_1u:1584_5: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:1585_0_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe sthitvā mahato janakāyasya purato mahāntaṃ janakāyam
S06psp_1u:1585_0_1: abhinirmimīte nirmāya annam annārthikebhyo dadyād anyatarānyataraṃ pariṣkāran tad arthikebhyo dadyāt.
S06psp_1u:1585_1: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte api nu tena māyākāreṇa māyākārāntevāsinā vā kasmaicit kiñcid dattaṃ bhavet.
S06psp_1u:1587_0_0: bhagavān āha: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yāvac cakravartivyūham abhinirmāya annam annārthikebhyo dadatā
S06psp_1u:1587_0_1: yāvad anyatarānyatarān mānuṣyakān pariṣkārān dadatā na kasmaicit sattvāya yāvad anyatarānyatarā mānuṣyakāḥ pariṣkārā dattā
S06psp_1u:1587_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1587_2: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:1589_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā saṃcintyopapattiparigraheṇa cakravartikule pratyājāyate,
S06psp_1u:1589_1: sa tatra [PvsP1-2:_49] sthitvā sattvān daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_1u:1589_2: caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_1u:1589_5: te ca sattvā na jātu virahitā bhavanti tayā dharmadeśanayā,
