S06psp_1u:1590_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ nirmāya daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06psp_1u:1590_2: tena tāvataḥ sattvān yāvad buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvo yāvad buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati,
S06psp_1u:1590_3: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya,
S06psp_1u:1590_4: yāvad aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvo yāvad buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati.
S06psp_1u:1590_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1590_6: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:1592_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sattvān kṣāntau samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_1u:1592_1_0: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sattvān kṣāntau samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati?
S06psp_1u:1592_1_1: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1592_2_0: evaṃ sannāhaṃ sannahyate, sacen mama sarvasattvā daṇḍaloṣṭamuṣṭiśastraprahāran dadyus tatra mayā ekam api kṣobhacittaṃ notpādayitavyaṃ
S06psp_1u:1593_0_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ nirmimīte te 'pi sarve tasya
S06psp_1u:1593_0_1: māyākārasya daṇḍair loṣṭair muṣṭibhiḥ śastrair vā prahāraṃ dadyuḥ,
S06psp_1u:1593_1: sa ca teṣu ekam api kṣobhacittaṃ notpādayet tāṃś ca sattvān nirmitān evaṃ rūpāyāṃ kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06psp_1u:1593_2: tena tāvataḥ sattvān kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati,
S06psp_1u:1593_3: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati.
S06psp_1u:1593_6: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:1595_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasattvān vīryapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_1u:1595_1_0: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasattvān vīryapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati?
S06psp_1u:1595_1_1: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ kāyikacaitasikavīrye pratiṣṭhitaḥ sarvasattvān
S06psp_1u:1596_0_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro vā māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ nirmāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair
S06psp_1u:1596_1: tena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān kāyikacaitasikavīrye pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ kāyikacaitasikavīrye pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati,
S06psp_1u:1596_2: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān kāyikacaitasikavīrye praviṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ kāyikacaitasikavīrye pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati.
S06psp_1u:1596_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1596_4: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:1598_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasattvān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_1u:1598_1_0: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasattvān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati
S06psp_1u:1598_1_1: pratiṣṭhāpayati? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ samatāyāṃ sthitvā na kasyacid dharmasya vikṣepaṃ vā avikṣepaṃ
S06psp_1u:1598_2: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito bhavati,
S06psp_1u:1598_3: sa tathaiva sarvasattvān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_1u:1598_4: te ca samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā bhavanti,
S06psp_1u:1598_5: na jātu virahitā bhavanti dhyānapāramitayā yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā iti.
S06psp_1u:1599_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:1599_1: _51] caturmahāpathe mahato janakāyasya purato mahāntaṃ janakāyam abhinirmāya taṃ janakāyaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06psp_1u:1599_2: tena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścid ekaḥ sattvo 'pi dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati,
S06psp_1u:1599_3: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati.
S06psp_1u:1599_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1599_5: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:1601_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasattvān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_1u:1601_1_0: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasattvān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati
S06psp_1u:1601_1_1: pratiṣṭhāpayati? yataḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kasyacid dharmasyāpāraṃ vā pāraṃ vā upalabhate,
S06psp_1u:1601_2: evaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito bhavati,
S06psp_1u:1601_3: sa tathaiva sarvasattvān api tatra samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06psp_1u:1602_0_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahato janakāyasya purato mahāntaṃ janakāyam abhinirmāya
S06psp_1u:1602_1: tena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścid ekasattvo 'pi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati,
S06psp_1u:1602_2: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ prajñā apāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati.
S06psp_1u:1602_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1602_4: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:1604_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddhaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu yāvantaḥ
S06psp_1u:1604_0_1: sattvās tān sarvān yathaivātmanā dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitas tathā dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_1u:1604_1: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_1u:1604_2: dharmaṃ ca [PvsP1-2:_52] deśayati, yad uta imam eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktam,
S06psp_1u:1604_3: te ca taṃ śrutvā na jātu bhūyo virahitā bhavanti ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā iti,
S06psp_1u:1604_4_0: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarasyām adha ūrdhvadiśi
S06psp_1u:1604_4_1: gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu yāvantaḥ sattvās tān sarvān yathaivātmanā dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitas tathā dānapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:1604_5: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_1u:1604_6: dharmaṃ ca deśayati, yad uta imam eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1604_7: te ca taṃ śrutvā na jātu bhūyo virahitā bhavanti ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā iti.
S06psp_1u:1605_0_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahato janakāyasya purato mahāntaṃ janakāyam abhinirmāya
S06psp_1u:1605_1: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte api nu tena māyākāreṇa māyākārāntevāsinā vā kaścit sattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu samādāpito bhavati,
S06psp_1u:1607_0: bhagavān āha: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati.
S06psp_1u:1607_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1607_2: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:1608_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhaṃ sannahya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena viharan nānyeṣāṃ cittotpādānām avakāśaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_1u:1608_1: iyanto mayā sattvā dānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti,
S06psp_1u:1608_2: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyām iyanto mayā sattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti,
S06psp_1u:1608_3: iyantaḥ sattvāḥ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā,
S06psp_1u:1608_5: _53] āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyantaḥ sattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1608_6_0: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale iyantaḥ sattvā arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyantaḥ sattvāḥ
S06psp_1u:1608_6_1: pratyekabuddhatve pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyantaḥ sattvāḥ sarvajñatve pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na
S06psp_1u:1609_0: api tu khalu punar asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1609_1_0: evaṃ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu
S06psp_1u:1609_1_1: pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ srotaāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhattve pratyekabuddhatve asaṃkhyeyā aprameyāḥ sattvā
S06psp_1u:1611_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahāntaṃ janakāyam asaṃkhyeyam aprameyaṃ nirmāya taṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06psp_1u:1611_1_0: yāvat sarvākāravaropete sarvajñajñāne pratiṣṭhāpayed evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān asaṃkhyeyān
S06psp_1u:1611_1_1: aprameyān ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpya yāvat sarvākāravaropete sarvajñajñāne pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu
S06psp_1u:1611_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ yad imāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1612_0: subhūtir āha: yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi tathā asannāhasannaddho batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1612_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1612_2: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1612_3: cakṣuś cakṣuṣā śūnyam, evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano manasā śūnyam,
S06psp_1u:1612_4: rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ, evaṃ śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyaṃ dharmā dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1612_6: evaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ manovijñānaṃ manovijñānena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1612_8: evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1613_1: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitayā śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:1615_0: saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣā dharmā bodhipakṣair dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1615_6: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa asannāhasannaddho bodhisattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1616_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1616_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? akṛtā hi subhūte sarvākārajñatā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā,
S06psp_1u:1616_4: yeṣāṃ kṛtaśo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsannāhaḥ sannaddhaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1617_0: subhūtir āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavan sarvākārajñatā akṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā,
S06psp_1u:1617_2: yeṣāṃ kṛtaśo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsannāhaḥ sannaddhaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1618_0: bhagavān āha: kārakānupalabdhitām upādāya subhūte sarvākārajñatā akṛtā vikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā,
S06psp_1u:1618_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi subhūte rūpaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti,
S06psp_1u:1618_3: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1618_4: na vijñānaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti.
S06psp_1u:1619_0: na cakṣuḥ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti,
S06psp_1u:1619_1: na śrotraṃ na ghrāṇaṃna jihvā na kāyo na manaḥ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti,
S06psp_1u:1619_2: na rūpaṃ [PvsP1-2:_55] karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti,
S06psp_1u:1619_3: na śabdo na gandho na raso na spraṣṭavyaṃ na dharmāḥ kurvanti na vikurvanti nābhisaṃskurvanti.
S06psp_1u:1620_0: na cakṣurvijñānaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti,
S06psp_1u:1620_1: na śrotravijñānaṃ na ghrāṇavijñānaṃ na jihvāvijñānaṃ na kāyavijñānaṃ na manovijñānaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti.
S06psp_1u:1621_0: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti,
S06psp_1u:1621_1: na śrotrasaṃsparśo na ghrāṇasaṃsparśo na jihvāsaṃsparśo na kāyasaṃsparśo na manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti.
S06psp_1u:1622_0: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti,
S06psp_1u:1622_1_0: na śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ na ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ na jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ
S06psp_1u:1622_1_1: na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti.
S06psp_1u:1622_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atyantatayā sarva ete na vidyante nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:1623_0: ātmā subhūte na karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti,
S06psp_1u:1623_1: evaṃ na sattvo na jīvo na poṣo na puruṣo na pudgalo na manujo na mānavo na kārako na vedako na jānako na paśyakaḥ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti.
S06psp_1u:1623_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atyantatayā sarva ete na vidyante nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:1624_0: svapnaḥ subhūte na karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti,
S06psp_1u:1624_1: evaṃ pratiśrutkā pratibhāsaḥ pratibimbaṃ marīcir na nirmāṇaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti.
S06psp_1u:1624_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atyantatayā sarva ete na vidyante nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:1625_0: adhyātmaśūnyatā subhūte na karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti.
S06psp_1u:1625_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy adhyātmaśūnyatā atyantatayā na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1625_3: bahirdhāśūnyatā na karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti.
S06psp_1u:1625_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bahirdhāśūnyatā na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1625_6: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā na karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti.
S06psp_1u:1625_7: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1625_9: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti.
S06psp_1u:1625_10: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na vidyate [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:1626_0: saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā na kurvanti na vikurvanti nābhisaṃskurvanti.
S06psp_1u:1626_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atyantatayā na vidyante nopalabhyante,
S06psp_1u:1626_2: daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā na kurvanti na vikurvanti nābhisaṃskurvanti.
S06psp_1u:1626_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atyantatayā na vidyante nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:1627_0: tathatā subhūte na karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti.
S06psp_1u:1627_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathatā hy atyantatayā na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1627_2: evam avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭir acintyadhātur bodhiḥ sarvākārajñatā subhūte na karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti.
S06psp_1u:1627_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atyantatayā na vidyante nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:1628_0: anena subhūte paryāyeṇa sarvākārajñatā akṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā,
S06psp_1u:1628_2: yeṣāṃ kṛtaśo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsannāhaḥ sannaddhaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1628_3: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:1630_0: subhūtir āha: yathāhaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi,
S06psp_1u:1630_2: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ, vijñānaṃ bhagavann abaddham amuktam.
S06psp_1u:1631_0: pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra āha: rūpam āyuṣman subhūte abaddham amuktam iti vadasi,
S06psp_1u:1631_1: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ, vijñānam āyuṣman subhūte abaddham amuktam iti vadasi.
S06psp_1u:1632_0: subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣman pūrṇa.
S06psp_1u:1633_0: pūrṇa āha: katamat tad āyuṣman subhūte rūpaṃ yad abaddham amuktam? katame te vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ? katamat tad vijñānaṃ yad abaddham amuktam?
S06psp_1u:1634_0: subhūtir āha: yad etad āyuṣman pūrṇa svapnopamaṃ rūpaṃ tad abaddham amuktam,
S06psp_1u:1634_1: ya ete svapnopamā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1634_2: yad etat svapnopamaṃ vijñānaṃ tad abaddham amuktam,
S06psp_1u:1634_3: evaṃ pratiśrutkopamā māyopamā marīcyupamā pratibhāsopamā yad etad āyuṣman pūrṇa [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:1634_5: ya ete nirmitopamā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1634_6: yad etaṃ nirmitopamaṃ vijñānaṃ tad abaddham amuktam.
S06psp_1u:1635_0: atītam āyuṣman pūrṇa rūpam abaddham amuktam,
S06psp_1u:1635_2: atītam āyuṣman pūrṇa vijñānam abaddham amuktam,
S06psp_1u:1635_3: evam anāgataṃ pratyutpannam āyuṣman pūrṇa rūpam abaddham amuktam,
S06psp_1u:1635_5: pratyutpannam āyuṣman pūrṇa vijñānam abaddham amuktam.
S06psp_1u:1635_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? asattvād āyuṣman pūrṇa rūpasya,
S06psp_1u:1635_8: asattvād āyuṣman pūrṇa vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām,
S06psp_1u:1635_9: asattvād āyuṣman pūrṇa vijñānasyaivaṃ tad vijñānam abaddham amuktam,
S06psp_1u:1635_10_0: evaṃ viviktatvāc chāntatvāc chūnyatvād ānimittatvād apraṇihitatvād asaṃskṛtatvād anutpannatvāt kuśalam akuśalaṃ saṃkleśaṃ
S06psp_1u:1635_10_1: niṣkleśaṃ sāvadyam anavadyaṃ sāsravam anāsravaṃ laukikaṃ lokottaraṃ saṃkliṣṭaṃ vyavadānam,
S06psp_1u:1635_12: tat kasya hetoḥ? asattvād rūpasyaivaṃ tad rūpam abaddham amuktaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1635_13: saṃkliṣṭaṃ vyavadānam āyuṣman pūrṇa vijñānam abaddham amuktam.
S06psp_1u:1635_14: tat kasya hetoḥ? asattvād vijñānasya evaṃ tad vijñānam abaddham amuktam.
S06psp_1u:1636_0: sarvadharmā apy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā amuktāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? asattvād abaddhā amuktāḥ.
S06psp_1u:1637_1: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāpy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā amuktā,
S06psp_1u:1637_2: asattvād abaddhā amuktā, evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad anutpannatvād abaddhā amuktā.
S06psp_1u:1638_3: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāpy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā amuktā.
S06psp_1u:1638_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? asattvād abaddhā amuktā,
S06psp_1u:1638_5: evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad anutpannatvād abaddhā amuktā.
S06psp_1u:1639_0: saptatriṃśad āyuṣman pūrṇa bodhipakṣyā dharmā abaddhā amuktā,
S06psp_1u:1639_1: evaṃ daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā apy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā amuktāḥ.
S06psp_1u:1639_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? asattvād abaddhā amuktāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1639_3: evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad anutpannatvād abaddhā amuktāḥ.
S06psp_1u:1640_1: bodhir apy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā amuktā,
S06psp_1u:1641_1: avitathatāpy ananyatathatāpi dharmatāpi dharmadhātur api dharmaniyāmatāpi bhūtakoṭir apy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā amuktā.
S06psp_1u:1641_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? asattvād abaddhā amuktā,
S06psp_1u:1641_3: evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad anutpannatvād abaddhā amuktā.
S06psp_1u:1642_0: evaṃ hy āyuṣman pūrṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'baddho 'muktaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1642_1: evaṃ ṣaḍ api pāramitā abaddhā amuktāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1642_5: te 'py abaddhā amuktāḥ, buddhakṣetrāṇy api yāni pariśodhayiṣyati,
S06psp_1u:1642_6: tāny apy abaddhāny amuktāni, yān api buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsiṣyate te 'py abaddhā amuktāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1642_7: yam api dharmaṃ śroṣyati so 'py abaddho 'muktaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1642_8: buddhair bhagavadbhir na jātu virahito bhaviṣyaty abaddho 'muktaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1642_10: na pañcabhiś cakṣurbhir virahito bhaviṣyaty abaddho 'muktaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1642_11: tathā nānyaiḥ samādhibhir virahito bhaviṣyaty abaddho 'muktaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1642_15: abaddhān amuktān sattvāṃs tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvāpayiṣyaty abaddho amuktaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1643_0: evaṃ hy āyuṣman pūrṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir abaddho 'muktaḥ sarvadharmān abhisaṃbhotsyate asattvam upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1644_0: evaṃ hy āyuṣman pūrṇa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya abaddho 'mukto mahāyānasannāho veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1646_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1646_1_0: katamad bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam? kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyanasaṃprasthito veditavyaḥ?
S06psp_1u:1646_1_1: kutas tad yānaṃ niryāsyati? kva vā tad yānaṃ sthāsyati? ko vā tena yānena niryāsyati?
S06psp_1u:1647_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1647_1: yat subhūte [PvsP1-2:_59] evaṃ vadasi, katamad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam iti.
S06psp_1u:1647_2: ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
S06psp_1u:1647_3: katamāḥ ṣaṭ? dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_1u:1648_0: subhūtir āha: katamā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā?
S06psp_1u:1649_0_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādair dānaṃ dadāti yad utādhyātmikabāhyāni
S06psp_1u:1649_0_1: vastūni tāni ca sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_1u:1650_0: subhūtir āha: katamā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitā?
S06psp_1u:1651_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1651_1: ātmanā ca daśa kuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate,
S06psp_1u:1651_2: parāṃś ca daśa kuśale karmapathe samādāpayaty anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:1651_3: iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya aparāmṛṣṭā śīlapāramitā.
S06psp_1u:1652_0: subhūtir āha: katamā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitā?
S06psp_1u:1653_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1654_0: subhūtir āha: katamā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitā?
S06psp_1u:1655_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ pañcasu pāramitāsu anikṣiptadhuro viharati,
S06psp_1u:1655_1: parāṃś ca tāsu pañcasu pāramitāsu samādāpayaty anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:1656_0: subhūtir āha: katamā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitā?
S06psp_1u:1657_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpadyate,
S06psp_1u:1658_0: subhūtir āha: katamā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā?
S06psp_1u:1659_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena sarvadharmān nābhiniviśate,
S06psp_1u:1659_2: sarvadharmaprakṛtipratyavekṣāyāṃ ca sattvāṃś ca samādāpayaty anupalaṃbhayogena.
S06psp_1u:1662_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad utādhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā
S06psp_1u:1662_0_1: śūnyatāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatā paramārthaśūnyatā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā atyantaśūnyatā anavarāgraśūnyatā anavakāraśūnyatā
S06psp_1u:1662_0_2: prakṛtiśūnyatā sarvadharmaśūnyatā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā anupalambhaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā bhāvaśūnyatā abhāvaśūnyatā svabhāvaśūnyatā
S06psp_1u:1663_0: tatra katamā adhyātmaśūnyatā? adhyātmikā dharmā ucyante cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo manaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1663_1: tatra cakṣuś cakṣuṣā śūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1663_8: tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyā eṣā,
S06psp_1u:1664_0: tatra katamā bahirdhāśūnyatā? ye bahirdhā dharmās tadyathā rūpaśabdagandharasasparśadharmāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1664_2: _61] upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā,
S06psp_1u:1664_3: evaṃ śabdagandharasasparśāḥ, dharmā dharmaiḥ śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1664_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir eṣām eṣā,
S06psp_1u:1665_0: tatra katamā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā? ṣaḍ ādhyātmikāny āyatanāni ṣaḍ bāhyāny āyatanāni,
S06psp_1u:1666_0: tatra katame adhyātmikā dharmā bahirdhādharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ? cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanāṃsy adhyātmikāni rūpaśabdagandharasasparśadharmaiḥ śūnyāny akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1666_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir eṣām eṣā.
S06psp_1u:1667_0: tatra katame bahirdhā dharmā adhyātmikair dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ? rūpaśabdagandharasasparśadharmāś cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanobhiḥ śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1667_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir eṣām eṣā,
S06psp_1u:1668_0: tatra katamā śūnyatāśūnyatā? yā sarvadharmāṇāṃ śūnyatā tayā śūnyatayā śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1668_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyā eṣā,
S06psp_1u:1669_0: tatra katamā mahāśūnyatā? pūrvā dik pūrvayā diśā śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:1669_1: evaṃ dakṣiṇā paścimā uttarā uttarapūrvā pūrvadakṣiṇā dakṣiṇapaścimā paścimottarā adha ūrdhvā dik ūrdhvayā diśā śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1669_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir āsām eṣā,
S06psp_1u:1669_3: tatra katamā paramārthaśūnyatā? paramārtha ucyate nirvāṇaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1669_4: tac ca nirvāṇena śūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1670_0: tatra katamā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā? saṃskṛta ucyate kāmadhātū rūpadhātur ārūpyadhātuś ca,
S06psp_1u:1671_0: tatra katamā asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā? asaṃskṛta ucyate yasya notpādo na nirodho na sthitir nānyathātvam,
S06psp_1u:1672_0: tatra katamā atyantaśūnyatā? yasyānto nopalabhyate tad atyantam atyantena śūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1673_0: tatra katamā anavarāgraśūnyatā? yasya naivāgraṃ nāvaram upalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1673_1: tasya madhyābhāvaḥ, yasya ca nādir na madhyaṃ nāvaram upalabhyate tasya nāgatir na gatiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1673_2: ādimadhyāvasānāny api ādimadhyāvasānaiḥ śūnyāny akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1673_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir eṣām eṣā,
S06psp_1u:1673_5: tatra katamā anavakāraśūnyatā? yasya dharmasya na kaścid avakāraḥ,
S06psp_1u:1674_0_0: tatra katamā prakṛtiśūnyatā, yā sarvadharmāṇāṃ prakṛtiḥ saṃskṛtānāṃ vā asaṃskṛtānāṃ vā na śrāvakaiḥ kṛtā na pratyekabuddhaiḥ
S06psp_1u:1674_0_1: kṛtā na tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ kṛtā nāpakṛtā,
S06psp_1u:1674_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyā eṣā,
S06psp_1u:1675_0_0: tatra katamā sarvadharmaśūnyatā? sarvadharmā ucyante rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo
S06psp_1u:1675_0_1: manorūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmā cakṣurvijñānaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ manovijñānaṃ
S06psp_1u:1675_0_2: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā
S06psp_1u:1675_0_3: śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā
S06psp_1u:1675_0_4: manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā saṃskṛtā dharmā asaṃskṛtā dharmā ima ucyante sarvadharmāḥ.
S06psp_1u:1675_1: tatra dharmā dharmaiḥ śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1675_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir eṣām eṣā,
S06psp_1u:1676_1: anubhavalakṣaṇā [PvsP1-2:_63] vedanā, udgrahaṇalakṣaṇā saṃjñā, abhisaṃskāralakṣaṇāḥ saṃskārā,
S06psp_1u:1676_4: yac cāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇālakṣaṇaṃ sarva ete dharmāḥ svalakṣaṇeṇa śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1676_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir eṣām eṣā,
S06psp_1u:1677_0: tatra katamā anupalambhaśūnyatā? ye dharmā atītānāgatapratyutpannās te nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:1677_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? nātīta anāgatā upalabhyante nāpy anāgata atītā,
S06psp_1u:1677_3: nāpy atītānāgatayoḥ pratyutpannā eṣām iyam anupalabdhir ādiviśuddhitvād akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1677_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir eṣām eṣā,
S06psp_1u:1678_0: tatra katamā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā? nāsti sāṃyogikasya dharmasya svabhāvaḥ pratītyasamutpannatvāt,
S06psp_1u:1679_0: tatra katamā bhāvaśūnyatā? bhāva ucyate pañcopādānaskandhāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1679_1: sa ca bhāvo bhāvena śūnyo 'kūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1680_0: tatra katamā abhāvaśūnyatā? abhāva ucyate asaṃskṛtaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1680_1: tac cāsaṃskṛtam asaṃskṛtena śūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:1681_0: tatra katamā svabhāvaśūnyatā? svabhāvo hi prakṛtir aviparītatā tasyā yā tayā śūnyatā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1681_1: na sā jñānena darśanena ca kṛtā.
S06psp_1u:1682_0_0: tatra katamā parabhāvaśūnyatā? yā utpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ anutpādād vā sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasthititā dharmadhātur
S06psp_1u:1682_0_1: dharmaniyāmatā tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā bhūtakoṭis tasyā yā tayā śūnyatā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:1682_1: na sā pareṇa kṛtā. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā,
S06psp_1u:1683_0: idam ucyate subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
S06psp_1u:1685_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,

S06psp_1u:1817_2_0: katamāni catvāri? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāya cchandaṃ janayati
S06psp_1u:1817_2_1: vyāyacchate vīryam ārabhate cittaṃ pratigṛhṇāti samyak praṇidadhāti,
S06psp_1u:1817_3: utpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāṃ yac chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate vīryam ārabhate cittaṃ pratigṛhṇāti samyak praṇidadhāti,
S06psp_1u:1817_4: anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ utpādāya cchandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate vīryam ārabhate cittaṃ pratigṛhṇāti samyak praṇidadhāti,
S06psp_1u:1817_5_0: utpannānāṃ kuśalanāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye bhūyobhāvāya asaṃpramoṣāya aparihāṇāya cchandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate vīryam ārabhate
S06psp_1u:1817_5_1: cittaṃ pratigṛhṇāti samyak praṇidadhāti tac cānupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:1817_6: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
S06psp_1u:1818_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1818_1_0: yad uta catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ. katame catvāraḥ? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś cchandasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgatam
S06psp_1u:1818_1_1: ṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargaparigatam,
S06psp_1u:1818_3: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.

S06psp_1u:1820_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta pañcabalāni.
S06psp_1u:1820_1: katamāni pañca? śraddhābalaṃ vīryabalaṃ smṛtibalaṃ samādhibalaṃ prajñābalaṃ tac cānupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:1820_2: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
S06psp_1u:1821_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta saptabodhyaṅgāni.
S06psp_1u:1821_1: katamāni sapta? smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ vīryasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ prītisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ praśrabdhisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ samādhisaṃbodhyaṅgam upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgam.
S06psp_1u:1821_2_0: tatra katamat smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ yāvad upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgam? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ
S06psp_1u:1821_2_1: yāvad upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargaparigataṃ tac cānupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:1821_3: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
S06psp_1u:1822_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1822_1: katama āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ? yad uta samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyaksaṃkalpaḥ samyagvāk samyakkarmāntaḥ samyagājīvaḥ samyagvyāyāmaḥ samyaksmṛtiḥ samyaksamādhiḥ tac cānupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:1822_2: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
S06psp_1u:1823_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta trayaḥ samādhayaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1823_2: tatra katamaḥ śūnyatāsamādhiḥ? svalakṣaṇena śūnyān sarvadharmān pratyavekṣamāṇasya yā cittasya sthitiḥ śūnyatāvimokṣamukhamayam ucyate śūnyatāsamādhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1823_3: ānimittān sarvadharmān pratyavekṣamāṇasya yā cittasya sthitir ānimittaṃ vimokṣamukham ayam ucyate ānimittaḥ samādhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1823_4: apraṇihitān sarvadharmān pratyavekṣamāṇasya yā cittasya sthitir apraṇihitaṃ vimokṣamukham ayam ucyate apraṇihitaḥ samādhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1823_6: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
S06psp_1u:1824_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:1824_1: _82] yad uta duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayajñānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānaṃ kṣayajñānam anutpādajñānaṃ dharmajñānam anvayajñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ parijayajñānaṃ yathārutajñānam.
S06psp_1u:1824_2: tatra katamad duḥkhajñānam? yad duḥkhasyānutpādajñānam idaṃ duḥkhajñānam.
S06psp_1u:1824_3: tatra katamat samudayajñānam? yat samudayasya prahāṇajñānam.
S06psp_1u:1824_7: tatra katamad anutpādajñānam? yad anutpāde anutpādajñānam.
S06psp_1u:1824_8: tatra katamad dharmajñānam? yat pañcānāṃ skandhānāṃ dharmopacchedajñānam.
S06psp_1u:1824_9: tatra katamad anvayajñānam? cakṣur anityaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano 'nityaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1824_10: evaṃ yāvad vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu ca jñānam.
S06psp_1u:1824_11: tatra katamat saṃvṛtijñānam? yat parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ cetasaiva cetaso jñānam.
S06psp_1u:1824_12: tatra katamat parijayajñānam? yat pratipat parijayajñānam.
S06psp_1u:1824_13: tatra katamad yathārutajñānam? yat tat tathāgatasya sarvākārajñatājñānaṃ tac cānupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:1824_14: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
S06psp_1u:1825_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1825_1: yad idaṃ trīṇīndriyāni. katamāni trīṇi? anājñātamājñāsyāmīndriyam ājñendriyam ājñātāvīndriyam.
S06psp_1u:1826_0_0: tat katamad anājñātamājñāsyāmīndriyam? yac chaikṣāṇāṃ pudgalānām anabhisamitānām anavabhāsaṃ yad avinayaṃ śraddhendriyaṃ
S06psp_1u:1826_0_1: vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam idam ucyate anājñātamājñāsyāmīndriyam.
S06psp_1u:1827_0: tatra katamad ājñendriyam? yac chaikṣāṇāṃ pudgalānām ājñātavatāṃ śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyamidam ucyate ājñendriyam.
S06psp_1u:1828_0_0: tatra katamad ājñātāvīndriyam? yad utāśaikṣāṇāṃ pudgalānām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ
S06psp_1u:1828_1: idam ucyate ājñātāvīndriyam. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:1829_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1829_1: yad uta savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhir avitarko 'vicāramātraḥ samādhir avitarko 'vicāraḥ samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:1829_2_0: tatra katamaḥ savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhiḥ? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair
S06psp_1u:1829_2_1: dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_1u:1829_4: tatra katamo 'vitarko 'vicāramātraḥ samādhiḥ? yaḥ prathamasya dhyānasya dvitīyasya dhyānasyāntariko yam ucyate 'vitarko 'vicāramātraḥ samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:1829_5: tatra katamo 'vitarko 'vicāraḥ samādhiḥ? yad dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ vistareṇa kartavyaṃ yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattir ayam ucyate 'vitarko 'vicāraḥ samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:1829_6: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:1830_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1830_1: yad uta daśānusmṛtayaḥ. katamā daśa? yad uta buddhānusmṛtir dharmānusmṛtiḥ saṃghānusmṛtiḥ śīlānusmṛtis tyāgānusmṛtir devatānusmṛtir,
S06psp_1u:1830_3: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:1831_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1831_1: yad uta catvāri dhyānāni, catvāry apramāṇāni, catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo 'ṣṭau vimokṣā,
S06psp_1u:1831_3: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
S06psp_1u:1832_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1832_1: daśa tathāgatabalāni. katamāni daśa? yad uta iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sthānañ ca sthānato 'sthānañ cāsthānato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:1832_2: atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ karmasamādānānāṃ ca sthānato hetuto vipākañ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:1832_9: sa ca divyena cakṣuṣā sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:1832_10: sa āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvā upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_1u:1832_11: kṣīṇā me jātir uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparamithyātvam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
S06psp_1u:1832_12: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:1833_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1834_0: yad uta samyaksaṃbuddhasya bata me pratijānataḥ,
S06psp_1u:1834_2: atra ca me kaścic chramaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā kaścid vā punar loke saha dharmeṇa codayed iti nimittam etan na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:1834_3_0: idam atra nimittam asamanupaśyan kṣemaprāpto 'bhayaprāpto viharāmi ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ pratijānāmi parṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ
S06psp_1u:1834_3_1: nadāmi brāhmaṃ cakraṃ pravartayāmy apravartitaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brāhmaṇā vā kenacid vā punar
S06psp_1u:1835_1: ime āsravā aparikṣīṇā iti naitat sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_1u:1835_2_0: atra ca me kaścic chramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā peyālaṃ yāvad brāhmaṃ cakraṃ pravartayāmy apravartitaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena
S06psp_1u:1835_2_1: vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā punar loke saha dharmeṇeti,
S06psp_1u:1836_0: ye khalu punar ime mayā āntarāyikā dharmā ākhyātās tān pratiṣedhamāṇasya nālam antarāyāyeti naitat sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_1u:1836_1: atra me kaścic chramaṇo vā peyālaṃ yāvat kenacid vā punar loke saha dharmeṇeti,
S06psp_1u:1837_0: yā mayā pratipad āhyātā āryā nairyāṇikī niryāti tat katarasya samyag duḥkhakṣayāya tāṃ pratipadyamāno na niryāyāt samyag duḥkhakṣayāyeti naitat sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_1u:1837_1: atra ca me kaścic chramaṇo vā peyālaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1837_2: yāvat kenacid vā punar loke saha dharmeṇeti.
S06psp_1u:1837_3: imāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:1838_1: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1838_3: katamāś catasraḥ? dharmapratisaṃvid arthapratisaṃvid niruktipratisaṃvit pratibhānapratisaṃvit.
S06psp_1u:1838_4: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:1839_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1839_2: katame aṣṭādaśa? yad uta yāñ ca rātriṃ subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1839_4: etasminn antare subhūte nāsti tathāgatasya skhalitaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1839_5_0: nāsti ravitaṃ, nāsti muṣitasmṛtitā, nāsti nānātvasaṃjñā, nāsty asamāhitaṃ cittaṃ, nāsty apratisaṃkhyāyopekṣā, nāsti cchandaparihāṇir,
S06psp_1u:1839_5_1: nāsti vīryaparihāṇir, nāsti smṛtiparihāṇir, nāsti samādhiparihāṇir, nāsti prajñāparihāṇir, nāsti vimuktiparihāṇiḥ, sarvakāyakarma
S06psp_1u:1839_10: pratyutpanne 'dhvany apratihatam asaṅgajñānaṃ darśanaṃ ca pravartate,
S06psp_1u:1839_12: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:1841_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1841_1: yad uta dhāraṇīmukhāni, yad utākṣaranayasamatākṣaramukham akṣarapraveśaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1883_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi na kasyacin nāmāsti yena saṃvyavahriyeta yena vābhilapyeta yena nirdiśyeta yena lujyeta yena paśyeta,
S06psp_1u:1883_5: yaḥ kaścit subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva idam akārādyakṣarakauśalyapraveśaṃ jñāsyati,
S06psp_1u:1883_9_0: yo hi kaścit subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva imām akārādyakṣaramudrāṃ śroṣyati śrutvā codgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati
S06psp_1u:1883_9_1: pareṣāṃ deśayiṣyati ramayati tayā santatyā tasya viṃśatir anuśaṃsāḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:1884_1: matimāṃś ca bhaviṣyati, gatimāṃś ca bhaviṣyati, dhṛtimāṃś ca bhaviṣyati, hrīmāṃś ca prajñāvāṃś ca pratibhānavāṃś ca,
S06psp_1u:1884_2: idaṃ dhāraṇīmukham alpakṛcchreṇa pratilapsyatena ca kathaṃkathī bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_1u:1884_3: vimatiś cāsya na bhaviṣyati, na ca ślakṣṇāṃ vācaṃ śrutvā pareṣv anunīto bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_1u:1884_5: na connato bhaviṣyati, nāvanataḥ yathāsthita eva bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_1u:1884_6: rutakuśalaś ca bhaviṣyati, skandhakuśalaś ca bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_1u:1884_7: dhātukuśalaś ca bhaviṣyati, āyatanakuśalaś ca bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_1u:1884_8: satyakuśalaś ca bhaviṣyati, pratītyasamutpādakuśalaś ca bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_1u:1884_9: hetukuśalaś ca bhaviṣyati, pratyayakuśalaś ca bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_1u:1884_10: dharmakuśalaś ca bhaviṣyati, indriyaparipūrṇajñānakuśalaś ca bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_1u:1884_21: idam api subhūte dhāraṇīmukham akṣaramukham akāramukhaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
S06psp_1u:1886_0: yad api tat subhūtir evam āha,
S06psp_1u:1886_3: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bhūmer bhūmiṃ saṃkrāmati,
S06psp_1u:1886_4: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūmer bhūmiṃ saṃkrāmati yad utāsaṃkrāntyā sarvadharmāṇām.
S06psp_1u:1886_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi sa kaścid dharmo ya āgacchati vā gacchati vā saṃkrāmati vā upasaṃkrāmati vā,
S06psp_1u:1886_6: api tu yā dharmāṇāṃ bhūmis tān na manyate na cintayati bhūmiparikarma ca karoti na ca bhūmiṃ samanupaśyati.
S06psp_1u:1887_0: katamac ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhūmiparikarma? prathamāyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena daśabhūmiparikarmāṇi karaṇīyāni.
S06psp_1u:1898_0: imāni subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prathamāyā bhūmer daśa parikarmāṇi yāni prathamāyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena daśa parikarmāṇi karaṇīyāni.
S06psp_1u:1899_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dvitīyāyāṃ bhūmau vartamāno 'ṣṭau dharmān manasikaroti teṣu ca pratipadyate.
S06psp_1u:1899_2: kṛtajñatāṃ kṛtaveditāṃ, kṣāntibalapratiṣṭhānaṃ, prāmodyapratyanubhavatāṃ, sarvasattvāparityāgatayā mahākaruṇāyā āmukhīkarma,
S06psp_1u:1899_3_0: gurūṇāṃ śraddhayā gauravaṃ, śāstṛsaṃjñāyāguruśuśrūṣāṃ, pāramitās tad yogaparyeṣṭim, imān subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
S06psp_1u:1899_3_1: dvitīyāyāṃ bhūmau vartamānenāṣṭau dharmān manasikṛtvā pratipattavyam.

S06psp_1u:2062_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte yac ca tad yānaṃ yena ca niryāsyati yaś ca niryāsyati yataś ca niryāsyati sarva ete [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:2062_3: _111] dharmā na saṃvidyante, evam asaṃvidyamānānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ katamo dharmaḥ katamena dharmeṇa niryāsyati.

S06psp_1u:2062_8: evam anutpādo 'nirodho 'saṃkleśo 'vyavadānam anabhisaṃskāro nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,

S06psp_1u:2062_16: evaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:2062_20: evaṃ daśa tathāgatabalāni nopalabhyante catvāri vaiśāradyāni nopalabhyante catasraḥ pratisaṃvido nopalabhyante aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā nopalabhyante atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:2062_30: anāgāmiphalan nopalabhyate, arhattvan nopalabhyate, pratyekabodhir nopalabhyate, tathāgatatvan nopalabhyate, sarvākārajñatā nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:2062_33: _112] sudurjayā abhimukhī dūraṅgamā acalā sādhumatī dharmameghā bhūmir nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:2062_37: evam agatir nopalabhyate gatir nopalabhyate sthitir nopalabhyate cyutir nopalabhyate upapattir nopalabhyate hānir nopalabhyate vṛddhir nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:2063_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi subhūte dharmadhātur upalabhyate anupalabdhyā nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2063_6: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitānupalabdhyā nopalabhyate prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_1u:2063_9: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā, evaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatānupalabdhyā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2063_13: evaṃ daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmānupalabdhyā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:2064_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi subhūte srotaāpanna upalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:2064_2: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhann arhadanupalabdhyā nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2064_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi subhūte tathāgata upalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:2066_1: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam ānāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabuddhatvaṃ bodhisattvatvaṃ buddhatvaṃ buddhānupalabdhyā nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2067_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte daśa bhūmayo bhūmyanupalabdhyā nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:2067_1: katamā daśa? śuklavidarśanābhūmir gotrabhūmir aṣṭamakabhūmir darśanabhūmis tanūbhūmiḥ vītarāgabhūmiḥ kṛtāvībhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmir bodhisattvabhūmir buddhabhūmiḥ.
S06psp_1u:2068_4: yāvad daśamī bhūmir adhyātmaśūnyatayā daśamī bhūmir nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2069_3: evaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā sattvaparipāko nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:2071_4: evaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā pañca cakṣūṃṣi nopalabhyante,
S06psp_1u:2071_5: atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nupalambhayogena sarvadharmāṇāṃ mahāyānena sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati.
S06psp_1u:2074_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:2074_2: sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati tenocyate mahāyānam iti,
S06psp_1u:2074_3: ākāśasamaṃ tad yānaṃ, tadyathāpi nāma bhagavann ākāśe 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2074_4: evam eva bhagavann asmin mahāyāne aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ.
S06psp_1u:2074_5: evaṃ hi bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2074_6: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan ākāśasya nāpy āgamo dṛśyate na nirgamo na sthānaṃ dṛśyate,
S06psp_1u:2074_7: evam evāsya bhagavan mahāyānasya naivāgama upalabhyate na nirgamo na sthānam upalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2074_8: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavann ākāśasya nāpi pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhya upalabhyate adhyavasamatām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:2074_9: evam eva bhagavann asya mahāyānasya na pūrvānto nāparānto na madhya upalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2074_10: adhvasamatām upādāya, evam idaṃ bhagavan mahāyānaṃ mahāyānam ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:2075_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2075_1: yad imāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā, dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_1u:2076_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni sarvasamādhimukhāni śūraṅgamaḥ samādhir vistareṇa kāryaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2077_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06psp_1u:2077_1: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā, idaṃ subhūte bodhisatvasya mahāsattvasya [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:2078_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra
S06psp_1u:2078_0_1: ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭaṅgo mārgaḥ catvāry apramāṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo
S06psp_1u:2078_0_2: daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06psp_1u:2079_0: yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha, sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya tad yānaṃ niryāsyatīti,
S06psp_1u:2079_1: katamaś ca sadevamānuṣāsuro loko yad uta kāmadhātū rūpadhātur ārūpyadhātuḥ
S06psp_1u:2080_0_0: sacet subhūte kāmadhātus tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ yathāvan nityo dhruvaḥ śāśvato 'vipariṇāmadharmī
S06psp_1u:2080_0_1: bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat,
S06psp_1u:2080_1: yasmāt tarhi subhūte kāmadhātuḥ kalpito viṭhapitaḥ saṃdarśito 'yathāvat sarvam anityam adhruvam aśāśvataṃ vipariṇāmadharmi,
S06psp_1u:2080_2: abhāvas tasmād idaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati,

S06psp_1u:2104_0: evaṃ catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni.

S06psp_1u:2106_1: _120] nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo 'bhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.

S06psp_1u:2112_0: evaṃ srotaāpannnadharmāḥ sakṛdāgāmidharmā anāgāmidharmā arhaddharmāḥ pratyekabuddhadharmā bodhisattvadharmāḥ.
S06psp_1u:2113_0: sacet subhūte buddhadharmā bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat,
S06psp_1u:2113_1: yasmāt tarhi subhūte buddhadharmā abhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.
S06psp_1u:2114_0: sacet subhūte gotrabhūmir bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat,
S06psp_1u:2114_1: gotrabhūmir abhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.
S06psp_1u:2115_0: evam aṣṭamakaḥ srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhan pratyekabuddho bodhisattvaḥ.
S06psp_1u:2116_0: sacet subhūte buddho bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat,
S06psp_1u:2116_1: yasmāt tarhi subhūte buddho 'bhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.
S06psp_1u:2117_1: sacet subhūte sadevamānuṣāsuro loko bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat,
S06psp_1u:2117_2: yasmāt tarhi subhūte sadevamānuṣāsuro loko 'bhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.
S06psp_1u:2119_0_0: sacet subhūte prathamacittotpādam upādāya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yāvad ā bodhimaṇḍād etasminn antare ye cittotpādās
S06psp_1u:2119_0_1: te bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat,
S06psp_1u:2119_1_0: yasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad ā bodhimaṇḍād etasminn antare ye cittotpādās
S06psp_1u:2119_1_1: te abhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.
S06psp_1u:2120_0_0: sacet subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vajropamaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naiva bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān
S06psp_1u:2120_1_0: yasmāt subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vajropamaṃ jñānam abhāvo na bhāvas tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān
S06psp_1u:2120_1_1: abhāvān iti viditvā sarvākāravaropetaṃ sarvajñajñānam anuprāpnoti,
S06psp_1u:2120_2: evaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevanānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.
S06psp_1u:2121_0_0: sacet subhūte tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naiva tathāgatā
S06psp_1u:2121_0_1: arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokaṃ tejasā ca śriyā cābhyabhaviṣyat,
S06psp_1u:2121_1: yasmāt subhūte dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāny abhāvo nabhāvas tasmāt tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokaṃ tejasā ca śriyā cābhibhavanti.
S06psp_1u:2122_0: sacet subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naiva tathagato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn avabhāsenāsphāriṣyat,
S06psp_1u:2122_1: yasmāt tarhi subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'bhāvo na bhāvas tasmāt tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn avabhāsena sphārati.
S06psp_1u:2123_0: sacet subhūte tathāgatasya ṣaṣṭyaṅgopetaḥ svaro bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naiva tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho daśasu dikṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:2123_2: yasmāt tarhi subhūte tathāgatasya ṣaṣṭyaṅgopetaḥ svaro 'bhāvo na bhāvas tasmāt tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho daśasu dikṣv aprameyasaṃkhyeyān lokadhātūn svareṇābhivijñapayati.
S06psp_1u:2124_0: sacet subhūte tathāgatasya triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ dharmacakraṃ bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naiva tathāgatas triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ dharmacakraṃ prāvartayiṣyat,
S06psp_1u:2124_1: apravartanīyaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā punar loke sahadharmeṇa,
S06psp_1u:2124_2_0: yasmāt tarhi subhūte tathāgatasya triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ dharmacakram abhāvo na bhāvas tasmāt tathagatena triparivartaṃ
S06psp_1u:2124_2_1: dvādaśākāraṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartitam apravartanīyaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā
S06psp_1u:2125_0_0: sacet subhūte sattvā bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo yeṣāṃ kṛtaśas tathāgatena dharmacakraṃ pravartitaṃ naiva te sattvā anupadhiśeṣe
S06psp_1u:2125_0_1: nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyan yasmāt tarhi subhūte sattvā abhāvo na bhāvo yeṣāṃ kṛtaśas tathāgatena dharmacakraṃ pravartitaṃ
S06psp_1u:2125_0_2: tasmāt te sattvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyanti.
S06psp_1u:2128_0_0: yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha, ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti, evam etat subhūte evam etat, ākāśasamaṃ tad yānaṃ, yathākāśasya na
S06psp_1u:2128_0_1: pūrvā dik prajñāyate na dakṣiṇā na paścimā nottarā na vidiśo nādho nordhvā dik prajñāyate,
S06psp_1u:2128_1: evam eva subhūte tasya yānasya na pūrvā dik prajñāyate na dakṣiṇā na paścimā nottarā na vidiśo nādho nordhvā dik prajñāyate,
S06psp_1u:2129_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na dīrghaṃ na hrasvaṃ na vṛttaṃ na caturasraṃ na samaṃ na viṣamaṃ na nīlaṃ na pītaṃ na lohitaṃ nāvadātaṃ na mañjiṣṭhaṃ na sphāṭikarajatavarṇam,
S06psp_1u:2129_1: evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na dīrghaṃ na hrasvaṃ na vṛttaṃ na caturasraṃ na samaṃ na viṣamaṃ na nīlaṃ na pītaṃ na lohitaṃ nāvadātaṃ na māñjiṣṭhaṃ na sphāṭikarajatavarṇaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2130_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ nātītaṃ nānāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2130_1: evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ nātītaṃ nānāgataṃ na [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:2130_2: _123] pratyutpannaṃ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
S06psp_1u:2131_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśasya na hānir na vṛddhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:2131_1: evam eva subhūte tasya mahāyānasya na hānir na vṛddhis tenocyate,
S06psp_1u:2132_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśasya na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2132_1: evam eva subhūte tasya mahāyānasya na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ tenocyate,

S06psp_1u:2139_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśe na prathamacittotpādo na dvitīyo na tṛtīyo na caturtho na pañcamo na ṣaṣṭho na saptamo nāṣṭamo na navamo na daśamaś cittotpādaḥ,

S06psp_1u:2139_2: _124] na saptamo nāṣṭamo na navamo na daśamaś cittotpādas tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,

S06psp_1u:2143_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na rūpi nārūpi na sanidarśanaṃ nānidarśanaṃ na sapratighaṃ nāpratighaṃ na saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2143_1: evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na rūpi nārūpi na sanidarśanaṃ nānidarśanaṃ na sapratighaṃ nāpratighaṃ na saṃyuktaṃna visaṃyuktaṃ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,

S06psp_1u:2144_1: evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na nityaṃ nānityaṃ na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ nātmā nānātmā na śāntaṃ nāśāntaṃ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
S06psp_1u:2145_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na śūnyaṃ nāśūnyaṃ na nimittaṃ nānimittaṃ na praṇihitaṃ nāpraṇihitaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2145_1: evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na śūnyaṃ nāśūnyaṃ na nimittaṃ nānimittaṃ na praṇihitaṃ nāpraṇihitaṃ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
S06psp_1u:2146_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na viviktaṃ nāviviktaṃ nāloko nāndhakāraḥ,

S06psp_1u:2147_1: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na labhyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2147_2: evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na labhyate nopalabhyate tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
S06psp_1u:2148_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na pravyāhāro nāpravyāhāraḥ,
S06psp_1u:2148_1: evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na pravyāhāro nāpravyāhāras tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam.
S06psp_1u:2150_0: yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha, yathā ākāśe 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2150_1: evam eva tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśa iti,
S06psp_1u:2150_2: evam etat subhūte evam etat, yathā ākāśe 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2150_3: evam eva tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ.
S06psp_1u:2150_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? sattvāsattayā hi subhūte ākāśāsattā veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:2150_6: anenāpi subhūte paryāyeṇa tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ.
S06psp_1u:2150_7: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte ye ca sattvā yac cākāśaṃ yac ca mahāyānaṃ sarvam etan nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2151_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte sattvāsattayā ākāśāsattā veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:2151_3: evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ.

S06psp_1u:2155_9_1: yac cāsaṃkhyeyaṃ yac cāparimāṇaṃ ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante.

S06psp_1u:2156_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yaś ca yāvaj jānakapaśyako yā ca bhūtakoṭir yac cāprameyam asaṃkhyeyam aparimāṇaṃ ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante.

S06psp_1u:2158_8: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvad ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:2159_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte ātmasattvāsattayā yāvaj jānakapaśyakāsattā veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:2159_2: dānapāramitayāsattayā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāsattā veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:2159_7: evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ.
S06psp_1u:2159_8: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvad ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante.

S06psp_1u:2160_1: jānakapaśyakāsattayā adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattā veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:2160_6: evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyāṇām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ.
S06psp_1u:2160_7: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvad ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante.

S06psp_1u:2161_19: evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ.

S06psp_1u:2162_11: evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ.
S06psp_1u:2162_12: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvadye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:2163_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte ātmasattvāsattayā yāvaj jānakapaśyakāsattā veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:2163_7: evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ.
S06psp_1u:2163_8: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvad ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:2164_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte ātmasattvāsattayā yāvaj jānakapaśyakāsattā veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:2164_8: evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ.
S06psp_1u:2164_9: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvad ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:2165_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte nirvāṇadhātāv aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2165_1: evam eva subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ.
S06psp_1u:2166_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśe 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2166_1: evam eva subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ.
S06psp_1u:2168_0: yad api subhūtir evam āha, nāpi tasya mahāyānasya āgatir dṛśyate nāpi gatir na sthānaṃ dṛśyata iti.
S06psp_1u:2168_1: evam etat subhūte tasya mahāyānasyāgatir na dṛśyate nāpi gatir na sthānaṃ dṛśyate.
S06psp_1u:2168_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? acalā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te na kvacid gacchanti na kutaścid āgacchanti na kvacit tiṣṭhanti.
S06psp_1u:2168_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi subhūte rūpasya prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2168_5: na hi subhūte vijñānasya prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2169_0: na subhūte rūpatathatā kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2169_2: na subhūte vijñānasya tathatā kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2170_0: na subhūte rūpasvabhāvaḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2170_1: na vedanāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ na saṃjñāyāḥ svabhāvo na saṃskārāṇāṃ svabhāvo na subhūte vijñānasya svabhāvaḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2171_0: na subhūte rūpasya lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2171_1: na vedanāyā lakṣaṇaṃ na saṃjñāyā lakṣaṇaṃ na saṃskārāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ na subhūte vijñānasya lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:2171_2: _130] na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2172_0: na subhūte cakṣuṣaḥ prakṛtir na tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2172_1: evaṃ na śrotrasya na ghrāṇasya na jihvāyā na kāyasya na subhūte manasaḥ prakṛtir na tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2173_0: na subhūte pṛthivīdhātoḥ prakṛtir na tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2173_1_0: evaṃ nābdhātor na tejodhātor na vāyudhātor nākāśadhātor na subhūte vijñānadhātoḥ prakṛtir na tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ
S06psp_1u:2173_1_1: kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2174_0: na subhūte dharmadhātoḥ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2174_1: na dharmadhātos tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2175_0: na subhūte tathatāyāḥ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2175_1: na tathatāyās tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2176_0: na subhūte bhūtakoṭeḥ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2176_1: na bhūtakoṭes tathatā na bhūtakoṭeḥ svabhāvo na bhūtakoṭer lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2177_0: na subhūte acintyadhātoḥ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2177_1: na subhūte acintyadhātos tathatā nācintyadhātoḥ svabhāvo nācintyadhātor lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2178_0: na subhūte dānapāramitāyāḥ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2178_1: na dānapāramitāyās tathatā na dānapāramitāyāḥ svabhāvo na dānapāramitāyā lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2179_0: evaṃ na śīlapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyā na prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2179_1: na prajñāpāramitāyas tathatā na prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvo na prajñāpāramitāyā lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:2179_2: _131] āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2180_0: na subhūte smṛtyupasthānānāṃ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2180_1: na smṛtyupasthānānāṃ tathatā na smṛtyupasthānānāṃ svabhāvo na smṛtyupasthānānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2181_0: evaṃ na samyakprahāṇānāṃ na ṛddhipādānāṃ nendriyāṇāṃ na balānāṃ na bodhyaṅgānāṃ nāryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2181_1: nāryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya tathatā nāryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya svabhāvo nāryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2182_0: na subhūte apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīṇāṃ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2182_1_0: nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīṇāṃ tathatā nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ svabhāvo nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ
S06psp_1u:2182_1_1: kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2183_0: na subhūte daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2183_1: na daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ tathatā na daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ svabhāvo na daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2184_0_0: evaṃ na caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ na catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ na ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ na subhūte aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ
S06psp_1u:2184_0_1: prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2184_1_0: nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ
S06psp_1u:2184_1_1: buddhadharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2185_0: na subhūte bodheḥ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2185_1: na bodhes tathatā na bodheḥ svabhāvo na bodher lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2186_0: na subhūte asaṃskṛtasya prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2186_1: nāsaṃskṛtasya tathatā nāsaṃskṛtasya svabhāvo nāsaṃskṛtasya lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati.
S06psp_1u:2188_1: yad api tat subhūtir evam āha,
S06psp_1u:2188_2: nāsya yānasya pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhya upalabhyate tryadhvasamaṃ tad yānaṃ tasmān mahāyānaṃ mahāyānam ity ucyate,
S06psp_1u:2188_3: evam etat subhūte evam etat, nāsya yānasya pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhya upalabhyate tryadhvasamaṃ tad yānaṃ tasmān mahāyānaṃ mahāyānam ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:2188_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte atīto 'dhvā atītenādhvanā śūnyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2188_8: mahāyānaṃ mahāyānena śūnyaṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattvena śūnyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:2189_0: na subhūte śūnyatā ekā vā dve vā tisro vā catasro vā pañca vā ṣaḍ vā sapta vā aṣṭa vā nava vā daśa vā tasmāt tryadhvasamatayā samam idaṃ yānaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
S06psp_1u:2189_1: nāpi tatra samam upalabhyate na viṣamaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2189_2: nāpi tatra rāga upalabhyate na virāgaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2189_3: na doṣa upalabhyate nādoṣaḥ, na moha upalabhyate nāmohaḥ, na nāma upalabhyate nānāma, yāvan na kuśalam upalabhyate nākuśalaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2189_13: nātmā upalabhyate nānātmā, na śāntam upalabhyate nāśāntaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2189_17: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tasya svabhāvo nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2189_18: atītaṃ subhūte rūpam atītena rūpeṇa śūnyam,
S06psp_1u:2190_0: na śūnyatāyām atītaṃ rūpam upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2190_1: kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyām atītaṃ rūpam upalapsyate,
S06psp_1u:2191_0: na śūnyatāyām atītā vedanā upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:2191_2: kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyām atītā vedanā upalapsyate,
S06psp_1u:2192_2: kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyām atītā saṃjñā upalapsyate,
S06psp_1u:2193_0: na śūnyatāyām atītāḥ saṃskārā upalabhyante śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2193_1: kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyām atītāḥ saṃskārā upalapsyante,
S06psp_1u:2194_0: na śūnyatāyām atītaṃ vijñānam upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2194_1: kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyām atītaṃ vijñānam upalapsyate,
S06psp_1u:2195_0: evaṃ na śūnyatāyām anāgataṃ rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāvijñānam upalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2196_0: na śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannaṃ rūpam upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2196_1: kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannaṃ rūpam upalapsyate,
S06psp_1u:2197_0: na śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannā vedanā upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2197_1: kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannā vedanā upalapsyate,
S06psp_1u:2198_0: na śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannā saṃjñā upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2198_1: kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannā saṃjñā upalapsyate,
S06psp_1u:2199_0: na śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannāḥ saṃskārā upalabhyante śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2199_1: kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannā saṃskārā upalapsyante,
S06psp_1u:2200_0: na śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannaṃ vijñānam upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2200_1: kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannaṃ vijñānam upalapsyate.
S06psp_1u:2201_0: na śūnyatāyām atītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ rūpam upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2201_1: kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyām atītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ rūpam upalapsyate,
S06psp_1u:2202_0: na śūnyatāyām atītānāgatapratyutpannā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2202_1: kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyām atītānāgatapratyutpannā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam upalapsyate.
S06psp_1u:2203_5: na subhūte tryadhvasamatāyām atīto 'dhvā upalabhyate samataiva tāvat samatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2205_1: aparāntato 'pi subhūte prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate pratyutpannato 'pi subhūte prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2205_3: na subhūte samatāyām atīto 'dhvā upalabhyate nānāgato na pratyutpanno 'dhvā upalabhyate samataiva tāvat samatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2206_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu smṛtyupasthānāni nopalabhyante tryadhvasamatāyāṃ smṛtyupasthānāni nopalabhyante,
S06psp_1u:2206_3: kutaḥ punaḥ samatāyām atītānāgatapratyutpannāni smṛtyupasthānāni upalapsyante,
S06psp_1u:2207_13: _135] atītānāgatapratyutpannādhvā upalabhyante samataiva tāvat samatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2207_14: kutaḥ punaḥ samatāyām atītānāgatapratyutpannā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā upalapsyante.
S06psp_1u:2208_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte pūrvāntataḥ pṛthagjano nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2210_0: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā triṣv adhvasu śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatā paripūrayitavyā.
S06psp_1u:2210_1: idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tryadhvasamatayā mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2210_2: atra sthito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhavan sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati.
S06psp_1u:2212_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:2212_1: sādhu sādhu bhagavan subhāṣitam idaṃ bhagavato bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mahāyānam,
S06psp_1u:2212_2: atra bhagavan mahāyāne śikṣamāṇair atīte 'dhvani bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ sarvākārajñatā anuprāptā,
S06psp_1u:2212_3: anāgatā api bodhisattvā mahāsattvā atra mahāyāne śikṣamāṇāḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti,
S06psp_1u:2212_4: ye 'pi bhagavan daśadiśi loke 'saṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pratyutpannās te 'py atra mahāyāne śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuvanti,
S06psp_1u:2212_5: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan mahāyānam idaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta tryadhvasamatānām,
S06psp_1u:2213_0: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:2213_1: evam etat subhūte evam etat, atra mahāyāne śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāptā anuprāpsyanti anuprāpnuvanti ca.
S06psp_1u:2214_0: atha khalu pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:2214_1: ayaṃ bhagavan subhūtiḥ sthaviras tathāgatena prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśo 'dhīṣṭo mahāyānam upadeṣṭavyaṃ manyeta.
S06psp_1u:2215_1: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:2215_2: mā haivāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ vyatikramya mahāyānam upadiśāmi.
S06psp_1u:2216_0: bhagavan āha: na hi subhūte anulomatvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ mahāyānam upadiśasi.
S06psp_1u:2216_1_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte ye kecit kuśalā bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ śrāvakadharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā vā bodhisattvadharmā
S06psp_1u:2216_1_1: vā buddhadharmā vā sarve te prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃgrahaṃ samavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti.
S06psp_1u:2217_0_0: subhūtir āha: katame bhagavan kuśalā bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ śrāvakadharmāḥ pratyekabuddhadharmā bodhisattvadharmā buddhadharmāś
S06psp_1u:2217_0_1: ca ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃgrahaṃ samavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti?
S06psp_1u:2218_0: bhagavān āha: tadyathā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2218_1_0: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhaṃ catvāry apramāṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā
S06psp_1u:2218_2: daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā asaṃpramuṣitadharmatā sadopekṣāvihāritā,
S06psp_1u:2218_3: ime subhūte kuśalā bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ śrāvakadharmāḥ pratyekabuddhadharmā bodhisattvadharmā buddhadharmāś ca ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃgrahaṃ samavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti.
S06psp_1u:2219_0: yac ca subhūte mahāyānaṃ yā ca dhyānapāramitā yā ca vīryapāramitāyā ca kṣāntipāramitā yā ca śīlapāramitā yā ca dānapāramitā,
S06psp_1u:2219_1: yac ca rūpaṃ yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā ye ca saṃskārā yac ca vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2219_2_0: yac ca cakṣur yac ca śrotraṃ yac ca ghrāṇaṃ yā ca jihvā yaś ca kāyo yac ca mano yac ca rūpaṃ yaś ca śabdo yaś ca gandho yaś
S06psp_1u:2219_2_1: ca raso yaś ca sparśo ye ca dharmā yac ca cakṣurvijñānaṃ yac ca śrotravijñānaṃ yac ca ghrāṇavijñānaṃ yac ca jihvāvijñānaṃ
S06psp_1u:2219_2_2: yac ca kāyavijñānaṃ yac ca manovijñānaṃ yaś ca cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo yaś ca śrotrasaṃsparśo yaś ca ghrāṇasaṃsparśo yaś ca jihvāsaṃsparśo
S06psp_1u:2219_2_3: yaś ca kāyasaṃsparśo yaś ca manaḥsaṃsparśo yā ca cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca śrotrasaṃsparśajāvedanā yā ca ghrāṇasaṃsparśajā
S06psp_1u:2219_2_4: vedanā yā ca jihvāsaṃsparśajā vedanāyā ca kāyasaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā,
S06psp_1u:2220_1_0: yāni ca catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni yāni ca samyakprahāṇāni ye ca ṛddhipādā yāni cendriyāni yāni ca balāni yāni ca bodhyaṅgāni
S06psp_1u:2220_1_1: yaś cāryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo yāni cāpramāṇāni yāni ca dhyānāni yāś cārūpyasamāpattayo yāni ca tathāgatabalāni yāni ca vaiśāradyāni
S06psp_1u:2220_1_2: yāś ca catasraḥ pratisaṃvido yāni ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni ye cāsaṃskṛtā dharmā yac ca duḥkhaṃ yaś ca samudayo yaś ca
S06psp_1u:2220_1_3: nirodho yaś ca mārgo yaś ca kāmadhātur yaś ca rūpadhātur yaś cārūpyadhātur yā cādhyātmaśūnyatāyā ca bahirdhāśūnyatā yā cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā
S06psp_1u:2220_1_4: yā ca yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā ye ca samādhayo yāni ca dhāraṇīmukhāni ye ca yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06psp_1u:2220_2: yaś ca tathāgatapravedito dharmavinayoyaś ca dharmadhātur yā ca tathatā yā ca bhūtakoṭir yaś cācintyadhātur yac ca nirvāṇaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2220_3: sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇāḥ.
S06psp_1u:2221_0: anena paryāyeṇa subhūte anulomatvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ mahāyānaṃ vyapadiśasi.
S06psp_1u:2221_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi subhūte anyan mahāyānam anyā prajñāpāramitā anyā dhyānapāramitā anyā vīryapāramitā anyā kṣāntipāramitā anyā śīlapāramitā anyā dānapāramitā,
S06psp_1u:2221_2: iti hi mahāyānañ ca prajñāpāramitā dhyānavīryakṣāntiśīladānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06psp_1u:2221_3: na subhūte anyan mahāyānam anyāni smṛtyupasthānāni iti hi mahāyānaṃ smṛtyupasthānāni cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06psp_1u:2221_4: evaṃ nānyan mahāyānam anye samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgā iti hi mahāyānaṃ ca samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgāś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06psp_1u:2221_5: nānyan mahāyānaṃ anyā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattaya iti hi mahāyānaṃ cāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06psp_1u:2221_6: nānyan mahāyānam anye daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā iti hi mahāyānaṃ ca buddhadharmāś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06psp_1u:2221_7: anena kāraṇena subhūte anulomatvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ mahāyānaṃ vyapadiśasi.
S06psp_1u:2223_0: subhūtir āha: api tu khalu punar bhagavan pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:2223_4: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatatā veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:2223_5: rūpaṃ [PvsP1-2:_138] bodhisattva iti, evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2223_6: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānaṃ bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:2223_8: evaṃ hi bhagavan sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ bodhisattvam anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi?
S06psp_1u:2224_0: api tu khalu punar bhagavan nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:2224_1: yathā ātmā ātmeti cocyate atyantatayā cānabhinivṛtta ātmā,
S06psp_1u:2224_2: evam asvabhāvānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ katamad rūpaṃ yad anabhinivṛttam,
S06psp_1u:2224_3: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ katamat tad vijñānaṃ yad anabhinivṛttaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2224_4_0: na tad rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā yac cānabhinivṛttaṃ na tad vijñānaṃ tat kim anabhinivṛttim anabhinivṛttau prajñāpāramitayām
S06psp_1u:2224_4_1: avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi? na cānyatrānabhinivṛtter bodhisattva upalabhyate yo bodhāya caret,
S06psp_1u:2224_5_0: saced evaṃ nirdiśyamāne bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipratisārī bhavati mānasaṃ nottrasyati
S06psp_1u:2224_5_1: na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_1u:2225_0: śāriputra āha: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi,
S06psp_1u:2226_2: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā?
S06psp_1u:2227_1: rūpaṃ bodhisattva iti, evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2227_2: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:2227_4: evam ahaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvam anupalabhamānaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2227_5: asamanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi?
S06psp_1u:2228_2: yad uta bodhisattva iti, yathā ātmā ātmeti cocyate atyantatayā cānabhinivṛtta ātmā,
S06psp_1u:2228_3_0: evam abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ katamad rūpaṃ yad anabhinivṛttaṃ katame te vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ katamat tad vijñānaṃ
S06psp_1u:2228_3_1: yad anabhinivṛttaṃ yac cānabhinivṛttaṃ na tad rūpaṃ ye [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:2228_4: _139] cānabhinivṛttā na vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā yac cānabhinivṛttaṃ na tad vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2228_5: tat kim anabhinivṛttam anabhinivṛttau prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi?
S06psp_1u:2229_1: na cānyatrānabhinivṛtte bodhisattva upalabhyate yo bodhāya caret?
S06psp_1u:2230_1_0: saced evam upadiśyamāne bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipratisārī bhavati mānasaṃ nottrasyati
S06psp_1u:2230_1_1: na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitām iti?
S06psp_1u:2231_0: subhūtir āha: sattvāsattayā āyuṣman śāriputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:2231_1: sattvaśūnyatayā āyuṣman śāriputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:2231_2: sattvaviviktatayā āyuṣman śāriputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:2231_3: sattvāsvabhāvatayā āyuṣman śāriputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:2231_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? sattvāsattayā śūnyatāviviktatāsvabhāvatā pūrvāntādīnām anupalabdheḥ,
S06psp_1u:2231_6: na cānyatra sattvāsattāśūnyatāviviktatāsvabhāvatā anyo bodhisattvo 'nyat pūrvāntādi iti hi yā ca sattvāsattā yāvad yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06psp_1u:2232_1: rūpaśūnyatayā rūpaviviktatayā rūpāsvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:2232_2: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānāsattayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:2232_3: vijñānaśūnyatayā vijñānaviviktatayā vijñānāsvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:2232_4: evam āyataneṣu dhātuṣu pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu ca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaitīti vaktavyam.
S06psp_1u:2233_1: dānapāramitāśūnyatayā dānapāramitāviviktatayā dānapāramitāsvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:2233_2: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāsattayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:2233_3: prajñāpāramitāśūnyatayā prajñāpāramitāviviktatayā prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti.
S06psp_1u:2233_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy āyuṣman śāriputra dānaśīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāpāramitāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ viviktatāyām [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:2233_6: na ca śāriputra anyā asattā anyā śūnyatā anyā viviktatā anyā asvabhāvatā anyo bodhisattvaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2233_7: anyā dānapāramitā anyā śīlapāramitā anyā kṣāntipāramitā anyā vīryapāramitā anyā dhyānapāramitā anyā prajñāpāramitā anyāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni,
S06psp_1u:2233_8: iti hy āyuṣman śāriputra yā cāsattā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvatā yāś ca ṣaṭ pāramitā yaś ca bodhisattvo yāni ca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni sarvam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_1u:2234_0: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:2234_1: adhyātmaśūnyatāsattayā śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:2234_2: evaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattayā śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti.
S06psp_1u:2234_3_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy āyuṣman śāriputra adhyātmaśūnyatāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ viviktatāyām asvabhāvatāyāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:2234_4: na ca śāriputra anyā asattā anyā śūnyatā anyā viviktatā anyā asvabhāvatā anyo bodhisattvo 'nyāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni,
S06psp_1u:2234_5_0: iti hy āyuṣman śāriputra yā cādhyātmaśūnyatā asattā śūnyatā viviktatā asvabhāvatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā asattā śūnyatā
S06psp_1u:2234_5_1: viviktatā asvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yāni ca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni sarvam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_1u:2234_6: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti.
