S06psp_1u:2235_0: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra smṛtyupasthanāsattayā śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:2235_1_1: śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti.
S06psp_1u:2235_2_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy āyuṣman śāriputra smṛtyupasthānāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ viviktatāyām asvabhāvatāyāṃ yāvad aṣṭādaśaveṇikabuddhadharmāsattāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:2235_3: na ca śāriputra anyā asattā śūnyatā viviktatā asvabhāvatā anyāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06psp_1u:2235_6_0: iti hy āyuṣman śāriputra yā ca smṛtyupasthānāsattā śūnyatā viviktā asvabhāvatā yāvad yo ca aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmāsattā
S06psp_1u:2235_6_1: śūnyatā viviktā asvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yāni ca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni sarvam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_1u:2235_7: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti.
S06psp_1u:2236_0_0: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra sarvasamādhyasattayā sarvadhāraṇīmukhāsattayā dharmadhātvasattayā tathatāsattayā bhūtakoṭyasattayā
S06psp_1u:2236_0_1: bhūtakoṭiśūnyatayā bhūtakoṭiviviktatayā bhūtakoṭyasvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti.
S06psp_1u:2236_1_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy āyuṣman śāriputra samādhyasattāyāṃ yāvad bhūtakoṭyasattāyāṃ bhūtakoṭiśūnyatāyāṃ bhūtakoṭiviviktatāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:2236_2_0: na ca śāriputra anyā asattā anyā śūnyatā anyā viviktatā anyā asvabhāvatā anyo bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ samādhir anyad dhāraṇīmukham
S06psp_1u:2236_2_1: anyo dharmadhātur anyā tathatā anyā bhūtakoṭir anyāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni.
S06psp_1u:2236_3: iti hy āyuṣman śāriputra yā ca samādhyasattā yāvad yā ca bhūtakoṭyasattā śūnyatā viviktatā asvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yāni ca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni,
S06psp_1u:2236_4: sarvam etad advaidhīkāram. anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti.
S06psp_1u:2237_0: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra śrāvakāsattayā śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:2237_1: pratyekabuddhāsattayā bodhisattvāsattayā sarvajñāsattayā sarvajñaśūnyatayā sarvajñaviviktatayā sarvajñāsvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti.
S06psp_1u:2237_2_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy āyuṣman śāriputra śrāvakāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ viviktatāyām asvabhāvatāyāṃ yāvat sarvajñāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:2237_3: na ca śāriputra anyā asattā anyā śūnyatā anyā viviktatā anyā asvabhāvatā anyaḥ śrāvako 'nyaḥ pratyekabuddho 'nyo bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ sarvajñaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2237_5_0: iti hy āyuṣman śāriputrayā ca śrāvakāsattā śūnyatā viviktatā asvabhāvatā yāvad yā ca sarvajñāsattā śūnyatā viviktatā asvabhāvatā
S06psp_1u:2237_5_1: yaś ca bodhisattvo yāni ca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:2237_7: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti.
S06psp_1u:2239_0: yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃ vadasi,
S06psp_1u:2239_2: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyeti,
S06psp_1u:2239_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? tadyathāpi nāma āyuṣman śāriputra yathā ākāśasya na pūrvanta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2240_0: evam evāyuṣman śāriputra rūpasya naiva pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhya upalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2240_2: na ca śūnyatāyāḥ pūrvānto vā aparānto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2240_4: vijñānasya naivapūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2240_6: na ca śūnyatāyāḥ pūrvānto vā aparānto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2241_0: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa rūpāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:2242_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tadyathāpi nāmāyuṣman śāriputra ākāśasya naivādir nānto na madhyam upalabhyate anantāparyantatayā ākāśam iti ca vyavahriyate.
S06psp_1u:2242_3: evam evāyuṣman śāriputra buddhadharmāṇāṃ nādir nānto na madhyam upalabhyate buddhadharmaśūnyatām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:2242_4: na ca śūnyatāyāḥ pūrvānto vā aparānto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2243_0: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa buddhadharmāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
S06psp_1u:2244_1: yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃ vadasi,
S06psp_1u:2244_2: kena kāraṇena rūpaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2244_3: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate iti?
S06psp_1u:2245_1: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra vijñānena śūnyam.
S06psp_1u:2245_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy āyuṣman śāriputra śūnyatāyāṃ rūpaṃ saṃvidyate nāpi śūnyatāyāṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_1u:2245_3: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, na śūnyatāyāṃ vijñānaṃ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_1u:2246_0: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa rūpaṃ bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:2246_2: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ bodhisattva iti, evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2247_0: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra dānapāramitā dānapāramitayā śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:2247_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi śūnyatāyāṃ dānapāramitā vidyate na śūnyatāyāṃ bodhisattvo vidyate,
S06psp_1u:2247_8: na śunyatāyāṃ prajñāpāramitā vidyate na śūnyatāyāṃ bodhisattvo vidyate.
S06psp_1u:2248_1_0: evaṃ samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādā indriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāni mārgo 'pramāṇāni dhyānāny ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ ṣaḍ abhijñā daśa
S06psp_1u:2248_1_1: tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā aṣṭādaśāveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:2248_2_0: dharmadhātur dharmadhātunā śūnyaḥ samādhiḥ samādhinā śūnyo dhāraṇimukhāni dhāraṇīmukhaiḥ śūnyāni sarvajñatā sarvajñatayā
S06psp_1u:2248_2_1: śūnyā mārgākārajñatā mārgākārajñatayā śūnyā sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñatayā śūnyā śrāvakayānaṃ śrāvakayānena śūnyaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ
S06psp_1u:2248_2_2: pratyekabuddhayānena śūnyaṃ buddhayānaṃ buddhayānena śūnyaṃ śrāvakatvena śrāvakaḥ śūnyaḥ pratyekabuddhatvena pratyekabuddhaḥ
S06psp_1u:2248_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi śūnyatāyāṃ tathāgato vidyate śūnyatāyāṃ bodhisattvo vidyate.
S06psp_1u:2249_0: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa rūpaṃ bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:2249_2: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ bodhisattva iti, evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2250_1_0: kena kāraṇenaivaṃ vadasi, evam ahaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvam anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan
S06psp_1u:2250_1_1: katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmīti?
S06psp_1u:2251_0: rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra rūpe rūpaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2252_2: rūpaṃ vedanā ca saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2253_3: rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskāreṣu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2256_0: cakṣur āyuṣman śāriputra cakṣuṣi na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2257_0: śrotraṃ cakṣuṣi na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ca ghrāṇena saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2258_1: ghrāṇaṃ cakṣuṣi śrotre ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2263_0: śabdaḥ śabde gandhe rase na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, śabdo 'nyeṣu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2264_0: evaṃ gandho gandhe 'nyeṣu ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2264_1: raso rase 'nyeṣu ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2264_2: sparśaḥ sparse 'nyeṣu ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2264_3: dharmā dharmeṣv itareṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:2265_0: cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurvrjñāne itaratra ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2266_0: evaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ manovijñānaṃ manovijñāne itaratra ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2268_0: evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparso manaḥsaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2269_0: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2269_1: tatrāpītarā itarāsu ca sā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2270_0_0: evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśajā vedanā ghrāṇasaṃsparśajā vedanā jihvāsaṃsparśajā vedanā kāyasaṃsparśajā vedanā manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā
S06psp_1u:2270_1: tatrāpītarā itarāsu ca sā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2271_1_0: evaṃ samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry apramāṇāni catvāri
S06psp_1u:2271_1_1: dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā
S06psp_1u:2272_1: adhyātmaśūnyatāpi yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2272_3: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāpi yāvad adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2274_1: evaṃ gotrabhūmir aṣṭamakabhūmir darśanabhūmis tanūbhūmir vītarāgabhūmiḥ kṛtāvibhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmir bodhisattvabhūmis tathāgatabhūmiḥ,
S06psp_1u:2275_1: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmī arhan pratyekabuddhaḥ pratyekabuddhatve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2275_7: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra sarvadharmāsaṃvidyamānatvena anupalambhena bodhisattvo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2277_2: yad uta bodhisattva iti, kena kāranenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi,
S06psp_1u:2277_3: āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:2277_4_0: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra nāma daśabhyo digbhyo na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati sarvadharmāṇām
S06psp_1u:2277_4_1: eva bodhisattvānāṃ nāmāpi na kutaścid eti na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:2277_5: āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ tathā hi yad rūpaṃ yad vedanā yat saṃjñā yat saṃskārā yad vijñānam iti nāmadheyaṃ na tad rūpaṃ na [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:2277_6: _147] vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam.
S06psp_1u:2277_7: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāmasvabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma,
S06psp_1u:2277_8: tena kāraṇenocyate bodhisattva iti nāmadheyamātram etad iti.
S06psp_1u:2278_0: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta dānapāramiteti,
S06psp_1u:2278_1: na ca dānapāramitāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni dānapāramitā,
S06psp_1u:2278_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? yac ca nāma yā ca dānapāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2278_3: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:2278_4_0: evaṃ nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta prajñāpāramiteti
S06psp_1u:2278_4_1: na ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_1u:2278_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca prajñāpāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2278_6: tasman nāmadheyamātram etat, yad uta bodhisattva iti, āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣipta yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:2278_7_0: nāmadheyamātram etad yad utādhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na cādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:2278_7_1: nāma na ca nāmni adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā,
S06psp_1u:2278_8_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cādhyātmaśūnyatā yā ca bahirdhāśūnyatā yā cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yā ca yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā
S06psp_1u:2279_0: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:2279_1: āgantukam etac chāriputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta smṛtyupasthānānīti,
S06psp_1u:2279_2: na ca smṛtyupasthāneṣu nāma na ca nāmni smṛtyupasthānāni.
S06psp_1u:2279_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yāni ca smṛtyupasthānāni ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2279_4_0: evaṃ samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāni pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo 'pramāṇāni dhyānāni ārūpyasamāpattayo
S06psp_1u:2279_4_1: daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvida āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad utāṣṭādaśāveṇikā
S06psp_1u:2279_4_2: buddhadharmā iti na ca buddhadharmeṣu nāma nāmni buddhadharmāḥ.
S06psp_1u:2279_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma ye ca buddhadharmā ubhayam etad na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2279_6: āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta samādhir iti,
S06psp_1u:2279_7: yāvat sarvajñateti, na [PvsP1-2:_148] ca sarvajñatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni sarvajñatā.
S06psp_1u:2279_8: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca sarvajñatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2280_0: yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃ vadasi,
S06psp_1u:2280_1: kena kāraṇenocyate yathā ātmā ātmeti cocyate,
S06psp_1u:2280_3: ātmā śāriputra atyantatayā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2281_0: atyantatayā āyuṣman śāriputra sattvo jīvaḥ poṣaḥ puruṣaḥ pudgalo manujo mānavaḥ kārako vedako jānakaḥ paśyako na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2282_0: atyantatayā āyuṣman śāriputra rūpaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2282_2: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, atyantatayā āyuṣman śāriputra vijñānaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2283_0: atyantatayā āyuṣman śāriputra cakṣur na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2283_2: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrānaṃ jihvā kāyo manaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2285_2: evam atyantatayā śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ manovijñānaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2286_2: evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2287_0: atyantatayā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2287_2: atyantatayā śrotrasaṃsparśajā vedanā ghrāṇasaṃsparśajā vedanā jihvāsaṃsparśajā vedanā kāyasaṃsparśajā [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:2287_5: atyantatayā manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2288_2: evam atyantatayā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2289_2: evaṃ atyantatayā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2290_2: evam atyantatayā samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2290_3: apramāṇāni dhyānāny ārūpyasamāpattayo daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06psp_1u:2290_5: atyantatayā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06psp_1u:2291_0: atyantatayā samādhayo dhāraṇīmukhāni na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06psp_1u:2292_0: atyantatayā śrāvakaḥ pratyekabuddho bodhisattvas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2293_0: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa ātmā ātmeti cocyate, atyantatayā cānabhinivṛtta ātmā.
S06psp_1u:2294_0: punar aparaṃ yad āyuṣman śāriputra evam āha,
S06psp_1u:2294_2: evam etat. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ.
S06psp_1u:2295_0: śāriputra āha: kasyāyuṣman subhūte nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ?
S06psp_1u:2296_0: subhūtir āha: rūpasyāyuṣman śāriputra nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2296_1: [PvsP1-2:_150] vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyāyuṣman śāriputra nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2297_1: evaṃ śrotrasya ghrāṇasya jihvāyāḥ kāyasya manaso nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2298_1: cakṣurvijñānasya śrotravijñānasya ghrāṇavijñānasya jihvāvijñānasya kāyavijñānasya manovijñānasya nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2298_2: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasya śrotrasaṃsparśasya ghrāṇasaṃsparśasya jihvāsaṃsparśasya kāyasaṃsparśasya manaḥsaṃsparśasya nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2298_3_0: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāyā vedanāyāḥ śrotrasaṃsparśajāyā vedanāyā ghrāṇasaṃsparśajāyā vedanāyā jihvāsaṃsparśajāyā vedanāyāḥ kāyasaṃsparśajāyā
S06psp_1u:2298_3_1: vedanāyā manaḥsaṃsparśajāyā vedanāyā nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2298_5: nāsti dānapāramitāyā nāsti śīlapāramitāyā nāsti kṣāntipāramitāyā nāsti vīryapāramitāyā nāsti dhyānapāramitāyā nāsti prajñāpāramitāyā nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ.
S06psp_1u:2298_7: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra anityāḥ sarvadharmā na kasyacid vigamena.
S06psp_1u:2299_0: śāriputra āha: katame te āyuṣman subhūte anityāḥ sarvadharmā na kasyacid vigamena?
S06psp_1u:2300_0: subhūtir āha: rūpam āyuṣman śāriputrānityaṃ na kasyacid vigamena,
S06psp_1u:2300_1: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputrānityaṃ na kasyacid vigamena.
S06psp_1u:2300_2_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra yad anityaṃ so 'bhāvaḥ kṣayaś ca evaṃ duḥkhā anātmānaḥ śāntāḥ śūnyā ānimittā
S06psp_1u:2300_2_1: apraṇihitā na kasyacid vigamena sarvadharmāḥ kuśalā anavadyā anāsravā niḥkleśā lokottarā vyavadānā asaṃskṛtāḥ.
S06psp_1u:2300_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra yo 'saṃskṛtaḥ so 'bhāvaḥ kṣayaś cānenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā na kasyacid vigamena.
S06psp_1u:2301_0: śāriputra āha: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte akūṭasthāvināśinaḥ sarvadharmāḥ.
S06psp_1u:2302_1: subhūtir āha: rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra akūṭastham avināśi.
S06psp_1u:2302_3: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra akūṭastham avināśi.
S06psp_1u:2302_5: evaṃ kuśalam akuśalaṃ sāvadyam anavadyaṃ sāsravam anāsravaṃ saṃkleśaṃ niḥkleśaṃ laukikaṃ lokottaraṃ saṃskṛtam asaṃskṛtaṃ saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ saṃsāro nirvāṇam akūṭastham avināśi.
S06psp_1u:2302_8: yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evam āha,
S06psp_1u:2302_9: kena kāraṇena rūpam anabhisaṃskṛtam evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ kena kāraṇena vijñānam anabhisaṃskṛtam iti.
S06psp_1u:2303_0: subhūtir āha: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra rūpam anabhinivṛttaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam anabhinivṛttam.
S06psp_1u:2303_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputrābhisaṃskarttā nāsti,
S06psp_1u:2304_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra abhisaṃskarttā nāsti,
S06psp_1u:2304_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra abhisaṃskarttā nāsti.
S06psp_1u:2305_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy abhisaṃskarttā nopalabhyate yāvat sarvadharmā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ.
S06psp_1u:2305_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy abhisaṃskarttā nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2305_4: yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃ vadasi,
S06psp_1u:2305_5: kena kāraṇena yad anabhinivṛttaṃ na tad rūpaṃna vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam iti.
S06psp_1u:2306_0: subhūtir āha: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra rūpaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2306_1: yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ na tasyotpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2306_2: yasya ca notpādo na vyayo na tasyānyathātvaṃ prajñāyate,
S06psp_1u:2306_3: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ na tasyotpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2306_4: yasya ca notpādo na vyayo na tasyānyathātvaṃ prajñāyate,
S06psp_1u:2306_5: evaṃ yāvat sarvadharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā ye ca prakṛtiśūnyās teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayas teṣāṃ nānyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
S06psp_1u:2307_0: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yad anabhinivṛttaṃ na tad rūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam.
S06psp_1u:2308_1: yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evam āha,
S06psp_1u:2308_2: kena kāraṇenaivaṃ vadasi, tat kim anabhinivṛttim anabhinivṛttau prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmīti,
S06psp_1u:2308_3: yathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra yā anabhinivṛttiḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā sā anabhinivṛttiḥ,
S06psp_1u:2308_4: iti hi prajñāpāramitā cānabhinivṛttiś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_1u:2308_6: tat kim anabhinivṛttim anabhinivṛttau prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmīti.
S06psp_1u:2309_0: yat punar āyuṣman sāriputra evam āha,
S06psp_1u:2309_1: na cānyatrānabhinivṛtter bodhisattva upalabhyate yo bodhāya cared iti,
S06psp_1u:2309_2: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nānyām anabhinivṛttim anyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:2309_3: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca bodhisattvaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_1u:2311_0: iti hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca rūpaṃ cādvyam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:2311_1: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:2311_2: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca vijñanaṃ cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:2312_0: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca cakṣuś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:2312_1: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:2312_2: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca manaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:2313_0: iti hy anabhinivṛttaś ca rūpaśabdagandharasasparśadharmāś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:2314_0: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca cakṣurvijñānaṃ cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:2314_1: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:2314_2: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca manovijñānaṃ cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:2315_0: iti hy anabhinivṛttaś ca cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:2315_1: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyasaṃsparśaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:2315_2: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca manaḥsaṃsparśaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:2316_0: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:2317_1: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgāś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:2317_2: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś cāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:2317_3: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:2317_4: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca daśabalavaiśāradyāṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06psp_1u:2317_5: yāvad iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca sarvadharmaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_1u:2317_6: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa nānyatrānabhinivṛtter bodhisattva upalabhyate yo bodhāya caret.
S06psp_1u:2318_0: yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evam āha,
S06psp_1u:2318_1_0: kena kāraṇenaivaṃ vadasi, saced bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evam upadiśyamāne cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipratisārī
S06psp_1u:2318_1_1: bhavati mānasaṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām iti,
S06psp_1u:2318_2_0: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmān nirīhān samanupaśyati māyopamān svapnopamān marīcyupamān
S06psp_1u:2318_2_1: pratiśrutkopamān pratibimbopamān pratibhāsopamān nirmitakopamān gandharvanagaropamān samanupaśyati.
S06psp_1u:2319_0_0: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evam upadiśyamāne cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipratisārī
S06psp_1u:2319_0_1: bhavati mānasaṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_1u:2320_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:2320_1: yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:2320_2: tasmin samaye rūpaṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati rūpam etad iti,
S06psp_1u:2320_3: yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:2320_4: tasmin samaye vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati vijñānam etad iti,
S06psp_1u:2320_5: tasmin samaye cakṣur nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati cakṣur etad iti,
S06psp_1u:2320_6: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvāṃ kāyaṃ mano nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati mana etad [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:2321_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:2321_1: tasmin samaye dānapāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati dānapāramiteyam iti.
S06psp_1u:2321_2: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_1u:2321_3: tasmin samaye prajñāpāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati prajñāpāramiteyam iti,
S06psp_1u:2321_4: tasmin samaye adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty adhyātmaśūnyateyam iti,
S06psp_1u:2321_5_0: tasmin samaye bahirdhāśūnyatām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate
S06psp_1u:2321_6: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:2321_7: tasmin samaye smṛtyupasthanāni nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati smṛtyupasthānānīmānīti,
S06psp_1u:2321_8: tasmin samaye samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādānīndriyāni balāni bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati mārgo 'yam iti,
S06psp_1u:2321_9: tasmin samaye apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati samāpattaya imā iti,
S06psp_1u:2321_10_0: tasmin samaye daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati
S06psp_1u:2321_10_1: nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati buddhadharmā ime iti.
S06psp_1u:2322_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:2322_1: tasmin samaye sarvasamādhidhāraṇīmukhāni nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati samādhidhāraṇīmukhānīmāni.
S06psp_1u:2322_2_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na samanupaśyati yāvad vyastasamastāni
S06psp_1u:2322_3_0: saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣān dharmān na samanupaśyati pāramitā na samanupaśyati apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattidaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān
S06psp_1u:2322_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpaṃ yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:2322_5: _155] saṃskārāṇāṃ yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānam iti hi vijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkaram.
S06psp_1u:2322_6: yo bhagavaṃś cakṣuṣo 'nutpādo na tac cakṣur yaḥ śrotrasya ghrāṇasya jihvāyāḥ kāyasya manaso 'nutpādo na tan mana iti hi manaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_1u:2323_0: yo bhagavan dānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dānapāramitā,
S06psp_1u:2323_2: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādo na sā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_1u:2323_3: iti hi prajñāpāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_1u:2324_0: yo bhagavann adhyātmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā adhyātmaśūnyatā,
S06psp_1u:2324_1: yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06psp_1u:2324_3: yo yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā,
S06psp_1u:2324_4: iti hi abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_1u:2325_0: yo bhagavan smṛtyupasthānānām anutpādo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06psp_1u:2326_0: yo bhagavann aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇām anutpādo na te 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā iti hi buddhadharmāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_1u:2327_0: yo bhagavan dharmadhātor anutpādo na sa dharmadhātuḥ,
S06psp_1u:2327_1: yas tathatāyā ākāśadhātor bhūtakoṭer acintyadhātor bodher yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñateti hi sarvākārajñatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_1u:2327_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy anutpādo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā.
S06psp_1u:2328_0: yo bhagavan rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2328_1: yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam,
S06psp_1u:2328_2: iti hi skandhāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_1u:2328_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vyayo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yaḥ pañcānāṃ skandhānāṃ vyayo na te pañca skandhāḥ,
S06psp_1u:2329_0: yo bhagavan dānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dānapāramitā,
S06psp_1u:2329_1: evaṃ [PvsP1-2:_156] yaḥ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyā,
S06psp_1u:2329_2: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā vyayo na sā prajñāpāramitā iti hi prajñāpāramitā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_1u:2329_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vyayo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yaḥ pāramitānāṃ vyāyo natāḥ pāramitā.
S06psp_1u:2330_0: yo bhagavann adhyātmaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā adhyātmaśūnyatā,
S06psp_1u:2330_1: iti hy adhyātmaśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_1u:2330_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vyayo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yo 'dhyātmaśūnyatayā vyayo na sā adhyātmaśūnyatā evaṃ yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06psp_1u:2330_3_0: yo 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad yo 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā
S06psp_1u:2330_3_1: iti hy abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_1u:2330_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vyayo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yo 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā.
S06psp_1u:2331_0: yo bhagavan smṛtyupasthānānāṃ vyayo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06psp_1u:2331_1: iti hi smṛtyupasthānāni ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkaram.
S06psp_1u:2331_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vyayo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yaḥ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ vyayo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06psp_1u:2332_0: evaṃ yaḥ samyakprahāṇānām ṛddhipādānām indriyāṇāṃ balānāṃ bodhyaṅgānāṃ yaś cāryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya vyayo na sa mārga iti hi mārgaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_1u:2332_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vyayo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yo mārgasya vyayo na sa mārgaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2333_0_0: evaṃ yo 'pramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnām abhijñānāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ yo 'ṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ
S06psp_1u:2333_0_1: buddhadharmāṇāṃ vyayo na te buddhadharmā iti hi buddhadharmāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_1u:2333_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vyayo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yo buddhadharmāṇāṃ vyayo na te buddhadharmāḥ.
S06psp_1u:2334_0: yat punar bhagavann ucyate, rūpam ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06psp_1u:2334_1: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, yat punar ucyate vijñānam ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06psp_1u:2334_2: yāvad yat punar ucyate rūpaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatety [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:2336_0: atha khalv āyuṣman śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:2336_1: katham āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:2337_0: subhūtir āha: yad āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃ vadasi,
S06psp_1u:2337_1: katamo bodhisattva iti, bodhir eva sattvas tenocyate bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:2337_2: tayā ca bodhyā sarvadharmāṇām ākārāñ jānāti na cātrābhiniviśate.
S06psp_1u:2338_3_0: vijñānasyākārāñ jānāti, na cātrābhiniviśate, evaṃ vyastasamastānāṃ skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ pratītyasamutpādasya saptatriṃśad
S06psp_1u:2338_3_1: bodhipakṣānāṃ dharmāṇām ākārāñ jānāti na cātrābhiniviśate,
S06psp_1u:2338_4: evam apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ pāramitānāṃ balānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidām āveṇikānāṃbuddhadharmāṇām ākārāñ jānāti na cātrābhiniviśate.
S06psp_1u:2339_0: śāriputra āha: katame te subhūte sarvadharmāṇām ākārāḥ?
S06psp_1u:2340_0_0: subhūtir āha: yair āyuṣman śāriputra ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmā vā adhyātmikabāhyā
S06psp_1u:2340_0_1: vā dharmāḥ saṃskṛtā asaṃskṛtā vā ākāryante ima ucyante sarvadharmāṇām ākārāḥ.
S06psp_1u:2341_0: yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃ vadasi,
S06psp_1u:2341_1: katamā prajñāpāramiteti, āratā āramitaiṣā āyuṣman śāriputra tenocyate prajñāpāramiteti,
S06psp_1u:2341_2_0: kuta āratā āramitā? skandhebhyo dhātubhya āyatanebhyaḥ pratītyasamutpadād dānapāramitāyāḥ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā
S06psp_1u:2341_3: adhyātmaśūnyatāyā bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā āratā āramitā,
S06psp_1u:2342_1: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa āratā āramitā eṣā yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_1u:2343_0: yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃ vadasi,
S06psp_1u:2343_1_0: katamā upaparīkṣaṇeti, ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na nityam ity upaparīkṣate
S06psp_1u:2343_1_1: nānityam iti na sukham iti na duḥkham iti nātmeti nānātmeti na śāntam iti nāśāntam iti na śūnyam iti nāśūnyamiti na nimittam
S06psp_1u:2343_1_2: iti nānimittam iti na praṇihitam iti nāpraṇihitam iti upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:2343_2: na viviktam iti nāviviktam ity upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:2343_3: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān,
S06psp_1u:2343_5_0: nānityam iti na sukham iti na duḥkham iti nātmeti nānātmeti na śāntam iti nāśāntam iti na śūnyam iti nāśūnyam iti na nimittam
S06psp_1u:2343_5_1: iti nānimittam iti na praṇihitam iti nāpraṇihitam iti upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:2344_0: evaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvāṃ kāyaṃ mano na nityam iti upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:2344_1_0: nānityam iti na sukham iti na duḥkham iti nātmeti nānātmeti śāntam iti nāśāntam iti na śūnyam iti nāśūnyam iti na nimittam
S06psp_1u:2344_1_1: iti nānimittam iti na praṇihitam iti nāpraṇihitam iti upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:2344_2: na viviktam iti nāviviktam ity upaparīkṣate.
S06psp_1u:2345_0: evaṃ rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmān na nityā iti nānityā iti upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:2345_1: na sukhā iti na duḥkhā iti nātmāna iti nānātmāna iti na śāntā iti nāśāntā iti na śūnyā iti nāśūnyā iti na nimittā iti nānimittā iti na praṇihitā iti nāpraṇihitā ity upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:2346_0: evaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ manovijñānaṃ na nityaṃ nānityam iti upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:2346_1: na sukham iti na duḥkham iti nātmeti nānātmeti na śāntam iti nāśāntam iti na śūnyam iti nāśūnyam iti na nimittam iti nānimittam iti na praṇihitam iti nāpraṇihitam iti upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:2346_2: na viviktam iti nāviviktam ity upaparīkṣate.
S06psp_1u:2347_0: evaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśaṃ ghrāṇasaṃsparśaṃ jihvāsaṃsparśaṃ kāyasaṃsparśaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśaṃ na nitya iti nānitya ity upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:2347_1: na sukha iti na duḥkha iti nātmeti nānātmeti na śānta iti [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:2347_2: _159] nāśānta iti na śūnya iti nāśūnya iti na nimitta iti nānimitta iti na praṇihita iti nāpraṇihita iti upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:2347_3: na viviktam iti nāviviktam ity upaparīkṣate.
S06psp_1u:2348_0_0: evaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayā
S06psp_1u:2348_0_1: vedanā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā manaḥsaṃsparśapṛtatyayā vedanā na nityā iti nānityā ity upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:2348_1: na sukhā iti na duḥkhā iti nātmā iti nānātmā iti na śāntā iti nāśāntā iti na śūnyā iti nāśūnyā iti na nimittā iti nānimittā iti na praṇihitā iti nāpraṇihitā iti upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:2348_2: na viviktā iti nāviviktā ity upaparīkṣate.
S06psp_1u:2349_0: evaṃ dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā na nityeti nānityety upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:2349_1: na sukheti na duḥkheti na ātmeti nānātmeti na śāntā iti nāśāntā iti,
S06psp_1u:2349_2: na śūnyā iti nāśunyā iti na nimittā iti nānimittā iti na praṇihitā iti nāpraṇihitā ity upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:2349_3: na viviktā iti nāviviktā ity upaparīkṣate.
S06psp_1u:2350_0: evam adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na nityeti nānityety upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:2350_1: na sukheti na duḥkheti nātmeti nānātmeti na śānteti nāśānteti na śūnyeti nāśūnyeti na nimitteti nānimitteti na praṇihiteti nāpraṇihitety upaparikṣate,
S06psp_1u:2351_0_0: evaṃ smṛtyupasthānāni na nityānīti nānityānīty upaparīkṣate na sukhānīti na duḥkhānīti nātmānīti nānātmānīti na śāntānīti
S06psp_1u:2351_0_1: nāśāntānīti na śūnyānīti nāśūnyānīti na nimittānīti nānimittānīti na praṇihitānīti nāpraṇihitānīty upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:2352_0_0: evaṃ samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādānīndriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo 'pramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo 'bhijñā daśatathāgatabalāni
S06psp_1u:2352_0_1: vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ samādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni sarvajñatā na nityeti nānityety upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:2352_1: na sukheti na duḥkheti nātmeti nānātmeti na śānteti nāśānteti na śūnyeti nāśūnyeti na nimitteti nānimitteti na praṇihiteti nāpraṇihitety upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:2353_0: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvao mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate.
S06psp_1u:2354_1: śāriputra āha: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi,
S06psp_1u:2354_5_0: evaṃ vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu pāramitāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu sarvabodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣv apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu
S06psp_1u:2354_5_1: baleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsu samādhidhāraṇīmukheṣv abhijñāsv aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu,
S06psp_1u:2354_6: yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñateti.
S06psp_1u:2355_0: subhūtir āha: rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra śūnyaṃ rūpeṇa,
S06psp_1u:2355_1: yā cāyuṣman śāriputra śūnyatā na tad rūpaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2355_2: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2355_3: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ vijñānena, yā cāyuṣman śāriputra śūnyatā na tad vijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2355_4: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yo vijñānasyānutpādona tad vijñānam.
S06psp_1u:2356_1: yā ca śūnyatā na sā dānapāramitā notpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2356_2: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yo dānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dānapāramitā,
S06psp_1u:2356_5: yā ca śūnyatā na sā prajñāpāramitā notpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2356_6: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādo na sā prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_1u:2357_1: yā ca śūnyatā na sā adhyātmaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2357_2: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādo na sā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_1u:2357_4: yā ca śūnyatā na sā adhyātmaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2357_5: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yo 'dhyātmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā adhyātmaśūnyatā,
S06psp_1u:2357_9: yā ca śūnyatā na sā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2357_10: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yo 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā.
S06psp_1u:2358_1: yā ca śūnyatā na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni notpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2358_2: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ smṛtyupasthānānām anutpādo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06psp_1u:2358_4: _161] daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaḥ samādhidhāraṇyaṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā sarvākārajñatā āyuṣman śāriputra sarvākārajñatayā śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:2358_5: yā ca śūnyatā na sā sarvākārajñatā notpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2358_6: anenāyuṣman śāriputra prayāyeṇa yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā.
S06psp_1u:2359_0: śāriputra āha: kiṃ kāraṇam āyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi,
S06psp_1u:2359_1: yo rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2359_3: yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam iti,
S06psp_1u:2359_4_1: baleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā vyayo na sāsarvākārajñatā.
S06psp_1u:2360_0: subhūtir āha: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra yaś ca vyayo yac ca rūpaṃ yac cādvaidhīkāraṃ yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā ye ca saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_1u:2360_1: yac ca vijñānaṃ sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighāḥ,
S06psp_1u:2360_2_0: ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇāḥ, evaṃ vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādapāramitābhijñāśūnyatābodhipakṣesu dharmeṣv
S06psp_1u:2360_2_1: apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu daśabalavaiśāradyāveṇikabuddhadharmasamādhidhāraṇīmukheṣu yaś ca vyayo yāvat sarvākārajñatāyac
S06psp_1u:2360_2_2: cādvaidhīkāraṃ sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo nidarśanā apratighāḥ,
S06psp_1u:2360_3: ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇāḥ, anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yo rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpam,
S06psp_1u:2360_5: yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam,
S06psp_1u:2360_6_1: daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu samādhidhāraṇīmukheṣu yāvad yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā vyayo na sā sarvākārajñatā.
S06psp_1u:2361_0: śāriputra āha: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi,
S06psp_1u:2361_1: yad idam ucyate rūpam ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛteti,
S06psp_1u:2361_2: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ, yad idam ucyate vijñānam ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛteti,
S06psp_1u:2361_3: yāvad yad idam ucyate sarvākārajñatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛteti.
S06psp_1u:2362_0: subhūtir āha: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra nānyo 'nutpādo 'nyad rūpam,
S06psp_1u:2362_1: anutpāda eva rūpaṃ, rūpam evānutpādaḥ, vedanā saṃjñā [PvsP1-2:_162] saṃskārā, nānyo 'nutpādo 'nyad vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2362_3: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yad etad ucyate rūpam ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06psp_1u:2362_4: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, yad etad ucyate vijñānam ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā.
S06psp_1u:2363_0_0: evaṃ vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣupāramitāsu bodhipakṣesu dharmeṣu sarvaśūnyatāsv apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu
S06psp_1u:2363_0_1: abhijñāsu baleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsu āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu samādhidhāraṇīmukheṣu tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra nānyo
S06psp_1u:2363_1: sarvākārajñataivānutpādaḥ, anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yad etad ucyate sarvākārajñatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā.
S06psp_1u:2364_0: punar aparam āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:2364_1: yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin samaye rūpasyānutpādaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:2364_2: atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyānutpādaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:2367_1: atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādaṃ paśyati,
S06psp_1u:2368_1: atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, evaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādaṃ paśyati,
S06psp_1u:2370_2_0: _163] anutpādaṃ paśyati, atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, evaṃ srotaāpannasya srotaāpannadharmāṇāṃ sakṛdāgāminaḥ sakṛdāgāmidharmāṇām
S06psp_1u:2370_2_1: anāgāmino 'nāgāmidharmāṇām arhato 'rhaddharmāṇāṃ pratyekabuddhasya pratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ bodhisattvasya bodhisattvadharmāṇāṃ
S06psp_1u:2371_0_0: śāriputra āha: yathāham āyuṣmataḥ subhūter bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi tathā rūpam anutpādo vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam anutpādo
S06psp_1u:2371_0_1: yāvad vyastā samastā skandhā anutpādo dhātavo 'nutpāda āyatanāny anutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādo 'py anutpādaḥ pāramitānutpādaḥ
S06psp_1u:2371_2: aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā anutpādaḥ sarvākārajñatā anutpādaḥ pṛthagjano 'nutpādaḥ pṛthagjanadharmā anutpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2371_3_0: evaṃ srotaāpannaḥ srotaāpannadharmāḥ sakṛdāgāmīsakṛdāgāmidharmāḥ anāgāmī anāgāmidharmā arhann arhaddharmā pratyekabuddhaḥ
S06psp_1u:2371_3_1: pratyekabuddhadharmā bodhisattvo bodhisattvadharmā buddho 'nutpādo buddhadharmā anutpādaḥ.
S06psp_1u:2372_0: yadi cāyuṣman subhūte rūpam apy anutpādo yāvad buddhadharmā apy anutpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2372_1: nanv āyuṣman subhūte prāptaiva śrāvakeṇa śrāvakabodhiḥ pratyekabuddhayānikena pratyekabuddhabodhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:2372_3: pañcānāñ ca gatīnāṃ bhedo na bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_1u:2372_4: prāptaiva bhavati bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcavidhā bodhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:2373_1: kim arthaṃ srotaāpannena trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāya mārgo bhāvayitavyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2373_3: anāgāminā pañcānām avarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāya mārgo bhāvayitavyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2373_4: arhatā pañcordhvabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāya mārgo bhāvayitavyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2373_7: yāni tāni sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo duḥkhāni pratyanubhavati,
S06psp_1u:2373_8: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā,
S06psp_1u:2373_9: [PvsP1-2:_164] kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena dharmacakraṃ pravartitam?
S06psp_1u:2374_0: subhūtir āha: nāham āyuṣman śāriputra anutpannasya dharmasya prāptim icchāmi nāpy abhisamayaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2375_0: nāham anutpādasya srotaāpannam icchāmi na srotaāpattiphalaṃ na sakṛdāgāminaṃ na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2375_1: nānāgāminaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ, nārhattvaṃ nārhattvaphalaṃ, nānutpādasya pratyekāṃ bodhim icchāmi na pratyekabuddhatvaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2376_0: nāham āyuṣman śāriputrecchāmi bodhisattvaṃ duṣkaracārikāṃ carantaṃ nāpi bodhisattvo duṣkarasaṃjñayā carati.
S06psp_1u:2376_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi śakya āyuṣman śāriputra duṣkarasaṃjñāyāṃ sthitvā aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām arthaṃ kartum.
S06psp_1u:2377_0_0: api tu khalu punar āyuṣman śāriputra mātṛsaṃjñāṃ sarvasattveṣu janayitvā pitṛsaṃjñāṃ bhrātṛsaṃjñāṃ putrasaṃjñām ātmasaṃjñāṃ
S06psp_1u:2377_0_1: janayitvā śakyo 'prameyāṇābm asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām arthaṃ kartum.
S06psp_1u:2378_0: api tu khalu punar āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃcittam utpādayitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2378_1: yathā ātmā ātmeti cocyate atyantatayā anutpanna ātmā,
S06psp_1u:2378_3: saced evaṃsaṃjñām utpādayiṣyati na duṣkarasaṃjñāṃ bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_1u:2378_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te bodhisattvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ kañcid dharmaṃ notpādayante nopalabhante.
S06psp_1u:2379_2: nāpi dharmacakrapravartanaṃ, nāpīcchāmy anutpannena dharmeṇānutpannāṃ prāptiṃ prāpyamāṇām.
S06psp_1u:2380_0: śāriputra āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte anutpannena dharmeṇa utpannā prāptiḥ prāpyate,
S06psp_1u:2380_1: atha utpannena dharmeṇa anutpannā prāptiḥ prāpyate?
S06psp_1u:2381_0: subhūtir āha: nāham āyuṣman śāriputra utpannena dharmeṇa anutpannāṃ prāptiṃ prāpyamāṇām icchāmi,
S06psp_1u:2382_0: śāriputra āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte anutpannena dharmeṇa prāptim icchasi,
S06psp_1u:2383_1: subhūtir āha: nāham āyuṣman śāriputra anutpannena dharmeṇa prāptim icchāmi,
S06psp_1u:2384_0: śāriputra āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte nāsti prāptir nāsty abhisamayaḥ?
S06psp_1u:2385_0: subhūtir āha: asty āyuṣman śāriputra prāptir asty abhisamayo na punar dvayam,
S06psp_1u:2385_1_0: api tu khalu punar āyuṣman śāriputra lokavyavahāreṇa prāptiś cābhisamayaś ca prajñapyate lokavyavahāreṇa srotaāpanno vā sakṛdāgāmī
S06psp_1u:2385_1_1: vā anāgāmī vā arhan vā pratyekabuddho vā bodhisattvo vā buddho vā prajñapyate na punaḥ paramārthena prāptir nābhisamayo na
S06psp_1u:2385_1_2: srotaāpanno na sakṛdāgāmī nānāgāmī nārhan na pratyekabuddho na bodhisattvo na buddhaḥ.
S06psp_1u:2386_0: śāriputra āha: anutpanno dharma ity āyuṣman subhūte pratibhāti mantrayitum.
S06psp_1u:2387_0: subhūtir āha: anutpanno dharmo 'nutpanno dharma ity āyuṣman śāriputra yad vadasi pratibhāti mantrayitum iti,
S06psp_1u:2387_1: anutpādo 'pi ye āyuṣman śāriputra pratibhāti mantrayitum.
S06psp_1u:2387_2_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra yaś cānutpanno dharmo yac ca pratibhānaṃ ye ca mantrā yā cānutpattiḥ sarva ete
S06psp_1u:2387_2_1: dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇāḥ.
S06psp_1u:2388_0: śāriputra āha: anutpādo 'py āyuṣman subhūte mantraḥ,
S06psp_1u:2388_1: anutpādaḥ pratibhānam anutpādo dharmas te 'pi dharmā anutpannā yān ārabhya pratibhāti mantrayitum.
S06psp_1u:2389_0: subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra anutpādo mantraḥ,
S06psp_1u:2389_1: anutpādaḥ pratibhānam anutpādo dharmas te 'pi dharmā anutpannā,
S06psp_1u:2389_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra rūpam anutpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2389_4: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam anutpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2389_5: evaṃ vyastasamastāḥ skandhadhātava āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaḥ pāramitāḥ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ sarvaśūnyatā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2389_6: abhijñāsamādhayo dhāraṇīmukhānibalāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā anutpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2389_7: srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmī arhan pratyekabuddho bodhisattvaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvākārajñaḥ sarvākārajñatāpy anutpādaḥ.
S06psp_1u:2390_0: śāriputra āha: evam etad āyuṣman subhūte anutpādo mantraḥ,
S06psp_1u:2390_1: [PvsP1-2:_166] anutpādaḥ pratibhānam anutpādo dharmas te 'pi dharmā anutpannā yān ārabhya pratibhāti mantrayituṃ,
S06psp_1u:2390_2: yāvat skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpadapāramitābodhipakṣā dharmāḥ sarvaśūnyatā sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni sarvasamādhayo balavaiśāradyapratisaṃvida āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ peyālaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2391_0: śāriputra āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte yathaiva lokavyavahāreṇa prāptiś cābhisamayaś ca,
S06psp_1u:2391_1: evaṃ pañcāṇāṃ gatīnāṃ saṃbhedo bhavati lokavyavahāreṇa paramārthato na bhavati.
S06psp_1u:2392_0: subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputraivam etat,
S06psp_1u:2392_1: yathaiva lokavyavahāreṇa prāptiś cābhisamayaś ca tathaiva lokavyavahāreṇa pañcāṇāṃ gatīnāṃ saṃbhedo bhavati nātra khalu punaḥ paramārthena.
S06psp_1u:2392_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra paramārthe na karma na vipāko notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānam.
S06psp_1u:2393_0: śāriputra āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte 'nutpanno dharma utpadyate utāho utpanno dharma utpadyate.
S06psp_1u:2394_0: subhūtir āha: nāham āyuṣman śāriputra utpannasya dharmasya utpādam icchāmi nāpy anutpannasya dharmasya utpādam icchāmi.
S06psp_1u:2395_0: śāriputra āha: katamasyāyuṣman subhūte anutpannasya dharmasyotpādaṃ necchasi?
S06psp_1u:2396_0: subhūtir āha: rūpasyāham āyuṣman śāriputra anutpannasya dharmasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06psp_1u:2396_1: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyāham āyuṣman śāriputra anutpannasya dharmasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06psp_1u:2396_2_0: evaṃ vyastasamastānāṃ skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ pratītyasamutpādasya pāramitānāṃ bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnām
S06psp_1u:2396_2_1: abhijñānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ balānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ
S06psp_1u:2396_2_2: bodher apy aham āyuṣman śāriputra anutpāpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi.
S06psp_1u:2397_0: śāriputra āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte utpāda utpadyate athānutpāda utpadyate?
S06psp_1u:2398_0: subhūtir āha: na hy āyuṣman śāriputra utpāda utpadyate nāpy anutpāda utpadyate.
S06psp_1u:2398_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra yaś cotpādo yaś [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:2398_2: _167] cānutpādo dvāv apy etau dharmau na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktau arūpiṇau anidarśanau apratighau ekalakṣaṇau yad utālakṣaṇau.
S06psp_1u:2399_0: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa notpāda utpadyate nāpy anutpāda utpadyate.
S06psp_1u:2400_0: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa anutpādo mantro 'nutpādaḥ pratibhānam,
S06psp_1u:2400_1: anutpādo dharmas te 'pi dharmā anutpannā yān ārabhya pratibhāti mantrayitum.
S06psp_1u:2401_0: śāriputra āha: dharmakathikānām āyuṣmān subhūtir agratāyāṃ sthāpayitavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:2401_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi āyuṣmān subhūtir yad yad eva paripraśnīkriyate tatas tata eva niḥsarati.
S06psp_1u:2402_0: subhūtir āha: dharmataiṣā āyuṣman śāriputra tathāgataśrāvakāṇām aniśritasarvadharmāṇāṃ te yato yata eva paripṛcchyante tatas tata eva niḥsaranti.
S06psp_1u:2402_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? yathāpi nāmāniśritatvāt sarvadharmāṇām.
S06psp_1u:2403_0: śāriputra āha: katham āyuṣman subhūte aniśritāḥ sarvadharmāḥ?
S06psp_1u:2404_0: subhūtir āha: rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ taṃ nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2404_1: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ taṃ nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2405_0: cakṣur āyuṣman śāriputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ taṃ nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2405_1: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mana āyuṣman śāriputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ taṃ nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2406_0: dānapāramitāpi āyuṣman śāriputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2406_1: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāpy āyuṣman śāriputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2407_0: adhyātmaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2407_1: evaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2408_0: smṛtyupasthānāni prakṛtiśūnyāni tāni nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2408_2: _168] balāni bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2409_0_1: te nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2410_1: prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya. evaṃ hi āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā rūpaṃ pariśodhayitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2410_4: āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaḥ sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ,
S06psp_1u:2410_5: apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo 'bhijñādaśabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ pariśodhayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_1u:2412_0: śāriputra āha: katham āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭpāramitāsu caran bodhisattvamārgaṃ pariśodhayati?
S06psp_1u:2413_0: subhūtir āha: asty āyuṣman śāriputra dānapāramitā laukikī asti lokottarā,
S06psp_1u:2413_1: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā asti prajñāpāramitā laukikī asti lokottarā.
S06psp_1u:2414_0: śāriputra āha: katamā āyuṣman subhūte dānapāramitā laukikī katamā lokottarā?
S06psp_1u:2415_0: subhūtir āha: laukikī āyuṣman śāriputra dānapāramitā iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dāyako bhavati dānapatiḥ,
S06psp_1u:2415_11: [PvsP1-2:_169] tasyaivaṃ bhavati, ahaṃ dadāmi eṣa parigṛhṇīte idaṃ dānam ahaṃ nirmatsaraḥ sarvasvaṃ parityajāmi,
S06psp_1u:2415_12: ahaṃ buddhājñāṃ karomi, ahaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ carāmi, aham etad dānaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayāmi tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:2415_13: anena ca dānena dānaphalena ca sarvasattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharme sukhitā bhavantu anupādāya parinirvāntu,
S06psp_1u:2415_14: sa tribhiḥ saṅgaiḥ sakto dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_1u:2415_15: katamais tribhir? yad utātmasaṃjñayā parasaṃjñayā dānasaṃjñayā ca ebhis tribhiḥ saṅgaiḥ sakto dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_1u:2415_17: tathā hi āyuṣman śāriputra lokato na calati noccalati na saṃkrāmati,
S06psp_1u:2416_0: tatra katamā lokottarā dānapāramitā? yad uta trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:2416_1: tatra katamā trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ? iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānaṃ dadan nātmānam upalabhate pratigrāhakaṃ nopalabhate dānaṃ ca nopalabhate,
S06psp_1u:2416_2: tad vipākaṃ ca nopalabhate, iyam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:2417_0: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānaṃ dadan sarvasattvebhyas tad dānaṃ niryātayati,
S06psp_1u:2417_1: sattvāṃś ca nopalabhate, ātmānaṃ ca nopalabhate, tac ca dānam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_1u:2417_2: na ca bodhim upalabhate. iyam ucyate lokottarā dānapāramiteti.
S06psp_1u:2418_0: kena kāraṇenocyate lokottarā dānapāramiteti? tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra lokāc calati uccalati saṃkrāmati,
S06psp_1u:2419_0: śāriputra āha: katamāyuṣman subhūte prajñāpāramitā laukikī, katamā lokottarā?
S06psp_1u:2420_0: subhūtir āha: laukikī āyuṣman śāriputra prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_1u:2420_1: iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānaṃ dadāti upalambhaniśrito mātsaryacittaṃ mayā nigrahītavyam iti,
S06psp_1u:2420_2: tac cātmasattvadānasaṃjñāniśritaḥ sarvasvaṃ parityajati bāhyaṃ vā adhyātmikaṃ vā vastu upāttaṃ vā anupāttaṃ vā nāsti kiṃcid yaṃ na parityajati,
S06psp_1u:2420_3: tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ bodhaye pariṇāmayati sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā upalambhaniśritaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2421_2: _170] tāṃś ca daśa kuśalān karmapathān sevamānaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2421_3: ātmadṛṣṭyāṃ sattvadṛṣṭyāṃ kuśaladṛṣṭyāṃ niśrito bodhim upalabhya sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni śīlāni bodhaye pariṇāmayati tac copalambhena,
S06psp_1u:2422_1: ātmasattvakṣāntidṛṣṭiniśritas tac ca kuśalamūlam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā upalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:2423_0: sa vīryam ārabhate kāyam upalambhamānaś cittam upalambhamānaḥ puṇyasaṃbhāram upalambhamānaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2423_2: ātmānam upalambhamānaḥ, bodhim upalambhamānas tena ca vīryārambhena manyate,
S06psp_1u:2423_3: tac ca sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā upalambhayogenānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati.
S06psp_1u:2424_0: sa maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāṃ bhāvayati dhyānasamāpattīḥ samāpadyate vyuttiṣṭhate ca tā āsvādayati,
S06psp_1u:2424_1: tā āsvādayan manyate sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni ca kuśalamūlāni upalambhadṛṣṭiko bodhāya pariṇāmayati.
S06psp_1u:2425_0: sa śūnyatāṃ bhāvayan rūpaṃ śūnyam ity upalabhate,
S06psp_1u:2425_1: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārān vijñānaṃ śūnyam ity upalabhate,
S06psp_1u:2425_3: tāni kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_1u:2425_5: ātmanaś ca pareṣāṃ ca puṇyam anumodate,
S06psp_1u:2425_6: ātmanaś ca parasya cārthāya upalabhamānaḥ sarvabuddhān adhyeṣayate,
S06psp_1u:2425_7: anupāyena triḥkṛtvaḥ puṇyaṃ sarvajñatāyai pariṇāmayati sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā.
S06psp_1u:2426_0: tatra katamā lokottarā prajñāpāramitā? ātmasattvadeyabodhyanupalabdhyā trimaṇḍalapariśuddhyā dānapāramitāṃ pariśodhayati,
S06psp_1u:2426_5: _171] pariśodhayati, bodhāya ātmasattvasarvadharmānupalabdhyā trimaṇḍalapariśuddhyā prajñāpāramitāṃ pariśodhayati,
S06psp_1u:2426_6: bodhāya sarvakuśalamūlāni cānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati nirviśeṣapariṇāmena,
S06psp_1u:2426_7: anuttarapariṇāmena, asamasamapariṇāmena, acintyātulyapariṇāmena, aprameyapariṇāmena. iyam ucyate lokottarā prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_1u:2427_0: kena kāraṇena laukikī? loko yābhir bhavati,
S06psp_1u:2427_1: lokaṃ vā yābhir nivartayati, lokena vā yāḥ samāḥ, lokāya vā yābhir dīyate, lokād vā yābhir niḥsarati, lokasya vā yā bhavāya, loke vā bhavā yās tā laukikasyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:2428_0: tatra katamā lokottarā? loko yābhir uttarati,
S06psp_1u:2428_1: lokaṃ vā yābhir uttārayati, lokena vā yābhir uttāryate, ālokāya vā yā bhavati, lokād vā yābhir niḥsarati, lokasya vā yā uttaraṇāya, loke vā yā uttarās tā lokottarā iti.
S06psp_1u:2429_0: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bodhimārgaṃ pariśodhayati.
S06psp_1u:2430_0: śāriputra āha: katama āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ?
S06psp_1u:2431_0: subhūtir āha: catvāry āyuṣman śāriputrai smṛtyupasthānāni bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2431_1_0: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāngo mārgaḥ śūnyatāvimokṣamukham
S06psp_1u:2431_1_1: ānimittavimokṣamukham apraṇihitavimokṣamukham adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā
S06psp_1u:2431_1_2: sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni catvāry apramāṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri
S06psp_1u:2431_2: ayam ucyate āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ.
S06psp_1u:2432_0: śāriputra āha: katamasyā āyuṣman subhūte pāramitāyā ayaṃ puruṣakāraḥ?
S06psp_1u:2433_0: subhūtir āha: prajñāpāramitāyā āyuṣman śāriputra ayaṃ puruṣakāraḥ.
S06psp_1u:2433_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra prajñāpāramitā janayitrī sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ bodhisattvadharmāṇāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ,
S06psp_1u:2433_3: _172] śāriputra pratigrāhikā sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ bodhisattvadharmāṇāṃ,
S06psp_1u:2433_4: prajñāpāramitāyām āyuṣman śāriputra śikṣitvā taiḥ paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā,
S06psp_1u:2433_5: anāgatā apy āyuṣman śāriputra tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante,
S06psp_1u:2433_6: ye 'py etarhi āyuṣman śāriputra daśasu dikṣu loke tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_1u:2433_7: te 'pi sarve ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ.
S06psp_1u:2434_0_0: sacet punar āyuṣman śāriputra asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ
S06psp_1u:2434_0_1: na bhavati dhanvāyitatvaṃ veditavyam etad āyuaṣman śāriputra viharaty ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena vihāreṇāvirahitaś
S06psp_1u:2434_0_2: cānena manasikāreṇa yad uta sarvasattvaparitrāṇāya sarvasattvāparityāgamanasikāreṇa mahākaruṇāmanasikāreṇa.
S06psp_1u:2435_0: śāriputra āha: yad āyuṣman subhūte evam āha,
S06psp_1u:2435_1: viharaty ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena vihāreṇāvirahitaś cānena manasikāreṇeti,
S06psp_1u:2435_2: evaṃ saty āyuṣman subhūte sarvasattvā api bodhisattva bhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_1u:2435_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣman subhūte sarvasattvā avirahitā manasikāreṇa.
S06psp_1u:2436_0: subhūtir āha: sādhu sādhu āyuṣman śāriputra upālapsye tvāṃ artha evāyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa bhūtapadābhidhānena parigṛhītaḥ.
S06psp_1u:2436_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? sattvāsattayāyuṣman śāriputra manasikārāsattā veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:2436_6: rūpāsattayā rūpaśūnyatayā rūpāsvabhāvatayā rūpaviviktatayā rūpānabhisaṃbodhanatayā manasikārānabhisaṃbodhanatā veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:2436_7: vedanā saṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānāsattayā vijñānaśūnyatayā vijñānāsvabhāvatayā vijñānaviviktatayā vijñānānabhisaṃbodhanatayā manasikārānabhisaṃbodhanatāveditavyā.
S06psp_1u:2437_1_1: sarvaśūnyatāsu sarvasamādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvitsu aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu sarvākārajñatāsattayā
S06psp_1u:2438_0: anenāyuṣman śāriputra vihāreṇānena ca manasikāraṇāvirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti.
S06psp_1u:2439_0: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāram adāt:
S06psp_1u:2439_1_0: sādhu sādhu subhūte, evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitopadeṣṭavyā yathā tvam upadiśasi yathāpi nāma
S06psp_1u:2439_1_1: tathāgatānubhāvenaivaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ yathā tvam upadiśasi.
S06psp_1u:2440_0_0: asmin khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitā parivarte āyuṣmatā subhūtinā bhāṣyamāṇe trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍ vikāraṃ prakampito
S06psp_1u:2440_0_1: yāvat pūrvottaradakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ vidiśy unnāmāvanāmaṃ gacchanti sma.
S06psp_1u:2440_1: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitam akarot.
S06psp_1u:2441_0: atha khalv āytiṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:2441_1: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kāḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prādurbhāvāya?
S06psp_1u:2442_0_0: bhagavān āha: yathaiva subhūte iha lokadhātau tathāgataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ nirdiśati tathaiva pūrvasyāṃ diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu
S06psp_1u:2442_0_1: lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣante,
S06psp_1u:2442_1: evaṃ samantād daśasu dikṣv asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nirdiśanti,
S06psp_1u:2442_2: asmin khalu punaḥ subhūtinā prajñāpāramitānirdeśe nirdiśyamāne dvādaśānām ayutānāṃ devamānuṣikāyāḥ prajāyā anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilambho 'bhūt,
S06psp_1u:2442_3_0: teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ samantād daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ bhāṣamāṇānām
S06psp_1u:2442_3_1: asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni.
S06psp_1u:2446_0: āryapañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāṃ bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām abhisamayālaṃkārānusāreṇasaṃśodhitāyāṃ sarvākārajñatādhikāraḥ subhūtiparivartaḥ prathamaḥ
